[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/mdo sde pha bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D152}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sA ga ra ma ti pa ri pr-its+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam 
[\[1b.2\]]po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab de bzhin gshegs 
[\[1b.3\]]pa'i spyod yul rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/_bsod nams chen po'i rgyan gyi tshogs bsags pa/_spyod pa chen po'i rgyu 'thun pa/_sangs rgyas 
[\[1b.4\]]kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gnas/_bstan pa mtha' yas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pas byin 
[\[1b.5\]]gyis brlabs pa/_chags pa med pa'i spyod yul gyi ye shes la 'jug pa/_dga' ba rgya chen po bskyed pa/_dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pas 'jug pa/_kun nas ma smad pa/_
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]ye shes kyis rnam par dpyad pa de la ma chags par rtogs pas 'jug pa/_bskal pa mu med par mngon par bstod pa/_yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad dpag tu med pa na bzhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mnyam pa 
[\[2a.2\]]nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor/_slob ma shin tu dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs ni mnga'/_chos thams cad la mnga' dbang ni brnyes/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa sgrub pa ni legs par mkhyen/_dbang 
[\[2a.3\]]po'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni brnyes/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms pa la ni mkhas/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa ni rgyun ma chad cing /_dge slong 'bum phrag drug cu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig ste/_
[\[2a.4\]]thams cad kyang cang shes kyi sems dang ldan pa/_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms pa la brtson pa/_chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras/_chos zab mo la gnas pa/_dmigs pa med pa'i chos 
[\[2a.5\]]kyis nges par byung ba/_spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/_sbyin gnas chen por gyur pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la shin tu zhugs pa sha stag go_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs 
[\[2a.6\]]pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa rab tu thob pa/_dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la zhugs pa/_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtsen pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]mi zad pa'i za ma tog rab tu thob pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba la dbang thob pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa rjes su thob pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lhun gyis grub 
[\[2b.2\]]pas nges par byung ba bkod pa'i rgyan gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa la shin tu gnas pa/_tshad med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_dpag tu med pa la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzod mi zad 
[\[2b.3\]]pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros tshad med pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa med pa'i bsam gtan pa zhes 
[\[2b.4\]]bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus gong na med ces bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus blo gros zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgyun mi 'chad pa zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[2b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chags pa med pa'i mi 'jigs pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don nges par brtags te blta ba zhes bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[2b.6\]]chen po tshad med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_dpag tu med pa dag dang yang thabs cig go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo byang chub sems 
[\[2b.7\]]dpa'i lam bkod pa la dmigs pa/_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su 'grub pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug pa/_so so yang dag par rig pas rnam par gdon 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]mi za ba la 'jug pa'i sgo/_mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes la 'bab pas 'jug pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo phyir mi ldog pa ston pa/_theg pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par 'du ba/_chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med de tshul 
[\[3a.2\]]gcig pa rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po'i tshul la 'jug pa ston pa/_snying po dang ldan pa/_chos rnam par gdon mi za ba dang /_bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/_tshul bzhin du chos kyi tshul la 'bab 
[\[3a.3\]]cing 'jug pa/_nyon mongs pa dang lta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dul ba/_chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa/_kun tu bsngo ba'i thabs la mkhas pa shes pa ston pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'jug pa/_chags pa med pa'i byin 
[\[3a.4\]]gyi rlabs kyi sgo chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par gdon mi za ba ston pa/_mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog ste/_mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo rtogs par byed pa/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po sogs pa/_sangs 
[\[3a.5\]]rgyas kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_mos pa dang /_shes rab mi zad pa mngon par sgrub pa/_nyan thos kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshul la 'jug pa/_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[3a.6\]]kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir lus dang sems rab tu dben par shes pa/_theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen par dbang bskur ba rab tu thob pa/_chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan 
[\[3a.7\]]brjod pa'i phyir gsung ngo /_/ston to/_/rab tu 'chad do/_/'dzin du 'jug go/_/klog tu 'jug go/_/shes par mdzad do/_/rnam par shes par mdzad do/_/rab tu shes par mdzad do/_/rab tu 'god do/_/rnam par 'byed do/_/rnam par 'grel to/_/gsal bar 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]mdzad do/_/yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don shin tu rnam par nges pa 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'og tu sa'i 
[\[3b.2\]]steng nas bzung ba yan cad rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi gzhi la thug pa'i bar dag tu chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtsho gcig ltar kun tu snang ste/_'di lta ste dper na/_bsreg pa'i bskal pa 'das nas chags pa 'byung ba'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 
[\[3b.3\]]thams cad chus yongs su gang bar 'gyur te/_chu'i dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su 'khor ba de bzhin du/_de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtsho gcig lta bur gnas par kun tu snang yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[3b.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams na grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams la yang sgrib pa med par kun tu snang ngo /_/'dzam bu'i gling rnams dang /_gling bzhi pa chen po rnams dang /_rgya mtsho chen po rnams dang /_
[\[3b.5\]]ri rab rnams dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la yang sngon ji ltar phyis kyang de bzhin du sgrib pa ci yang med par de kho na bzhin du kun du snang ngo /_/chu'i phung po de las kyang pad ma chu ba ni bai dUr+ya/_sdong bu ni an da rnyil/_lo ma ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser/_ze ba ni dpal 
[\[3b.6\]]gyi snying po/_snying po ni rdo'i snying po las grub pa/_mu tig gi dra bas ni khebs par byas pa/_'dab ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang ldan pa/_tshad ni rgyang grags kyi khyon tsam yod pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po byung ste/_de dag rin po che'i bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi gzhi 
[\[3b.7\]]las thal nas shing ta la'i srid du 'phags te/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang de'i tshe pad ma la 'khod par kun tu snang ngo /_/pad ma de dag las kyang 'od gang dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa dag snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa'i 'od 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]de lta bu dag byung ngo /_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas ji ltar snga ltas 'di dag kun tu snang ba las na/_kye ma'o 'di ni chos bstan pa chen por 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[4a.2\]]byams pas cho 'phrul chen po de mthong nas pad ma'i stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad ma'i snying po la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[4a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di chab kyis yongs su gtams pa'i rgya mtsho gcig lta bur kun tu gda' ba dang /_pad ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig mngon par byung ba 'di dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das sngon ma mthong ma thos 
[\[4a.4\]]pa'i cho 'phrul rgya chen po 'di dag kun tu gda' ba 'di dag su'i snga ltas lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams pa 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas 
[\[4a.5\]]kyi zhing 'di nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che dri ma dang bral ba dpag tu med pa bkod pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[4a.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i mchog mnga' ba'i blos rnam par rol pa mngon par 'phags pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa yod de/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho 
[\[4a.7\]]zhes bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dag dang lhan cig tu nga la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos bstan pa 'di las gtam gyi rgyud 'ga' zhig dri ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur te/_
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]'di ni de'i snga ltas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho thag ring po de srid cig na mchis shing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan lags sam/_
[\[4b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu khyod ji ltar nga'i mdun na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho yang 'jig rten gyi khams de na 'dug cing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan to/_/shA ri'i bu khyod kyis ji 
[\[4b.3\]]ltar nga dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di mthong bde bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos kyang nga dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di mthong ngo /_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kye ma'o ci tsam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[4b.4\]]po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_'di ltar thag ring po de srid na mchis kyang mig gis gzugs mthong ba la sgrib pa ma mchis shing rna bas sgra thos pa la sgrib pa ma mchis pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang 
[\[4b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yon tan gyi che ba nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos nas su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi bskyed/_gnas brtan shA ri'i bus bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe lha'i bu nyi khri bzhi stong 
[\[4b.6\]]gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis kun nas bskor te mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu/_
[\[4b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i mchog mnga' ba'i blos rnam par rol pa mngon par 'phags pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das des gnang ste/_sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_mngon par 'du 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /_sems gcig gis thob pa'i dran pas mig phye ba tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che'i dri ma dang bral ba dpag tu med pa bkod pas brgyan pa de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin 
[\[5a.2\]]te/_rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi gzhi las thal nas shing ta la bdun tsam du mngon par 'phags te pad ma'i snying po la 'dug par kun tu snang ngo /_/de las gzhan pa'i pad ma'i snying po rnams la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'khod par kun 
[\[5a.3\]]tu snang ngo /_/'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa dag nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu grangs med dpag tu med pa dag chos nyan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur to/_/
[\[5a.4\]]de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma la 'khod pa dag gis rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams shin tu rgyas pas mdzes te/_lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/de na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo 
[\[5a.5\]]mtshar du gyur te/_dga' ba dang /_dang ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba thob nas thal mo sbyar te/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag la phyag 'tshal to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtshos 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che dri ma dang bral ba dpag 
[\[5a.6\]]tu med pa bkod pas brgyan pa na yod pa'i me tog mya ngan med cing yid du 'ong ba mthong na dga' ba zhes bya ba 'dab ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa/_tshad rgyang grags kyi khyon tsam yod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'os pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[5a.7\]]bsam pas rnam par dag pa sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su sbyangs pa/_rnam par bkra ba/_mig tu sdug pa/_'khor thams cad tshim par byed pa kun nas 'od dang ldan pa kun nas shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i dri dang ldan pa'i me tog de 'dra ba dag mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar me tog gi char chen po mngon par phab ste/_me tog gi char des rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su mi bdun gyi 'phang tsam gyi me tog dgram pa bkram par gyur to/_/rab tu dben pa'i bsam gtan gyi zas zhes bya ba'i sil snyan 
[\[5b.2\]]yang bsgrags te/_sil snyan gyi sgra des thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin du bdag bde bas tshim par shes so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtshos bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa 'di lta bu 'di 
[\[5b.3\]]byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[5b.4\]]rgya mtsho'i mchog mnga' ba'i blos rnam par rol pa mngon par 'phags pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol to/_/byang chub 
[\[5b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan bdun bskor ba byas nas slar rang rang gi stan la 'khod do/_/de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pa zhes bya ba mya 
[\[5b.6\]]ngan med pa'i gling bzhi pa chen po na gnas pa/_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtsho gcig lta bu yang mthong /_pad ma rnam par bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa/_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong mngon 
[\[5b.7\]]par byung ba yang mthong /_rin po che bkod pa 'khor gyi khyams byang chub sems dpas gang ba yang mthong ste/_mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_bsreg pa'i bskal pa ni ma byung na chus 'jig pa 'di byung ste/_'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul 'di dag kun tu snang ba 'di la rgyu 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]ci yod/_bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/_bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos chen po 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags zhes zhu'o snyam mo/_/de nas tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pa/_
[\[6a.2\]]tshangs pa 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyis yongs su bskor te/_mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur te/_rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar steng gi bar snang la 'dug ste/_lus 
[\[6a.3\]]btud thal mo sbyar nas/_bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ci lags/_gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[6a.4\]]'di chab kyis yongs su gtams pa'i rgya mtsho gcig lta bur kun tu gda' ba dang /_pad ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig byung ba 'di dang /_de dag la yang skyes bu dam pa dag mchis pa 'di lta bu kun tu gda' yang bcom ldan 
[\[6a.5\]]'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams la yang sgrib pa ma mchis par kun tu gda' ba dang /_'dzam bu'i gling rnams dang /_gling bzhi pa chen po rnams 
[\[6a.6\]]dang /_rgya mtsho rnams dang /_ri rab rnams dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la yang sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin du sgrib pa ci yang ma mchis par de kho na bzhin du kun tu gda' ba de la/_bcom ldan 'das 'di su'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gyur snyam du bdag 
[\[6a.7\]]ngo mtshar cher gyur na 'di su'i snga ltas lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshangs pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das/_de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho mchog mnga' ba'i 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]blos rnam par rol pa mngon par 'phags pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che dri ma dang bral ba dpag tu med pa bkod pas brgyan pa nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[6b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dag dang lhan cig tu nga la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las gtam gyi rgyud 'ga' zhig yongs su dri ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 
[\[6b.3\]]'ong ba yin te/_gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di chus yongs su gang bar kun tu snang ba 'di lta bu 'di ni de'i rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis rlabs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das da dung yang 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[6b.4\]]'chang ngam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa la ni/_rgyun chad pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang med de/_gang gi tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung bar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe na yang /_da ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 
[\[6b.5\]]gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos rnam par nges pa'i gtam yang dag par rab tu ston te/_tshangs pa sangs rgyas kyi yul ni de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang 'di lta bu 'di rnam par sprul pa'i byang 
[\[6b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa khyod kyis pad ma dpag tshad bcu'i khyon tsam yod pa de'i dkyil na pad ma'i snying po la rin po che bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri 'phang du 
[\[6b.7\]]shing ta la bdun tsam pa srog chags bye ba phrag mang pos phyag byas pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa khyod kyis seng ge'i khri de la byang chub sems dpa' lus gser gyi kha dog tu 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]'dug pa/_lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa 'dug ste/_gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ma gtogs par gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i lus zil gyis mnan nas 'dug pa/_byang chub sems dpa' mang pos phyag byas 
[\[7a.2\]]pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ste/_'di ni de'i rnam par sprul pa'o/_/de nas tshangs pa snying rje chen 
[\[7a.3\]]po sems pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig_/gang dag byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i 
[\[7a.4\]]ming thos pa'i sems can de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang skyes bu dam pa 'di'i ming thos shing gzugs kyi lus kyang mthong bas bdag gis kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i 
[\[7a.5\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ji srid cig tu 'chad/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad gnas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag chos kyi 
[\[7a.6\]]rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /_rgyas par byed kyi bar du'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshangs pa 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni 'di'i nang du 'dus pa'i 
[\[7a.7\]]phyir ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtshos 'khor thams cad rgya cher yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang /_tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pa 'dun par bya ba dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di brgyan par bya ba dang /_bdag_
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]nyid kyi shes rab kyi dang /_spobs pa'i stobs nye bar bstan pa'i phyir pad ma dang lhan cig seng ge'i khri dang lhan cig tu steng gi bar snang la shing ta la bdun srid tsam na 'dug ste/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/khrag khrig sangs rgyas zhing rdul snyed kyi zhing 
[\[7b.2\]]rnams 'das pa'i 'og logs na/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gnas zhing yon tan kun ldan rab mdzes pa/_/de na 'dren pa'i bstan pa rgya mtshos blo thugs mtshungs pa med bzhugs te/_/der ni bdag gis thub pa'i chos thos gyur te thos nas de bzhin 
[\[7b.3\]]bzung /_/bdag ni stobs bcu ldan la blta bar bgyi dang de bzhin phyag bgyi dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog 'di rnams phan tshun dri slad 'dir mchis te/_/skyob la phyag bgyi bas ni chos rgyal mtshungs med khyod la 'dir phyag 'tshal/_/sangs rgyas mchod pa 
[\[7b.4\]]gang lags rgya chen shin tu rgyas pas mchod pa 'tshal/_/gang gis gzugs la gzugs su mi rtog tshor ba 'dus bgyis ma lags shing /_/rnam par shes pa'ang tshor gsum bzhin du rtag par shin tu rnam dag ste/_/gang zhig 'dren la mtshan du ma lags skyes dang rigs 
[\[7b.5\]]su ma lags rtogs/_/mig ldan des ni chos kyi rgyal po dri med yang dag don du mthong /_/bdag gam bdag med ces bya'i mtha' de gnyi ga mi len mi 'dor te/_/nang du gyur pa zhi zhing thugs kyang zhi ste phyi rol rgyu mi mnga'/_/mi rtog rnam mi rtog cing rtog bral thub 
[\[7b.6\]]pa'i thugs ni nam mkha' 'dra/_/des ni phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs chos kyi rgyal mtshan gsal mdzad rnams la mchod/_/gang blo sbyin pa rnams la 'di ni sgyu ma len pa stong pa nyid/_/g.yo ba med pa'i yid kyis nor rnams de dag re ba med par gtong /_/byang chub don du 
[\[7b.7\]]nges kyi lta bar nges min spros la gnas ma yin/_/gang blo sems can nyes pa mthar 'byin de ni sbyin bdag ser sna med/_/de ni rab tu zhi bas zhi ste ngag med yid med lus gdung med/_/gdung ba med pas bcing ba rgya chen bral te des pa dbang po zhi/_/bdag med theg par gnas 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]nas byang chub dmigs pa med cing de mi 'dor/_/khrims gnas blo ldan khrims 'chal mthar byed 'dod pa tshul khrims dri ma med/_/chos rnams skad cig par ni rtogs par shes bya rnams la smras pa med/_/nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i yid kyis 'gro 
[\[8a.2\]]ba 'di dag sgyu ma ji bzhin mthong /_/gang zhig lus ni dum bu dum bur bcad kyang yid ni khro mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig byang chub brtul zhugs gnas pa'i blo ldan mkhas de bzod pa smra/_/gang zhig chos rnams chu zla chu bur mnyam zhing sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra/_/rtogs nas 
[\[8a.3\]]mi min srog ma yin zhing shed bu ldan pa ma yin mthong /_/byang chub dang ni sems can tshogs mi dmigs kyang byang chub gzhan don brtson/_/tshul 'dir gang zhig skrag pa med pa de ni brtson 'grus tha mar phyin/_/gang gi sems ni yul la chags pa med cing the tshom yod 
[\[8a.4\]]min la/_/sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod pa dus gsum gyur pa'ang shes pa dang /_/gang sems spyod par gyur pa gang yin de yi bdud kyis mi shes pa/_/pha rol phyin thob bsam gtan dang ni mngon par shes la blo gros gnas/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung 
[\[8a.5\]]kun nyan cing de bzhin 'dzin byed pa/_/bskal pa dpag tu med par smras kyang spobs pa rgyun chad mi 'gyur te/_/sangs rgyas chos rtogs sems can mi ltung de ni gang du'ang gnas med pa/_/bcom ldan thub nyid mkhyen gter shes rab ldan zhing 'jig rten gsum na dpa'/_/gang 
[\[8a.6\]]zhig pha rol phyin pa'i pha rol gshegs kyang gshegs min ma gshegs min/_/gang zhig sems can spyod pa mthar phyin mi gnas g.yo ba mi mnga' zhing /_/yon tan kun mthar gang phyin yon tan rnams la rlom sems mi mnga' ba/_/thub pa'i dbang po shAkya sangs rgyas 
[\[8a.7\]]khyu mchog de la mgo bos 'thug_/'od zer rnam dag nyi mas srin bu me khyer 'od rnams zil gyis mnan/_/me lce rtse mthon bskal mtha'i me yis sa la ji snyed yod pa sreg_/ri mchog ri rab kyis ni sa la yod pa'i ri kun zil gyis mnan/_/shAkya khyu mchog spu 'dis 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]'jig rten gsum gyi 'od gzhan zil du rlag_/zhing brgya dag nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog ji snyed pa/_/de dag gtso bo khyod kyi mdog dang gzi brjid kyis ni tshim par gyur/_/gang dag smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar kun gyis 'thun par mthong /_/
[\[8b.2\]]bdag cag gang nas ma 'ongs rang gi zhing nyid na ni 'dug par shes/_/ji ltar gang gis rang rig de ltar khyod kyi gsung ni shin tu 'jug_/srid pa gsum na skad rnams ji snyed ci mchis de dang 'thun par 'jug_/rdul gyi rdul dang mi rnams kyi ni sems kyi bsam pa 
[\[8b.3\]]bgrang nus srid/_/thub pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad med nam mkha' 'dra 'di bgrang bar nus ma lags/_/nam mkha'i mtha' dang mi rnams kyi ni mtha' ma bgrang bar mi nus te/_/'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' ma nyid ni rnam pa kun tu bgrang mi nus/_/nam mkha'i 
[\[8b.4\]]mtha' dang 'khor ba'i mtha' ni mi yis bgrang bar nus kyang srid/_/sangs rgyas mkhyen dang ting 'dzin tshul khrims yul ni gang du'ang shes mi nus/_/gzhal yas bskal par gang gi bsngags pa brjod par sla ba ma lags pa/_/khyu mchog dpag yas chos 
[\[8b.5\]]kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/skye bo gang dag shes dang mos pas sangs rgyas che ba rjes rtogs pa/_/de dag gis ni blo gros bsam yas rmad byung kun lhag 'dren pa mthong /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtshos 
[\[8b.6\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas bar snang de las babs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[8b.7\]]kyis bdag la skabs phye na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_dris pa de dang de ngas lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/
[\[9a.2\]]de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu dkar ba dri ma med pa'i phyag 
[\[9a.3\]]rgya zhes bgyi ba mchis te/_ting nge 'dzin de la rab tu gnas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhes bdag gis thos na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[9a.4\]]kyi shin tu dkar ba dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ji ltar 'thob pa dang /_ci'i slad du shin tu dkar ba dri ma med pa zhes bgyi ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de legs par bshad du gsol/_ting nge 'dzin de la 'jug pa'i sgor 'jug pa gang thos 
[\[9a.5\]]nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bshad du gsol/_
[\[9a.6\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so/_/kye ma dri ba 'di bzang zhing dpyod pa de tshul bzhin yin te/_de'i phyir rigs kyi 
[\[9a.7\]]bu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis shin tu dkar ba dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ji ltar 'thob pa dang /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ngas bshad par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/blo gros rgya mtsho 'di 
[\[9b.2\]]la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa bas bstan pa yin te/_dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/_nges pa'i phung po la rab tu gnas pa/_tshogs bsags pa/_dbang po rno ba/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa/_sangs 
[\[9b.3\]]rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_rgyu'i stobs can yin te/_de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed/_bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_rim gror byed/_mchod par byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi gzugs phun sum tshogs 
[\[9b.4\]]pa mthong zhing gsung snyan pa thos te/_'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang mthong zhing chags pa med pa'i mkhyen pa yang thos la/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lam/_kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul lam/_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis sems can 'dul ba mdzad pa yang mthong nas 
[\[9b.5\]]sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyes te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/_dge ba'i chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson zhing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brjed pa med pas sems yongs su 
[\[9b.6\]]dag par rnal 'byor du byed do/_/de sems yongs su dag pas ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste/_dper na rigs 'phags pa'i nor bu rin po che nor bu mkhan mkhas pa'i lag tu son pa/_ji tsam na yongs su dag pa dang /_
[\[9b.7\]]shin tu dkar ba dang /_mthing bu dang bral ba dang /_skyon med par gyur pa de srid du yongs su sbyangs na/_skyes bu mkhas pa nor bu rin po che la mkhas pa rnams 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rigs 'phags pas thams cad mkhyen 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]par sems bskyed pa rin po che bskyed nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_ji tsam na mthing bu dang bral zhing rlom sems kyi mthing bu dang bral bar 'gyur ba de srid du/_byang chub 
[\[10a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyang ba bya ba dang /_thos pa la mkhas pa yongs su sbyang ba bya bas thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa'i rin po che de yongs su sbyangs na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'du zhing shin tu dkar ba dri 
[\[10a.3\]]ma med pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di yang 'thob bo/_/blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste dper na/_rigs 'phags pa'i nor bu rin po che de ni rin po che'i rigs dgu las shin tu 'das par 'byung ste/_dgu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gser gyi rigs dang /_dngul gyi rigs dang /_
[\[10a.4\]]shel gyi rigs dang /_bai dUr+ya'i rigs dang /_rdo'i snying po'i rigs dang /_spug gi rigs dang /_mu tig dmar po'i rigs dang /_ke sa ra'i rigs dang /_dpal gyi snying po'i rigs te/_nor bu rin po che'i rigs dgu po 'di dag las shin tu 'das nas/_dri ma med cing 
[\[10a.5\]]rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i rigs de las de rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po cher 'gyur te/_de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i yongs su spyad par 'gyur gyi/_de ma yin pa'i sems can phal pa gzhan rnams kyi ni ma yin te/_nor bu rin po che 
[\[10a.6\]]de'i 'od gang yin pa des ni de ma yin pa'i nor bu rin po che gzhan rnams kyi 'od mog mog por byed do/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa'i rin po che de yang rin po che'i rigs dgu las shin tu 'das par byung ste/_dgu gang zhe na/_'di lta 
[\[10a.7\]]ste/_so so'i skye bo dge ba'i rin po che'i rigs dang /_dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rin po che'i rigs dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rin po che'i rigs dang /_mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rin po che'i rigs dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa rin po che'i rigs dang /_/lan 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]cig phyir 'ong ba rin po che'i rigs dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rin po che'i rigs dang /_dgra bcom pa rin po che'i rigs dang /_rang sangs rgyas rin po che'i rigs dang /_rin po che'i rigs dgu po 'di dag las shin tu 'das nas bcu pa sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs 
[\[10b.2\]]pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa snying rje chen po'i rin po che'i rigs las thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa de rin po che 'byung ste/_de yongs su sbyangs na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis non cing /_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud rnams la yang 
[\[10b.3\]]snang bar byed do/_/blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che chen po de gang gi tshe/_sbyang bzod cing gnod pa bzod la/_phugs nas kyang nyes par ma gyur na/_nor bu rin po che chen po de ni 'di ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[10b.4\]]bskyed pa rnams la phan pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de yang gang gi tshe sbyang bzod cing gnod pa bzod la/_phugs nas kyang nyes par ma gyur na thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che skyon thams 
[\[10b.5\]]cad dang bral ba de 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de la thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de sbyang ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sdom pa gsum gyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su dag pa dang /_byams 
[\[10b.6\]]pa'i rjes su 'jug pas sems can thams cad la byams shing dang ba dang /_snying rje'i rjes su 'jug pas sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod snyam pa la brtson pa dang /_dga' ba'i rjes su 'jug pas sems can thams cad chos la sbyor ba dang /_btang snyoms kyi rjes 
[\[10b.7\]]su 'jug pas sems can thams cad la mi 'tshe zhing rtag tu sems drang ba dang /_g.yo dang sgyu med pas phan pa'i dngos po'i bsam par gyur pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad brtsam pa la lhag pa'i bsam pa sbyor ba dang /_cang shes kyi sems kyis dran pa dang shes 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]bzhin dang ldan pa dang /_sems shin tu dul bas sems las su rung ba dang /_dgang sla bas sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa'i cho ga dang ldan pa dang /_gso sla bas 'phags pa'i rigs chog shes pa dang /_bla ma dang sbyin gnas rnams 
[\[11a.2\]]la 'dud cing rab tu 'dud pa dang /_nga rgyal med pas khengs pa dang rtsod pa rnam par spong ba dang /_sems nges par sems pas nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal rnam par spong ba dang /_rnyog pa med pas sems gsal ba dang /_bdag la mi stod pas bdag shes pa la 'jug 
[\[11a.3\]]pa dang /_gzhan la mi smod pas sems can rjes su srung ba dang /_sman gyi sems kyis chos la gus pa dang /_de'i don so sor myong bas chos don du gnyer ba dang /_de la gzhol 'bab bab pas chos 'dod pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pas chos la 
[\[11a.4\]]dga' ba dang /_chos ma yin pa rnam par spong bas chos yongs su tshol ba dang /_rtag tu ngo tsha shes pas dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pas dge ba thams cad yid la byed pa'i bya ba la 'jug pa dang /_
[\[11a.5\]]drang bas spyod lam sbas pa dang /_khengs pa med pas mnyen pa dang /_zhi gnas yongs su tshol bas rgod pa dang bral ba dang /_blo brtan pas snyom las med pa dang /_rab tu mi g.yo bas sems ri dang mtshungs pa dang /_rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral 
[\[11a.6\]]bas sems sa dang mtshungs pa dang /_bsam pa dag pas sems chu dang mtshungs pa dang /_rlom sems med pas sems me dang mtshungs pa dang /_gnas med pas sems rlung dang mtshungs pa dang /_shin tu dri ma med pas sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa 
[\[11a.7\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi tshul 'khrugs pa med pa'i phyir rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba dang /_lus dben pa'i phyir dgon pa la dga' ba dang /_sems dben pa'i phyir chos la spyod pa dang /_de byed cing yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir tshig bden pa dang /_kha 'og tu 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]lus 'khrus par byed pa'i phyir ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang /_nyon mongs pas mi rdzi ba'i phyir sems dpa' ba dang /_shin tu nyams pa med pa'i phyir bslab pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba phra rab la yang 'jigs par lta ba'i phyir tshul khrims lhod pa 
[\[11b.2\]]med pa dang /_skye bar smon pa med pa'i phyir tshul khrims skyon med pa dang /_gcig tu dkar po spyod pa'i phyir tshul khrims thun tshags ma yin pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag sbyang ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang /_mig yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'od zer 
[\[11b.3\]]thogs pa med pa dang /_rna ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir sgra la thogs pa med pa dang /_sna yongs su dag pa'i phyir dri la thogs pa med pa dang /_lce yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro la thogs pa med pa dang /_lus yongs su dag pa'i phyir reg bya la thogs pa med pa dang /_yid 
[\[11b.4\]]yongs su dag pa'i phyir chos la thogs pa med pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni mi sdug pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang bral ba yin/_byams pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang bral ba yin/_rten cing 
[\[11b.5\]]'brel par 'byung ba la shin tu brtags pa'i phyir gti mug gi gdung ba dang bral ba yin/_dbang po rnams la shin tu brtags pa'i phyir sgrib pa dang bral ba yin/_stobs yongs su dag pa'i phyir sgrib pa yang dag par bsal ba yin/_'byung bar bya ba'i khams yongs su 
[\[11b.6\]]dag pa'i phyir kun nas ldang ba bsal ba yin/_yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyir 'dod pa dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_'jigs pa dang /_nga rgyal dang bral ba yin/_chos kyi sbyin pa la ser sna med pa yin/_zang zing gi sbyin pa la kun 'dzin pa'i sems 
[\[11b.7\]]med pa yin/_theg pa dman pa la 'dod pa med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi bsam pa yin/_dbang po sbas pa'i phyir nang nye bar zhi ba yin/_skyon shin tu mthong ba'i phyir phyi rol nye bar zhi ba yin/_sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa'i phyir 'khor bas skrag pa yin/_dge 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]ba'i rtsa ba sogs pas mi ngoms pa'i phyir yid yongs su mi skyo ba yin/_chu bo bzhi las bsgral ba'i phyir chos kyi gru chen po yang dag par sbyar ba yin/_pha rol du 'gro ba'i phyir stegs dang zam pa shin tu bcas pa yin/_thang la shin tu gnas 
[\[12a.2\]]pa'i phyir 'dam dang 'obs las brgal ba yin te/_blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe chos 'di lta bu de dag gis dag pa dang /_yongs su dag pa dang /_sbyin pa 'phags pa dang /_tshul khrims yongs su dag pa de ni thams cad 
[\[12a.3\]]mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de sbyong ba'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid bsdams shing /_/rnam par dag pa'i las lam bcu la slob/_/byams pas sems can kun 
[\[12a.4\]]la yang dag lta/_/'di ni thams cad mkhyen par sems sbyong yin/_/snying rje ldan pas gzhan gyi bya bar brtson/_/dga' dang ldan pas chos la pha rol sbyor/_/btang snyoms ldan pas chos mchog 'tshe ba med/_/'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin/_/rtag tu 
[\[12a.5\]]drang zhing g.yo ni rnam par spangs/_/gzhan la phan byed sdig pa rnam par spangs/_/lhag bsam dge ba ci yod rjes su 'jug_/'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin/_/shes rab rab 'jug dran dang shes bzhin can/_/sems rab dul bas sems ni las 
[\[12a.6\]]su rung /_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams dang gso sla ba/_/'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin/_/'phags rigs chog shes pa dang tshig mnyen dang /_/bla ma rnams la rtag tu 'dud byed dang /_/rtsod [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]nga rgyal spangs dang stobs ldan dang /_/brnyas dang 
[\[12a.7\]]log pa nam yang byed ma yin/_/sems ni nges sems mngon pa'i nga rgyal bral/_/rnyog pa med cing rab tu dang lags la/_/bdag shes pa la rim gyis 'jug par byed/_/gzhan la mi brnyas sems can rjes su srung /_/chos la gus par dga' zhing gus dang bcas/_
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]bsgrims te nyon mongs rnams ni spong bar byed/_/chos don gnyer zhing chos la rton par byed/_/rtag tu chos don gzhol zhing 'bab par byed/_/chos la brtson zhing nyon mongs med pa bsgoms/_/chos min spangs shing chos rnams yongs su tshol/_/dkon mchog 
[\[12b.2\]]gsum la dad pa mi phyed ldan/_/'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin/_/rtag tu 'dzem dang ldan zhing nyes spyod ldog_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun la ngo tshas sdom/_/khrel yod ldan zhing 'dir ni dbang po bsdams/_/'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems 
[\[12b.3\]]sbyong yin/_/rab tu sbyor bas las kyi bya bar 'jug_/bag yod pas na mtha' gnyis 'dzin mi byed/_/mkhas pa sten pa'i chos rnams rjes rtogs pa/_/'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin/_/spyod lam gyis ni drang ba'i dngos dang ldan/_/khengs pa 
[\[12b.4\]]med pas rtag tu mnyen pa nyid/_/zhi gnas cho ga ldan pas rgod pa med/_/'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin/_/blo ni rab tu brtan pas nyams pa med/_/lhag mthong la ni ri rgyal ji bzhin te/_/dam bcas brtan zhing bar skabs nyams pa med/_/'di 
[\[12b.5\]]ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin/_/sdug bsngal bde bas mi g.yos sa dang mtshungs/_/bsam pa dag pas chu ltar dri ma 'khru/_/rtag tu rlom sems med pas me dang mtshungs/_/gnas med rgyu bas rtag tu rlung dang 'dra/_/shin tu dri ma med pas mkha' 
[\[12b.6\]]mnyam sems/_/rab tu byung bas sangs rgyas bstan pa rnyed/_/lus ni dben zhing zhi bas dgon par dga'/_/sems dben pas ni chos kyi mchog la spyod/_/dge ba bden par smra dang yang dag smra/_/ji skad smras pa de ni de bzhin byed/_/nyon mongs mi rdzi dge 
[\[12b.7\]]la dpa' bo mchog_/shin tu bslabs pas bslab pa yang dag 'dzin/_/de la lhod pa nam yang yod ma yin/_/kha na ma tho chung la'ang rtag tu 'jigs/_/byang chub mchog rgyu'i tshul khrims nyams pa med/_/yon tan dkar spyod tshul khrims 'dres pa med/_/dge ba'i 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]bshes gnyen bsten cing sdig pa min/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems sogs bya phyir brtan/_/de ltar de yi mig ni dri med kyis/_/'jig rten kun la 'od zer mnyam par lta/_/mkhas pa de ni sna tshogs sgra thos nas/_/dga' med rangs pa med cing 
[\[13a.2\]]zhum pa med/_/blo ldan de ni sgra yi don rtogs shes/_/de yi rna ba de ltar rnam dag nyid/_/sna yis dri dang lce yis ro rnams dang /_/lus kyis reg dang yid kyis chos rnams la/_/reg gnas ma khengs ma dud zhum pa med/_/de ltar de yi dbang po dag pa nyid/_/chags 
[\[13a.3\]]pas mi chags sdang bas sdang ba med/_/gti mug ma rmongs mi sdug gnas pa can/_/byams la dga' zhing rkyen gyis chos sems pa/_/'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin/_/sgrib pa lnga po dag gis bsgribs pa med/_/de ltar des ni dbang po lnga yang bsgoms/_/
[\[13a.4\]]de ni gang du'ang sgrib med bcings pa'ang med/_/stobs rnams lnga po dag la rab tu gnas/_/kun nas ldang ba shes shing byung ba nyid/_/tshul bzhin ma yin spangs shing tshul bzhin gnas/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sten/_/yang dag spong dang rdzu 'phrul rkang par ldan/_/
[\[13a.5\]]byang chub yan lag sten dang rtag tu ldan/_/brtan pa de ni yan lag brgyad la mchog_/de ni 'dod dang sdang dang 'jigs mi 'gro/_/gti mug bral zhing dbang po shin tu bsdams/_/chos kyi sbyin la de ni ser sna med/_/slob dpon nam yang chos 'chab mi byed de/_/zang zing 
[\[13a.6\]]med par chos ni ston par byed/_/des na de ni byang chub sems dag 'gyur/_/de ni zang zing rnams la kun 'dzin med/_/rnam smin re med 'dod dgu gtong bar byed/_/sbyin dang snyan dang don byed don 'thun pas/_/de ni sems can brgya dag rab tu sdud/_/de yi byang chub sems 
[\[13a.7\]]ni brjed mi 'gyur/_/theg pa dman la nam yang re ba med/_/ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas yon tan mthong /_/de lta de ltar de bsam ri rab 'dra/_/nang ni rab zhi srid pa'i nyes pa mthong /_/de ni gzhan gyi 'khrul la lta mi byed/_/'dus byas nyes pa dag kyang shin tu mthong /_
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]'khor bas 'jigs pas sdig pa rnams mi byed/_/legs spyod khur khyer bas ni skyo ba med/_/zhing rnams sbyong bar 'dod pa nyams pa med/_/chos rnams yongs su bzung bas zhum pa med/_/sems can thar byed rgyu la 'jigs pa med/_/chu bo bzhi po dag las bsgral 
[\[13b.2\]]ba'i phyir/_/de ni chos gru yang dag sbyor bar byed/_/lus can mya ngan 'das lam gzud pa'i phyir/_/de ni stegs dang zam pa 'cha' bar byed/_/'dam las 'das shing 'obs las brgal nas ni/_/thang la gnas shing de dag 'jigs med gnas/_/'jigs pas 
[\[13b.3\]]g.yen spyo rnams la 'jigs med ston/_/bdag nyid rgal nas de dag gzhan yang sgrol/_/gang dag chos tshul 'di dag rnam dag cing /_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems brtan kha lo sgyur/_/de dag byang chub sems mchog rnam dag ste/_/nyon mongs dri mas gzhar yang 
[\[13b.4\]]gos mi 'gyur/_/ji ste nam mkha' nyon mongs bya bar nus/_/de la rjes kyang bstan par nus srid kyi/_/rang bzhin 'od gsal rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems/_/de ni nam yang nyon mongs byar mi nus/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che yongs su sbyang ba'i 
[\[13b.5\]]le'u ste dang po'o//_//'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa/_bam po gnyis pa/_blo gros rgya mtsho thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de'i gnod pa bzod pa ni ji lta bu/_thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de'i gnod pa ni 
[\[13b.6\]]gang zhe na/_blo gros rgya mtsho 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de ltar bskyed nas/_'phags pa ma yin pa tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can rnams sam/_bdud rnams sam/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams 
[\[13b.7\]]sam/_bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa rnams sam/_bdud kyi pho nya rnams kyis gtses sam/_rnam par gtses sam/_bskyod dam/_kun tu bskyod dam/_dkrugs sam/_kun tu dkrugs sam/_bsdigs sam/_brdegs kyang byang chub tu bsam pa'i sems 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]bskyed pa de las mi phyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba'i snying rje chen pos brtson 'grus brtsams pa las mi phyed pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad par bya bar brtson pa las mi phyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[14a.2\]]chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba las mi phyed pa dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa las mi phyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba mngon par sgrub par 
[\[14a.3\]]brtson pa las mi phyed pa dang /_lus dang srog 'dor zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par mngon par brtson pa las mi phyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la mngon par brtson zhing bdag bde ba la mi chags pa las mi phyed pa ste/_de de ltar lhag 
[\[14a.4\]]pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pas sems can thams cad kyis dpyas kyang bzod/_thing slad byas pa dang /_smad pa dang /_bshung ba byas kyang bzod/_sems can thams cad kyis spyos sam bsdigs sam ngan du brjod dam/_ngan du smras pa'i tshig gi lam 
[\[14a.5\]]yang bzod/_sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa yang bzod/_sems can thams cad kyi khur yang bzod/_sgrol bas kyang skyo ba med/_zhum pa med/_kun tu zhum pa med/_sgyid lug pa med/_yi chad pa med kyi stobs nye bar ston par byed/_mthu skyed par 
[\[14a.6\]]byed cing brtson 'grus rtsom la rtul bas rtul bar byed de/_spro bskyed cing rmongs pa'i sems mi 'dzin to/_/de spyos kyang slar mi gshe/_brdegs kyang slar mi rdeg_/khros kyang slar mi khro/_'khrugs kyang slar mi 'khrug ste/_de ltar sems can bgrang ba'i 
[\[14a.7\]]go cha gyon no/_/'di lta ste/_theg pa chen po 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'i theg pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can de dag ni rgyun gyi rjes su 'gro ba dag go_/bdag ni rgyun las ldog par rtsol bar 'dod pa'o/_/sems can de dag ni phan 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]tshun mi 'thun pa dag go/_/bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi mi 'thun pa spang ba'i phyir go cha bgos pa'o/_/sems can de dag ni gnod sems la dpa' ba dag go/_/bdag ni bzod pa dang /_nges pa yongs su tshol ba'o/_/sems can de dag ni gcig la gcig 
[\[14b.2\]]yongs su 'drid par gnas pa dag go/_/bdag ni shes rab kyis ngoms pa yongs su tshol ba'o/_/gal te sems can de dag phyogs bcu'i rab tu dbye bas rab tu phye ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ral gri dang /_mdung thung dang mda' bo che lag na thogs te/_bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang yang /_
[\[14b.3\]]sa phyogs gang du 'greng ngam 'dug gam 'chag gam nyal yang rung ste/_byang chub kyi sems skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_sbyin pa'i sems sam/_tshul khrims kyi sems sam/_bzod pa'i sems sam/_brtson 'grus kyi sems sam/_bsam gtan gyi sems sam/_
[\[14b.4\]]shes rab kyi sems sam/_thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs der da bdag lus rgya shug gi lo ma'i brgya cha tsam du gtubs sam/_rnam par gtor tam/_rnam par bcom mam/_sems can de dag thams cad las gzhan mi byed par rgyun 
[\[14b.5\]]tu gshe 'am/_bsdigs sam/_smod dam/_bshung ngam/_tshig ngan pa dang ngag rtsub po smra ba de ltar gyur kyang bdag gis sems can 'ga' la yang 'khrug pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sngon gyi mtha' nas 'khor ba tshad med par byas te/_
[\[14b.6\]]gang du bdag gis lus 'di sems can dmyal bar song ngam/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ngam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du song ngam/_mir gyur kyang rung ste 'dod pa'i zas kyi dri mas dri ma can du gyur nas chos thos pa dang mi ldan zhing yang ba'i 'tsho ba'i spyod yul 
[\[14b.7\]]don med pas 'tsho ba can du gyur te yan lag dang /_nying lag brgyar gshegs shing gtubs te phye zhing phral la bya ba rnam pa mang po byas kyang bdag gis gzhi de las bdag gi don byas kyis gzhan gyi don ma byas pa'i gal te sems can de dag thams cad kyis/_phyi 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]ma'i mthar bdag gis lus gshegs gtubs rnam par gtor rnam par bcom pa de lta bur gyur kyang bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa yongs su mi gtong ngo /_/sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ngo /_/dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa yongs su mi gtong 
[\[15a.2\]]ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lus gtubs pa'i lus kyi gnod pa 'di lta bu thams cad ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi/_brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/bdag ni sems can dmyal bar gnas par spro'i/_bdag gis sangs 
[\[15a.3\]]rgyas kyi chos gtang bar ni mi bya'o/_/sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba la dmigs pa'i snying rje chen po mi gtong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs te/_dge ba la ni bar chad mang ngo /_/mi dge ba'i phyogs la ni grogs 
[\[15a.4\]]byed pa mang ngo /_/dge ba'i phyogs la ni grogs byed pa nyung ngo zhes gsungs pas bdag gis mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi grogs mi bya'i dge ba'i phyogs kyi grogs bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la bzod par bya'i gnod sems su mi bya'o/_/sems can de dag la gang 
[\[15a.5\]]yod pa de ma byin na yang bdag la gang yod pa de bdag gis sbyin par bya ste/_sems can de dag la gnod sems dang khro ba dang /_'khon du 'dzin pa yod pa de dag de rnams kyis ma byin yang bdag la bzod pa dang des pa gang yod pa de bdag gis sbyin par bya'o/_/bdag 
[\[15a.6\]]gis bzod pa'i stobs bstan par bya'i gnod sems ni ma yin no snyam mo/_/blo gros rgya mtsho lus dang srog 'dor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no/_/gang gi gzhi las gnod sems 'byung 
[\[15a.7\]]ba'i chos de bdag gis spang bar bya'o snyam mo/_/chos de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste lus la dga' ba dang /_lus la gnas pa dang /_lus la chags pa ste/_lus btang na gnod sems kyang gtong ngo /_/blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar bgrang ba la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa bzod de mi skyo mi khro'o/_/de gnod pa gsum bzod de/_gsum gang zhe na/_lus kyi gnod pa dang /_ngag gi gnod pa dang /_sems kyi gnod pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de la byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[15b.2\]]lus kyi gnod pa bzod pa gang zhe na/_gang yan lag dang nying lag rnams bcad kyang chos nyid la rton te gang de'i lus gcod pa'i sems can de nyid la lta ba'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de la thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus gcod pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug 
[\[15b.3\]]bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros rgya mtsho ji ltar na thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus gcod pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/_gang lus 'dor ba dang lus yongs su gtong ba dang lus la mi lta ba 
[\[15b.4\]]'di ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang lus gcod pa na sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa dang /_tshor ba rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang lus yongs su gcod pa na gang dag de'i lus 
[\[15b.5\]]gcod pa de dag nyid rab tu thar bar bya ba'i phyir bzod cing sems kyi rma mi phyin te/_bzod pa'i stobs nye bar ston pa 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/brtson 'grus gang gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'dun pa mi 'dor zhing sems kyi stobs bskyed pa yang rab tu 
[\[15b.6\]]'dzin la 'khor ba nyid du mtshams kyang sbyor zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsam pa yang rtsom pa 'di ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang lus rnam par 'thor ba na thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che de mi brjed cing byang chub nyid la lta ba dang /_zhi ba dang rab tu zhi ba 
[\[15b.7\]]la so sor rtog pa 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang lus gcod pa na lus la rtswa dang /_rtsig pa dang /_shing dang /_rdo dang /_mig yor lta bur so sor rtog cing lus la sgyu ma'i chos nyid du 'jug pa dang /_yang dag par na mi rtag pa nyid dang /_
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]yang dag par na sdug bsngal ba nyid dang /_yang dag par na bdag med pa nyid dang /_yang dag par na zhi ba nyid du lus la rtog pa 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar na thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[16a.2\]]lus gcod pa na/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing theg pa chen po de las nyams par mi 'gyur te 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gnod pa bzod pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de la byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gnod pa bzod pa gang zhe 
[\[16a.3\]]na/_gang ngan du brjod pa'i tshig thams cad dang du len pa dang /_gshe ba dang /_bsdigs pa dang /_smad pa dang /_bshung ba dang /_bsdigs mo byed pa thams cad bzod pa dang /_yod pa'am/_med pas glengs pas kyang mi khro ba dang /_'khon du mi 'dzin 
[\[16a.4\]]pa dang /_bag la nyal spong ba'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de la thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan du brjod pa dang /_ngan du smras pa'i tshig gi lam dang /_gshe ba dang bsdigs pa dag pha rol las thos nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs 
[\[16a.5\]]su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros rgya mtsho ji ltar na thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ngan du brjod pa dang ngan du smras pa'i tshig gi lam dang /_gshe ba dang bsdigs pa dag pha rol las thos na pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/_
[\[16a.6\]]blo gros rgya mtsho 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan du brjod pa dang ngan du smras pa'i tshig gi lam dang /_gshe ba dang bsdigs pa dag pha rol las thos na dran pa 'di lta bu rab tu 'thob ste/_sems can 'di ni sngon nas ser sna can du gyur pa 'jungs pa 
[\[16a.7\]]ste/_ser sna'i dri mas kun nas kun tu bskor ba des gang dag de'i gnod sems kyi dri ma spang ba'i phyir/_chos ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la ma bsten/_gus par ma byas bsnyen bkur ma byas pa'o/_/bdag ni gtong ba la mos shing ser sna med par bya/_
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten par bya/_bsnyen par bya/_bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam ste/_de dag bsrung zhing gnod sems kyang spong ba 'di ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/_sems can 'di ni tshul khrims 'chal pa las 
[\[16b.2\]]ma mthong ba ste/_de ni bdag la gshe zhing bsdigs pa'o/_/bdag ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs pa las mi nyams par bya'o/_/gnod sems med par bya'o/_/byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsrung bar bya'o/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa la 
[\[16b.3\]]bsten par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/_sems can 'di ni zhe sdang gi shas che zhing gnod sems mang ba ste/_de ni bdag la gshe zhing bsdigs pa'o/_/bdag ni bzod pa'i stobs mang du byas 
[\[16b.4\]]te/_byams pa la gnas par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/_sems can 'di ni le lo can dge ba'i chos dang bral ba ste de ni bdag la gshe zhing bsdigs pa'o/_/bdag ni brtson 'grus brtsam par 
[\[16b.5\]]bya/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su btsal bar brtson pa la mi ngoms par bya ste/_sems can 'di byang chub kyi snying por sngar je 'jug par byas la phyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du/_de ltar go cha gyon pa 'di 
[\[16b.6\]]ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/_sems can 'di ni brjed ngas pa/_shes bzhin med pa/_nyon mongs pa nges par bsams pa ste/_de ni bdag la gshe zhing bsdigs pa'o/_/bdag ni nyon mongs pa nges par 
[\[16b.7\]]bsam par bya/_dran pa dang shes bzhin can du bya/_rtse gcig tu byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par bya ste/_sems can ma dul ba/_ma zhi ba/_ma sbas pa/_nye bar ma zhi ba 'di lta bu dag gi don du bdag gis go cha chen po bgos te 'di ltar sems nges par 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]sems su gzhug go/_/snyam pa 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/_sems can 'di ni shes rab 'chal pa/_bdag tu smra ba/_sems can du lta bar dmigs pa'i spyod yul ba ste de ni bdag la 
[\[17a.2\]]gshe zhing bsdigs pa'o/_/bdag ni chos nyid la bsten par bya'o snyam ste 'di la gshe ba dang khro ba su yin zhes des yongs su tshol ba na gang gshe ba dang khro ba'i chos de mi dmigs so/_/de bdag dang gzhan mi dmigs par lta ba dang bral bar bzod pa 'di ni de'i shes rab 
[\[17a.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar na thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ngan du brjod pa dang ngan du smras pa'i tshig gi lam dang /_gshe ba dang bsdigs pa dag pha rol las thos nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing theg pa 
[\[17a.4\]]chen po de las kyang mi nyams te 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gnod pa bzod pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gnod pa bzod pa gang zhe na/_gang bdud thams cad kyis byang chub kyi sems de las phral yang mi g.yo ba dang /_phas kyi rgol 
[\[17a.5\]]ba dmigs par lta ba la mngon par zhen pa thams cad kyis yang dag pa'i bsam par zhugs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de las mos pa bzlog kyang mi brjed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su 'dug kyang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems de las nyams par byed mi 
[\[17a.6\]]nus te bdud rdzu 'phrul rab tu chen po dag gis khyod kyis theg pa chen po yang dag par bsgrub par mi nus kyis khyod kyis gces par bya ba 'di thong shig_/khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'di 'or cig_/byang chub ni rnyed par dka' ba/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni rnyed par dka' 
[\[17a.7\]]ba ste 'dir 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mang du myong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag mya ngan las 'das pa de dag ni bde ba yin gyis skyes bu dam pa khyod myur du mya ngan las 'das par gyis shig ces de'i sems skul zhing sems dran par byed la/_blo gros rgya mtsho gal te byang chub 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de ltar bral bar byed de ltar mos pa zlog par byed kyang sngon gyi go cha mi 'dor zhing bsam pa rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed kyi de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis nges par byang chub kyi snying po mnan par bya/_bdag gis nges 
[\[17b.2\]]par bdud dpung dang bcas par 'pham par byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/_bdag gis nges par chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bya/_bdag gis nges par stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su chos kyi gtam 
[\[17b.3\]]chen po brjod par bya/_bdag gis sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_bdag dang gzhan gyi sems rig pa'i lha rnams kyis byang chub tu bsam pa rig gis/_bdag gis 
[\[17b.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi gnod pa bzod par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang lha rnams dang sems can thams cad dang bdag la bslu bar mi bya'o snyam pa 'di lta bu ni/_blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gnod pa bzod cing /_theg pa chen po de las mi phyed 
[\[17b.5\]]pa ste/_blo gros rgya mtsho 'di ni thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de'i gnod pa bzod pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha gang yin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gong na med pa gang yin pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gnyis yongs 
[\[17b.6\]]su rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gnod pa bzod pa'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/byang chub lam las bsam pa mi phyed cing /_/de ni snying rje las kyang phyed ma yin/_/bdag 
[\[17b.7\]]gis dkon mchog gsum po bsrung bar bya/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams yang dag bsgrub par bya/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis khyad 'phags mtshan dang dpe byad bzang /_/gang dag gis ni stobs bcu rnams kyis lus mdzes pa/_/de dag yongs su btsal phyir mchod sbyin bye 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]ba byed/_/gnod pa shin tu rnam mang bzod cing yon tan phyug_/brgya phrag mtha' yas zhing rnams de dag bdag gis sbyang /_/rin chen chos mchog 'di dag bdag gis bsrung bar bya/_/brgya phrag mtha' yas sems can de dag bdag gis dgrol/_/
[\[18a.2\]]des na gnod pa bzod cing bsam pa mi phyed do/_/phyogs bcu'i sems can khams ni mtha' yas ji snyed pa/_/thams cad 'dus par gyur nas lag na mtshon thogs te/_/de dag de la 'jigs sbyin gshe zhing bsdigs byed kyang /_/yon tan phyir ni bsdigs dang 'phya ba 
[\[18a.3\]]bzod par byed/_/sngon mtha'i bskal pa brgya phrag mtha' yas ji snyed par/_/de dag rgyun mi 'chad par tshig rtsub smras kyang ni/_/bdag nyid chen po de bzod mi khro gshe ba med/_/de ltar rtogs pa rnams ni gnod pa dag par 'gyur/_/sems can de dag lag na 
[\[18a.4\]]mtshon thogs lhan cig tu/_/bdag gi lus kyi yan lag dum bu dum bur gtubs/_/'on kyang bdag gi sems yid khro bar mi bya ste/_/byang chub yid la byas na gnod 'di dag par 'gyur/_/'greng ngam 'dug gam 'chag gam 'on te nyal yang rung /_/
[\[18a.5\]]gang du byang chub sems mchog 'di dag sbyin pa dang /_/dul ba'i sems dang gzhan yang dkar sems mi 'dor ba/_/der ni de'i lus dum bu dum bur rnam par 'thor/_/sems dmyal dud 'gro'i skye gnas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten mir/_/bskal pa brgya phrag mtha' yas 
[\[18a.6\]]don med lus kyang gtubs/_/sangs rgyas ye shes mngon par 'dod pas lus 'dor zhes/_/skyes bu des ni yid kyang yang dag tshim par byed/_/mi yi sdug bsngal rgyu ni rnam pa du ma dag_/mtshams med sdug bsngal brgya char nye bar mi 'gro ba'i/_/dmyal ba rnams 
[\[18a.7\]]su bskal pa brgyar ni gnas par spro/_/rgyal ba dang ni chos dang sems can mi gtong ngo /_/bdag lus mi rtag ring du mi thub sgyu ma 'dra/_/khams bzhi de dag gdug pa'i sbrul dang 'dra bar gsungs/_/bdag gis lus bor byas te dug med 'gyur bar bya/_/nyon mongs 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]dug zhi nas ni rang byung sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/srid gsum 'jig rten 'di ni lus bde 'gyur ba'i gzhi/_/'dod pa'i zas rgyu cung zad ji snyed 'jigs pa ste/_/bdag gis lus btang 'jigs pa med par 'gyur bar bya/_/bgrang ba 'di la zhugs pa de dag gnod 
[\[18b.2\]]pa bzod/_/nag po'i phyogs la grogs ni brgya stong phrag kyang mang /_/dkar po'i phyogs ni gang la'ang grogs po gcig pur 'gyur/_/bdag ni mi dge rnams dang rtsod par mi bya ste/_/sangs rgyas bzod pa gsungs pas bzod pa bdag gi grogs/_/phyogs 
[\[18b.3\]]bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag 'dir ni bdag gi dpang /_/ji ltar sangs rgyas sku la sems ni mi phyed de/_/sangs rgyas dang ni bdag nyid che lha bdag gi grogs/_/gnod pa bzod par bya yi sdang bar mi bya'o/_/gnod pa lus dang ngag yid rnam pa gsum du gsungs/_/gang 
[\[18b.4\]]bzod dpa' bo de ni mi phyed bzod pa yin/_/lus kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa mtha' yas yod pa dag_/gal te lus la bzod pa lus gnod dag par 'gyur/_/lus ni dum bu dum bur gtubs te rnam gtor tshe/_/thabs ldan che ba'i bdag nyid pha rol phyin rdzogs 
[\[18b.5\]]'gyur/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang /_/shes rab khyad 'phags dam pa skad cig tsam gyis 'dzin/_/lus dang lus la sred pa'i nyon mongs rnams kyang 'dor/_/sbyin dang rab tu ldan pa'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur/_/byams 
[\[18b.6\]]pas 'jig rten khyab byed tshul khrims nyams mi 'gyur/_/byang chub rjes su 'gro bas tshul khrims dag pa 'dzin/_/bzod pa'i stobs bskyed yan lag rnams dang nying lag gcod/_/de yang de yi bzod pa'i pha rol phyin la sbyor/_/brtson 'grus gces pa ma zhum 
[\[18b.7\]]bar skabs sgyid lug med/_/lus ni rnam par 'thor zhing brtson 'grus pha rol 'gro/_/byang chub sems kyi bsam pa dran pa mi 'dor zhing /_/nyon mongs mun pa'i rdul rnams bsal phyir rab tu brtson/_/lus bshig nas ni bsam gtan stobs dang rnam thar 'thob/_/
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]'dir yang rdul bral bsam gtan pha rol phyin la sbyor/_/bdag gi lus ni bdag med rmi lam glog dang 'dra/_/'di la byed pa po med tshor ba po yang med/_/lus kyi gzings pas bcings pa'i sems can bdag gis dgrol/_/shes rab 
[\[19a.2\]]'di ni khyad 'phags pha rol phyin pa mchog_/gang zhig 'di la sbyor zhing tshul bzhin chos sems la/_/lus kyi gnod pa bzod cing rab sdang mi byed de/_/mi snyan pa dang smad dang bshung ba'i tshig thos kyang /_/de ni zhe sdang mi 'gyur byams ldan sems kyang dul/_/tha ba 
[\[19a.3\]]rab tu zhe sdang bor 'di sbyin pa dag_/byams pa'i yid du gyur pa 'di ni tshul khrims dag_/bzod pa'i stobs bskyed 'di ni bzod pa dag pa yin/_/sangs rgyas ye shes 'dod nas brtson 'grus phyir zhing skyed/_/sems dang yid rab zhi ba 'di ni bsam gtan dag_/sgra skad 
[\[19a.4\]]mi rnyed 'di ni shes rab dag pa yin/_/mi yi tshig thos nas ni gang chos 'di sems pa/_/de 'dir gnod bzod dag gi skyon la chags pa med/_/bdud dang mu stegs can gyi lta gyur brgya stong gis/_/gnas 'di rnyed dkas sbyor ba 'ong brjod kyang /_/mi skrag zhum pa med cing 
[\[19a.5\]]phyi phyir mthu bskyed de/_/mkhas pa de ni gnod dang sems gnod mtha' yas bzod/_/gang zhig bzod dang brtson 'grus rab gnas ri rab 'dra/_/sems can kun nang dpa' bo de 'dir gnod pa bzod/_/stobs bcu rnams kyi sbyang ba dang ni gnod shes nas/_/byang chub rjes su 
[\[19a.6\]]'gro bas phyi nas lung ston to/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de la thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de'i 'bigs pa gang zhe na/_blo gros rgya mtsho 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che des rlom sems su mi byed 
[\[19a.7\]]de/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de la brten par mi byed gnas par mi byed/_len par mi byed/_'dor bar mi byed/_spros par mi byed/_rtog par mi byed/_rnam par rtog par mi byed kyi rnam par rtog par nye bar zhi ba la gnas pa yin te/_de chos zab 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]mo rnams la blos rnam par dpyod do/_/chos zab mo de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i lugs su 'byung ba dang /_rgyu la dmigs pa khong du chud pa dang /_rtag pa ma yin pa dang /_chad pa ma yin pa dang /_mthar lta ba dang bral ba 
[\[19b.2\]]dang /_rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa dang /_bdag ngo bo nyid med pas chos thams cad/_ngo bo nyid med pa dang /_gdod ma nas ma skyes pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_stong pa nyid la mos pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa la yid ches pa dang /_smon pa med pa la som nyi 
[\[19b.3\]]med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la de kho na'i blo dang ldan pa dang /_shin tu mi rtag pa nyid dang /_gzugs dbub dang mtshungs pa nyid dang /_tshor ba chu bur dang 'dra ba nyid dang /_'du shes smig rgyu dang mtshungs pa ste gnyis su med pa nyid dang /_'du byed 
[\[19b.4\]]rnams la chu shing dang mtshungs par so sor rtog pa dang /_rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bu'i chos nyid dang /_khams rnams g.yo ba med pa nyid dang /_skye mched rnams phan tshun du shes pa med pa nyid dang /_sems gnas pa med pa dang /_nga rgyal yid la mi byed pa dang /_
[\[19b.5\]]lhag par byed pa lhag par mi byed pa dang /_mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang /_tha dad du bya ba med pa dang /_ro gcig pa dang /_bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam la rab tu gnas pa dang /_lam gyi tshogs shes pa yongs su tshol ba dang /_nges pa'i don gyi don la 
[\[19b.6\]]rton pa dang /_don gyi rjes su zhugs pa'i blo dang /_skad thams cad la skad med par 'jug pa dang /_sgra thams cad la sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad par shes pa dang /_don dang tshig 'bru gnyis su med pa la 'jug pa shes pas don brjod du med 
[\[19b.7\]]par rtogs pa dang /_sdug bsngal shes pa ngar 'dzin pa med pa dang /_kun 'byung ba shes pa de shin tu zad pa dang /_'gog pa shes pa sgro btags pa med pa dang /_lam shes pa 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa dang /_lus la zhugs pa'i 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]dran pa sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mthar 'pho ba med pa dang /_tshor ba la zhugs pa'i dran pa skye ba dang 'jig par mi gnas pa dang /_sems la zhugs pa'i dran pa dmigs pa la shin tu brtags pa dang /_chos la zhugs pa'i dran pa chos kyi 
[\[20a.2\]]dbyings la ma yin pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba mnyam pas mnyam pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sems la dbang sgyur bar gyur pa dang /_dad pa'i dbang po chags pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dben pas nges par byung ba dang /_
[\[20a.3\]]dran pa'i dbang po dran pa med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po yid la byed pa med pa dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po spros pa las shin tu 'das pa dang /_dad pa'i stobs gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi stobs dmigs pa rtogs pa med pa dang /_dran 
[\[20a.4\]]pa'i stobs nyams pa med pa dang ldan pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs nges par sems par gyur pa dang /_shes rab kyi stobs mi 'khrugs pa'i rgyu 'thun pa dang /_dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dran pa med cing brjed pa med pa dang /_chos rnam par 
[\[20a.5\]]'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa dang /_brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag len pa med cing 'dor ba med pa dang /_dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dba' rlabs med pa dang /_rab tu sbyangs pa yang dag 
[\[20a.6\]]byang chub kyi yan lag lus dang sems la zhugs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa dang /_btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gnyis dang bral ba dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba lta ba thams cad spong ba dang /_yang 
[\[20a.7\]]dag pa'i rtog pa rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag sgra skad thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' lus dang /_sems kyi las dang bral ba dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba tshol ba 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]thams cad rgyun bcad pa dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba 'deg pa med cing 'jog pa med pa dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rnam par rig pa la mi 'jug pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi dmigs pa mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa dang /_zhi 
[\[20b.2\]]ba zhi gnas kyi mthar song ba dang /_lhag mthong lta ba rnam par dag pa dang /_skye ba med pa'i don mi rtag pa'i don dang /_gdod ma nas skye ba med pa'i don sdug bsngal gyi don dang /_rgyu ba med pa'i don bdag med pa'i don dang /_nye bar zhi ba'i don zhi ba'i don dang /_dul bas sbyin pa 
[\[20b.3\]]dang /_bsil ba'i dngos por gyur pa'i tshul khrims dang /_zad pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bzod pa dang /_shin tu rnam par phye bas rnam par 'byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_nad nye bar zhi ba'i bsam gtan dang /_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 
[\[20b.4\]]shes rab dang /_sems can gdod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i byams pa dang /_nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i snying rje dang /_dga' ba med pa'i dga' ba dang /_rtsod pa thams cad rgyun bcad pa'i btang snyoms dang /_chos thams cad 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang /_
[\[20b.5\]]sngon gyi mtha' nas stong pa dang /_phyi ma'i mthar dben pa dang /_da ltar byung ba na bdag med pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar gang chos zab mo rgyun chad pa tshig 'bru dang bral ba nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_'di lta bu 'di dag rtogs pa dang khong du chud pa dang 'jug pa shes pa la 
[\[20b.6\]]dpyod pa dang /_sems pa dang 'jal ba dang bgrang ba dang /_nye bar rtog pa dang nan tan byed pa 'di ni thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de 'bigs pa'o/_/de ltar thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de phigs na/_chos thams cad la dbang 
[\[20b.7\]]sgyur ba nyid lhun gyis grub pa nyid du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste dper na/_zla ba dang nyi ma'i gzhal med khang lhun gyis grub par rnam par rgyu zhing 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du/_snang bar byed kyang lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba 'di snyam du bdag cag 'gro'am 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]'on te ldog snyam du mi sems par sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pas de dag 'gro'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de bzhin du rab tu phigs pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang lhun gyis grub 
[\[21a.2\]]par sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dag na sems can gyi don byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni yang mngon par 'du byed pa med par bya ba de dag kun tu ston to/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de la byang chub sems dpa'i 'bigs pa shes pa gang yin pa de ni/_bsam 
[\[21a.3\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yongs su btsal bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par bzhag na lhag mthong gi chos rnams mthong gi mnyam par ma bzhag pas ni ma yin no/_/de'i mthong ba gang yin pa de 
[\[21a.4\]]ni shes rab ste/_shes rab des mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/gang mngon sum du 'gyur zhe na/_chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid la mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_mtshan nyid kyi gzhi de la kun tu mi spyod pa'o/_/
[\[21a.5\]]chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi gzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste rnam par rig pa ni chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'o/_/rnam par rig pa de'i yang dag pa ji lta ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de nyid ni chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o/_/gang gi tshe tshor ba thams 
[\[21a.6\]]cad rgyun bcad par gyur pa de'i tshe snang bar yang mi byed/_mi snang bar mi byed do/_/de la snang ba ni gang /_mi snang ba ni gang zhe na/_snang ba zhes bya ba ni skye ba'o/_/mi snang ba zhes bya ba ni 'gag pa'o/_/gang gi tshe snang bar yang mi byed mi snang bar yang mi byed pa de'i tshe/_skye bar 
[\[21a.7\]]yang mi byed 'gag par yang mi byed do/_/gang gi tshe skye bar yang mi byed 'gag par yang mi byed pa de'i tshe chos nyid la gnas pa yin te chos kyi dbyings 'khrugs par mi byed/_de bzhin nyid las mi g.yo/_yang dag pa'i mtha' 'jig par mi byed do/_/de la chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba ni 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rjes su rtogs pa'o/_/de bzhin nyid ni de kho na'i mtshan nyid khong du chud pa'o/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnyis su med pa'i yang dag par mngon par rtogs pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar mngon sum du shes pa rig pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[21b.2\]]dpa' chen po ni shin tu phigs pa shes pa zhes bya'o/_/sbyang ba dang gnod pa dang nges par 'bigs pa'i le'u 'di/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i tshe/_lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i srog chags khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[21b.3\]]sems bskyed do/_/srog chags khri drug stong gis bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/chos kun nges par rtogs pa yi/_/byang chub sems ni sgrogs par byed/_/de tshe des rtogs ye shes 
[\[21b.4\]]kyis/_/chos rnams kun la chags pa med/_/zab mo'i chos rnams khong du chud/_/mkhas pa skrag par 'gyur ba med/_/skrag med kun tu 'jigs med pas/_/khyad par 'phags par 'gyur ba yin/_/rgyu la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/brten pa'i chos rnams khong 
[\[21b.5\]]du chud/_/shes rab ldan de rjes 'thun byed/_/mtha' lta ba ni mi 'dzin to/_/rtag pa dang ni chad pa la/_/blo ni thogs pa yod ma yin/_/yang dag mtha' ni bsam yas pa'i/_/dbu ma'i mtha' ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/bdag gis mtha' yi rang bzhin gyis/_/chos 
[\[21b.6\]]rnams bdag med ngo bo nyid/_/chos kun de yi rang bzhin te/_/gdod nas ma skyes 'gag pa med/_/skyes pa med cing 'byung ba med/_/stong pa gzung med dri ma med/_/mtshan ma med cing spros pa med/_/nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs shing 'dra/_/de dag sems kyis mi smon par/_/
[\[21b.7\]]'dod cing chags pa rnam par spangs/_/gzugs kyi rang bzhin mngon sum du/_/dbub lta bur rab tu shes/_/tshor ba chu bur 'dra ba ste/_/'du shes smig rgyu'i mtshan nyid do/_/'du byed chu shing snying po 'dra/_/rnam par shes pa sgyu ma 'dra/_/khams bzhi g.yo ba med pa ste/_/
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i khams yin no/_/gang dag skye mched thams cad ni/_/bems po phan tshun spyod yul lo/_/sems ni nang na ma yin te/_/phyi rol du yang mi dmigs so/_/yid la nga yi yod ma yin/_/rnam par shes pa gnas pa med/_/chos 
[\[22a.2\]]rnams yid la mi byed de/_/lhag par byed pa rnam par spong /_/chos rnams thams cad mnyam nyid du/_/yang dag nyid du khong du chud/_/tha dad med cing ro gcig ste/_/gcig pu bgrod lam mnyam pa nyid/_/lam gyi shes pa rab tu rtogs/_/nges pa'i don gyi don rnams 
[\[22a.3\]]mthong /_/blo ni don gyi rjes su zhugs/_/skad ni skad med khong du chud/_/sgra rnams kun la sngon mtha' dang /_/phyi ma'i mtha' mar yongs su gcod/_/don dang tshig 'bru rnams la mkhas/_/chos rnams gnyis su med par rtogs/_/brjod du med pa'i don la ni/_/'di 
[\[22a.4\]]nyid yang dag khong du chud/_/skye ba med par sdug bsngal shes/_/kun 'byung ba la mnyam pa'i blo/_/'gog pa shes pa zad par bstan/_/lam shes pa ni 'dus ma byas/_/lus dang tshor ba sems dang ni/_/chos la chos su rjes su rtogs/_/dran med yid la byed med pa'i/_/
[\[22a.5\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ston/_/chos kyi dbyings ni dbyings min par/_/yang dag nyid ni mnyam pas mnyam/_/spong bas spang du med pa ni/_/yang dag spong bar rab tu bstan/_/sems la dbang ni thob pa yi/_/rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rab tu bstan/_/chags pa kun las rab 
[\[22a.6\]]'das pa/_/de ni dad pa'i dbang po yin/_/chos rnams thams cad rnam dben pa/_/de ni brtson 'grus dbang po yin/_/dran pa med cing dran 'jug pa/_/de ni dran pa'i dbang po yin/_/chos rnams yid la mi byed pa/_/de ni ting 'dzin dbang po yin/_/spros las shin 
[\[22a.7\]]tu rab 'das pa/_/de ni shes rab dbang po yin/_/yang dag nyid ni rtogs nas de/_/gzhan gyi dad pas 'gro ma yin/_/sems ni g.yo ba yod min pa/_/dad pa'i stobs ni 'di 'dra'o/_/yang dag shes las nyams pa med/_/dran pa'i stobs ni 'di 'dra'o/_/ting nge 'dzin 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]gyi stobs mdzod ni/_/des par sems la dga' ba yin/_/mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa/_/shes rab stobs ni 'di 'dra'o/_/chos rnams rtogs pa'i don du ni/_/byang chub yan lag rab tu bstan/_/mnyam ste mi mnyam med pa'i chos/_/yang dag lta ba yin zhes 
[\[22b.2\]]brjod/_/gnyis med chos la bsgom pa ni/_/skye ba med pa'i lam bsgom yin/_/skye ba med pa mi rtag don/_/'byung ba med pa sdug bsngal te/_/rgyu ba med pa bdag med don/_/zhi don nye bar zhi ba'i gnas/_/dul ba'i sems ni sbyin pa yin/_/zhi ba'i sems ni tshul 
[\[22b.3\]]khrims ldan/_/zad pa'i chos rtogs bzod pa yin/_/brtson 'grus rnam par phye bas rtogs/_/shin tu zhi ba'i bsam gtan te/_/shes rab yang dag rab shes pa/_/sems can gdod nas rnam dag don/_/byams pa zhes ni brjod pa yin/_/snying rje nam mkha' 'dra 
[\[22b.4\]]ba ste/_/dga' ba spyod pa dga' ba yin/_/rtsom pa thams cad rgyun chad pa/_/btang snyoms zhes ni rab tu bstan/_/'khor gsum yongs su chad par ni/_/chos rnams thams cad rab tu shes/_/chos rnams nges par 'bigs 'di ni/_/lta ba'i mdud pa gcod pa yin/_/
[\[22b.5\]]bsam gtan shes rab gang yin pa/_/der ni nges par 'bigs pa bstan/_/tshad med pa la 'jug pa ni/_/chos shes pa zhes brjod pa yin/_/gnod pa bzod pa dang nges par 'bigs pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[22b.6\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/_blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar na gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag pa dang yongs su dag par 'gyur te/_bsam pa bcos ma ma yin zhing sems can thams cad kyis gnod par byas kyang
