[\[43a.6\]]'grus de ni gang ming dang gzugs yongs su shes pa'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa 'gog pa'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang 'dzin pa dang /_'ching ba 'dor ba'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang sgrib pa rnams dang kun nas ldang ba rnams rnam par 
[\[43a.7\]]sel ba'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang 'gyod pa dang the tsom spong ba'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang mdud pa rnams dang zug rngu rnams yang dag par sel ba'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang dmigs pa dang /_rgyun chad pa las shin tu 'da' ba'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang nga rgyal dang 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]mngon pa'i nga rgyal rnam par spong ba'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang gzhi dang gnas las shin tu 'da' ba'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro spong ba'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang ma rig pa dang /_srid pa'i sred pa rab tu sbyangs pa'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni 
[\[43b.2\]]gang chags pa dang zhe sdang kun tu mi rgyu ba'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang gti mug dang so sor mi rtog pa dang bral ba'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang nang dang phyi'i skye mched rnams yongs su shes pa'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang phung po dang khams rnams gdod ma nas skye ba med pa'o/_/brtson 
[\[43b.3\]]'grus de ni gang sems zhi ba dang rab tu zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang rnam par bsams na chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med pa'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang chos nyid gnas par shes pa'o/_/
[\[43b.4\]]brtson 'grus de ni gang 'phro ba med cing mi 'phro ba med pa'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang len pa med cing 'dor ba med pa'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang byed pa med cing byed pa dang bral ba ma yin pa'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang 'deg pa med cing gzhag pa med pa'o/_/brtson 'grus de 
[\[43b.5\]]ni gang blang ba med cing dor ba med pa'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang la bcing ba med cing grol ba med pa'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang la gnon pa med pa dang /_pha rol gnon pa med pa'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang la rgyags pa med pa dang bag med pa ma yin pa'o/_/brtson 'grus 
[\[43b.6\]]de ni gang la bya ba med cing byed pa po med pa'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang lta bar mi byed pa dang rnam par lta bar mi byed pa'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang zhi bar mi byed pa dang rab tu 'bar bar mi byed pa'o/_/brtson 'grus de ni gang srung bar mi byed pa dang srung ba dang bral ba ma yin pa'o/_/
[\[43b.7\]]brtson 'grus de ni gang kun tu mi 'ong ba dang 'ong ba dang bral ba ma yin pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus 'bar bas/_/brtson 'grus dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam 'di dag rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad pa na srog chags khris mi skye 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' go cha sra bas bcom ldan 'das de las brtson 'grus bstan pa de thos nas dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson te/_brtson 'grus brtsams nas gnas par gyur 
[\[44a.2\]]to/_/de brtson 'grus brtsams te gces pa ma bor bar lo bye ba 'das pa dang chung ngu'i rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa rab tu thob bo/_/de brtson 'grus brtsams te dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson pas 'dug bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas so/_/de shi 'phos nas de 
[\[44a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi spyan sngar brdzus te skyes par gyur nas des yang de bzhin gshegs pa de las 'dus pa chen po'i le'u yi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur to/_/de yang chos yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson pas 'dug bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to/_/
[\[44a.4\]]blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa' des rnam grangs 'dis sangs rgyas brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag mnyes par byed cing /_gang dag bskal pa me tog gi 'byung gnas de la byung ba thams cad las brtson 'grus brtsams te/_dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson 
[\[44a.5\]]par gyur nas 'dug bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' go cha sra ba zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi'am yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[44a.6\]]zhe na/_blo gros rgya mtsho nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' go cha sra ba zhes bya bar gyur to/_/blo gros rgya mtsho ngas brtson 'grus 'di 'dra bas byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po dag phyir bsnyil to/_/blo gros rgya mtsho ngas de tsam du brtson 'grus brtsams pa de lta bu de 
[\[44a.7\]]dang tshegs de lta bus/_byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la ltos/_gang dag le lo can dang brtson 'grus dman par gyur pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de dag la byang chub yod par ga la 'gyur te de dag la byang chub shin tu ring zhing rnam par ring ngo /_/blo 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]gros rgya mtsho bstan pa 'di la brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni dag par 'gyur gyi le lo can ni ma yin no/_/blo gros rgya mtsho rnam grangs des na 'di ltar gang la brtson 'grus dang bag yod pa de la byang chub yod par rig par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis brtson 'grus dang rab tu ldan 
[\[44b.2\]]pa'i sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i srog chags bdun stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 
[\[44b.3\]]'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/ngas dran snga ma 'das pa'i dus na ni/_/bskal pa me tog 'byung gnas blta sdug la/_/shin tu rnam bltas 'jig rten khams mchog tu/_/brtson 'grus 'bar ba'i bde bar gshegs pa byung /_/bskal pa de la rgyal 
[\[44b.4\]]ba gang byung ba/_/de dag brgyad khri bzhi stong tham pa'o/_/'jig rten khams ni dga' ldan gnas 'dra ste/_/mi yi bza' dang btung ba bsams pas 'byor/_/bud med yod min mngal na gnas pa min/_/sems can thams cad brdzus te skye bar gyur/_/theg pa dman pa 
[\[44b.5\]]grags par ma gyur te/_/thams cad bdag nyid che ba'i theg chen zhugs/_/shin tu rnam bltas 'jig rten khams blta'i phyir/_/byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas lhags pa/_/de dag dga' ba'i rnam pa'i ting 'dzin thob/_/sngon chad ma mthong ba yi bde ba myong /_/rkang 
[\[44b.6\]]gnyis kyi ni tshogs gyur grags chen po/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu rtsa drug yod/_/gzhan yang lha dang mi ni mang po dag_/sangs rgyas theg pa mchog la zhugs par gyur/_/yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho drang srong che/_/de ni brtson 'grus bsngags pa yang yang brjod/_/de nas 
[\[44b.7\]]brtson 'grus brtan pa mkhas pa de/_/langs nas don 'di nyid ni rgyal la zhus/_/byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams gyur pa/_/ji tsam gyis ni brtson 'grus stobs la gnas/_/de don bcom ldan bdag la bshad du gsol/_/bdag ni de la rab tu nan tan 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]bgyid/_/de yi bsam pa mkhyen nas chos rje des/_/brtson 'grus las brtsams yon tan rab gsungs pa/_/rtsom pa dang ni de bzhin rtul ba dang /_/rtag tu so sor rtog dang sgrub pa'o/_/rtsom pa de ni byang chub sems zhes bya/_/rtul ba dge ba stong 
[\[45a.2\]]dag sgrub byed pa/_/so sor rtog pa sems can phan pa'i dngos/_/sgrub pa de byed chos la bzod pa yin/_/rtsom pa gus par byas te thos tshol ba/_/rtul ba brtan pa yang dag ston byed pa/_/so sor rtog pa 'di ni tshul bzhin brjod/_/sgrub pa gang tshe yang dag lta skye ba/_/
[\[45a.3\]]rtsom pa ser sna'i dri ma sel ba yin/_/rtul ba bdog pa thams cad yongs gtong ba/_/so sor rtog pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems/_/sgrub pa gang tshe rnam smin mi re ba/_/rtsom pa gtong ba chen po gang bsgrubs pa/_/rtul ba slong ba rnams la byams byed pa/_/so sor rtog 'di longs 
[\[45a.4\]]spyod mi rtag snyam/_/sgrub pa byin nas gdung ba med pa yin/_/rtsom pa chos kyis longs spyod gang tshol ba/_/rtul ba de ni 'tsho ba dag pa yin/_/bdag gis snying po blangs snyam so sor rtog_/sgrub pa sbyin pa sbyin pas rlom sems med/_/rtsom pa 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dri ma sel/_/
[\[45a.5\]]rtul ba tshul khrims brtul zhugs nyams pa med/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sbyin byed so sor rtog_/sgrub pa gang tshe tshul khrims rlom sems med/_/rtsom pa dag ni yongs su dag pa ste/_/rtul ba lus ni yongs su dag pa yin/_/so sor rtog pa gang yin 'di sems dag_/
[\[45a.6\]]sgrub pa gang yin chos rnams yongs su dag_/rtsom pa gnod sems go skabs med pa yin/_/rtul ba bzod pa'i stobs ni nye bar ston/_/so sor rtog pa bdag dang gzhan srung byed/_/sgrub pa gang tshe rlom sems gang med pa/_/rtsom pa gshe la rtag tu dad byed pa/_/rtul ba de dag 
[\[45a.7\]]thag ring spong ba ste/_/so sor rtog pa nang ni zhi ba yin/_/sgrub pa bdag dang gzhan du dmigs pa med/_/rtsom pa le lo'i dri ma sel ba ste/_/rtul ba brtson 'grus stobs dang mthu yin no/_/le lo can dag smin byed so sor rtog_/de byed chos la bzod pa sgrub pa yin/_/rtsom pa 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]bya ba yang dag sgrub byed pa/_/rtul ba bya ba nyams 'og chud par byed/_/theg pa gzhan la mi re so sor rtog_/sgrub pa las rnams chud mi gson pa yin/_/rtsom pa yang dag dran dang shes bzhin can/_/rtul ba chos rtogs pa la 'jug pa yin/_/blo gros kun tu bsrungs pa 
[\[45b.2\]]so sor rtog_/sgrub pa de la mos shing 'gyur ba med/_/rtsom pa rig pa rtul ba tshul yin te/_/so sor rtog pa de ni chos sgo yin/_/sgrub pa de ni 'byung ba rab tu shes/_/'di dag brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i sbyor ba yin/_/rtsom pa tshig 'bru kun tu 'dzin pa ste/_/rtul ba bstan pa 
[\[45b.3\]]yang dag ston par byed/_/so sor rtog pa sgra ni sel byed pa/_/sgrub pa chos rnams brjod pa med pa nyid/_/rtsom pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yin/_/rtul ba sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spong /_/thos nas chos nyid la ni so sor rtog_/sgrub pa chos rnams dang ni 'gal mi 
[\[45b.4\]]byed/_/rtsom pa sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu 'byung /_/rtul ba dga' ba thams cad spong ba yin/_/dge la gnas pa gang yin so sor rtog_/chos rnams 'gal ba med pa sgrub pa yin/_/rtsom pa dgon par dga' ba gang thob pa/_/rtul ba 'du 'dzi rnam par spong ba yin/_/dben 
[\[45b.5\]]par gnas par dga' ba so sor rtog_/sgrub pa gang yin nyon mongs med par gnas/_/rtsom pa 'dod pa chung zhing bka' blo bde/_/rtul ba de ni chog shes gyur pa yin/_/des par gang gyur de ni so sor rtog_/sgrub pa gang yin rung ba'i tshod shes pa/_/rtsom pa lhag pa'i tshul 
[\[45b.6\]]khrims slob ces bya/_/rtul ba'i tshul khrims lhod pa med pa yin/_/lhag pa'i sems slob 'di ni so sor rtog_/lhag pa'i shes rab slob pa sgrub pa mchog_/rtsom pa sbyin dang de bzhin tshul khrims yin/_/rtul ba bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus so/_/so sor rtog 'di 
[\[45b.7\]]bsam gtan shes rab ste/_/sgrub pa ye shes dang ni de bzhin thabs/_/rtsom pa 'jig rten zang zing chos sbyin pa/_/snyan par smra ba de ni rtul ba yin/_/don dpyod gang yin de ni so sor rtog_/sgrub pa don 'thun pa ste snying po yin/_/rtsom pa gang yin byams pa yongs su dag_/
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]rtul ba de ni snying rje ldan pa yin/_/dga' ba chos la so sor rtog pa ste/_/btang snyoms ye shes sgrub par brjod pa yin/_/rtsom pa zhing ni rnam par sbyong ba ste/_/rtul ba mtshan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed/_/so sor rtog pa dam chos yongs su 
[\[46a.2\]]'dzin/_/sgrub pa sems can yongs su smin par byed/_/rtsom pa gang yin phung po bdud sel ba/_/rtul ba nyon mongs bdud ni tshar gcod pa/_/so sor rtog pa 'chi bdag tshar gcod de/_/snying po sgrub pa bdud kyis ci byar yod/_/rtsom pa sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa 
[\[46a.3\]]ste/_/srid pa'i gnas med 'di ni rtul ba yin/_/lam sgom gang yin de ni so sor rtog_/'gog pa shes pa sgrub par brjod pa yin/_/rtsom pa lus la dran pa bcings pa med/_/rtul ba tshor ba la ni lta ba med/_/sems la dran pa 'di ni so sor rtog_/chos la dran pa sgrub pa dam 
[\[46a.4\]]pa yin/_/rtsom pa dad pa'i stobs dang de'i dbang po/_/rtul ba brtson 'grus stobs dang mthu yin te/_/dran dang ting 'dzin dbang po so sor rtog_/shes rab dbang po sgrub par brjod pa yin/_/rtsom pa mi dge rnam par spong zhes brjod/_/rtul ba gang yin dge ba chud mi gson/_/
[\[46a.5\]]lus dang sems kyang gang yin so sor rtog_/sgrub pa rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul zhes brjod/_/rtsom pa mkhas pa byang chub yan lag sgom/_/rtul ba gang tshe lam ni rtog pa yin/_/zhi gnas lhag mthong de ni so sor rtog_/rig dang rnam grol sgrub pa snying po yin/_/rtsom pa 
[\[46a.6\]]'jug pa rtul ba spyod pa yin/_/so sor rtog pa sems ni rab sbyangs pa/_/mtshan ma'i spyod yul thams cad gang log pa/_/de ni sgrub pa'i tshul du brjod pa yin/_/lus dang sems ni rab tu sbyangs pa dang /_/rgyu dang lta las rab tu 'da' ba dang /_/ming dang gzugs ni yongs su 
[\[46a.7\]]gang shes pa/_/de ni brtson 'grus mchog ces 'phags pas bsngags/_/nga dang nga yi zhes pa nam 'gag pa/_/de tshe bcings pa kun las rnam par grol/_/kun nas ldang med sgrib pa lnga las grol/_/mkhas pa the tshom dang ni 'gyod pa spangs/_/mdud pa rnams dang zug rngu 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]bsal ba gang /_/sgrib pa med cing rgyun chad yod pa min/_/nga rgyal mngon pa'i nga rgyal gang tshe spangs/_/de tshe brtson 'grus stobs kyis las byas yin/_/mtshan ma thams cad sel ba gang yin dang /_/spros pa thams cad 'jug pa med pa dang /_/nyon mongs thams 
[\[46b.2\]]cad spong ba gang yin pa/_/brtson 'grus de ni mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags/_/brtson 'grus 'bar bas rab tu bsngags pa'i tshe/_/brtson 'grus yon tan 'di dag thos nas ni/_/grags pa chen po stong phrag bcu kun gyis/_/mi skye'i bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[46b.3\]]'di thos nas ni stong phrag lnga zhig kyang /_/sangs rgyas zhing 'dir bzod pa rnam par sbyangs/_/mi dang lha dang lha min mi'am ci/_/bdun stong byang chub mchog la rab tu zhugs/_/de na gang gis brtson 'grus mchog reg pa/_/dge slong brtson 'grus brtan pa nga yin te/_/brtson 
[\[46b.4\]]'grus brtsams nas ngas ni lus btang ste/_/'dug bzhin de tshe 'chi ba'i dus byas gyur/_/brgyad khri las ni bzhi stong lhag pa la/_/bdag gis lus ni rab tu skams par byas/_/bskal pa gcig la 'dren pa mnyes byas te/_/bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' phyir bsnyil 
[\[46b.5\]]to/_/brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas tshangs pa chen po snying rje chen po sems pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 
[\[46b.6\]]zhes bya ba de la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba la de dag gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]de skad ces smras pa dang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshangs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba la 
[\[46b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba de ni chos thams cad kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su chad pa'i rnam pas tshad dang ldan par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ma yin gyi/_de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su ma 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]chad pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam pas tshad med par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/tshangs pa chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa ni byang chub ste/_tshangs pa de'i phyir chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[47a.2\]]chos rnams zhes bya'o/_/tshangs pa chos thams cad ci 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang de 'dra ba nyid do/_/chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid do/_/chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas sangs rgyas kyi chos dben pa nyid 
[\[47a.3\]]du khong du chud par bya'o/_/chos thams cad stong pas sangs rgyas kyi chos stong pa nyid du khong du chud par bya'o/_/tshangs pa chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dag ste rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba khong du chud pa ni byang chub bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad ji 
[\[47a.4\]]ltar gzigs pa ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang de 'dra ba nyid do/_/tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pas smras pa/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams khams gsum las shin tu 'das pa ma yin nam/_blo gros rgya mtshos smras pa/_tshangs pa khams gsum gyi 
[\[47a.5\]]ngo bo nyid kyis mtshan ma nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshangs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid la tha ma'am mchog gang yang med do/_/tshangs pa 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' la ni tha ma'am mchog gang yang med do/_/tshangs pa de bzhin du sangs 
[\[47a.6\]]rgyas kyi chos de dag ni nam mkha' dang mnyam ste/_de dag la yang tha ma'am mchog gang yang med do/_/tshangs pa chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid de de la yang tha ma'am mchog gang yang med do/_/tshangs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par 'dod 
[\[47a.7\]]pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos/_rtog pa med pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams de ltar rtogs par bya'o/_/tshangs pa gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni yul na mi gnas pa/_phyogs na mi gnas pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma 'gag pa/_sngon po ma yin pa/_
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]ser po ma yin pa/_dmar po ma yin pa/_dkar po ma yin pa/_le brgan ma yin pa/_shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ma yin pa dag ste/_de dag ni kha dog med pa/_dbyibs med pa/_rtags med pa dag go/_/de dag ni mtshan ma med pa dag go/_/tshangs pa mtshan 
[\[47b.2\]]ma med pa'i don ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi chos kyi don no/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi chos kyi don ni 'chi 'pho med pa'i tshig gi don no/_/'chi 'pho med pa'i tshig gi don ni zhi ba'i don no/_/zhi ba'i don ni dben pa'i don no/_/dben pa'i don ni stong pa'i don no/_/stong pa'i don ni 
[\[47b.3\]]gnas med pa'i don no/_/gnas med pa'i don ni de kho na'i don no/_/de kho na'i don ni shin tu skye ba med pa'i don no/_/skye ba med pa'i don ni 'gag pa med pa'i don no/_/'gag pa med pa'i don ni gnas med pa'i don no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_mtshan ma med pa'i don 
[\[47b.4\]]brjod 'di/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi dam pa ste/_/sangs rgyas chos don bstan pa ni/_/'chi 'pho med pa'i tshig ces bya/_/'chi 'pho med don zhi ba'i don/_/rnam par dben pa'i don du bstan/_/dben pa'i don ni stong pa'i don/_/stong pa'i don ni gnas med don/_/gnas 
[\[47b.5\]]med don ni de kho na/_/de nyid don ni de bzhin nyid/_/shin tu skye dang bral ba ni/_/'gag pa med pa'i don du bstan/_/'gag med don ni gnas med don/_/gnas pa med pa'i chos don tshig_/chos dbyings ji ltar gnas pa ltar/_/chos rnams thams cad de ltar gnas/_/
[\[47b.6\]]chos kun ji ltar gnas pa ltar/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams de ltar gnas/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas chos gnas ltar/_/slob pa'i chos rnams de ltar gnas/_/chags med chos ni mtshungs pa'i don/_/de ltar de dag gzhan med gnas/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang /_/
[\[47b.7\]]'dir ni mnyam pa ji bzhin gnas/_/de lta'i gnas la gnas pa'i chos/_/sangs rgyas chos te bla na med/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams de dag ni/_/yul dang phyogs na gnas pa med/_/skye ba dang ni 'jig pa yis/_/nam yang rab tu phye ba min/_/gang du'ang chos 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]rnams de dag la/_/dbyibs dang kha dog rnyed mi 'gyur/_/mtshan ma med cing rtags med par/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu bstan/_/chos kun rang bzhin gang yin pa/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams de lta'i tshul/_/des na de dag mnyam par bstan/_/
[\[48a.2\]]khyad par med de mtshan nyid med/_/sangs rgyas chos rtogs 'dod pa yis/_/chos rnams kun la blta bar bya/_/gang tshe cung zad mi dmigs pa/_/de tshe rnam par bltas pa yin/_/sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas chos/_/chos rnams kun kyang thams cad du/_/byang chub snying 
[\[48a.3\]]por drang srong ches/_/de dag yang dag mnyam par rtogs/_/sangs rgyas chos gang sangs rgyas kyis/_/byang chub snying por gang bltas pa/_/sangs rgyas chos bstan de dag ni/_/rtag tu mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam/_/mnyam ste mi mnyam med pa'i chos/_/nam mkha' lta bu dri 
[\[48a.4\]]med par/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni mkhyen pas rtogs/_/des 'dir sangs rgyas yin zhes brjod/_/rten cing 'brel par gang byung ba/_/de dag gang la'ang rang bzhin med/_/gang dag ngo bo nyid med pa/_/de dag gang du'ang 'byung ba med/_/'gro ba mtha' med mnyam par 
[\[48a.5\]]ni/_/gang gis mtha' 'dir rab shes pa/_/de yi ye shes mthar son pas/_/chos rnams kun la 'jug par 'gyur/_/chos rnams gang dag 'das pa dang /_/chos rnams gang dag ma 'ongs dang /_/da ltar byung ba'i chos gang dag_/de rnams sangs rgyas chos su 
[\[48a.6\]]'dod/_/de ltar dus gsum rnams la yang /_/sangs rgyas ye shes chags pa med/_/gang du yi ges mi chags pa/_/de dag thub pa'i chos su bstan/_/stobs ni rnam pa bcu dag dang /_/mi 'jigs rnam bzhi gang dag dang /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma 'dres 
[\[48a.7\]]chos/_/rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad gang yin dang /_/gzhan yang chos gang ci yod pa/_/thams cad 'dir ni 'dus par 'gyur/_/des ni chos rnams de dag kun/_/sangs rgyas chos zhes brjod pa yin//_//'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa/_bam po lnga pa/_tshangs 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]pa snying rje chen po sems pas gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci rigs kyi bu khyod la chos 'di dag mngon sum du gyur tam/_smras pa tshangs pa ci sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gzugs su bgrang ngam/_smras pa de ni ma 
[\[48b.2\]]yin no/_/smras pa tshangs pa chos gang gzugs med pa bstan du med thogs pa med/_rnam par rig pa med pa de la gang yang mngon sum du 'gyur ram/_smras pa rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa tshangs pa de ltar na chos thams cad ni mngon sum ma yin pa nyid do/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[48b.3\]]zhe na/_de la gnyis su [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang med de/_tshangs pa chos thams cad ni gnyis su med pa'o/_/de la mngon sum gang yin pa de yang de'i mtshan nyid kho na'o/_/tshangs pa mngon sum yang gzhan la/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/_mngon sum du gang yin pa 
[\[48b.4\]]de nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa de nyid mngon sum nyid do/_/smras pa rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa la yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mngon sum ma yin nam/_smras pa tshangs pa gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 
[\[48b.5\]]kyang rung ste 'ga' zhig yang dag par yongs su grub par gyur na ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/smras pa rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang med dam/_smras pa tshangs pa chos gang yongs su grub pa med pa de yod pa'am 
[\[48b.6\]]med par khas blang du med do/_/chos gang yod pa'am med par khas blang du med pa de la mngon sum du 'gyur ba gang yang med do/_/smras pa'o nad ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bstan/_smras pa tshangs pa 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' la nam mkha' zhes bstan kyang nam mkha' 
[\[48b.7\]]la yang dag par yongs su grub pa gang yang med do/_/tshangs pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bstan kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la ni yang dag par yongs su grub pa gang yang med do/_/smras pa rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pas 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]bstan pa 'di thos nas skrag par mi 'gyur gyi de sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ched du go cha gyon pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/smras pa tshangs pa sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skyed de de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo thos nas skrag par 
[\[49a.2\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa 'dzin pa dang mngon par zhen par gyur na skrag par 'gyur gyi 'dzin pa med cing /_mngon par zhen pa med na skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/gnas dang chags par gyur na skrag par 'gyur gyi gnas med cing chags pa med na skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 
[\[49a.3\]]'dzin par gyur na skrag par 'gyur gyi ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa dang bral na skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/smras pa stobs gang dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo dag la/_skrag par mi 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa'i stobs gang yin/_smras pa tshangs pa byang chub 
[\[49a.4\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/_stobs de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo dag la skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mos pas thogs pa med pa'i dad pa'i stobs 
[\[49a.5\]]dang /_ston pa dang mtshungs pa'i blos gus pa las nges par byung ba dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi stobs dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos yongs su rdzogs par byed pas thos pa las nges par byung ba shes rab kyi stobs dang /_bsod nams tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[49a.6\]]par byed pas/_bsod nams las nges par byung ba bsnyen bkur bya ba'i stobs dang /_bdud thams cad nges par gzhom pa'i phyir tshul bzhin las nges par byung ba ye shes kyi stobs dang /_chos rnams bdag med pa la dogs pa med pas byams pa chen po las nges par byung ba/_
[\[49a.7\]]snying rje chen po'i stobs dang /_byang chub kyi sems brjed pa med pas nges par sems pa las nges par byung ba'i sems kyi stobs dang /_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pas gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa las nges par byung ba'i bzod pa'i stobs so/_/tshangs pa brgyad po de 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs te stobs de dag dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo dag la skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_blo gros 
[\[49b.2\]]rgya mtsho khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/_stobs de dag legs par bshad pa ni legs so legs so/_/stobs 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gang thos nas skrag par 'gyur ba'i/_sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gang yang med do/_/blo gros rgya 
[\[49b.3\]]mtshos bstan pa'i sgra de dag thams cad ni 'jigs pa'o/_/byang chub kyi don dam pa gang yin pa de yang brjod par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_brjod du med pa de ni bsnyad du med pa ste/_de la ni yi ge rnams kun tu mi rgyu'o/_/de la ni sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams 
[\[49b.4\]]kyang kun tu mi rgyu na yi ge rnams kun tu rgyu bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_'di ltar chos zab mo yi ge med pa/_bsnyad du med pa/_brjod du med pa/_smrar med pa 'di lta bu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang /_yi ge'i rnam par rig pas sems can gzhan dag dang gang 
[\[49b.5\]]zag gzhan rnams la ston te/_sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po ji snyed 'jug pa la ltos/_blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu gang la la zhig gis nam mkha' gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_
[\[49b.6\]]thogs pa med pa/_rnam par rig pa med pa 'di la tshon sna tshogs kyis ri mo bris te rta pa dang glang po che dang shing rta dang dpung bu chung dang /_bzhon pa rnams su 'dir nye bar ston tam/_lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za'i gzugs rnams 'dir nye bar ston na/_blo gros rgya mtsho 'di la ji snyam 
[\[49b.7\]]du sems/_skyes bu de dka' ba byed pa ma yin nam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das dka' ba bgyid pa'o/_/bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu dka' ba bgyid pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros rgya mtsho sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag brjod du med pa'i 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can gzhan dag dang gang zag gzhan rnams la brjod du med pa'i don de brjod pas rnam par rig par byed cing go bar byed pa ni de bas kyang ches dka' ba mdzad pa'o/_/gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo 'di dag la 
[\[50a.2\]]mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni de bas kyang ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo 'di dag la skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/_/blo gros 
[\[50a.3\]]rgya mtsho mdo sde zab mo/_'jig rten thams cad dang /_mi 'thun pa 'di dag rig nas 'chang ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dang de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa dag go/_/sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i 
[\[50a.4\]]phyogs 'dzin pa dag go/_/blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa thams cad rin po che thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir dbul ba phul na/_blo gros rgya mtsho 
[\[50a.5\]]'di la ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa tshad ma mchis pa lags so/_/bsod nams kyi phung po de ni ji tsam du dpe bgyi bar sla ba ma lags pa de 
[\[50a.6\]]tsam du/_bsod nams kyi phung po de tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros rgya mtsho khyod mos par bya'o/_/khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa kun tu bsrung ba dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs 
[\[50a.7\]]mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed nas mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes sgrub par rig nas 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_kun chub par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni de bas kyang ches bsod nams mang du skyed na 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]gang de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_blo gros rgya mtsho zang zing gi sbyin pa de thams cad ni 'jig rten la bsten pa'o/_/chos kyi sbyin pa 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad las shin tu 'da' bar 'gyur ba'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin 
[\[50b.2\]]pa ni/_yongs su bzung ba bzhi rab tu 'thob ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba rab tu 'thob pa dang /_lhas yongs su bzung ba dang /_bsod nams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_ye shes kyis yongs su bzung ba 'thob pa'o/_/
[\[50b.3\]]blo gros rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par du 'gyur ba bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba dang /_de la bdud thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_gzungs 
[\[50b.4\]]rab tu thob pas mi zad par 'gyur ba dang /_mngon par shes pa myur te phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ba ste/_blo gros rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par du 'gyur ba bzhi po de dag go/_/blo gros rgya mtsho lhas yongs su bzung 
[\[50b.5\]]ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dag par 'gyur ba bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_lha rnams kyis de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyong ba dang /_chos mnyan pa la sems rtse gcig tu bya bar 'jog pa dang /_de la pha rol gyi gnod pa thams cad mi 'byung bar byed pa dang /_
[\[50b.6\]]de la sems ma dad pa thams cad kyang lha rnams kyi dbang gis dad par byed pa ste/_blo gros rgya mtsho lhas yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dag par 'gyur ba bzhi po de dag go/_/blo gros rgya mtsho bsod nams kyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems 
[\[50b.7\]]dpa'i rgyan du 'gyur ba bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pas lus kyi rgyan dang /_sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pas ngag gi rgyan dang /_bya ba thams cad kun tu ston pas zhing gi rgyan dang /_brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]'jig rten skyong du skye ba rab tu thob pas skye ba'i rgyan te/_blo gros rgya mtsho bsod nams kyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan du 'gyur ba bzhi po de dag go/_/blo gros rgya mtsho ye shes kyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i snang bar 
[\[51a.2\]]'gyur ba bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_so sor ci rigs par chos ston pas sems can gyi dbang po snang ba dang /_chos kyi sman yang dag par sbyor bas nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad snang ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du 'gro bas mngon par shes pa snang ba dang /_
[\[51a.3\]]chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pas chos kyi dbyings snang ba ste/_blo gros rgya mtsho ye shes kyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i snang bar 'gyur ba bzhi po de dag go/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[51a.4\]]po yon tan gyi phan yon 'di dag yongs su 'dzin par 'dod pas dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba la mngon par brtson par bya'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yon tan gyi khyad par tshad med par 
[\[51a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam chos gang 'dzin pa/_/de dag phan yon rnam pa mang 'gyur te/_/de las phyogs tsam yongs su brjod par bya/_/dper na rgya mtsho'i chu las thigs 
[\[51a.6\]]pa bzhin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs la byas gzo yin/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis mdzod 'dzin yid brtan zhing /_/phyogs bcu rnams su sangs rgyas mchod pa yin/_/sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs pa'i zhing mang 
[\[51a.7\]]po/_/rin chen bkang ste de bzhin gshegs la phul/_/zad pa'i dus na ji ltar chos 'dzin ltar/_/bsod nams phung po de tsam 'phel ma yin/_/'jig rten zang zing rgyal la bsti stang byas/_/'jig rten byed las nam yang grol mi 'gyur/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i chos 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]ni gang tshol ba/_/mkhas pa de ni 'jig rten chos las 'da'/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/_/lha dang klu dang mi'am ci rnams dang /_/bsod nams ye shes kyis ni yongs su bzung /_/de bzhin 
[\[51b.2\]]gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/dran ldan blo gros ldan zhing blo ldan 'gyur/_/shes rab rgya chen kun nas ye shes ldan/_/mkhas pa bag chags bcas pa'i nyon mongs spong /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/de la bdud kyi skyon chags rnyed mi 
[\[51b.3\]]'gyur/_/de la 'gyod dang de bzhin dogs pa med/_/de la bcings med sgrib pa cung zad med/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/zhing stong dag tu nam yang mi skye ste/_/skye ba kun tu de ni rgyal ba mthong /_/mthong nas de la dad pa rab tu 'thob/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[51b.4\]]pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/chos kyi bdag nyid chen po skye dran 'gyur/_/yang dang yang du rab tu 'byung ba 'thob/_/spyod pa yongs dag sgrub pa snying por byed/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/tshul khrims thos pas 'phags pa'i chos spyod pa/_/mkhas pa 
[\[51b.5\]]mngon shes lnga la myur du reg_/ma smad bsam gtan rnam par thar pa 'thob/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/de ni zab chos rtogs par khong du chud/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul stong nyid the tshom med/_/sems can bdag med par yang mos par 'gyur/_/
[\[51b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/de ni so so yang dag rig pa 'thob/_/'jigs med shes rab rno zhing chags med dag_/de ni srog chags kun gyi the tshom gcod/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/mkhas pa de ni gzungs rnams 'thob 
[\[51b.7\]]par 'gyur/_/bskal pa brgyar yang gang thos chud mi za/_/spobs dang ldan zhing chags pa med par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/de la mkhas pa rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/lha dang lha min mi ci'i yid du 'ong /_/de la sangs rgyas bu gcig bzhin 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]du bstod/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/brgya byin tshangs pa de bzhin 'jig rten skyong /_/'khor los sgyur dang mi yi rgyal por 'gyur/_/bde dang yid bde byang chub de 'tshang rgya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/de 
[\[52a.2\]]lus sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan zhing /_/mkhas pa yan lag smad pa med par 'gyur/_/de la lta bas ngoms par yong mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/gang dag chos kyi phyag rgya 'di ston pa'i/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen de la dkon mi 'gyur/_/
[\[52a.3\]]chos mdzod zad mi shes pa nyan par byed/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rnam par dag_/tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab rnam par dag_/rnam grol ye shes shin tu rnam par dag_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 
[\[52a.4\]]'dzin pa/_/de ni byang chub sems brjed 'gyur ba med/_/pha rol phyin pa spyod dang 'gal mi 'gyur/_/dge ba brgya rnams kyis kyang rab tu bzung /_/de dag rnams kyi yon tan phan yon rnams/_/bskal pa rgyun mi 'chad par rab brjod kyang /_/dam chos 'dzin pa'i phan 
[\[52a.5\]]yon 'di dag ni/_/brjod pas mtha' mar phyin par mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi rgyal po snang ba/_zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/_
[\[52a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ngas chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de brjod du med do zhes gsungs na/_bcom ldan 'das chos brjod du ma mchis pa lags na dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba ji lta bu zhig lags/_
[\[52a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_chos gang ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de brjod du med do/_/rigs kyi bu 'on kyang yi ge'i nges pa'i tshig gang dag gis brjod du med pa 'dus ma byas kyi chos de bsnyad pa'i 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]yi ge'i nges pa'i tshig de dag gang len pa dang 'dzin pa dang ston pa dang /_rab tu shes par byed pa dang /_'jog pa dang rnam par 'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang gsal bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa 'di ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa zhes 
[\[52b.2\]]bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos smra ba gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /_ston pa dang /_sgrub pa'i chos smra ba de dag la gang bsnyen pa dang /_bsten pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_ldang ba dang /_rim gro byed pa dang /_gus par byed pa dang /_
[\[52b.3\]]zhe sa byed pa dang /_bsti stang byed pa dang /_kun tu srung ba dang /_sbed pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad sbyin pa dang /_legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa dang /_rje bo ltar kun tu srung ba dang /_dge 
[\[52b.4\]]ba kun tu srung ba dang /_bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_mi snyan pa 'chab pa 'di yang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang stong pa nyid la mos pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa la yid ches pa dang /_smon pa med pa la som nyi med pa dang /_mngon 
[\[52b.5\]]par 'du bya ba med pa la de kho na nyid du nges par sems pa 'di yang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang rtsod pa med pa lhur len pa dang /_chos ma yin pas rtsod pa rnams chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcod pa 'di yang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin 
[\[52b.6\]]pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang zhe sdang med pa'i rgyud dang /_sems can bsdu ba dang rab tu thar bar bya ba'i blo dang /_zang zing med pa'i sems kyis gzhan dag la chos sbyin pa 'di yang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang lus dang srog 'dor zhing mdo sde 
[\[52b.7\]]'di lta bu 'di dag kun tu srung ba dang /_sbed pa dang /_sgrub par dgon pa la gnas pa 'di yang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang chos mnyan pa'i rgyu las byung ba'am/_chos bstan pa'i rgyu las byung bas tha na gom pa gcig 'dor ram/_tha 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]na dbugs 'byin pa'am rngub pa gcig kyang rung ste 'di yang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang chos thams cad yongs su mi 'dzin cing mi len pa 'di yang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/_/yon tan gyi rgyal po 
[\[53a.2\]]snang ba khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_dga' ba 'phags pa'i bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams 'od rnam par dag par bcom ldan 
[\[53a.3\]]'das ye shes chen po'i stobs bsgrags pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams 
[\[53a.4\]]kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'od rnam par dag pa de ni bai dUr+ya las grub pa/_shin tu rnam par dag pa/_phyogs bcu snang bas rgyas par 'gengs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[53a.5\]]mngon par shes pa chen po'i stobs kyis rnam par rtsen pa/_chos zab mo la nges par byung ba nyi tshe'i gnas su gyur pa'o/_/de'i tshe sems can de dag gi longs spyod ni lha'i bu rab 'phrul gyi dang 'dra bar gyur cing lha'i bu'i gzugs nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das de la chos nyan to/_/de na 
[\[53a.6\]]khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba tha dad du bya ba med do/_/bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen po'i stobs bsgrags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa des rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis lus srog 'dor zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la mngon par brtson par bya'o/_/zhes dam pa'i chos yongs su 
[\[53a.7\]]gzung ba'i gtam nyid rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos smra ba zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen po'i stobs bsgrags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de la 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos smra bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_byang chub sems dpas gang yongs su gzung bar bgyi ba'i chos de gang lags/_de skad ces gsol 
[\[53b.2\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen po'i stobs bsgrags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa des byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu kye ma'o sems 'di ni yul la rab tu 'phyar ba ste/_gang de zlog pa dang /_yongs su srung ba 
[\[53b.3\]]dang /_rtse gcig tu 'gyur ba dang /_dul ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba dang 'dul ba 'di ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mig dang /_gzugs rnams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba chos ma yin pa 'di ni chos ma yin 
[\[53b.4\]]pa'o/_/rna ba dang /_sgra rnams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna dang /_dri rnams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce dang /_ro rnams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus dang /_reg bya rnams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid dang /_chos rnams dang /_
[\[53b.5\]]yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba chos ma yin pa 'di ni chos ma yin pa'o/_/gang mig dang gzugs stong par rig nas mig dang gzugs rnams la rnam par mi rtog cing mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas pa med pa 'di ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/gang yang dag pa'i ye 
[\[53b.6\]]shes kyis de gzhan dag la go bar byed pa la mkhas pa 'di ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sgra dang sna dang /_dri dang lce dang /_ro dang lus dang /_reg bya dang yid dang /_chos rnam stong par rig nas yid dang chos rnams la rnam par mi rtog cing yin 
[\[53b.7\]]kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas pa med pa 'di ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/de yang yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi gzhan dag la go bar byed pa la mkhas pa 'di ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos gang gis chos gang byung ba'i chos de la yongs su 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]mi 'dzin pa dang /_mi len pa 'di ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/lta ba gang gis log par lta ba la gnas par byed pa'i lta ba de la yongs su mi 'dzin cing mi len pa 'di ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/mi shes pa gti mug gi ling tog gang 
[\[54a.2\]]gis sems yongs su dkar bar mi 'gyur ba'i mi shes pa'i gti mug gi ling tog de la gang yongs su mi 'dzin cing mi len pa 'di ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang bsgrubs nas spang bar bya ba de ni chos ma yin 'dul ba ma yin no/_/
[\[54a.3\]]gang bsgrub par yang mi bya spang bar yang mi bya ba 'di ni chos so/_/de ni 'dul ba'o bsgrubs nas spang bar bya ba'i chos gang zhe na 'dus byas kyi lam ste/_bsgrubs nas spang bar bya ba de ni chos ma yin 'dul ba ma yin no/_/bsgrub par bya ba yang ma yin spang bar bya ba yang ma yin pa 
[\[54a.4\]]gang zhe na/_gang brjod du med pa dang skye ba med pa dang 'byung ba med pa ste/_de ni bsgrub par bya ba yang ma yin spang bar bya ba yang ma yin pa'o/_/gang bsgrub par bya ba yang ma yin spang bar bya ba yang ma yin pa de chos so/_/de 'dul ba'o ci'i phyir de chos yin de 'dul ba yin zhe na/_
[\[54a.5\]]rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams skye bar mi byed pas de'i phyir de chos yin/_de 'dul ba yin zhes bya'o/_/chos dang 'dul ba gang yin pa de ni skye ba med pa 'gag pa med pa'o/_/gang skye ba med 'gag pa med pa de ni zad par mi 'gyur ro de ltar zad pa med pa dang /_
[\[54a.6\]]skye ba med pa'i chos dang 'dul ba de ni ji ltar 'byung ba med pa de ltar yongs su gzung ba med do/_/gang yongs su gzung ba med pa de dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen po'i stobs bsgrags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa des 
[\[54a.7\]]bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sum khri nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos smra bas bcom ldan 'das de las bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang yid bde ba 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa 'di legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 
[\[54b.2\]]'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni chos ma lags so/_/gang chos ma lags pa de ni chos so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mngon par zhen pas chos ma lags so/_/
[\[54b.3\]]gang mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pa de ni chos so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos dang chos ma lags pa gnyis kyi 'du shes dang ldan pa'i chos thams cad ni chos ma lags pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'du shes yongs su shes pa dang ldan pa'i chos thams cad ni chos so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[54b.4\]]don dam par bstan na chos dang chos ma lags pa mi dmigs so/_/gang la chos kyi 'du shes kyang ma mchis/_chos ma lags pa'i 'du shes kyang ma mchis pa de la chos su bgrang ba gang yang ma mchis so/_/gang la chos su bgrang ba gang yang ma mchis pa de mtha' ma lags 
[\[54b.5\]]pa'o/_/gang mtha' ma lags pa de yang dag pa'i mtha'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_nam mkha'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/_nam mkha' la ni tshar gcad pa'i mtha' gang yang ma mchis so/_/ji ltar nam mkha' la tshar gcad pa'i mtha' gang yang ma mchis pa de bzhin 
[\[54b.6\]]du chos thams cad la yang tshar gcad pa'i mtha' gang yang ma mchis te/_de'i slad du chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis yang dag pa'i mtha' bstan pa 'di thos nas de bzhin du yang dag pa nyid du khas len 
[\[54b.7\]]pa de dag ni chos gang la yang gnyis su dbye bar khas len pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni chos gang yongs su bzung bas dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa bstan pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de ltar 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]bstan na de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa smra ba dang /_chos smra ba dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos su lung ston pa lta lags sam/_yang dag pa'i lung bstan pas lung ston pa lta lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_
[\[55a.2\]]rigs kyi bu yang dag pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa smra ba dang /_chos smra ba dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos su lung ston pa yin no/_/yang dag pa'i lung bstan pas lung ston pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos smra bas 
[\[55a.3\]]lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i 'khor de las lha'i bu khris rjes su 'thun pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/yon tan gyi rgyal po snang ba de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' chos smra bar gyur pa zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom za'am/_yid 
[\[55a.4\]]gnyis su gyur na de de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yon tan gyi rgyal po snang ba khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na chos smra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de'i phyir yon tan gyi rgyal po snang ba ngas bskal pa grangs med pa bye bar bsgrubs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[55a.5\]]pa'i byang chub 'di khyod la gtad do/_/gzung ba dang /_bcang ba dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir 'khor 'di'i mdun du ngas khyod la bcol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung 'di gsungs ma thag tu de nas byang chub 
[\[55a.6\]]sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu stan las langs te mgrin gcig tu bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di gzung bar bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces 
[\[55a.7\]]bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis chos ji lta bu zhig la gnas te ngas bskal pa grangs med pa bye bar bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di 'dzin par byed/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' ri dbang gi rgyal po zhes bya ba der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lus dang srog la lta bas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lus dang srog la mi lta bar bgyis la bcom ldan 'das kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpal 
[\[55b.2\]]brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa la re bas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa thams cad bor la 
[\[55b.3\]]'phags pa ma lags pa dang bsten pa thams cad yongs su spangs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' tog chen pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos dang chos ma lags pa gnyis kyi 'du shes dang ldan pas dam pa'i 
[\[55b.4\]]chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad gnyis dang bral ba mnyam pa nyid thob par bgyis te dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpal sbas kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa rnams 
[\[55b.5\]]kyis zil gyis non pas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'phags pa'i shes rab dang ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad zil gyis mnan te dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgron ma 'dzin gyis 
[\[55b.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gti mug gi mun pa'i spyod yul gyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba thob par bgyis la chos thams cad la gti mug gi mun pa dang bral bar bgyis te dam pa'i 
[\[55b.7\]]chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' glog ltas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gzhan la rag las pa'i ye shes kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par mngon sum gyi ye 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]shes thob par bgyis te dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu sbas kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dbang po phal pa dang 'khrul pa'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 
[\[56a.2\]]dbang po thams cad du dang sgo dang skye mched thams cad shin tu sbas shing shin tu btul la dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od dri ma med pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can dang chos tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas dam pa'i chos yongs su 
[\[56a.3\]]gzung bar mi nus te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang /_chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid thob par bgyis te/_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyad par du 'gro bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[56a.4\]]'das mnyam par ma bzhag cing g.yeng ba'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mnyam par bzhag la mi g.yeng ba'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[56a.5\]]'das lam shes pa'i cho ga ma 'tshal cing lam ngan par zhugs pas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lam shes pa'i cho ga 'tshal bar bgyis la sems can rnams lam ngan pa las yang dag pa'i lam la rab tu dgod cing dam pa'i chos 
[\[56a.6\]]yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros legs pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dogs pa'i sems the tshom du gyur pas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dogs pa dang bral zhing the tshom thams cad spangs la 
[\[56a.7\]]dogs pa'i zug rngu thams cad bsal ba thob par bgyis te/_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang byed kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos la mi gnas shing sgrub pa nyams pas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/_
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos la gnas shing sgrub pa snying por bgyis te sems can rnams yang dag pa'i nan tan la rab tu dgod cing dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' snang ba mthong bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab 'chal pa chos 
[\[56b.2\]]kyi snang ba dang bral bas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shes rab kyis rnam par nges pa'i ye shes la mkhas shing chos kyi snang ba dang ldan pas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhe 'gras pa med pa'i 
[\[56b.3\]]blo gros kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das zhe 'gras pa'i sems dang sems can rjes su mi srung ba'i blos dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis zhe 'gras pa ma mchis pa'i sems dang sems can rjes su srung ba la gnas pas dam pa'i chos 
[\[56b.4\]]yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rnam dag blo gros kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi dbang po la mi mkhas shing sems can gyi spyod pa'i cho ga ma 'tshal bas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[56b.5\]]gis sems can gyi dbang po dang spyod pa shes pa la zhugs la dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos la yongs su rtog pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas bdag dang sems can dang chos la gnas pas 
[\[56b.6\]]dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang yongs su rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing 'khor gsum yongs su dag la bdag dang sems can dang chos la mi gnas par bgyid cing bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'i chos 
[\[56b.7\]]yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i tog gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 'di ni 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba la skrag pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang ma byung bar 'tshal 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]nas skrag pa ma mchis kun tu skrag pa ma mchis shing chos gang la yang nye ba'am ring bar mi gnas par bcom ldan 'das kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub la ring 
[\[57a.2\]]ba'i 'du shes can gyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di snyam du bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob nas byang chub lus dang sems dang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin par mthong ngo 
[\[57a.3\]]snyam pa des de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi rgyal po snang bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yon tan la mi gnas shing yon tan dang bral la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan don du mi gnyer bas 
[\[57a.4\]]dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yon tan thams cad dang ma bral zhing byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan yang dag pa la gnas te de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson pas bcom ldan 'das kyi dam pa'i 
[\[57a.5\]]chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang 'di skad du bdag gis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ngo zhes de skad mchi ba'i 'jig rten de ni rnam par smra ba legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom 
[\[57a.6\]]ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs nas chos gang ma brnyes shing mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa de la yongs su gzung ba gang yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad yongs su mi gzung ba dang sems can thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa 
[\[57a.7\]]'dor du stsal ba'i slad du snying rje chen po'i chos nyid 'di gzung bar bgyi/_chos gang yang 'phros par mi bgyi/_'phros pa dang bral bar yang mi bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_'jam dpal legs so legs 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]so/_/de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_ngas chos gang yang ma thob par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug go/_/ma thob bzhin du byang chub kyi snying po las langs so/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs sam ci na gang 'di skad du 
[\[57b.2\]]ngas ma thob bzhin du byang chub kyi snying po las langs zhes gsung /_gal te bzhugs na ni byang chub la gnyis 'jug par 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyang gzhan la byang chub kyi snying po yang gzhan du 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma 
[\[57b.3\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal nga byang chub kyi snying po'i ngo bo nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug go/_/nga'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de byang chub kyi snying po'i ngo bo nyid de byang chub kyang de'i ngo bo nyid sems can thams cad kyang 
[\[57b.4\]]de'i ngo bo nyid/_chos thams cad kyang de'i ngo bo nyid do/_/'jam dpal byang chub kyi snying por gang ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ni ngo bo nyid gcig pa'o/_/ro gcig pa'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub kyi snying po las 
[\[57b.5\]]rnam par grol ba'i chos gang yang ma gzigs so/_/byang chub mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mnyam pa nyid ni chos gang gi grangs su 'gro ba yang ma yin te grangs med pa grangs dang bral ba'o/_/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs 
[\[57b.6\]]pa 'dus ma byas pa zhes bya'o/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dus ma byas thob pa ste/_'dus byas thams cad las shin tu 'das so/_/'jam dpal gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di la mos pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol 
[\[57b.7\]]bas rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par grol nas chos nyid de las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags pa de dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir legs par lhags pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_skyes bu dam pa 'di dag kyang mthong ba dang /_chos 
[\[58a.2\]]zab mo bstan pa 'di yang thos pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gnas par 'gyur ba der sangs rgyas byung bar blta'o/_/gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba der chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor 
[\[58a.3\]]bar blta'o/_/da ltar byung ba'am de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/_gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /_thos nas kyang mos pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan la yang 
[\[58a.4\]]rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa dag go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis ji ltar byang chub sems dpas rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa shes sam/_de dag gis gsol pa/_
[\[58a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa ni bcu po 'di dag ste/_rnyed pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dag go/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa rab tu 'thob pa dang /_mthong nas kyang lhag pa'i bsam 
[\[58a.6\]]pas de la dad pa rab tu 'thob pa dang /_sems dad nas kyang chos mnyan pa rab tu 'thob pa dang /_chos thos nas kyang the tshom ma mchis pa rab tu 'thob pa dang /_the tshom ma mchis nas kyang rab tu 'byung ba rab tu 'thob pa dang /_rab tu byung nas kyang 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa rab tu 
[\[58a.7\]]'thob pa dang /_'tsho ba yongs su dag nas kyang chos bstan pa la mkhas pa rab tu 'thob pa dang /_tshe rabs tshe rabs su byang chub kyi sems rab tu 'thob pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems ma brjed nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos mnyan pa rab tu 'thob pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]sems dpa'i sde snod thos nas kyang sgrub pa rab tu 'thob pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das rnyed pa bcu po de dag ni rnyed pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dag go/_/de la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom 
[\[58b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu dam pa dag khyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnyed pa de dag legs par smras pa de ni legs so legs so/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags sum khri drug stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[58b.3\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/yongs su gtad pa'i le'u bdun pa rdzogs te/_'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa phyed gong ma'o//_//bam po drug pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[58b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong bar bgyi ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa bla na med pa thob par bgyi ba'i slad du ji tsam du theg pa chen po sems can thams cad la phan par bgyid par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[58b.5\]]'das theg pa chen po sdud par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams ni gang lags/_theg pa chen po la gces spras bgyid pa'i chos rnams ni gang lags/_theg pa chen po la dka' ba bgyid pa'i chos rnams ni gang lags/_theg pa chen po ston par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams ni gang lags 
[\[58b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po'i bar chad du 'gyur ba'i chos rnams ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du theg pa chen po la theg pa chen po zhes bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[58b.7\]]to/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de'i phyir nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho theg pa chen po sdud par 'gyur ba'i chos gcig ste/_chos gcig po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi sems brjed pa med cing bag yod pa ste/_blo gros rgya mtsho 'di ni theg pa chen po sdud par 'gyur 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]ba'i chos gcig go/_/blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang theg pa chen po sdud par 'gyur ba'i chos gcig ste/_chos gcig po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bya bar 'jug pa la zhugs shing rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig 
[\[59a.2\]]ste/_'di lta ste/_bstan pa'i chos dang mi 'gal ba yang dag pa'i lta ba'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_de sdug pa dang mi sdug pa bsal te sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid do/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_thams cad bskyab pa dang ldan pa'i byams 
[\[59a.3\]]pa chen po'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_bdag bde ba la mi chags pa'i snying rje chen po'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_chos sgrub pa'i snying por byed pa'i chos rjes su dran pa'o/_/
[\[59a.4\]]gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun dang ldan pa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba'i gtong ba'i rjes su dran pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_byang chub kyi sems ma brjed pa'i tshul 
[\[59a.5\]]khrims rjes su dran pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_rnam par dag pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i lha rjes su dran pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_phan pa dang bde ba dang ldan pa'i phan par 'dod pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_bsam pa brtan par gyur cing mos 
[\[59a.6\]]pa drag po'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba la mchog tu dga' ba'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_chos zab mo la nges par 'byung ba'i dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_zang zing med 
[\[59a.7\]]pa'i sems kyis chos sbyin pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir lhag pa rnams la nad par 'du shes pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_chos la sman du 'du shes pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_bdag la sman par 'du shes pa'o/_/
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir kun tu srung ba'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi gcod pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_mi brkam zhing ngan ngon gyis chog shes pa'o/_/gzhan 
[\[59b.2\]]yang chos gcig ste/_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la zhum pa med pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_rang gi tshul khrims kyis tshul khrims 'chal ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_nyes par byas pa la shar mi 
[\[59b.3\]]gnyer ba'i bzod pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_legs pa byas pa la lan blan pa'i blo'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_byas pa mi gzo ba rnams la snying rje ba'i blo'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_byas pa gzo ba rnams la rim gro bya ba'i blo'o/_/gzhan yang chos 
[\[59b.4\]]gcig ste/_mi shes pa rnams la nga rgyal med pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_shes pa rnams kyi rjes su slob pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba la lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sems mi 'dor ba'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_mi dge ba'i 
[\[59b.5\]]sems kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_tshul 'chos pa med cing kha gsag med pas sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_chos smra ba rnams la ston pa dang bla ma ltar phangs par rim gro byed pa'o/_/gzhan 
[\[59b.6\]]yang chos gcig ste/_'jig rten rgyang phan pa dang ma 'dres pa legs par thos pa'i chos nyan pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyang ba yongs su dag nas 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_de bzhin 
[\[59b.7\]]gshegs pa bzhugs pa rnams sam yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams la mchod pa byed pas mi ngoms pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_sems can thams cad kyis gsol ba ma btab par bshes gnyen byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_dngos 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]po thams cad la mi gnas shing yongs su mi 'dzin mi chags pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_khyim na gnas pa'i skyon rig nas rtag par rgyun du rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_skyes bu dam pa'i las rnams 
[\[60a.2\]]la zhugs pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_nges par byas pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs sogs pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_theg pa mtshungs par yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la zhe mi sdang ba'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_byang 
[\[60a.3\]]chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_gsang ba'i sngags rnams kun tu srung bas rnam par 'phros par mi byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_chos dang bzo yongs su btsal ba shes pa'o/_/gzhan 
[\[60a.4\]]yang chos gcig ste/_bden pa'i ngag la rab tu gnas pas chos mthong ba'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_kha 'og tu lus 'khrus par byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_'gyod pa med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa 'gyed pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_
[\[60a.5\]]bdud kyi las rnams rtogs nas yongs su spong ba'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_nga rgyal dang bral ba'i ye shes kyi las so/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_shes kyi khe dang bral bar dgon pa na gnas pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang bral 
[\[60a.6\]]zhing bdag la mi stod gzhan la mi smod pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_nyon mongs pa dang bral zhing 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'thun pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_'tsho ba yongs su dag ste dben pa la dga' ba'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_tshul bzhin la 
[\[60a.7\]]brtson pas nang du yang dag 'jog pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_mang du thos nas sems nges par sems pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_yang dag par rab tu brtson pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_stong pa nyid kyi spyod 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]yul gyi chos la so sor rtog pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pas khengs pa med cing gdung ba med pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_'du 'dzis 'jigs shing skrag nas gcig pu dga' ba'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_chos kyis rnyed 
[\[60b.2\]]pa gzhan dag dang kun tu 'ged pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa la mkhas pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_shes pa thams cad la slob dpon dpe mkhyud med pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_ma bslabs pa rnams bslab 
[\[60b.3\]]pa la sbyor zhing mi brnyas pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa rnams la las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches shing yongs su gdung ba med pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_gus par byas te chos nyan pa rnams la chos ston pa'o/_/gzhan 
[\[60b.4\]]yang chos gcig ste/_sdug pa rnams la rjes su chags pa spangs nas sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid do/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_chos smra ba rnams la g.yo ba med par legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_cang shes 
[\[60b.5\]]kyi sems kyis sems can thams cad kyi khur khyer ba'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la sbyor ba yongs su tshol ba'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs sogs pa'i brtson 'grus so/_/gzhan yang chos gcig 
[\[60b.6\]]ste/_dad pa'i rtsa ba brtan zhing mi g.yo ba'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_yul 'khor bsod snyoms don yod par yongs su spyod pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_nor bdun yang dag par 'du bas dbul ba med pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_snying 
[\[60b.7\]]po blangs pa'i srog gi dbang po'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_chos kyi mchod sbyin sbyin pas bsdu ba'i dngos po'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_rtsod pa med la lhur 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]len pa'i chos kyi gtam mo/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_klan ka mi tshol ba'i sems kyis chos mnyan pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_dge sbyong gi dri ma dang bral ba'i dge sbyong nyid do/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_'dre ba med par 
[\[61a.2\]]grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal du 'jug pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_rang gi 'khrul pa la so sor rtog pas sems can thams cad kun srung ba'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_'jig rten gyi sna tshogs la btang snyoms su byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos 
[\[61a.3\]]gcig ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la mi slu ba'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_rang gi sems yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su dag par shes pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_bcos ma ma yin pas bsam pa dag pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos 
[\[61a.4\]]gcig ste/_khyad par du 'gro bas lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_legs par byed pa'i las byed pas sbyor ba dag pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_bsod nams yongs su dag pas mtshan yongs su dag pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_shes pa yongs su dag 
[\[61a.5\]]pas nyon mongs pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_sems can yongs su dag pas zhing yongs su dag pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_mtshan ma med pa la so sor brtags te yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_
[\[61a.6\]]rjes su 'thun pa'i chos kyi bzod pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yongs su bsgoms nas nges par gyur pa la so sor rtog pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_gnas med pa la gnas pas gnas brtan pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos 
[\[61a.7\]]gcig ste/_mngon par shes pas rnam par rtsen zhing zag pa zad pa shes pa la 'jug pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i rigs pa dang rnam par grol ba'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_thabs kyis yang 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]dag par zin pa'i shes rab bsgoms pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_khams gsum gyi snying po thob pa byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan no/_/gzhan yang chos gcig ste/_'di lta ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par khong du chud pas bla na med 
[\[61b.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang theg pa chen po sdud par 'gyur ba'i chos gcig ste/_chos gcig po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa dang ma byung bar rig nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab 
[\[61b.3\]]tu thob pa ste/_blo gros rgya mtsho 'di ni theg pa chen po sdud par 'gyur ba'i chos gcig go_/blo gros rgya mtsho chos de dag ni theg pa chen po sdud par 'gyur ba dang /_'dzin pa dang gnas pa thams cad 'dod par 'gyur ba dag go_/blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang theg pa chen po la 
[\[61b.4\]]gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa med pa ste/_blo gros rgya mtsho chos gnyis po de dag ni theg pa chen po la gces spras byed pa'o/_/blo 
[\[61b.5\]]gros rgya mtsho theg pa chen po la dga' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_mos pas rnam par grol ba de kun tu srung ba dang /_rnam par grol ba de'i phyir chos ston pa ste/_blo gros rgya mtsho chos gnyis po de dag ni theg pa chen po la dga' ba byed pa'o/_/blo gros rgya 
[\[61b.6\]]mtsho theg pa chen po la gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_byang chub kyi sems las mi nyams pa dang /_sems la lta ba la brtan pa'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_byang chub kyi sems la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa dang /_sems can thams cad 
[\[61b.7\]]la bdag med par so sor rtog pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_bsam pa mi 'dor ba dang /_sbyor ba bcos ma ma yin pa'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_rtsa ba yongs su dag pa'i bsam pa dang /_byed pa med cing byed pa dang bral ba yang ma yin par bsod 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]nams sogs pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la sbyor ba dang /_sbyor ba yang nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_spros pa med par sbyor ba dang /_sbyor ba nyams 'og tu chud 
[\[62a.2\]]par byed pas dben pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_lhag pa'i bsam pas khyad par du 'gro ba dang /_khyad par gyis khyad par du lhag par dmigs pa'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_bdag nyid nyes pa mi byed pa dang /_gzhan yang nyes 
[\[62a.3\]]pa las 'byin pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /_rnam par smin pa la mi re ba'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_mnyam pa'i sems gtong ba dang /_yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'o/_/
[\[62a.4\]]gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_bslab pa ma nyams pa dang /_skye bar smon pa med pa'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la cher snying rje ba dang /_bdag la mi stod pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_bzod 
[\[62a.5\]]cing des pa dang /_byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_rjes su chags pa 'dor ba dang /_rje bo la bzod pa bsgom pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su btsal bar rtsom pa'i brtson 
[\[62a.6\]]'grus dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba la yi rang ba'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_lus dang sems dben pa dang /_sems gnas pa yongs su thar bar byed pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_bsam gtan gyi yan lag yang dag par sdud pa dang /_
[\[62a.7\]]sems las su rung ba'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_bsam gtan las ldog pa shes pa dang /_'dod pa'i khams la smod pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_chos don du gnyer ba dang chos 'dod pa'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_chos la 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]so sor rtog pa dang /_chos nges par sems pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang /_bla ma la gus par brten pa'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_gus pa dang bka' blo bde ba'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i 
[\[62b.2\]]chos gnyis te/_dus dang dus ma yin par yongs su 'dri ba dang /_don myong bar byed pa'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_don shes pa dang /_chos shes pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_thos pa'i nor gyis mi ngoms pa dang /_thos pa'i 
[\[62b.3\]]shes rab kyis ngoms mi myong ba'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_tshul bzhin du chos la so sor rtog pa dang /_tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i chos rnam par spong ba'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_chos ston pa dang /_chos nyan pa rnams la snying rje 
[\[62b.4\]]ba'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_slob dpon dpe mkhyud med pa dang /_zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos ston pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_rna ba blags te nyan pa dang /_thams cad du sems kyis sems pa'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i 
[\[62b.5\]]chos gnyis te/_sgrib pa sel ba dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag sgom pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_mchog tu dga' ba thob pa dang /_dga' ba myong ba'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_rung ba rnams la tshod shes pa dang /_bdag shes pa la 
[\[62b.6\]]'jug pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa dang /_legs par bya ba'i las byed pa'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_las med cing rnam par smin pa med par mos pa dang /_dge ba'i chos kyang ston pa'o/_/
[\[62b.7\]]gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_tshig bden pa dang /_'phags pa'i skye bo la mi slu ba'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi tshul mi 'khrugs par byed pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_lus 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]yongs su dag pa dang /_mi dge ba rnam gsum yongs su spong ba'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_lus gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /_rtswa dang rtsig pa dang shing lta bur so sor rtog pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_ngag yongs su 
[\[63a.2\]]dag pa dang /_ngag gi skyon bzhi yongs su spong ba'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_chos brjod du med par khong du chud pa dang /_sgra thams cad brag ca dang mtshungs par shes pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_sems yongs su dag pa dang /_
[\[63a.3\]]brnab sems dang gnod sems dang log par lta ba yongs su spong ba'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_nang nye bar zhi ba dang /_phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_byams pa sgom pa dang /_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid do/_/
[\[63a.4\]]dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_nam mkha' ltar rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa'i byams pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir yongs su sngo ba'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_snying rje chen po mi 'dor ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su tshol 
[\[63a.5\]]ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_skye ba med par so sor rtog pa dang /_nges par gyur pa kun tu bsrung ba'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_chos la dga' bas dga' zhing mos pa dang /_mi dga' ba spong ba'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos 
[\[63a.6\]]gnyis te/_mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_brtul zhugs ma yin pa mi spyod pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_rjes su chags pa 'dor ba dang /_khong khro ba spong ba'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_btang snyoms sgom pa 
[\[63a.7\]]dang /_sems can la lta ba yongs su spangs pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa dang /_dran pa de la gnas par sems bskyed pa'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_chos kyi sku sgom pa dang /_mtshan gyi sku yang sgrub pa'o/_/
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_chos rjes su dran pa sgom pa dang /_sems can rnams kyang chos la sbyor ba'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid la so sor rtog pa dang /_'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la cher snying rje ba'o/_/
[\[63b.2\]]gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la yang ston pa'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_'dus ma byas la yang rtog pa dang /_'bras bu thob pa yang kun tu srung ba'o/_/gces spras 
[\[63b.3\]]byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i tshul khrims la so sor rtog pa dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can sdud cing yongs su smin par byed pa'o/_/
[\[63b.4\]]gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_'gyod pa med par gtong ba'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_rang gi nyon mongs pa 'dor ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba ston pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_
[\[63b.5\]]lha rjes su dran pa dang /_skye bar smon pa med pa'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_dran pa dang shes bzhin dang /_sems g.yeng ba rnams dran pa la 'god pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /_ye shes rnams kyi tshogs so/_/
[\[63b.6\]]dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i ye shes dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs ma smad pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_chags pa las shin tu 'da' ba dang /_chags pas zhen pa yongs su 'grel pa'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis 
[\[63b.7\]]te/_'dun pa drag pa dang /_sgyu med cing g.yo med pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_byas pa gzo ba dang /_byas pa shes pa'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_'dun pa'i 'dod chags spong ba dang /_dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa mi 'dor ba'o/_/gces 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_sdig pa thams cad 'chags pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa'o/_/dka' ba byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_'gyod pa med pa dang /_kun nas ldang ba med pa'o/_/gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te/_gzhan gyi bsod
