[\[84a.5\]]le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang 'khrul pa 'di snyed cig bsrung yang 'khrul par mi 'gyur ba ni bgyi dka' ba bgyid 
[\[84a.6\]]pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags kyis kyang byang chub sems dpas thams cad du yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pa 'tshal bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das thabs kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan dang rnam par 
[\[84a.7\]]thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs kyang bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis 'khrugs par mi 'gyur te/_thabs mkhas pa des bgyi ba thams cad kyang ston la bgyi bar ltung bar yang mi 'gyur/_
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]chos mnyam pa nyid la yang gnas la sems can log pa nyid du mchis pa rnams la yang dag pa nyid kyi nges par gyur pa'i slad du chos kyang ston cing bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du bdag nges par gyur pa der yang mi ltung ngo /_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[84b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de de bzhin no/_/ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpas thams cad du thabs la mkhas pa 'dod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_blo gros rgya mtsho thabs la mkhas pa'i 
[\[84b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' la byang chub yod kyi thabs la mi mkhas pa la ni byang chub med do/_/blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste/_dper na/_snod gcig gi nang du tshon sna gsum ste/_sna gcig ni kha dog sngon po/_/sna gcig ni kha dog dmar po/_/sna gcig ni gser gyi kha 
[\[84b.4\]]dog lta bu ser po blugs la tshon gyi snod gcig pu der ras kha bsgyur ba gsum ste/_gcig ni ras shog po yug sngon por kha bsgyur ba/_gcig ni ras phran yug dmar por kha bsgyur ba/_gcig ni ras bcos bu rin thang med pa ser po gser gyi kha dog lta bur kha bsgyur 
[\[84b.5\]]ba zung gcig bcug la/_de dag snod gcig gi nang du bcug ste bstsubs na ji ltar kha bsgyur ba'i bye brag bzhin du tshon 'dzin te/_gang tshon sngon pos kha bsgyur ba de ni kha dog sngon por 'gyur/_gang tshon dmar pos kha bsgyur ba de ni kha dog dmar por 'gyur/_gang tshon ser 
[\[84b.6\]]po gser lta bus kha bsgyur ba de ni kha dog ser po gser lta bur 'gyur yang snod de la ni rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba gang yang med do/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i snod gcig la gang zag gsum ste/_gcig ni nyan thos kyi theg 
[\[84b.7\]]pa pa/_gcig ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa/_gcig ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa btsud la de dag tshud pa dang /_gang gis ci 'dra ba'i bsam pa dang sems kyi tshon bsags pa de 'dra bar de ye shes kyi tshon yongs su 'dzin kyang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]med pa dang smon pa med pa'i snod la ni rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do/_/de la ras shog po'i yug lta bur ni nyan thos kyi theg pa par blta'o/_/ras phran gyi yug lta bur ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par blta'o/_/rin thang med pa'i ras bcos bu'i zung 
[\[85a.2\]]lta bur ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par blta'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho chos rnams ni snying po med pa/_byed pa po med pa/_bdag med pa/_sems can med pa/_srog med pa/_gang zag med pa/_bdag po med pa ste/_'di ltar ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar 
[\[85a.3\]]rnam par sgrub ste rnam par bsgrubs kyang sems pa ma yin/_rab tu rtogs pa ma yin pa la ltos/_blo gros rgya mtsho chos rnam par bsgrub pa 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos gang la yang yongs su skyo ba mi bskyed do/_/de de ltar ye shes mthong ba shin tu rnam par dag pa 
[\[85a.4\]]yin te/_'dir gang la yang phan pa'am gnod pa mi byed do/_/de ltar chos rnams kyi chos nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa ni snying rje chen po'i go cha de yang mi 'dor ro/_/blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya rin thang med pa/_shin tu byang 
[\[85a.5\]]ba/_shin tu rnam par dag pa/_shin tu dri ma med pa rdzab kyi nang du bcug nas lo stong lon la de lo stong 'das nas rdzab de nas phyung ste bkrus shing yongs su sbyangs te/_byi dor byas na shin tu dag cing shin tu yongs su dag la shin tu byang nas de nyid dag pa dri ma med pa'i nor bu 
[\[85a.6\]]rin po che'i rang bzhin mi 'dor ro/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad kyi sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar rab tu shes la de yang blo bur gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pas nyon mongs pa can du byas par mthong ngo /_/de la byang 
[\[85a.7\]]chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_nyon mongs pa 'di dag ni sems can rnams kyi sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba la zhugs pa med kyi nyon mongs pa de dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa las byung du zad pas bdag gis sems can de dag gi blo bur gyi nyon 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos bstan nus so snyam nas de zhum pa'i sems mi skyed kyi de de bas kyang shas cher sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba'i sems bskyed pa bskyed do/_/de yang 'di snyam du sems te/_nyon mongs pa de dag la ni stobs dang mthu cung zad kyang med de/_
[\[85b.2\]]nyon mongs pa de dag ni stobs med pa nyam chung ba dag go/_/de dag ni yang dag pa la cung zad kyang mi gnas kyi nyon mongs pa de dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa dag ste/_de dag la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshul bzhin yid la byed pas brtags na 'khrugs 
[\[85b.3\]]par mi 'gyur bas bdag gis de dag la ci nas kyang 'dre bar mi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar brtag par bya'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams dang mi 'dre ba ni legs pa yin gyi 'dre ba ni ma yin no/_/gal te bdag nyon mongs pa rnams dang 'dre bar gyur na nyon mongs pa'i bcing bas bcings 
[\[85b.4\]]pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i bcing ba spang ba'i phyir ji ltar chos bstan gyis bdag nyon mongs pa rnams dang mi 'dre bar byas la nyon mongs pa'i bcing ba spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o/_/bdag sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir 
[\[85b.5\]]gang dag 'khor ba'i rgyun byed la dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag dang ni 'dre bar bya'o snyam mo/_/'khor ba'i rgyun byed la dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bsod nams kyi tshogs 
[\[85b.6\]]yongs su btsal bar mi ngoms pa dang /_bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang phrad par smon pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson pa 
[\[85b.7\]]dang /_sems can gyi bya ba ci yod snyam pa la spro ba dang /_chos 'dod pa'i bag la nyal mi 'dor ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba rnams yongs su mi gtong ba'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams te/_byang chub 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]sems dpa' ni de dag gis 'dre yang nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams kyis mi gos so/_/blo gros rgya mtshos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba lags na ci'i slad du nyon mongs pa rnams zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[86a.2\]]pa/_blo gros rgya mtsho 'di ltar nyon mongs pa de lta bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum dang 'dre zhing khams gsum pa ni nyon mongs pa las byung ba yin yang de la byang chub sems dpa' ni thabs la mkhas pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pas 
[\[86a.3\]]bsams bzhin du khams gsum dang 'dre'o/_/de'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa zhes bya ste/_khams gsum du 'dre bas de skad bya yi/_sems nye bar nyon mongs pas ni ma yin no/_/blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste dper na/_tshong dpon 
[\[86a.4\]]nam khyim bdag cig la bu sdug pa phangs pa yid du 'ong ba lta ba dang 'thun pa gcig pu zhig yod par gyur la/_khye'u de yang byis par gyur pas gar byed bzhin du/_khron pa btsog pa zhig tu lhung ba dang /_de nas khye'u de'i ma dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_nye du 
[\[86a.5\]]dag gis khye'u de khron pa btsog par lhung bar mthong la/_mthong nas kyang sgra cher phyung ste mya ngan byed cing smre sngags 'don gyi khron pa btsog pa der zhugs te bu gcig pa de mi 'byin la/_de nas khye'u de'i pha 'ongs te des bu gcig pa khron pa btsog par lhung ba de mthong la mthong nas 
[\[86a.6\]]kyang bu gcig pa de la bsam pa thag pa nas byams shing rjes su chags pas mi smod par myur du skyen par la gor du khron pa btsog pa der zhugs te/_bu gcig pa phyung ba 'di lta bu 'di ni blo gros rgya mtsho ji tsam du don shes par bya ba'i phyir dper byas pa yin no/_/'dir don du lta ba 
[\[86a.7\]]gang zhe na/_blo gros rgya mtsho khron pa btsog pa zhes bya ba ni khams gsum gyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/bu gcig pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]te de dag la byang chub sems dpa' bu gcig pa ltar 'du shes so/_/ma dang mdza' bshes dang nye du zhes bya ba de 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]te/_de dag ni 'khor bar lhung ba'i sems can rnams mthong na mya ngan byed cing smre sngags 'don gyi 'byin ni mi nus so/_/tshong dpon nam khyim bdag ces bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]
[\[86b.2\]]te/_de ni sems dag cing dri ma med de dri ma dang bral la 'dus ma byas kyi chos mngon sum du gyur kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du khams gsum du mtshams sbyor ro/_/blo gros rgya mtsho 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po ste/_
[\[86b.3\]]gang nyon mongs pa'i bcing ba thams cad las shin tu yongs su grol yang thabs mkhas pas srid par skye ba nye bar len la shes rab kyis yongs su zin pas rang gi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kyang gnod pa med cing nyon mongs pa'i bcing thams cad spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams 
[\[86b.4\]]la chos kyang ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dri ma ma mchis shing dri ma dang bral te/_de dag kyang 'khor ba la mi smod cing chos zab mo la ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pas kyang 'dus ma byas 
[\[86b.5\]]su mi ltung zhing 'bras bu yang thob par mi bgyid pa ni bgyi dka' ba bgyid pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros rgya mtsho 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yan lag gnyis dang rab tu ldan pa'i lam ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 
[\[86b.6\]]thabs la mkhas pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dri ma med cing dri ma dang bral te dag par gyur pa 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la mi smod cing sems can yongs su 
[\[86b.7\]]smin par bya ba'i phyir skye bar yang 'dzin pa 'di ni de'i thabs la mkhas pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'du byed thams cad la stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /_ma 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]skyes pa dang ma byung bar so sor rtog pa 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang gi tshe snying rje chen po sngon du btang ba'i sems kyis 'dus ma byas su mi ltung zhing 'bras bu thob par yang mi byed pa 'di ni de'i thabs la mkhas pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho 
[\[87a.2\]]gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir tha dad du bya ba'i chos gang yang mi mthong ste/_chos kyi dbyings kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de sems can gyi khams kyi mnyam pa/_sems can gyi khams kyi mnyam pa gang yin pa de mya ngan las 'das 
[\[87a.3\]]pa'i dbyings kyi mnyam pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi mnyam pa gang yin pa de chos kyi dbyings kyi mnyam pa ste/_chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang gi tshe sems can gyi khams gcig tu rab tu shes 
[\[87a.4\]]shing mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyang mngon sum du mi byed la/_sems can gyi khams la lta bas chos kyi dbyings la mi lta bar yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i thabs la mkhas pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sbyin pa dag pa ni shes rab bo/_/yongs su bsngo ba dag pa ni 
[\[87a.5\]]thabs so/_/tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dag pa ni shes rab bo/_/yongs su bsngo ba dag pa ni thabs so/_/mdor bsdu na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dag pa ni shes rab bo/_/yongs su bsngo ba dag pa ni thabs so/_/blo gros rgya mtshos 
[\[87a.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dag pa ni gang lags/_yongs su bsngo ba dag pa ni gang lags/_shes rab dag pa ni gang lags/_thabs dag pa ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros rgya mtsho 
[\[87a.7\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba dag pa ni gang bdag dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag tu lta ba dang bral bar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sogs pa'o/_/yongs su bsngo ba dag pa ni gang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yongs su 'dris 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]par dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'o/_/shes rab dag pa ni gang sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i ye shes so/_/thabs dag pa ni gang sems can thams cad la so so ci rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa'o/_/blo 
[\[87b.2\]]gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang dge ba'i rtsa ba dag pa ni gang srid par 'gro ba'i skye ba thams cad la mi gnas par dge ba'i de dag thams cad sogs pa'o/_/yongs su bsngo ba dag pa ni gang theg pa thams cad la yang dag par gzhol bas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yid la 
[\[87b.3\]]byed pa dang bral bar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag theg pa chen por yongs su bsngo ba'o/_/shes rab dag pa ni gang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor bar gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa'o/_/thabs dag pa ni sems can gang dag yongs su smin par byed pa de dag don 'thun 
[\[87b.4\]]pas theg pa chen po yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'o/_/gzhan yang dge ba'i rtsa ba dag pa ni 'di lta ste/_longs spyod mi zad pa dang lag na rin po che'o/_/yongs su bsngo ba dag pa ni gang sems can thams cad dang /_slob pa dang /_mi slob pa dang /_rang sangs 
[\[87b.5\]]rgyas thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo ba des yongs su 'dzin cing yang dag par 'jug pa'o/_/shes rab dag pa ni gang gzungs kyi phyag rgyas btab nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 
[\[87b.6\]]gsungs pa kun tu 'dzin cing chud mi za bar byed pa'o/_/thabs dag pa ni gang spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /_spobs pa chags pa med pa dang /_chos bstan pa don yod pas legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa'o/_/blo gros rgya 
[\[87b.7\]]mtsho gzhan yang dge ba'i rtsa ba dag pa ni gang tshe rabs tshe rabs dag tu byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'o/_/yongs su bsngo ba dag pa ni gang byang chub kyi sems ma brjed par dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'o/_/shes rab dag pa ni gang mi gnas 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de byang chub kyi sems su shes pa'o/_/thabs dag pa ni byang chub kyi sems mnyam pa nyid pha rol khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces 
[\[88a.2\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don ji ltar bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/_byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa rnams kyi byang chub ni kun tu 'gro ba ste/_
[\[88a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das de dag gi byang chub ma lags pa'i chos gang yang ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa ni byang chub bo/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas byang chub la ring ba'i 'du shes mi 
[\[88a.4\]]bgyi'o/_/yul drug po dag gi nang nas chos gang de la snang bar 'gyur ba de nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa ni byang chub bo/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thabs la mkhas pa dag pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa thob par 
[\[88a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_blo gros rgya mtsho legs so legs so/_/de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_yul drug po dag gi nang nas chos gang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la 
[\[88a.6\]]mkhas pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa rnams la snang bar 'gyur ba de nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa ni byang chub ste/_blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang de ltar rig par bya'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal 
[\[88a.7\]]pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa shin tu rgyas pa tshad med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na skar mdog gi bskal pa la shin tu sprul pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]sangs rgyas 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/ci'i phyir 
[\[88b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa de 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas zhes bya zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de thams cad mkhyen pa ma thob cing byang chub sems dpar gyur bzhin du byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas lus las 'od 'di lta bu phyung ste/_'od rab tu phyung ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs 
[\[88b.3\]]med bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa dag snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag phyir mi ldog pa dang /_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa 'khod pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de mthong ngo /_/mthong 
[\[88b.4\]]nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' de ga la ba de logs su me tog dag gtor to/_/gtor ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus la bab bo/_/me tog de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu sprul pa der mi bdun gyi 'phang tsam gyi me tog bkram 
[\[88b.5\]]pa gcig pu gnas par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa'i lha gang dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis 'od de mthong nas gang 'di lta bu rnam par dag pa'i 'od byung ba las na kye ma 'di ni da de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od 
[\[88b.6\]]zer snang ba mtha' yas su 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de/_de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas/_'od zer snang ba mtha' yas zhes bya bar gyur to/_/ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de shin tu sprul pa zhes bya zhe na/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[88b.7\]]khams de na 'khod pa'i mi de dag gi longs spyod dang yongs su spyad pa ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyi longs spyod dang yongs su spyad pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur pas de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de shin tu sprul pa zhes bya'o/_/ci'i phyir bskal pa de skar mdog ces bya zhe na/_
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]blo gros rgya mtsho bskal pa khri 'das nas bskal pa de la sangs rgyas byung bar gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gang gi 'og tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas des byang chub thob pa'i de 
[\[89a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan gyis bskal pa de skar mdog ces bya'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho bskal pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag bcu bzhi byung ngo /_/blo gros rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu sprul pa de ni 'byor pa rgyas pa zhi ba lo legs pa lha dang mis gang ba/_yangs shing 
[\[89a.3\]]tha gru che bar gyur te/_gling bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug yod do/_/gling re re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yod do/_/dpag tshad brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi re re la yang grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong bzhi stong yod par gyur to/_/grong khyer re re yang 
[\[89a.4\]]grong dang tshong 'dus dang ri 'or gyi grong brgyad khri bzhi stong bzhi stong gis kun nas bskor bar gyur to/_/grong khyer de dag thams cad na yang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu bcu yod par gyur to/_/grong dang tshong 'dus dang ri 'or gyi grong de dag thams cad na yang mi'i skye 
[\[89a.5\]]dgu'i srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad brgyad gnas par gyur to/_/dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa'i mi rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de rgyas par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de ni gser dang dngul dang shel dang bai dUr+ya dang rin po che sna bzhi 
[\[89a.6\]]las grub par gyur to/_/de na bza' ba dang btung ba dang gos dang rgyan dang yongs su spyad pa dag bsams pa tsam gyis 'byor to/_/lha dang mi de dag kyang nga yi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas 
[\[89a.7\]]de'i tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bcu thub par gyur to/_/de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po ni nyan thos bye ba brgya stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag bcu gnyis yod do/_/rgyal po'i pho brang grong khyer 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das de'i sku skye ba'i sar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de de nas mngon par byung nas bcom ldan 'das de grong khyer chen po dga' ba 'byung ba zhes bya bar gnas te bzhugs so/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de'i tshe de'i dus na grong khyer chen po dga' ba 
[\[89b.2\]]'byung ba der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo /_/de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/_'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che 
[\[89b.3\]]dang /_rta rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_blon po rin po che dang bdun no/_/rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/_lhag 
[\[89b.4\]]pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pas sems can thams cad la sems zhe 'gras pa med pa'o/_/rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa de'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med ni bye ba phrag bzhi yod de/_gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa lha'i bu mo'i gzugs dang 'dra ba 
[\[89b.5\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag go/_/de la bu stong yod de/_dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag bzang po mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa/_sred med kyi bu'i stobs kyi shugs phyed 
[\[89b.6\]]bdog pa/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis yan lag rnam par spras pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag go/_/de la bu mo brgyad 'bum yod de/_gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa lha'i bu mo'i 
[\[89b.7\]]gzugs 'dra ba/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag go/_/blo gros rgya mtsho rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dag pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas de 'khor dang bcas pa la bar gyi bskal pa 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]gnyis kyi bar du rung ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dge sbyong dang 'thun pa yid du 'ong ba'i gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad rnams kyis spyan drangs par gyur to/_/rgyal po des bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'khor 
[\[90a.2\]]gyi khyams yangs shing tha gru che ba/_chu zheng dpag tshad lnga 'bum yod pa/_sa phyogs nor bu rin po che bai dUr+yas spras pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi phyi ras bskor ba/_tsan dan dmar po dang /_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po gshibs te sbyar ba sna tshogs blta na sdug pa/_lha'i 
[\[90a.3\]]gzhal med khang 'dra bar byas so/_/gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su spyad pa'i khang pa brtsegs pas ya byas so/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar rgyal po yun shin tu rnam par dag pa las gang gzhan mi byed par rgyun tu tshangs par spyad pa yang dag par blangs/_bslab 
[\[90a.4\]]pa'i gnas lnga yongs su bzung ste/_btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas rang gi skye bo dang bcas g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas bar gyi bskal pa gnyis su bcom ldan 'das de la bsnyen bkur byas nas bar gyi bskal pa de gnyis 'das pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[90a.5\]]gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dag pas bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[90a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyad par du mchi bas de la gang ma chags 
[\[90a.7\]]pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' blo mi g.yo mi 'gyur zhing shin tu brtan pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang shes rab yongs su dag pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]dpa' rgyang ring du'ang lta la rtsa ba yang ma chad pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yul yang 'byor la bag mchis pa yang mi 'dor ba rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' don zab mo'i tshul la mi skrag pa rnams lags/_
[\[90b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa rnams zhes bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas 
[\[90b.3\]]des rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 
[\[90b.4\]]'jog pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_mos pa las nges par byung ba'i dad pa 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus 'bar bas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la brtson pa dang /_shin tu rnam par brtags pa'i blos mngon par 
[\[90b.5\]]shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rtsen pa dang /_so so yang dag par shes pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid de/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 
[\[90b.6\]]'jog pa rnams yin no/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na khyad par du 'gro bas de la ma chags pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_sems las su rung bas bsam gtan las ldog pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/_gzhan la bde ba 
[\[90b.7\]]rab tu sbyin pas bdag bde ba la mi chags pa rnams yin/_snying rje chen po la rab tu gnas shing byams pa chen po la gnas pa rnams yin/_gong nas gong ma'i khyad par 'dod pas rgya chen po la mos pa rnams yin te/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/_khyad par du 'gro bas de la ma chags pa rnams yin no/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na blo mi g.yo mi 'gyur zhing shin tu brtan pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_sgyu dang 
[\[91a.2\]]g.yo med pa'i bsam pa dang /_bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i sbyor ba dang /_sbyor ba las mi ldog pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa ma bor bar bsgrub pa ste/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na blo mi g.yo 
[\[91a.3\]]mi 'gyur zhing shin tu brtan pa rnams yin no/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na thabs dang shes rab yongs su dag pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_sems can thams cad la bdag med par yang mthong la bsdu ba'i dngos po 
[\[91a.4\]]bzhis sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_chos thams cad brjod du med par yang rab tu shes la yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis sems can rnams la chos kyang ston cing dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi skus rab tu phye 
[\[91a.5\]]bar yang mos la mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyang nyams par mi byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid du yang rtog la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir rtsol ba'i rgyun kyang mi gcod pa ste/_
[\[91a.6\]]rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na thabs dang shes rab yongs su dag pa rnams yin no/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na rgyang ring du yang lta la/_rtsa ba yang ma chad pa 
[\[91a.7\]]rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_byang chub kyi snying po la yang lta la byang chub kyi sems kyang mi 'dor ba rnams yin/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la yang lta la rang gi shes pas kyang zhum pa med pa rnams yin/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba la yang lta la ji ltar thos pa'i chos 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]bstan pas kyang yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la yang lta la tshe dang /_'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba la yang mi smod pa rnams yin te/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na rgyang ring du yang lta 
[\[91b.2\]]zhing rtsa ba yang ma chad pa rnams yin no/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na yul yang 'byor la bag yod pa yang mi 'dor ba rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_mi yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por yang 
[\[91b.3\]]gyur la 'du byed la mi rtag par so sor rtog pas yul 'byor kyang bag med par mi 'gyur ba rnams yin/_lha yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin du yang 'gyur la 'du byed la sdug bsngal bar so sor rtog pas yul 'byor kyang bag med par mi 'gyur ba rnams 
[\[91b.4\]]yin/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdud nyid du yang nye bar ston la chos la bdag med par so sor rtog pas yul 'byor kyang bag med par mi 'gyur ba rnams yin/_tshangs ris kyi lha yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir tshangs pa dbang sgyur du yang gyur la mya ngan las 'das 
[\[91b.5\]]pa la zhi bar rtog pas yul 'byor kyang bag med par mi 'gyur ba rnams yin te/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na yul yang 'byor la bag yod pa yang mi 'dor ba rnams yin no/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[91b.6\]]dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na don zab mo'i tshul la mi skrag pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag phyi rol du mi byed par rgyun du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub zab mo 'di yang dag par rab tu ston pa la bsten pa dang /_mdo sde zab mo tshul 
[\[91b.7\]]'di lta bu de dag mnyan pa'i phyir dpag tshad brgyar yang 'gro ba dang /_ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la tshul bzhin du dpyod pa dang /_don la rton pa yin gyi tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin pa ste/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]ldan na don zab mo'i tshul la mi skrag pa rnams yin no/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa rnams zhes bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su tshol ba la brtson 
[\[92a.2\]]pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_sems can thams cad la yongs su smin par bya ba la brtson pa'i snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la brtson pa'i stobs kyis rnam par gnon pa dang /_'khor ba dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin pa la yongs 
[\[92a.3\]]su mi skyo bar brtson pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs sogs pa ste/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa rnams zhes bya'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[92a.4\]]gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas des bzhi pa bsgrub pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/_srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/dge slong bye ba phrag brgyad len pa med pas zag pa rnams las sems rnam 
[\[92a.5\]]par grol lo/_/rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag dang /_rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang /_rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor ni chung ngu'i rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/_/rgyal po chen po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa ni rno ba'i rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/_/de nas rgyal 
[\[92a.6\]]po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas rgyal srid thams cad bcom ldan 'das de la yongs su spyad pa'i phyir phul lo//_//'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa/_bam po dgu pa/_blo gros rgya 
[\[92a.7\]]mtsho de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas des rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis yongs su spyad pa'i phyir rgyal srid thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa la phul zin na/_rgyal po chen po khyod 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]dad pas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po chen po legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba ni don che ba phan yon che ba rgya che ba'o/_/rgyal po chen po rab tu byung bar gtogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[92b.2\]]sems dpa'i 'thob pa chen po ni nyi shu po 'di dag ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa bla na med pa'i 'thob pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dag go/_/nyi shu po de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rgyal srid dang longs spyod dang g.yog 'khor dang dbang phyug 'dor bas nga yi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa 
[\[92b.3\]]med pa 'thob pa dang /_khyim nas 'byung ba la gzhol bas nyon mongs pa las byung ba 'thob pa dang /_ngur smrig 'dzin pas rnyog pa med pa'i sems 'thob pa dang /_'phags pa'i rigs chog shes pas dgang sla ba dang /_gso sla ba 'thob pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad 
[\[92b.4\]]bsnyungs pa yang dag par len pas 'dod pa che ba dang sdig pa 'dod pa spong ba 'thob pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pas lha dang mir skye ba 'thob pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug 'thob pa dang /_dgon pa dben pa na gnas pas 'du 
[\[92b.5\]]'dzi dang mi 'dre ba 'thob pa dang /_gnod pa med pas chos sems pa'i bde ba 'thob pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi yan lag yang dag par bsgrubs pas sems las su rung ba 'thob pa dang /_thos pa yongs su tshol bas shes rab chen po 'thob pa dang /_nga rgyal med pas ye 
[\[92b.6\]]shes chen po 'thob pa dang /_don nyung zhing byed pa nyung bas chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa 'thob pa dang /_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid pas byams pa chen po 'thob pa dang /_sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar byed pa'i sems kyis snying rje chen po 'thob 
[\[92b.7\]]pa dang /_lus dang srog la mi lta bas dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa 'thob pa dang /_sems rab tu sbyangs pas mngon par shes pa chen po 'thob pa dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas sangs rgyas mthong ba 'thob pa dang /_tshul bzhin gyis chos la so sor rtog pas mi 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa 'thob pa dang /_yon tan thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i spyod pas myur du thams cad mkhyen pa thob pa 'thob pa ste/_rgyal po chen po rab tu byung bar gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la 'thob pa chen po nyi shu po 'di dag rnyed 
[\[93a.2\]]par dka' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na/_khyod legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung shig_/blo gros rgya mtsho de nas bcom ldan 'das des rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa rab tu 'byung ba yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas rgyal srid thams 
[\[93a.3\]]cad spangs/_rgyal srid kyi dpal yang spangs te khyim na gnas pas yid byung bas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/de rab tu byung bar rig nas rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor 
[\[93a.4\]]kyang rab tu byung ngo /_/de dag rab tu byung bar rig nas rgyal bu gzhon nu rnams kyang rab tu byung ngo /_/de dag rab tu byung bar rig nas rgyal po'i bu mo gzhon nu ma rnams kyang rab tu byung ngo /_/de dag rab tu byung bar rig nas rgyal po'i yul na gnas pa'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[93a.5\]]brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu yang rab tu byung ngo /_/de ltar de dag rab tu byung nas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos tshol ba la yongs su brtson pa'i brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas so/_/blo gros rgya mtsho sems can bsod nams byas pa thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pas ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das 
[\[93a.6\]]de'i gsung rab mdzes par gyur pa la ltos/_blo gros rgya mtsho de nas rgyal po chen po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa de ltar rab tu byung nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[93a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag gang la sgrub pa snying por bgyid par gnas shing don mchis par yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa bdag la stsal du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]des dge slong yul shin tu rnam par dag pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong khyod kyi ming ni yul shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/_/khyod song la rang gi yul rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyis shig_/rang gi yul la tshul bzhin gyis so sor rtogs shig_/
[\[93b.2\]]ci nas kyang yul drug po dag gi nang nas chos gang khyod la snang bar 'gyur ba de nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa khong du chud pas byang chub mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar so sor rtogs shig_/byang chub la ring ba'i 'du shes ma byed cig_/nye ba'i 'du shes kyang ma byed cig_/
[\[93b.3\]]blo gros rgya mtsho de nas bcom ldan 'das des dge slong yul shin tu rnam par dag pa la gdams ngag 'dis gdams pa dang gcig pu dben par rtun cing shes bzhin dang ldan la bag yod par gnas te rang gi yul la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog go/_/de'i tshul bzhin 
[\[93b.4\]]gyis so sor rtog pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mig gi yul ni stong pa nyid kyi yul lo/_/stong pa nyid kyi yul ni sems can thams cad kyi yul lo/_/sems can thams cad kyang stong pa nyid kyi yul te sangs rgyas kyi yul lo/_/rna ba'i yul ni stong pa nyid kyi yul 
[\[93b.5\]]lo/_/stong pa nyid kyi yul ni sems can thams cad kyi yul lo/_/sems can thams cad kyang stong pa nyid kyi yul te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul lo/_/de bzhin du sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi yul ni stong pa nyid kyi yul lo/_/stong pa nyid kyi yul ni 
[\[93b.6\]]sems can thams cad kyi yul lo/_/sems can thams cad kyang stong pa nyid kyi yul te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul lo/_/mig gi yul ni mtshan ma med pa'i yul lo/_/mtshan ma med pa'i yul ni sems can thams cad kyi yul lo/_/sems can thams cad kyang mtshan 
[\[93b.7\]]ma med pa'i yul te sangs rgyas kyi yul lo/_/yid kyi bar gyi yul ni mtshan ma med pa'i yul lo/_/mtshan ma med pa'i yul ni sems can thams cad kyi yul lo/_/sems can thams cad kyang mtshan ma med pa'i yul te sangs rgyas kyi yul lo/_/de bzhin du mig gi 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]yul ni smon pa med pa'i yul lo/_/mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i yul lo/_/ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba'i yul lo/_/ma byung ba'i yul ni sems can thams cad kyi yul lo/_/sems can thams cad kyang ma byung ba'i yul te sangs rgyas kyi yul lo/_/
[\[94a.2\]]de bzhin du yid kyi bar gyi yul dang sbyar ro/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar dge slong yul shin tu rnam par dag pa yul la 'jug pa 'dis lus dang sems las su rung ste 'dun pa dang brtson 'grus dang sems dang /_dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgoms pas ring po ma thogs par 
[\[94a.3\]]mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed par gyur to/_/bag yod pa'i spyod pa des kyang don dang nges par byung ba'i tshig thams cad sdud pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rab tu thob po/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de'i tshe de'i dus na gang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'byor pa spangs te bcom ldan 'das de'i 
[\[94a.4\]]bstan pa la rab tu byung nas yul shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i dge slong du gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing yid gnyis su gyur tam the tshom za na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_blo gros rgya mtsho khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong yul 
[\[94a.5\]]shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de'i tshe de'i dus na gang dag dge slong rab tu byung ba de'i rjes su rab tu byung ba'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por gyur pa de dag gzhan dag cig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na/_de de ltar mi blta ste/_
[\[94a.6\]]chos mnyan pa'i phyir gang dag khyod kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na srog chags khri brgyad stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[94a.7\]]brgyad stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/sngon byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/_blo gros rgya mtsho de lta bas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]byang chub myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi rjes su bslab par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpas tshig tu byas shing tshig lhur blang bar mi bya'i byang chub sems dpas ji skad smras pa de bzhin du 
[\[94b.2\]]bya'o/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa yin zhe na/_blo gros rgya mtsho sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di ni brjod par sla'i/_dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgrub pa ni dka'o snyam pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho 
[\[94b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang la las chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer te/_kho bos sems can khyed chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par bya'o zhes byas la mang du thos pa dang /_de las gzhan pa dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la yang brtson par mi 
[\[94b.4\]]byed na de sems can de dag la slu ba yin te/_de ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ma yin no/_/blo gros rgya mtsho gang gi tshe byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer te kho bos sems can khyod chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par bya'o zhes byas la 
[\[94b.5\]]mang du thos pa dang /_de las gzhan pa dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la yang brtson par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpas ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa yin no/_/blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste dper na/_rgyal po'am rgyal po'i blon pos grong khyer gyi skye bo thams 
[\[94b.6\]]cad la sang zan sbyin no zhes mgron du bos la yal bar bor te/_bza' ba dang btung ba ma sbyar na des skye bo'i tshogs de thams cad bslus pa yin te/_de dag kyang bza' ba dang /_btung ba'i zas ma thob pas 'phya zhing slar 'ong ba de bzhin du/_blo gros rgya mtsho byang 
[\[94b.7\]]chub sems dpas ma rgal ba bsgral ba dang /_ma grol ba dgrol ba dang /_dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir sems can thams cad dbugs phyung la mang du thos pa dang /_de las gzhan 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]pa'i dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la yang brtson par mi byed na/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ma yin te/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu ba yin no/_/de lta bu de sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha rnams kyis mthong 
[\[95a.2\]]na 'phya zhing gzhogs 'phyas byed la rnam par smod de/_gang dag mchod sbyin bya bar dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'i mchod sbyin gyi bdag po byed pa de dag ni dkon no/_/de bas kyang gang dag mchod sbyin chen po de brtsams nas bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po la yongs 
[\[95a.3\]]su skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dag ni ches dkon no/_/blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpas gang gis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu bar 'gyur ba'i tshig brjod par mi bya'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang la la zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' gang la chos kyi 
[\[95a.4\]]don bya bar gsol ba btab la/_de la byang chub sems dpa' kho bos khyed kyi chos kyi don 'di yongs su thob par bya'o zhes tshig smras par gyur na/_byang chub sems dpas de la lus ni yongs su gtang bar bya'i sems can slu bar ni mi bya'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis rnam 
[\[95a.5\]]grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho sngon byung ba'i 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med dpag tu med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_seng ge'i rgyal po dar dkar lta bu'i ral pa can yan lag ma smad pa zhes bya ba sems can thams 
[\[95a.6\]]cad la byams pa'i rjes su zhugs pa rtsa ba dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu la mos pa zhig ri'i phug bgrod dka' ba zhig na gnas so/_/ri phug bgrod dka' ba de na spre'u pho mo gnyis shig kyang gnas so/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na spre'u mo de la bu 'brangs nas de las phru gu 
[\[95a.7\]]gnyis byung ngo /_/de nas spre'u de dang spre'u mo des phru gu de gnyis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge la btams te spyod yul du dong ngo /_/de nas bya rgod kyi rgyal po spu gri ba zhes bya ba steng gi bar snang las babs te spre'u'i phru gu de gnyis blangs nas steng gi bar snang la gnas par gyur pa 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ges bya rgod kyi rgyal po spu gri bas spre'u'i phru gu de gnyis khyer ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bya rgod rgyal po khyod la bdag gsol ba/_/bdag gi spre'u'i phru gu de gnyis khyed kyis thong /_/bdag ni de dag 'jigs 
[\[95b.2\]]med bya phyir gnas/_/skyabs su dong ba ma gsad khyed kyis thong /_/de nas bya rgod kyi rgyal pos [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal po gal te khyod ni bdag 'dor na/_/de ltar na ni 'di gnyis mi gsad gtang bar bya/_/kho bos 
[\[95b.3\]]'di gnyis zos nas kho bo mkha' la gnas/_/khyod ni khros par gyur kyang bdag la ci byar yod/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal pos yang smras pa/_bdag ni btang gis yongs su bza' bar gyis/_/bdag gi spre'u'i phru gu gnyis ni btang bar gsol/_/byang chub zhugs pa dam 
[\[95b.4\]]bcas srung bar byed/_/mkhas pa dag ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba med/_/bdag [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]'gyur du 'ong ste lhag bsam pas/_/de nas drang srong chen po lus 'dor te/_/de nas lhag pa'i bsam pas dgar gyur nas/_/sems can rnams kyi ched du lus gtong ngo /_/de nas bya rgod 
[\[95b.5\]]kyi rgyal po des rmad du byung ba de mthong nas nam mkha' la gnas te ched du brjod de ched du brjod pa/_gang dag gzhan phyir rang gi lus 'dor ba/_/de dag 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'dir bder 'tsho/_/kho bos spre'u'i phru gu 'di gnyis gtang bar bya/_/khyod kyang 'tsho zhing ring du 
[\[95b.6\]]chos spyod cig_/blo gros rgya mtsho de'i tshe de'i dus na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ger gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_blo gros rgya mtsho nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ger gyur to/_/'od srung chen 
[\[95b.7\]]po ni spre'ur gyur to/_/ser skya bzang mo ni spre'u mor gyur to/_/sgra gcan zin dang kun dga' bo ni spre'u phrug tu gyur to/_/dge slong phreng ba bzang po ni de'i tshe de'i dus na bya rgod kyi rgyal po spu gri ba zhes bya bar gyur to/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]lus ni yongs su gtang bar bya'i skyabs su dong ba rnams ni yongs su gtang bar mi bya ste ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o/_/de la ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa gang zhe na/_blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa smra ba ni ji skad smra ba ste/_
[\[96a.2\]]gang gi tshe bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar snang ba 'di ni de'i de bzhin byed pa'o/_/de ltar na ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims smra ba ni ji skad smra ba ste/_gang gi tshe tshul khrims dang bslab pa dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan 
[\[96a.3\]]thams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing spyod par kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i de bzhin byed pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa smra ba ni ji skad smra ba ste/_gang gi tshe gnod sems dang tha ba dang zhe sdang spong bar snang ba 'di ni de'i de bzhin byed pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' brtson 
[\[96a.4\]]'grus smra ba ni ji skad smra ba ste/_gang gi tshe dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba la brtson 'grus snang ba 'di ni de'i de bzhin byed pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan smra ba ni ji skad smra ba ste/_gang gi tshe bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin 
[\[96a.5\]]dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la snang ba 'di ni de'i de bzhin byed pa'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab smra ba ni ji skad smra ba ste/_gang gi tshe tshig rab tu dbye ba'i spobs pa rnam par nges pa'i ye shes la mkhas par snang ba nyid ni de'i de bzhin byed pa'o/_/
[\[96a.6\]]de bzhin du mi dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi bar dag spong bar smra ba dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba smra ba ni byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smra ba ste/_gang gi tshe mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba la 
[\[96a.7\]]brtson par snang ba 'di ni de'i de bzhin byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang bsam pa ni ji skad smra ba'o/_/g.yo med cing sgyu med pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o/_/sbyor ba ni ji skad smra ba'o/_/sbyor ba nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o/_/rtsom pa ni ji skad smra ba'o/_/rtsom pa 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]la zhum pa med pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa ni ji skad smra ba'o/_/de la ma chags par khyad par du 'gro ba ni de bzhin byed pa'o/_/dam bcas pa ni ji skad smra ba'o/_/dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o/_/thos pa kun tu 
[\[96b.2\]]'dzin pa ni ji skad smra ba'o/_/thos pa sgrub pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o/_/tshig gis yang dag par blangs pa ni ji skad smra ba'o/_/lus dang sems zhum pa med pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o/_/nga rgyal med pa ni ji skad smra ba'o/_/ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni de bzhin byed 
[\[96b.3\]]pa'o/_/bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa ni ji skad smra ba'o/_/bslab pa ma nyams pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o/_/sems dang po bskyed pa ni ji skad smra ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgrub pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o/_/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni ji skad smra ba'o/_/
[\[96b.4\]]phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ni de bzhin byed pa'o/_/skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ni ji skad smra ba'o/_/byang chub kyi snying por 'dug pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o/_/yang dag par blangs pa brtan pa ni ji skad smra ba'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni 
[\[96b.5\]]de bzhin byed pa'o/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba ni ji skad smra ba'o/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad par byed pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa yin no/_/
[\[96b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma bkod pas 'di 
[\[96b.7\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad smras pa de bzhin bgyid pas sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di thams cad bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di la 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bsgrub pa 'di yang 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]ji skad smras pa de bzhin bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod bsgrub pa shes sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod 
[\[97a.2\]]bsgrub pa las rtsoms la spobs par gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bsgrub pa zhes bgyi ba ni gang /_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid du 'tshal nas yang dag pa nyid kyi nges par gyur pa la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas kyang mngon sum 
[\[97a.3\]]du yang mi bgyid pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsgrub pa yang dag pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' ri dbang rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang bsgrub pa las brtsams te spobs lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[97a.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod spobs par gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sgrub pa ni bsgrub pa ma mchis pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad ma dmigs 
[\[97a.5\]]te/_gang bsgrub pa dang /_gang la sgrub pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi rgyal po snang bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang la sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par 
[\[97a.6\]]shes pa 'jug pa de la sgrub pa ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang chos thams cad la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa de chos gang la yang mi gnas pa lags so/_/gang chos thams cad la yang mi gnas pa de nyid de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa 
[\[97a.7\]]lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' lhun po'i sgron me'i rgyal pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das lta ba ma mchis pa ni sgrub pa lags te/_lta ba dang bcas pa la sgrub pa ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang chos thams cad gdeg 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]pa ma mchis pa dang /_gzhag pa ma mchis pas chos gang la'ang mi lta ba 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gnas pa ni g.yo ba lags te/_mi gnas pa la g.yo ba ma 
[\[97b.2\]]mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang gnas par mi bgyid pa de ni mi g.yo'o/_/gang mi g.yo ba de chos thams cad kyis mi 'khrugs te/_'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bos gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[97b.3\]]ldan 'das 'jig rten ni sems kyis spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ni sems kyis rgyug go/_/rjes su rgyug go/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang sems thams cad sems ma mchis par gyur pa de ni mi sems mi rtog ste/_'di ni de'i 
[\[97b.4\]]sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthong dgas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das tshor ba thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pas sdug bsngal du gsungs te/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang tshor ba thams cad kyi rgyun bkum 
[\[97b.5\]]nas tshor ba ma mchis shing len pa ma mchis kyang tshor ba 'gog pa la yang rig par mi bgyid la snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad kyang yongs su mi gtong ba 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' glang chen spos kyi bal glang gis 
[\[97b.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo dag ni phung po lnga la lta bas glags par gyur pas khur gyis non pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang phung po lnga yongs su 'tshal ba dang ldan te khur myur du 'dor ba de byis pa so so'i skye bo 
[\[97b.7\]]phung po lnga la lta bas glags par gyur pas khur gyis non pa rnams kyi khur spang ba'i phyir chos ston kyang chos thams cad ma skyes shing mngon par grub pa ma mchis pas chos gang la yang yang dag pa'i 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/_/
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba 'dzin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par sbyor ba'i sgrub pa lags kyi ya nga ba'i sbyor ba'i ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa'i sbyor ba la brtson par bgyi'o/_/de 
[\[98a.2\]]la yang dag pa'i sbyor ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid pas gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'tshal ba 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang 
[\[98a.3\]]chub sems dpa' gang thabs dang shes rab kyi ye shes kyis ma skyes pa las kyang skye/_ma byung ba las kyang 'byung yang skye ba dang 'jig pa dang gnas pa la mi gnas pa 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpal brtsegs rgyal 
[\[98a.4\]]pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par yang mthong la snying rje chen po'i go cha de yang mi 'dor zhing rtsol ba yang don mchis par mthong ba 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa 
[\[98a.5\]]lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer thogs pa med pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rgyu ba'i gnas ji tsam pa de tsam du bdud kyi las so/_/ci tsam du bdud kyi las lags pa de tsam du sgrub pa ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das rgyu ba ma mchis 
[\[98a.6\]]pa'i gnas la gnas pa la ni bdud kyis glags mi rnyed de/_bdud kyi lam las shin tu 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sgrub pa yang dag pa la gnas pa zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[98a.7\]]gang dag chos 'ga' zhig yongs su 'grub par 'tshal ba de dag gi 'bad pa don ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su grub pa ma mchis par yang 'dir 'tshal la 'tshal ba gang lags pas kyang rlom sems su mi bgyid pa 'di ni 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ngan spong gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'gyur ba dang rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa de dag la sgrub pa ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang rtog pa ma mchis 
[\[98b.2\]]pa ni sgrub pa ste/_gang 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa ni sems can gyi sems kyi rang bzhin lags so/_/sems kyi rang bzhin yongs su 'tshal ba dang ldan pa ni sgrub pa yang dag pa la gnas pa zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[98b.3\]]dpa' bsam pa legs par sems kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su 'jug par bgyi ste/_gang 'dir sems can thams cad kyi sems rnams kyang sems ma 
[\[98b.4\]]lags par sems 'tshal ba la 'jug pa 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das nye bar zhi ba ni sgrub pa lags te/_ma zhi ba la ni sgrub pa ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[98b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang sems kyi dmigs pa thams cad las zhi ba dang rab tu zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba de rtog pa dang spong bar mi bgyid de rtog pa dang spong ba dang bral ba mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/_/byang chub sems 
[\[98b.6\]]dpa' ded dpon bzang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pa ni sgrub pa thob par bgyid pa lags te/_dge ba'i rtsa bas ma brtan pa ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang bsod 
[\[98b.7\]]nams kyi tshogs kyis kyang brtan ye shes kyi tshogs kyis kyang brtan te/_bsod nams mnyam pa nyid bas ye shes mnyam pa nyid ye shes mnyam pa nyid pas bsod nams mnyam pa nyid/_bsod nams dang ye shes mnyam pa nyid pas byang chub mnyam pa nyid/_
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]byang chub mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' dus dpog rgyal pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa ni sgrub pa 
[\[99a.2\]]lags te/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du bar 'tshal nas chos gang yang 'byed par yang mi bgyid/_sbyor bar yang mi bgyid pa 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/_/byang chub sems 
[\[99a.3\]]dpa' don legs sems kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das don la rton pa lags kyi tshig 'bru la ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang don gyi rjes su zhugs pa'i blos chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong kun tu 'dzin pa dang ston par 
[\[99a.4\]]bgyid kyang yang dag pa'i don brjod du ma mchis pa de las kyang mi g.yo ba 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam par dag pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das lhag pa'i bsam pa ni sgrub pa lags te/_bcom ldan 
[\[99a.5\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' gang lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa de ni skad dang tshig dang brjod pa lhur len pa ma lags kyi de ni yang dag pa'i sgrub pa tshol ba lags te/_ji ltar 'gro ba dang 'ong ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar tshol ba 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang 
[\[99a.6\]]dag pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' shin tu dri med sems pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_gos dri ma can bkru bar bgyi'i dri ma ma mchis pa ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sems yongs su ma dag pa ni yang 
[\[99a.7\]]dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pas yongs su sbyang bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang gi sems dang yid la nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mi 'jug pa de dag pa'o/_/dag pa gang lags pa de sgrub pa yang dag pa la 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]gnas pa zhes bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa 'di ni tshegs chung ngus sgrub pa yang dag pa 'phags pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[99b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag la gnas shing bdud kyi lcags kyu las mi 'da' ba de dag thams cad ni sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa lags so/_/gang dag bdud kyi lcags kyu las shin tu 'da' ba de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes 
[\[99b.3\]]gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lcags kyu las shin tu 'da' bar 'tshal bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen par bgyi/_/bsten par bgyi/_bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/_/dge ba'i 
[\[99b.4\]]bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshegs chung ngus sgrub pa yang dag par 'phags pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis 
[\[99b.5\]]bdud kyi lcags kyu rnams shes sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bdud kyi lcags kyu rnams 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros rgya mtsho gang thos pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu 'da' bar 'gyur zhing bdud dang 
[\[99b.6\]]phyir rgol ba choms te myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar khyod bdud kyi lcags kyu bstan pa la rtsom ste spobs par gyis shig_/blo gros rgya mtshos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_sangs 
[\[99b.7\]]rgyas kyi mthus bdag gis bdud kyi lcags kyu bshad par bgyi'o/_/bdud kyi lcags kyu rnams gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi lcags kyu ni bcu gnyis po 'di dag ste/_bcu gnyis gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni mi phangs pa'i dngos po yongs su btang ba'i sems 'jug gi phangs pa'i dngos po yongs su btang ba'i sems mi 'jug pa dang /_sems can gang dag de la dga' bar gyur pa de dag la ni sbyin par bgyid sems can gang dag dga' bar ma 
[\[100a.2\]]gyur pa de dag la ni sbyin par mi bgyid cing des dngos po tha dad du bgyid sems can tha dad du bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste dang po'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' tshul 
[\[100a.3\]]khrims dang ldan zhing dge ba'i chos can du gyur te/_so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams/_cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs/_kha na ma tho ba phra rags la yang 'jigs par lta/_'tsho ba yongs su dag_/bslab pa'i gnas yang dag par blangs pa rnams la 
[\[100a.4\]]slob ste/_de tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong dang bram ze la bsnyen cing sten la bsnyen bkur bgyid de tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can rnams la khro ba dang sdang ba dang zhe 'gras par bgyid cing tshul khrims de nyid kyis bdag la stod de gzhan la smod na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[100a.5\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste gnyis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa sgrub ste/_lus kyis kyang bzod ngag gis kyang bzod na/_sems kyis gnod pa bgyid de/_de sems can 
[\[100a.6\]]stobs dang ldan pa rnams la ni bzod/_sems can nyam chung ba rnams la ni mi bzod pa sems can stobs dang ldan pa rnams la ni bzod pa'i stobs nye bar ston/_sems can nyam chung ba rnams la ni gnod sems kyi sems kyi stobs nye bar ston te/_de re zhig 
[\[100a.7\]]ni bzod re zhig ni mi bzod/_kha cig la ni bzod/_kha cig la ni mi bzod la de gang gi tshe bzod pa de'i tshe bzod pas rgyags te rlom sems su bgyid/_gang gi tshe mi bzod pa de'i tshe ni myur du so sor mi 'chags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]bzod pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste gsum pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams par gyur la/_de brtson 'grus brtsams par gnas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sems can rnams yongs su 
[\[100b.2\]]smin par bgyid kyi theg pa chen po la sems can yongs su smin par mi bgyid/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam rgyun du ston gyi theg pa chen po'i gtam 'chab par bgyid/_'jig rten pa'i bgyi ba la zhal ta bgyid par brtson gyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 
[\[100b.3\]]yongs su mi tshol/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pas dga' ba thob ste/_'di lta ste/_me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis de 
[\[100b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod par bgyid de de la gzhol/_de la 'bab/_de la bab par gyur kyang thos pa yongs su btsal ba dang /_thos pa bstan pa dang /_thos pa la so sor brtag pa dang /_thos pa sgrub par brtson 'grus mi rtsom na bcom ldan 'das 'di ni 
[\[100b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bzhi pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan bzhi skyed/_gzugs ma mchis pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi skyed cing sgrub ste/_de dag la rgyun du mang 
[\[100b.6\]]du gnas par gyur la/_de zhi ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la gnas shing /_sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa la smod/_chos bstan pa la smod/_sems can dang 'dre ba la smod/_bsod nams kyi 'du byed rnams la smod cing mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed kyi ro 
[\[100b.7\]]myong bar bgyid cing /_gcig pur dga' bas dga' ba thob ste/_'bad pa chung ngur gnas par gyur nas/_bsam gtan las ldog par yongs su mi tshol gyi/_'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams la gsad par 'du shes shing gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]kyi ro myong bar bgyid la/_de lus dman pas gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams rnams su skye bar bgyid cing lha tshe ring po rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ste/_de der skye nas kyang gang sangs rgyas mang po dang /_sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang /_
[\[101a.2\]]sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po mnyes par mi bgyid pa de'i gnas mchis so/_/sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_chos mnyan pa dang /_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang bral bar 'gyur/_sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs 
[\[101a.3\]]su gzung ba dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur/_de'i dbang po rnams blun zhing rtul ba'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur/_de nas shi 'phos nas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der yang rtul ba'i rgyud can du 'gyur zhing rmugs pa dang gnyid che bar 'gyur 
[\[101a.4\]]ba 'di ni/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste lnga pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ldan par gyur te rkyen shin tu mthong ba'i slad du rgyu yongs su shes pa dang ldan par 
[\[101a.5\]]gyur/_rgyu ma mchis pa dang rgyu dang bral ba dang /_mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis par gyur te/_bsod nams kyi 'du byed rnams la smod thabs dang bral sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par mi bgyid/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[101a.6\]]dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson par mi bgyid la de 'di snyam du sems te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mchog shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni khyad par du 'phags pa ste/_de las gzhan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ni dman pa'o snyam na de'i 
[\[101a.7\]]dbang po yongs su ma smin pa btang snyoms su ltung ba ste/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams mi sdud cing spros pa ma mchis pa/_mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa de nyid kyi ro myong bar bgyid pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab dang rab tu ldan pa'i 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]bdud kyi lcags kyu ste drug pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa par gyur te/_bas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dga' zhing 'dod pa chung la chog shes te/_rab tu dben cing khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams dang mi 'dre ste/_de don 
[\[101b.2\]]nyung ba dang bgyi ba nyung bas bde bar gnas te g.yo ba ma mchis kyang mang du thos pa yongs su btsal ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /_chos mnyan pa la brtson par mi gnas/_chos kyi 'bel ba'i bka' mchid dang don rnam par nges pa'i bka' mchid 
[\[101b.3\]]bgyi ba la rgyun dgum par sems te/_yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can ma lags/_dge ba'i ci zhes tshol ba la mi brtson/_de dgon pa la gnas pa dang gcig pur dga' bas nyon mongs pa rnams kun tu mi rgyu ba ste/_de kun nas ldang ba gnon pa tsam gyis dga' ba 
[\[101b.4\]]thob cing bag la nyal yang dag par gzhom pa'i slad du lam sgom par mi bgyid/_de de na bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don gyi slad du brtson par mi 'gyur ba 'di dag ni/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i dgon pa la gnas pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste 
[\[101b.5\]]bdun pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos par gyur te/_chos kyi gtam can ni tshig mnyan par 'os pa/_tshig gzung bar 'os pa/_snyan pa sna tshogs kyi gtam can dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs par gyur kyang de zang zing gi slad du 
[\[101b.6\]]chos ston te/_zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems kyis ma lags/_gang las de'i gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams mchi bar 'gyur ba de dag la chos ston gyi sems can gang dag dad pa dang ldan zhing dang ba mang ba/_legs 
[\[101b.7\]]par bshad pa'i don 'tshal bar nus shing stobs dang ldan pa zang zing gis de rjes su 'dzin par mi bgyid pa de dag la chos mi ston pa dang /_gang dag de la 'ged par bgyid pa ni dman pa/_dman par gyur pa/_gti mug gi rang bzhin can/_chos rgya chen po'i snod du ma gyur pa 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]de dag la chos ston pa dang /_de zang zing gis sbags pa'i rgyud des gang dag chos bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_snod du ma gyur pa de dag la chos ston cing gang dag bstan par bgyi ba de dag la mi ston pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i chos 
[\[102a.2\]]bstan pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste brgyad pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten rgyang pa na pa yongs su tshol te/_de gzhan dag la zab mo'i bka' mchid rgyun bkum nas 'jig rten rgyang pa na pa'i bka' mchid sna tshogs ston te/_
[\[102a.3\]]de 'jig rten rgyang pa na pa'i bka' mchid ston pas 'jig rten dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba'i tshig dang /_lan gyi tshig la mkhas pas sems can rnams dga' bar 'gyur te/_de la legs so legs so zhes bgyi ba yang stsol bar 'gyur la/_des kyang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[102a.4\]]yi rangs par 'gyur ba dang /_lha'i bu gang dag sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba/_chos zab mo la mos pa/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir der 'dus par gyur pa de dag sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/_yi ma rangs nas gang 'jig rten gyi dga' bas mngon par dga' ba'i sems can 
[\[102a.5\]]de dag la zab mo'i gtam gyi rgyun bcad de 'jig rten rgyang pa na pa'i gtam sna tshogs ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'di ni dam pa'i chos nub par byed pa yin gyi/_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_don zab mo'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[102a.6\]]rnams 'byung gi/_'jig rten rgyang pa na pa'i gtam sna tshogs kyi phyir ma yin no/_/zhes mchi zhing 'khor de nas mchi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig smra'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gang 'jig rten rgyang pa na pa'i bka' mchid sna tshogs bgyid 
[\[102a.7\]]kyi zab mo'i bka' mchid 'chab pa de ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba nub par bgyi ba'i slad du zhugs pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bka' mchid zab mo 'chab cing 'jig rten rgyang pa na pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste dgu pa'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen ltar bcos pa sdig pa'i grogs po gang dag de la bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams las 'dun pa zlog pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa las 'dun pa zlog pa dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba las 
[\[102b.2\]]'dun pa zlog pa dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs las 'dun pa zlog pa dang /_rab tu dben pa la sbyor ba dang /_don nyung zhing bgyid pa nyung ba la sbyor ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid de la rgyun du mang du ston pa dang /_theg pa chen po dang ldan 
[\[102b.3\]]pa'i bka' mchid de la mi ston pa dag la bsnyen cing bsten te bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang /_gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dben par gnas pas theg pa chen po las ldang ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas gdon mi za bar zhal ta byed par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta bgyid 
[\[102b.4\]]pa'i dri ma la sbyor la/_gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta bgyid pa'i dri ma la sbyor ba de'i tshe/_dben pa la sbyor zhing mtshan ma dang bcas pa dang rgyu dang bcas pa'i bzod pa'i sa nye bar ston gyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag pa yang dag phul gang lags pa de dag de la 
[\[102b.5\]]mi ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag pa yang dag phul de dag gang lags zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag pa yang dag phul lags so/_/bcu po de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dad pa'i rtsa ba la rab tu 
[\[102b.6\]]gnas te/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen cing bsten te bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang /_mgo dang gos la zhugs 'bar ba bzhin du dge ba'i chos ci zhes yongs su tshol ba dang /_dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa la gnas te yang dag pa'i brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang /_bag 
[\[102b.7\]]mchis par las bgyid pa chud mi gzon pa dang /_bdag bde ba la mi chags par rtag par rgyun tu sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /_lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]su sbyang ba'i slad du bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa dang /_gzungs dang spobs pa rab tu thob par bgyi ba'i slad du ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba dang /_so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi sas mi gos par bgyi ba'i slad du shes rab 
[\[103a.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis las shin tu bzla ba'i slad du thabs la mkhas pa yongs su tshol ba ste/_bcom ldan 'das bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag pa yang dag phul lags te/_gang dag la byang 
[\[103a.3\]]chub sems dpas bslab par bgyi ba de dag de la mi ston pa dang /_de la 'di skad du byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i yin gyi le lo can gyi ma yin no/_/gal te khyod bskal pa brgyad dam bcus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[103a.4\]]rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas na phyis khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so zhes mchi la/_bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' gang sgyid lug nas 'bras bu thob par bgyid pa'i gnas mchis na/_bcom ldan 
[\[103a.5\]]'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen ltar bcos pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bcu pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal gyis khengs shing nga rgyal gyis rengs par gyur te/_de nga rgyal des bla ma rnams dang /_sbyin gnas rnams 
[\[103a.6\]]dang /_pha ma dang /_slob dpon dang /_mkhan po rnams dang /_de las gzhan pa bla ma lta bu'i gang zag rnams la kun tu 'dud pa dang /_'dud pa dang /_rab tu 'dud par mi bgyid cing de la ma gus par gyur pa dang /_gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams 
[\[103a.7\]]la mkhas pa/_khyad par thob pa/_gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i bgyi ba thams cad tshar phyin pa de dag gi gan du mi mchi/_mi bsnyen/_mi bsten/_bsnyen bkur mi bgyid/_yongs su mi 'dri/_yongs su 'drir mi stsol cing de 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]ma thos pa'i chos nyan par mi bgyid/_thos pa'i chos rnams kyang yongs su dkar bar mi bgyid/_de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag bdud kyi lcags kyus zin pa/_chos ngan pa la spyod pa de dag la dga' ba rnyed pa dang /_de dag kyang 
[\[103b.2\]]de bzhin du de'i rjes su 'jug par gyur pa dang /_de dman pa la sten cing /_khyad par dang bral ba 'di lta ste zhan pa'i 'gro ba/_blun pa/_'on pa/_lkugs pa'i 'gro ba/_'gro ba dman pa nyid du mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu la 
[\[103b.3\]]la zhig gis gram pa'i sa phyogs su shing tsam pa ka bskrun la chab stsol bar mi bgyid kyi/_gang nas chab mchi bar mthong ba'i phyogs der yang gor ma dang gyo mo dag gis bkum na/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar na zhugs shing tsam pa ka chab dang bral ba de la yal ga dang lo ma dang 
[\[103b.4\]]yal ga phre'u ma chags pa rnams kyang chags par mi 'gyur/_yal ga dang lo ma dang yal ga phre'u chags pa rnams kyang skams te dog sa la lhung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub kyi sems bskyed la nga rgyal gyis khengs shing 
[\[103b.5\]]nga rgyal gyis rengs par gyur na/_de dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang chos mnyan pa dang bral te/_ma thos pa'i chos rnams kyang mi nyan/_thos pa'i chos rnams kyang yongs su dkar bar mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_gang gi tshe rgya mtsho chen po mchis 
[\[103b.6\]]par gyur pa de'i tshe gzhol ba'i phyogs na mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de gzhol ba'i slad du chu klung thams cad dang chab mig dang /_'bab chu thams cad tshegs chung ngus der 'bab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal ma mchis pa bla ma dang /_sbyin 
[\[103b.7\]]gnas la gus pa yang tshegs chung ngus chos zab mo'i sgo rnams rna ba'i dbang po la grags par 'gyur ro/_/de dran pa la yang gnas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal gyis khengs nga rgyal gyis rengs par gyur te/_bla ma 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]dang sbyin gnas rnams la kun tu mi 'dud cing 'dud par mi bgyid la rab tu mi 'dud na/_bcom ldan 'das kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyus zin par rig par bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i nga rgyal dang rab tu 
[\[104a.2\]]ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bcu gcig pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la phyug cing nor che ba dang /_longs spyod che ba nor mang la mdzod dang bang ba mang po phun sum tshogs par gyur te gzugs dang /_longs spyod dang /_
[\[104a.3\]]rus dang /_rigs dang /_g.yog 'khor dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan par gyur/_ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson zhing de gzugs dang /_longs spyod dang /_g.yog 'khor dang /_dbang phyug gi stobs kyis rgyags shing bag ma 
[\[104a.4\]]mchis par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rab tu byung bar gtogs pa khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba/_ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa/_gdugs dang bser mas sha dang khrag bskams pa/_rke ba/_nyam chung ba/_lus rtsas yog 
[\[104a.5\]]pa/_mgo dang gos la zhugs 'bar ba bzhin du gdugs mtshan du brtson 'grus brtsams pa/_dge ba'i chos yongs su tshol ba la rtag tu brtson pa dang ldan pa de dag la rke zhing nyam chung la mdog ngan cing mi sdug par rig nas brnyas par bya'o snyam du sems shing /_de dag las 
[\[104a.6\]]legs par bshad pa nyan par mi 'tshal gyi de de bas shas cher dman zhing ches rmugs par 'gyur ba 'di ni/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i rgyags pa dang bag ma mchis pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bcu gnyis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bcu gnyis 
[\[104a.7\]]po de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi lcags kyu ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag las shin tu ma 'das na tha na rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa yang mi 'thob na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lta smos kyang ci 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]'tshal te de ni gnas ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/_byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas bdud kyi lcags kyu 'di dag las shin tu 'da' bar bgyi'o//_//
[\[104b.2\]]'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa/_bam po bcu pa ste tha ma/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi lcags kyu 'di dag legs par 
[\[104b.3\]]bshad pa legs so legs so/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang byang chub sems dpa' dag gang la gnas na bdud kyi lcags kyu thams cad las shin tu 'da' bar 'gyur ba bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo khyod la
