[\[104b.4\]]bshad do/_/blo gros rgya mtsho bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo de dag gang zhe na/_blo gros rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni stong pa 
[\[104b.5\]]nyid kyi rang bzhin pas stong pa nyid kyi rnam par zhugs kyang bdag nyid skyabs byed pas/_sems can thams cad la cher byams pa 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo dang po'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin pas mtshan ma 
[\[104b.6\]]med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang yongs su thar bar byed pas/_sems can thams cad la cher snying rje ba 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo gnyis pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin pas smon pa med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang 
[\[104b.7\]]sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du skye ba 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo gsum pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rang bzhin pas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam par zhugs kyang 'dod chags 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]la spyod pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo bzhi pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni zhe sdang dang bral ba'i rang bzhin pas zhe sdang dang bral ba'i rnam par zhugs kyang zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems 
[\[105a.2\]]can yongs su smin par byed pa 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo lnga pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni gti mug dang bral ba'i rang bzhin pas gti mug dang bral ba'i rnam par zhugs kyang gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'di ni 
[\[105a.3\]]bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo drug pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i rang bzhin pas kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'di ni bdud kyi 
[\[105a.4\]]lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo bdun pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pa'i rang bzhin pas skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang /_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba spong ba'i phyir sems can rnams 
[\[105a.5\]]la chos ston pa 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo brgyad pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni ngang mnyam zhing bye brag med pa'i rang bzhin pas ngang mnyam zhing bye brag med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang theg pa chen po'i bsam pa yongs su mi 'dor bar sems can 
[\[105a.6\]]rnams la theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa'i chos ston pa 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo dgu pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa la yang mi gnas la/_byang chub kyi sems kyang mi brjed/_rtsom 
[\[105a.7\]]pa thams cad dang yang bral la sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba'i rtsom pa yang mi 'dor/_spyod pa thams cad las kyang shin tu 'das la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las kyang mi ldog pa 'di ni/_blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]sgo bcu pa'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo ste byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rab tu sbyor na bdud kyi lcags kyu thams cad las shin tu 'das par 'gyur ro/_/bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad 
[\[105b.2\]]pa na/_bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por gyur te rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/'di lta ste/_dper na/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdzod spu nas 'od rab tu byung bas bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe bdud 
[\[105b.3\]]kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por gyur to/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis ltas rgya chen po 'di mthong nas rings shing myur bar la gor du dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bsdus te/_bkod pa ci 'dra bas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gan du 'gro ba'i 
[\[105b.4\]]bkod pa de 'dra ba'i dpag tshad sum cu rtsa drug tshun chad bdud kyi sdes bkang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba der dong ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mthus der des bsgrims par gyur te/_'ongs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_gang dag phyir 
[\[105b.5\]]mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_'khor de las sems can gang dag 'dul bar gyur pa rnams dang /_gang dag srid par kun tu sbyor ba spangs pa'i dgra bcom pa lta ba phun sum tshogs pa'i gang zag rnams ma gtogs par gang gis kyang de ma mthong ngo /_/
[\[105b.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/_blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis bdud sdig can bkod pa ji lta bu dang ldan pas 'ong ba mthong ngam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[105b.7\]]blo gros rgya mtsho bdud sdig can 'di ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad bya ba'i phyir 'ongs na 'di ci zhig bya/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das deng 'di bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'phang bar bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_byang 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni ga la yod/_de na chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ni ci zhig bya/_blo gros rgya mtshos smras pa/_btsun 
[\[106a.2\]]pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[106a.3\]]sangs rgyas bdud rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba chos ston to/_/ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya zhe na/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na bde ba'i rgyu dang /_yon tan gyi rgyu dang /_bkod 
[\[106a.4\]]pa'i rgyu bskal par brjod kyang zad par mi nus te/_de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud rab tu 'joms pa des byang chub thob 
[\[106a.5\]]pa de'i tshe/_de byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par lus las bdud kun tu skul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung nas 'od zer des bskul bas 'jig rten gyi khams de na bdud bye ba phrag brgya 'khod pa'i bdud re re zhing yang g.yog 'khor bye ba brgya phrag bcu 
[\[106a.6\]]yod pa/_de dag thams cad byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad bya bar brtsams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad byed ma nus te/_de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs so/_/des 
[\[106a.7\]]kyang ji lta ji ltar de dag bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdud de dag la chos bstan nas bcom ldan 'das de phyis byang chub thob ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de bdud rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya'o/_
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]de byang chub thob pa'i mchog gi phrugs dang /_bzang po'i phrugs kyang bdud las btul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so/_/rim gro ba yang bdud las btul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de ni 
[\[106b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i gtam 'ba' zhig yang dag par rab tu ston te/_de na theg pa gzhan gyi ming yang med do/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni de 'dra ste/_der 'phangs na phyis bdud kyi las byed par mi 'gyur gyi/_bdud 
[\[106b.3\]]las btul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bdud sdig can dngangs skrag 'jigs te/_spu zing zhes byed nas/_'khor de nas 'gro bar 'dod na 
[\[106b.4\]]'gro ma nus te mi snang bar ma gyur na/_de de bas kyang cher dngangs shing skrag ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'jig rten gyi khams der 'phang bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[106b.5\]]la bskyab tu gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bdag la bskyab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sdig can ma 'jigs shig/_skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag ni sems can la rnam par 'tshe ba'i phyir gnas pa ma yin no/_/sdig can khyod byang chub 
[\[106b.6\]]sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho 'di la bzod pa gsol cig dang /_'di nyid khyod la skyob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis thal mo sbyar te/_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod bdag la bzod pa 
[\[106b.7\]]mdzad du gsol/_bdag bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der mi 'phang bar gsol/_ji ltar gang na skyes bu dam pa khyod lta bu chos ston par gyur pa'i 'khor der bar chad bgyi ba'i slad du lan 'ga' yang mchi bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o/_/blo gros rgya mtshos 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]smras pa/_sdig can kho bo lta bu dag la bzod pa gsol mi dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad la shin tu bzod pa nyid do/_/sdig can khyod bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der song la/_'jig 
[\[107a.2\]]rten gyi khams kyi bkod pa de dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de la ltos shig dang khyod la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos lag pa g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas/_bdud sdig 
[\[107a.3\]]can gyi spyi bor bzhag nas/_bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi ser sna dang /_slob dpon chos kyi dpe mkhyud med pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ci 'dra bar bdud sdig can gyi yang de dang 'dra bar 
[\[107a.4\]]gyur cig ces de lta bu'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs byas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/_de nas bdud sdig can rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs mchog dang ldan par gyur te/_des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[107a.5\]]'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas mi snang bar gyur te/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i byin gyi rlabs kyis skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der gnas par gyur to/_/
[\[107a.6\]]de nas bdud sdig can bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud rab tu 'joms pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 
[\[107a.7\]]'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bdud las btul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis bdud sdig can de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]'joms pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can dbang chung zhing mdog ngan la mi sdug pa 'di lta bu 'di gang nas mchis/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas gang gA'i klung 
[\[107b.2\]]bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod do/_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/'tsho'o gzhes so/_/de 'dus pa chen po'i 
[\[107b.3\]]le'u ni chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher ston to/_/yang dag par rab tu 'chad do/_/der phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med cing bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa dag_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 
[\[107b.4\]]der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba go cha bsam gyis mi khyab pa bgos pa/_bcom ldan 'das de la yongs su 'dri zhing yongs su 'drir 'jug pa yang 'dus par gyur to/_/chos kyi rnam grangs de'i tha ma bshad pa'i tshe bdud sdig can mig 
[\[107b.5\]]gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i las kyi phyir 'ongs pa dang /_skyes bu dam pa des 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste/_bdud sdig can de 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'phangs so/_/de nas bdud las btul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces 
[\[107b.6\]]smras so/_/kho bo cag kyang khyod kyi grogs yin gyis/_sdig can khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kho bo cag kyang bdud du gyur te/_sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa las/_
[\[107b.7\]]kho bo cag de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de lta bas na sdig can khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas tshig 'di skad ces bdag gis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de phyin chad bdud kyi las mi bya'o zhes smras so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdud sdig can rin po che bkod 
[\[108a.2\]]pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhag ste/_de na 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gtam rgyud ci 'dra ba la rigs kyi bu khyod spobs par gyis shig ces gsol ba btab bo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos gang bdud sdig can seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa'i kha'i 
[\[108a.3\]]sgo dang /_ba spu'i khung thams cad nas ji ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'dus pa chen po'i le'u rab tu bshad pa lta bu'i gtam byung ste/_yi ge de dag dang /_tshig dang /_yi ge'i 'bru de dag dang mnyam zhing mi nyung mi mang ma lhag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byin gyi rlabs 
[\[108a.4\]]byas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdud sdig can de las 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i gtam thos nas/_ngo mtshar du gyur te bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de dang /_bcom 
[\[108a.5\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho de dang /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pas 
[\[108a.6\]]mdzod spu nas/_gzugs thams cad ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/_'od zer phyung ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed de dag las 'das te 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/der byang chub sems 
[\[108a.7\]]dpa' de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams na bskal pa brgyar yang bsngags pa'i mthar mi phyin pa'i seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs te/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]dpa' rnams la 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho yang mthong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtsho gcig lta bur gnas pa 'di yang mthong ngo /_/
[\[108b.2\]]de nas sgrib pa ci yang med par mthong ngo /_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam gyi rin po che'i pad ma dag la 'khod cing chos nyan pa de dag kyang mthong ngo /_mthong nas kyang tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu 
[\[108b.3\]]dga' ste/_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su me tog gtor to/_/gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'ongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyi gtsug gi mtshams su me tog gi 
[\[108b.4\]]gdugs chen por gyur to/_/der thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des me tog gi gdugs de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang me tog gi gdugs 'di lta bur gyur pa'i me tog 'di dag gang nas mchis/_
[\[108b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag me tog 'di dag ni bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas 'ongs te/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis nga la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir gtor to/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 
[\[108b.6\]]gis bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de dang /_bdud sdig can 'jig rten gyi khams de na ci bgyid pa blta bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor des gsol ba 
[\[108b.7\]]btab pa mkhyen nas/_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de dang /_bdud sdig can de 'khor 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]'di la ston cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye bas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos sor mo bcu las 'od zer stong phrag bcu phyung nas/_'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed po de dag las 'das 
[\[109a.2\]]nas bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/der thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 
[\[109a.3\]]'joms pa de dang /_bdud sdig can chos kyi khri chen po la 'dug ste 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i gtam rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa yang mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas rang rang gi pad ma'i stan las langs te/_bcom 
[\[109a.4\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de la phyag 'tshal nas/_de dag gis mu tig dang /_me tog gis gtor to/_/gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug gi mtshams su me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa chen 
[\[109a.5\]]por gnas par kun tu snang ngo /_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gan du mchi'o/_/
[\[109a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na khyod song shig_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan bdun bskor ba byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur te/_byang chub 
[\[109a.7\]]sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gnas par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa de mthong ngam/_smras pa/_btsun 
[\[109b.2\]]pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams ji tsam du yongs su dag pa de mthong ste/_ji ltar dag cing dri ma med pa'i sems can mchog byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas de ngo mtshar to/_/bdag gis de mthong nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[109b.3\]]sems bskyed do/_/smras pa/_grogs po khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_khyod kyang bdud kyi las lta byed dam/_smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[109b.4\]]rnams la gang gis kyang bdud kyi las byed mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji lta ji ltar bdud kyi las byed pa de lta de ltar/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ches stobs dang ldan zhing brtson 
[\[109b.5\]]'grus rtsom mo/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang gang dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdud kyi las byed pa de nyid/_sangs rgyas kyi phrin las su brjod kyi bdud kyi las ni ma yin pa de ltar rig par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu bstan 
[\[109b.6\]]pa dang /_bdud kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 'khor de las srog chags nyi khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/bdud kyi 'khor de las kyang bdud kyi bu khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas 
[\[109b.7\]]mgrin gcig tu bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa der skye bar gyur cig ces tshig de skad ces smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun du 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni bar chad mang ba phyir rgol ba 
[\[110a.2\]]mang ba lags na/_gang 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis nub par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang /_ston pa de dag la yang bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur 
[\[110a.3\]]ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas pa dang mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang kun tu bsrung ba dang sba ba dang /_yongs su gzung ba'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas legs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[110a.4\]]'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/blo gros rgya mtsho sems can gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /_ston par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar gzung 
[\[110a.5\]]ste chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs zin to/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_tshig gang dag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi dag bkug nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun tu bsrung ba dang /_chos smra ba de dag kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir 
[\[110a.6\]]nan tan byed par 'gyur ba'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dgug pa'i tshig rnams brjod par bya'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho dgug pa'i tshig de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sa me sa ma san d+hi/_sa ra ne/_sa ra pa ti/_d+ha ne/_d+ha na ba ti/_d+hu d+hu me/_d+hu d+hu ma ti/_A brte/_a ma le/_bi ma le/_bi ra dze/_
[\[110a.7\]]ka ka re/_kA ru Ne/_hu hu/_hu hu ba ti/_hu hu san d+hi/_nir+g+ha ta ni/_a baT+Te/_bI baT+Te/_ma d+hu ma ti ma ra dzi te/_bi shud+d+he/_bi shud+ha ba ti/_mi si le/_ma no ra ha re/_blo gros rgya mtsho 'di dag ni dgug pa'i tshig rnams yin te/_tshig de dag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi bkug nas chos kyi 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]rnam grangs 'di kun tu bsrung ba dang /_chos smra ba de yang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir nan tan byed par 'gyur ro/_/sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams chos smra ba des legs par kha don du byas te/_phyogs bzhir byams pas khyab par byas la rgyal po chen po bzhi bsams na/_sngags kyi tshig 
[\[110b.2\]]'di dag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi bkug nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa de dag stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[110b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag lhan cig tu 'thun par gang na yang dag pa dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba der/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang kun tu srung ba dang chos smra ba de yang yongs su gzung ba dang /_ci nas gang gis 
[\[110b.4\]]kyang ma bsgribs pa'am gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchi bar bgyi'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug pa'i tshig brjod par bya ste/_tshig de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug par 
[\[110b.5\]]'gyur ba'i tshig de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dza ye/_dza ya ma ti/_aT+Te maT+Te ma~M ku re/_sid+d+ha ma ti/_shu b+he shAn+ti ka re/_nad ne/_/dAn+te/_dAn+ta ma ti/_ta d+ka re/_k+Sha ye/_k+Sha ya mu khe/_a baT+Ta ni bi baT+Ta ni pa ri baT+Ta ni/_pa ri ts+tshe de/_smr-i ti smr-i ti san+d+hi/_A gats+tsha kau shi ka_/nirdzi tA/_
[\[110b.6\]]a su ra/_dza yan+ti de ba/_sa ma ya ste/_a ra ba d+ho/_/d+harma ni rdzi to/_/ra ma hi/_swA sti ya nA ma b+hu tA nAM/_a rak+Sha d+harma tsA ri NAM/_blo gros rgya mtsho 'di dag ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug pa'i tshig ste de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug par 'gyur ro/_/der chos smra ba des 
[\[110b.7\]]sngags kyi tshig 'di dag legs par kha ton du byas la gtsang ba dang /_gtsang sbra'i cho gas khrus legs par byas te/_gos bzang po bgos la/_shar phyogs su me tog gtor te/_sangs rgyas thams cad bsam pa'i dran pa dang /_sems can thams cad la snying rje chen 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]po dang rab tu ldan pas seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste lha'i dbang po brgya byin bsams la/_kau shi ka 'khor legs par yongs su gzhag pa'i phyir tshur shog_/sngags kyi grub pa mngon sum du gyis shig ces brjod na/_de'i bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag cing 
[\[111a.2\]]yongs su dag la tshul khrims yongs su dag pas bsams ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'ongs nas 'khor yongs su 'jog par 'gyur/_sngags kyi grub pa yang nye bar bsgrub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/_'dug pa 
[\[111a.3\]]des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gzung ba dang /_yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag chos smra ba de'i drung du mchi bar bgyi/_de'i 'khor kyang yongs su gzhag par bgyi/_sngags kyis grub 
[\[111a.4\]]pa yang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i 
[\[111a.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di las bstan pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos la gus par bgyis te/_chos kyi rnam 
[\[111a.6\]]grangs 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_kau shi ka khyod kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legs so legs so/_/de lta bu ni 
[\[111a.7\]]khyod kyi bya ba'o/_/lha'i dbang po khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsams na lha rnams ni rgyal zhing lha ma yin rnams ni pham par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams tshar gcad pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]brjod par bya ste/_sngags kyi tshig de dag gis bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/_/sngags kyi tshig de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sha me/_sha ma ba ti/_sha mi ta sha tru/_a~M ku re/_ma~M ku re/_mA ra dzi te/_ka rA Te/_ke 
[\[111b.2\]]yU re/_te dzo ba ti/_o ho ka ma ti/_bi sha Tha/_ni rma le/_ma lA pa na ye/_o kha re/_o kha rA/_gra se/_kha yA gra se/_gra sa te/_he mu khI/_pa rAmu khi/_a mu khI/_sha mi tA ni/_sarba gra ha ban+d+ha nA ni/_ni gr-i hi twA/_sarba par 
[\[111b.3\]]pra bA din/_bi muk+tA mA ra pa shA/_s+thA pi tA bud+d+ha mu drA/_sa mung+g+ha ti tAH/_sarba mA rA/_su tsa ri ta pa da pa ri shud+d+h+ya/_gats+tshan+tu sarba mA ra karma Ni/_blo gros rgya mtsho 'di dag ni bdud tshar gcad pa'i tshig_/nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i tshig ste/_de dag chos 
[\[111b.4\]]smra ba des legs par kha ton du byas la chos kyi khri la 'dug ste/_byang chub kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pas 'khor thams cad la khyab par byas la/_bdag la sman par 'du shes bskyed de/_chos la sman gyi 'du shes dang /_chos nyan pa la 
[\[111b.5\]]nad pa'i 'du shes dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la skyes bu dam pa'i 'du shes dang /_chos kyi tshul la yun ring du gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed la/_sngags kyi tshig 'di dag mngon du byas te/_chos kyi gtam byed na/_de'i khor yug dpag tshad brgya tshun chad 
[\[111b.6\]]du bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i las kyi phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang dag 'ong ba de dag kyang bar chad byed par mi nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang 
[\[111b.7\]]bdag byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'jig rten gyi khams/_bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan par 'phangs pa skyes bu dam pa de dag gis byin gyi rlabs dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul 'di bdag la mngon sum du gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]deng slan chad bdud kyi sug las thams cad 'dor ro/_/gang dag na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa dang /_yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba'i grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_gtsug lag khang der chos mnyan pa'i 
[\[112a.2\]]slad du bdag nga rgyal ma mchis pa dang /_gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas pas mchis par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sdig can legs so legs so/_/khyod chos la gus pa'i rnam par smin pa 'dis rim gyis bdud kyi las 
[\[112a.3\]]thams cad las shin tu 'das te/_gang skyes bu dam pa de dag gis thob pa'i chos de dag rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dgug pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bya ste/_dgug pa'i sngags kyi tshig de 
[\[112a.4\]]dag gis tshangs pa bkug nas chos smra ba'i gan du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/sngags kyi tshig de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mai tre ka re/_ka ru Na ka re/_mu di ta ka re/_u pe k+Sha ka re/_bud+d+ha ka re/_d+harma ka re/_saM g+ha ka re/_su kr-i ta bi dza ye/_
[\[112a.5\]]ma hA bi tA ne/_ni s+pha re/_dA g+he/_o dzo ba ti/_o dzo ga me/_d+harmA na/_nad ne/_sa t+ya pra tiSh+ThA ne/_u pa pa ti/_bi shu d+d+he/_swa tsit+ta u pa sha me/_bya ba lo ka ya bra h+ma Na/_byu tiSh+Tha nam ste/_a be k+Sha/_swa d+harma tsa ra NA~M/_ku ru sad+d+harma pa ri 
[\[112a.6\]]grA ha Na/_kri ta ma nu bA la ya/_bud+d+ha ne/_trI ma ma bya ba ts+tshe/_ba si/_sma ra ta/_d+harma tsakra pra ban+tA nA~M//_ku ru sa twa bi sho d+ha nA~M/_pra ti gr-i hA na/_d+harmA nA ga ra mA lA nA~M/_bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA nA~M/_mA bi ka u pa ya/_blo gros rgya mtsho mi mjed 
[\[112a.7\]]kyi bdag po tshangs pa dgug pa'i tshig 'di dag chos smra ba des legs par kha ton du byas la tshangs pa'i lam la shin tu gnas te/_zhe 'gras pa med pa'i/_sems kyi rgyud dang /_dbang po shin tu sbas pa dang /_shin tu bsrungs pa'i dran pa dang /_shin tu dkar 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]ba'i phyag rgya dang /_shin tu yongs su dag pa'i lus kyi las dang /_shin tu dben pas zin pa'i ngag gi las dang /_shin tu brtan pa'i blo dang /_legs par byas pa'i bzod pa'i las dang /_shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_legs par brtsams pa'i 
[\[112b.2\]]brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /_shin tu bsten pa'i mang du thos pa dang /_shin tu yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems las su rung ba dang /_shin tu rno ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po dang /_shin tu brtson pa'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba dang /_byang chub kyi sems kyis legs par zin pa dang /_
[\[112b.3\]]shin tu yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa dang /_shin tu brtan pa'i snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad kyi bde ba yang dag par skyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las shin tu yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs 
[\[112b.4\]]pa bsams la chos kyi gtam yang dag par rab tu brjod na/_des bsams ma thag tu tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de la tshangs pa 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i ltas ni 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_'khor 
[\[112b.5\]]thams cad byams pa'i sems su 'gyur ba dang /_dbang po nyams pa med pa dang /_gcig la gcig mi gnod par gnas pa dang /_chos dang chos smra ba la ston pa dang /_bla ma ltar phangs par sems pa dang /_thal mo sbyar ba dang sems rtse gcig pa dang /_mi g.yeng bar yid la byed pa 
[\[112b.6\]]dang /_rus shing ltar byed pa dang /_yid la byed pa dang /_sems thams cad kyis sems pa dang rna ba blags te nyan pa dang /_chos smra ba de yang sngon lung ma mnos pa dang /_sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams kyang mngon du 'gyur ba ste/_'khor der mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'ongs par rig par 
[\[112b.7\]]bya'o/_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du gnas te/_bsam gtan dang tshad med pa'i bde ba la gnas pa bor la gang na chos kyi rnam 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]grangs 'di ston pa'i 'khor der mchi bar bgyi'o/_/chos smra ba de la yang chos brgyad bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_ji ltar thos pa'i chos mi bskyud par bgyi ba'i slad du de la dran pa bsgrub par bgyi/_chos zab mo rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du de la blo gros 
[\[113a.2\]]bsgrub par bgyi/_don gyi rnam par rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du de la rtogs pa bsgrub par bgyi/_the tshom thams cad gcad pa'i slad du de la spobs pa bsgrub par bgyi/_skad dang nges pa'i tshig thams cad kyis yongs su tshim par bgyi ba'i slad du de la lung bstan pa phun sum tshogs 
[\[113a.3\]]pa bsgrub par bgyi/_'khor thams cad zil gyis mi non par bgyi ba'i slad du de la 'dul ba bsrung ba bsgrub par bgyi/_mi dman par lung bstan par bya ba'i slad du de la chos kyi snang ba bsgrub par bgyi/_de bgyid cing chos bsgrub pa'i slad du de la nges par 'byung ba'i sgo bsgrub par bgyi 
[\[113a.4\]]ste/_bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de la chos brgyad po 'di dag bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/chos smra ba de la bsrung zhing sba ba dang /_dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas 
[\[113a.5\]]par 'gyur ba de ltar bdud thams cad dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcad par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_tha ma'i dus kyi tshe ci nas 
[\[113a.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi sug par mchi ba dang /_mdzod du chud pa dang /_glegs bam du 'gyur zhing nub par mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo 
[\[113a.7\]]gros rgya mtshos gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/_mdzod spu nas 'di lta bu'i 'od phyung ste/_'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen po khyab par gyur nas/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]nags tshal dang /_rdo dang gyo mo dang gzugs su snang ba gang dag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su snang ngo /_/rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams na mchod pa'i las byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzugs kyi rnam pa gang dag yod pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[113b.2\]]pa'i gzugs nyid du gnas par kun tu snang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis gsung gcig tu/_kye ma'o chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byin gyis brlabs so/_/gang bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pa de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 
[\[113b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa de la bdud thams cad kyis bar chad bya bar mi nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bdud dpung dang bcas/_g.yog 
[\[113b.4\]]'khor dang bcas te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad bya bar brtun kyang de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad bya bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sa ni 'gas kyang srid/_rgya mtsho thams cad ni skam yang srid/_ri thams cad ni rnam par 'thor yang srid/_rlung ni zhags 
[\[113b.5\]]pas bcing du rung yang srid/_nyi ma dang zla ba ni sa'i steng du ltung yang srid/_nam mkha' ni gzugs kyi rnam par bstan du rung yang srid/_me ni chur 'gyur yang srid/_chu ni mer 'gyur yang srid/_'byung ba chen po bzhi ni gzhan du 'gyur yang srid/_sems can thams cad kyi sems ni 
[\[113b.6\]]gcig tu byar rung yang srid/_nam mkha' dang sa ni 'byar yang srid kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ni sus kyang bskyod pa 'am g.yo ba 'am 'khrugs par byed mi nus so zhes gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i spyi bor phyag bzhag 
[\[113b.7\]]ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba nye bar bzung ste/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis don gyi dbang gang gzigs nas de la rgya mtsho dang mtsho chen po ltar/_gting dpag dka' 
[\[114a.2\]]ba'i dran pa dang blo rab tu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag mchis bzhin du/_dge slong kun dga' bo nyi tshe ba'i 'tshal ba dang ldan pa la chos kyi le'u 'di lta bu 'di yongs su gtad/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros rgya mtsho dge slong kun dga' bo rang gi blo'i stobs 
[\[114a.3\]]bskyed pas mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa ma yin gyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dzin to/_/blo gros rgya mtsho sems can gang dag dge slong kun dga' bo las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang /_mchog tu dga' ba thob par 'gyur ba yod de/_de dag 
[\[114a.4\]]'di snyam du 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'di ltar nyan thos kyang 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di 'dzin cing ston pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ci tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar to snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'khor de las lha dang mi kha cig 
[\[114a.5\]]'di snyam du sems te/_ci byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho 'di dran pa dang rab tu ldan pa yin gyi/_gang bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa'i mchog tu bstan pa'i tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni de lta ma yin no snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'khor de'i sems kyi rnam 
[\[114a.6\]]par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas 'khor gyi sems can rnams la rnam par bltas te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho 'di rab tu dran pa dang ldan pa lags kyi gang bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog 
[\[114a.7\]]tu bstan pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na sems can ji tsam du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can gyi khams ni rab tu mang gi sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin no/_/zhes gang 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]de skad du bya ba de la ji snyam du sems/_'od srung sems can gyi khams de mang ngam/_'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa tshad ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung yongs su rtag pa nye bar bzung ste/_
[\[114b.2\]]sems can de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/_de bzhin du ji ltar dge slong kun dga' bo ltar dran pa dang gzungs kyi stobs dang yang ldan par gyur kyang kun dga' bo lta bu'i sems can de dag gis dran pa dang gzungs kyi stobs de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 
[\[114b.3\]]rgya mtsho'i dran pa dang /_gzungs kyi stobs bskyed par brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/'od srung byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'dzin to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gcig 
[\[114b.4\]]gis chos bstan pas de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis kyis chos bstan pa la sgrib pa'am/_kun nas ldang ba'i bya ba mi byed do/_/'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen por shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa'i chu'i rgyun gcig gis chu'i rgyun gnyis pa la sgrib pa 'am 
[\[114b.5\]]kun nas ldang ba'i bya ba mi byed de/_chu'i rgyun thams cad kyang rgya mtsho chen pos blangs nas de la 'grib pa'am gang ba yang med do/_/'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos bstan pa kun tu 'dzin kyang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[114b.6\]]pa gcig gis chos bstan pas de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis kyis chos bstan pa la sgrib pa'am/_kun nas ldang ba'i bya ba mi byed de/_de'i dran pa'i stobs skyed pa la bri ba'am gang ba yang med do/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags brgyad stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[114b.7\]]chub tu sems bskyed de/_tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur cig ces smras so/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis lha'i dang /_mi'i me tog gis bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]mtsho la gtor mngon par gtor to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma bkod pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos nas mos pa dang /_mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_
[\[115a.2\]]'don pa dang /_rtog pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyis pa de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' pad ma bkod pa la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_stong chen po yi 'jig rten khams 'di ni/_/gser gyis bkang ste bde gshegs phul ba 
[\[115a.3\]]bas/_/gang gis chos kyi mdzod 'di thos nas ni/_/mos pa'i bsod nams 'di ni khyad par 'phags/_/gang gis 'jig rten khams khri rin chen bkang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phul ba bas/_/gang gis mdo sde 'di la 'jug byas pa/_/bsod nams de la snga mas bskyed du med/_/gang gis 'jig rten 
[\[115a.4\]]khams ni stong phrag bcu/_/rin chen bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas/_/gang gis mdo 'di bton nas ston pa yi/_/bsod nams de yi cha ni snga ma min/_/zhing ni bye ba khrag khrig stong gi rnams/_/rin chen bkang ste 'jig rten slob dpon skyob/_/sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar phul ba bas/_/gang gis tshul 'dir rab tu sbyor 
[\[115a.5\]]ba dang /_/phyogs bcu rnams su gang gA'i bye snyed zhing /_/rin chen bkang ste rgyal la phul ba bas/_/ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du gang gnas pa'i/_/bsod nams de la mnyam pa yod ma yin/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dang chos 'dzin dang /_/chos sgrub pa dang srog chags snying rje ba/_/chos bzhi 'di dag bsod nams 
[\[115a.6\]]mtha' yas te/_/de dag mtha' ni bde gshegs mi gsung ngo /_/nam mkha'i khams dang de bzhin sems can khams/_/sangs rgyas ye shes dang ni byang chub sems/_/chos bzhi 'di dag dpag tu med pa ste/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis de thos dogs mi bya/_/dkon mchog chos 'di rab tu bshad pa na/_/phyogs bcu'i 
[\[115a.7\]]zhing ni bye ba g.yos par gyur/_/snang ba byung zhing me tog char yang bab/_/sil snyan brgya dag ma dkrol sgra yang byung /_/byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de dag kun/_/mgu nas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod/_/chos bstan 'di 'dra 'di thos bdag cag rnams/_/'tsho ba don yod rnyed pa legs par rnyed/_/gang dag 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]'di 'dra 'di ni thos gyur pa/_/sems can de dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed/_/gang dag byang chub sems ni mi brjed pa/_/de dag de bzhin gshegs pas shin tu bzung /_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba rnams/_/phyag ni g.yas pa rab tu rkyang mdzad de/_/yon tan rgya mtsho'i spyi bor bzhag nas ni/_
[\[115b.2\]]shAkya seng ge'i bskul ba legs zhes gsungs/_/lha dang klu dang lha min mi'am ci/_/dri za gnod sbyin mkha' lding lto 'phye che/_/brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams/_/nam mkhar gnas te ched du brjod pa brjod/_shAkya seng ge 'di dang dge 'dun dang /_/mdo sde 'di 'dra ba ni 'dzin byed pa/_/byang chub 
[\[115b.3\]]sems dpa' dpa' bo ring gnas gyur/_/legs gsungs chos ni gzhar yang nub mi 'gyur/_/gang dag chos kyi tshul ni 'di 'dzin pa/_/de dag la ni bdag cag bsnyen bkur bgyi/_/bdag cag thams cad gus dang bcas par ni/_/kun tu srung zhing spa bar spro bar bgyi/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang 
[\[115b.4\]]chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/_blo gros rgya mtsho chos kyi tshul chos kyi phyag rgya/_chos btus pa/_chos rab tu dbye ba 'di ni 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bshad pa/_'chad pa 'chad par 
[\[115b.5\]]'gyur ba ste/_blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis de la gus pa dang bcas pa dang /_zhe sa dang bcas pa dang /_sgrub pa snying por bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[115b.6\]]tshogs de dag dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//byin gyi rlabs kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o/_/'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam 
[\[115b.7\]]grangs las/_'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_bud d+ha pra b+ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]{D153}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sA ga ra nA ga rA dza pa ri prIts+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal 
[\[116a.2\]]lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/_dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pas phyogs 
[\[116a.3\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa/_rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa/_gzungs dang mdo sde rtogs par khong du chud pa/_sems can thams cad spobs pas mgu bar byed pa/_mngon par shes pa'i ye shes ston pa la mkhas pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi 
[\[116a.4\]]dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa shes pa la mkhas pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags la snyan par brjod pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba shes pa la mkhas pa/_bdud 
[\[116a.5\]]thams cad skrag par bya ba shes pa la mkhas pa/_chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa la mkhas pa/_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa shes pa la mkhas pa/_
[\[116a.6\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa'i las yang dag par sgrub pa shes pa la mkhas pa/_'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa/_lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po la spro ba'i go cha bgos pa/_bskal 
[\[116a.7\]]pa grangs med par brtson 'grus chen pos yid yongs su mi skyo ba/_seng ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags pa/_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi zil gyis mi non pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi phyag rgyas btab pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba thob pa khri nyis stong 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po dang /_ri rab dang /_lhun po chen po dang /_lhun po'i rtse 'dzin dang /_lhun po mar me'i rgyal po dang /_lhun po brtsegs pa dang /_lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang /_lhun po'i rgyal po dang /_lhun po'i rtse mo rdob pa'i 
[\[116b.2\]]rgyal po dang /_'brug sgra dang /_rnga sgra dang /_rin chen 'byung gnas dang /_rin chen tog dang /_rin chen rtse mo dang /_rin chen dpal dang /_rin chen 'byung dang /_rin chen 'od dang /_rin chen khar ba can dang /_rin chen rtse mo dang /_lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang /_rin chen dra 
[\[116b.3\]]ba dang /_rin chen bkod pa dang /_rin chen 'od dang /_rin chen gling dang /_rin chen sgron ma dang /_lag na rin chen dang /_dga' byed dang /_chos la dga' ba bkod pa dang /_bkod pa'i rgyal po dang /_mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa dang /_tshig bkod pa'i 'od dang /_tshig rnam 
[\[116b.4\]]par dag pa'i 'od dang /_gtsug na rin po che dang /_lha brtsegs dang /_rin chen brtsegs dang /_'od zer stong ldan dang /_me lce dang /_skar ma la dga' ba dang /_zla 'od dang /_sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnam dag 'od dang /_byang 
[\[116b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang /_byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /_'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med pa drug cu dang /_bzang skyong 
[\[116b.6\]]la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang /_lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams dang /_
[\[116b.7\]]lha'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams dang /_lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang /_lha'i rgyal po dbang byed la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_lha'i bu ded dpon la sogs pa bdud 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]kyi ris kyi lha'i bu dkar po'i phyogs thams cad dang /_rab tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa'i lha rnams dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs chen gyi ris kyi lha rnams dang /_lha'i rgyal po 'od gsal la sogs pa 'od 
[\[117a.2\]]gsal gyi lha rnams dang /_lha'i rgyal po dge rgyas la sogs pa dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang /_lha'i rgyal po 'bras bu che la sogs pa 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang /_lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_lha'i rgyal po 
[\[117a.3\]]dri med 'od la sogs pa 'og min gyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po drug khri dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi'am ci'i rgyal po bzhi khri nyis stong dang /_dri za'i rgyal po phreng thogs la sogs pa dri za'i rgyal 
[\[117a.4\]]po sum khri nyis stong dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po bdun khri nyis stong dang /_bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding bzhi stong dang /_de ma yin pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 
[\[117a.5\]]'phye chen po gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba stong dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston cing /_lha thams cad kyi bkod pas legs par brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la ri'i rgyal po ri rab 
[\[117a.6\]]rgya mtsho'i nang nas gyen du 'phags pa bzhin du bzhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te lham me lhan ne lhang nge zhing bzhugs so/_/de nas de ltar 'dus pa'i 'khor de'i nang na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[117a.7\]]pa de ltar bzhugs pa'i steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs rin po che thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan zhing rin po che thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa zhig byung ste/_rin po che'i gdugs des thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten 'di kun tu khebs par gyur to/_/
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang mu tig kha dog du ma'i rgyan phreng 'bum phrag du ma 'di lta ste/_mu tig dkar po dang /_mu tig dmar po dang /_mu tig dri ma med pa dang /_gser lta bu'i mu tig dang /_zla ba lta bu'i mu tig dang /_pad ma lta bu'i mu tig dang /_nam mkha' lta bu'i 
[\[117b.2\]]mdog can gyi mu tig rnams 'phyang ngo /_/mu tig gi rgyan phreng de dag las kyang 'od zer dag byung ngo /_/'od zer de dag las kyang me tog kha dog sna tshogs pa/_kha dog 'bum phrag du ma dri zhim pa/_blta na sdug pa yid du 'ong ba dag gi char mngon par bab bo/_/me tog de dag gis 
[\[117b.3\]]kyang 'khor gyi khyams thams cad pus mo nub pa tsam du gang bar gyur to/_/bar snang la yang 'brug sgra chen po grags par gyur to/_/a ga ru dang /_tsan dan gyi phye ma dag dang /_tsan dan dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phye ma dag gi char yang bab bo/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang 
[\[117b.4\]]ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sngon ma mthong 
[\[117b.5\]]ma thos pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di dag su'i snga ltas lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa la bltar 'ong 
[\[117b.6\]]ba de'i snga ltas yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig de skad ces bka' stsal nas ring po ma lon par/_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho klu bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang /_klu'i bu mo bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_me tog dang /_bdug pa 
[\[117b.7\]]dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan thams cad dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_glu dbyangs brgya stong dag len cing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa la sogs pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan la sogs pa dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg 
[\[118a.2\]]rdob pa dang /_glu dbyangs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/_btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_gnyen 'dab kyi 'khor dang bcas pas de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/'jig 
[\[118a.3\]]rten dag na 'jig rten phan par bzhed pa 'jig rten gyis mchod 'jig rten mig sbyin pa/_/'jig rten du skyes 'jig rten dri ma rnams kyis ma gos pad ma chus mi chags pa bzhin/_/'jig rten snang ba rnam par gzigs pa spyan gsum mnga' ba 'jig rten bde ba sbyin mdzad pa/_/'jig 
[\[118a.4\]]rten nyi ma rkyen la mkhas pa 'jig rten gtso bo khyod la de ring bdag phyag 'tshal/_/dul zhing dul bas yongs bskor stobs bcu mnga' ba sbyin pa rnams dang dul ba rnams kyis 'phags/_/'dren pa nyon mongs rdul dang mun pa dang ni dri ma tha ba bsregs shing myu gu bsregs/_/snying rjes nor gyi 
[\[118a.5\]]gtso bo bdun po sbyin par mdzad cing sems can rnams la byams pas 'phags/_/bsod nams zhing ste 'jig rten rtsa lag brtan po khyod la bdag ni mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyi zhal gyi smin mtshams mdzod spu 'bar ba me tog kun da zla ba dung mdog 'dra/_/'di na tshangs pa'i 
[\[118a.6\]]gnas na 'khod pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang khyod kyi spyi gtsug mthong mi 'gyur/_/zla ba lta bu'i zhal nas byung ba'i rmad byung 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus snang bar mdzad/_/de yis reg par gyur pa'i dbang gis mtshams med sems can rnams kyang bde ba nyid du gyur/_/khyod kyi gsung ni shin tu 
[\[118a.7\]]yid 'ong tshig ste zla ba bzhin du yid kyang tshim par bgyid/_/lha dang mi yi sgra skad zil gyis gnon cing gcig tu nges par dag la gtsang ba ste/_/'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa rdul rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid cing shes rab gsal bar bgyid/_/dga' dang mgu bgyid bde ba shin tu skyed 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]par bgyid cing thar pa yang dag ston pa lags/_/khyod kyi ye shes dus gsum gtogs pa thogs pa ma mchis gar yang chags pa ma mchis te/_/khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi spyod pa chung dang 'bring dang dam pa ma lus thugs su chud/_/gang dag gi ni dbang po bsam pa dag dang 'gro 
[\[118b.2\]]dang thar pa tha dad ji 'dra ba/_/thams cad khyod kyis skad cig tsam gyis thugs su chud par de slad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub shing rgyal drung du glags lta'i phyir brtson bdud rnams bye ba brgya phrag snyed/_/khyod kyi thad du lhags par gyur kyang gnas las ma g.yos thugs brtser 
[\[118b.3\]]ldan pa'i blo mnga' ba/_/mnga' bdag khyod kyis bden dang brtul zhugs dpal dang yon tan rnams dang byams pas pham par mdzad/_/de slad mi rnams su zhig deng 'dir khyod la mchod pa'i slad du khyod la ngoms par 'dzin/_/mnga' bdag khyod kyis chos rnams byed pa med dang ya ma brla dang 
[\[118b.4\]]zla ba 'dra ba dang /_/dbu ba glog sprin chu yi chu bur 'dra zhing sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bur thugs su chud/_/gang la rgyu med rtog pa mi 'byung khyod kyis chos de dag ni rtag tu bdag med de/_/de ltar 'gro ba'i 'dod pa lnga skyed mdzad pas mnga' bdag khyod ni thar pa lags par 'os/_/gang gi don du 
[\[118b.5\]]bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por dka' ba rnams ni bstan pa dang /_/gang gi don du rtag tu 'gro la phan mdzad 'dren pa rnams la mchod pa mdzad pa dang /_/gang gi don du sbyin dang yang dag sdom dang dul dang bzod pa rtag tu bsten pa yi/_/rnam 'dren khyod kyi smon lam chen po shin tu 
[\[118b.6\]]rmad du byung ba de ni rdzogs par gyur/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/_bcom ldan 
[\[118b.7\]]'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]klu'i bdag po khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang /_ngas dri ba dris pa de dang de lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ba lung bstan pa'i skabs phye nas/_bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya 
[\[119a.2\]]mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngan 'gro dang ngan song thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang /_mi khom pa brgyad las 'das pa dang /_lha dang mi'i skye bar 'gro ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[119a.3\]]dpa' rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas mthong ba thob pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang /_'tsham pa'i yul du gnas pa 'thob pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dad pa dang /_dang ba'i shas che ba dang /_las kyi 
[\[119a.4\]]rnam par smin pa la rton pa dang /_mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs nas dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis 'bogs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos don du gnyer ba dang /_chos 'tshal ba dang /_chos kyi kun dga' la dga' bas dga' ba dang /_thos 
[\[119a.5\]]pa tshol bas cho ga ma 'tshal ba dang /_thos pa bsgrubs pas mngon par 'phags pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu 'byung ba la mos pa dang /_nags dang /_nags 'dab na rgyu ba dang /_'phags pa'i rigs dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan 
[\[119a.6\]]dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /_rab tu byung ba'i yon tan rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa dang /_chad pa dang rtag par lta ba yongs su spangs pa 
[\[119a.7\]]dang /_rgyu dang rkyen gyi chos rnams la zhugs pa dang /_lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba dang /_sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes mthong ba lags/_bcom 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can gyi spyod pa dang /_bsam pa dang /_cho ga 'tshal ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /_gzung ba dang /_bklag pa dang /_brda sprod pa la mkhas 
[\[119b.2\]]pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang /_skrag pa dang /_'jigs pa thams cad dang bral nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyir mi 
[\[119b.3\]]ldog pa'i chos la yang dag par gzhol ba dang /_bzod pa thob pa dang /_lung bstan pa thob pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/klu'i bdag po legs so legs so/_/khyod de bzhin 
[\[119b.4\]]gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni klu'i bdag po khyod legs so/_/klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_
[\[119b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngan 'gro dang ngan song thams cad yang dag par chad par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems 
[\[119b.6\]]med pa dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs nas thams cad srung ba dang /_gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng zhing brnyas par mi byed pa dang /_bdag gi 'khrul pa la rtog par byed kyi gzhan gyi 'khrul pa la mi rtog pa ste/_klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/_
[\[119b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngan 'gro dang /_ngan song thams cad yang dag par chad par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi khom pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dkon mchog gsum po 'di lta ste/_
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog gi bsngags pa rgyun du brjod pa dang /_chos 'dod pa rnams g.yengs par mi byed pa dang /_gzhan dag gi 'gyod pa mi skyed pa dang /_sems can 'gyod cing 'dug pa rnams 
[\[120a.2\]]kyi 'gyod pa sel ba ste/_klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi khom pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams lha dang mi'i skye bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[120a.3\]]byang chub kyi sems mi gtong zhing gzhan dag la yang sgrogs pa dang /_tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa mi gtong zhing nyams par mi byed pa dang /_smon lam la bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de dag la snying rje chen po skyed pa ste/_klu'i 
[\[120a.4\]]bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams lha dang mi'i skye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po chos brgyad dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur te/_brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas rjes su 
[\[120a.5\]]dran pa yid la byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur dang /_mchod pa byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa rgyun du brjod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba la sems can rnams 
[\[120a.6\]]yang dag par 'dzud pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa thos pa der skye bar smon lam 'debs pa dang /_rgyud zhum pa med cing rgya chen po la mos pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa ste/_klu'i bdag po chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan 
[\[120a.7\]]na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sgyu med pa dang g.yo 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]med par bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_chos la gces pa dang gus pa dang ri mo byed pa dang /_bka' blo bde zhing gso sla la des pa dang /_nga rgyal med cing sri zhu byed pa ste/_klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 
[\[120b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po chos gsum dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'tsham pa'i yul du gnas pa thob par 'gyur te/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi brlang zhing gya gyu med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_phrag dog dang ser sna bsal ba dang /_gzhan 
[\[120b.3\]]dag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang bde bar sbyar ba la dga' ba ste/_klu'i bdag po chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'tsham pa'i yul du gnas pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dad pa dang ldan 
[\[120b.4\]]par 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mos pa'i stobs dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi stobs dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa'i stobs dang /_byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba'i stobs dang /_chos nyid la rton pa'i stobs te/_klu'i 
[\[120b.5\]]bdag po chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dad pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po chos gnyis dang ldan na dga' ba'i shas che bar 'gyur te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rgyu'i stobs dang /_yang dag par sbyor ba'i stobs te/_klu'i bdag 
[\[120b.6\]]po chos de gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ba'i shas che bar 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po chos gsum dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton par 'gyur te/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste bdag med pa la mos pa dang /_
[\[120b.7\]]bzod pa'i stobs dang /_yang dag pa'i las la legs par brtson pa ste/_klu'i bdag po chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po chos gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi dge 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]ba'i chos thams cad spangs nas dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis 'bogs par 'gyur te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phung po gsum gyi yongs su bsngo ba dang ldan pa dang /_bag yod par gnas pa ste/_de gnyis so/_/gzhan yang gnyis te/_
[\[121a.2\]]'di lta ste/_dge ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pa dang /_rnam par smin pa la mi re ba ste/_klu'i bdag po chos de gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs nas dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis 'bogs par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po 
[\[121a.3\]]chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos don du gnyer ba yin te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang /_sgra don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang /_dri don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang /_ro don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang /_reg bya 
[\[121a.4\]]don du gnyer ba ma yin pa ste/_lnga po ni de dag yin no/_/klu'i bdag po gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos don du gnyer ba yin te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos don du gnyer ba yin gyi lus don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang /_yon 
[\[121a.5\]]tan don du gnyer ba yin gyi srog don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang /_shes rab don du gnyer ba yin gyi reg pa don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang /_dge ba don du gnyer ba yin gyi tshor ba don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang /_sems can yongs su bskyab pa don du gnyer ba yin gyi/_
[\[121a.6\]]bdag gi bde ba don du gnyer ba ma yin pa ste/_klu'i bdag po chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos don du gnyer ba yin no/_/klu'i bdag po chos drug dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos 'dod pa yin te/_drug po dag gang zhe na/_'di lta 
[\[121a.7\]]ste rab tu byung ba'i yon tan 'dod kyi/_gos tshon can gyi rtags 'dzin pa tsam 'dod pa ma yin pa dang /_chos nyan pa 'dod kyi 'jig rten rgyang pa na pa'i gsang tshig nyan 'dod pa ma yin pa dang /_chos bstan pa 'dod kyi 'jig rten gyi zang zing 'dod pa ma yin pa dang /_chos la so sor rtog par 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]'dod kyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed par 'dod pa ma yin pa dang /_chos bsgrub pa 'dod kyi yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig dang brda yongs su tshol ba 'dod pa ma yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos nyan 'dod kyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa ma yin pa ste/_klu'i bdag 
[\[121b.2\]]po chos drug po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos 'dod pa yin no/_/klu'i bdag po chos brgyad dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi kun dga' la dga' bas dga' ba yin te/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi sems kyi gtam 
[\[121b.3\]]la dga'i theg pa dman pa'i gtam la ma yin pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po'i gtam la dga'i phyin ci log gi gtam la ma yin pa dang /_chos kyi lugs kyi gtam la dga'i 'jig rten rgyang pa na po'i gtam la ma yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid kyi gtam la dga'i 'khor 
[\[121b.4\]]ba bcad pa'i gtam la ma yin pa dang /_zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtam la dga'i bdag tu lta ba 'dzin pa'i gtam la ma yin pa dang /_chos bdag med pa'i rang bzhin dang rkyen rnam par dag pa'i gtam la dga'i chad pa dang /_rtag pa dang /_
[\[121b.5\]]bdag dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang skyes bu dang /_gang zag tu 'dzin pa'i gtam la ma yin pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i gtam yang dag pa ji lta ba la dga'i/_dmigs par lta ba'i gtam la ma yin pa dang /_rab tu 
[\[121b.6\]]byung ba la dmigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan bkod pa'i gtam la dga'i/_zhi ba la btang snyoms su byed pa'i gtam la ma yin pa ste/_klu'i bdag po chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi kun dga' la dga' bas dga' ba yin no/_/
[\[121b.7\]]klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni don gyi dbang rnam pa lnga mthong ba'i phyir thos pa yongs su tshol ba na chog mi shes te/_lnga gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams thos pa las shes rab 'byung bar yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir thos pa yongs su tshol ba na chog mi shes pa 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams thos pas 'gyod pa dang the tshom med par 'gyur ba yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir thos pa yongs su tshol ba na chog mi shes pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams thos pas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba rtogs par 'gyur 
[\[122a.2\]]bar yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir thos pa yongs su tshol ba na chog mi shes pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams thos pas sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir/_nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir thos pa yongs su tshol ba na 
[\[122a.3\]]chog mi shes pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams thos pas mi 'jigs par 'gyur la mi 'jigs pa las sems can thams cad kyi the tshom chad par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir thos pa yongs su tshol ba na chog mi shes pa ste lnga po de dag go/_/gzhan yang byang 
[\[122a.4\]]chub sems dpa' rnams ni don gyi dbang rnam pa gnyis mthong ba'i phyir thos pa yongs su tshol ba na chog mi shes te gnyis gang zhe na/_'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba skye ba dang /_chags pa med pa'i gzungs 'thob pa ste de gnyis so/_/klu'i bdag po chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub 
[\[122a.5\]]sems dpa' rnams thos pa sgrub pas mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te bcu gang zhe na/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti rnams la 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa dang /_yongs su tshol ba rnams la lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang /_spyod lam rnams la dran pa dang /_shes bzhin pa dang /_ji skad 
[\[122a.6\]]thos pa la shas cher yongs su rtog pa dang /_'du 'dzi med pas bya ba nyung ba dang /_sbyor ba la brtson pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nam gyi cha stod dang /_nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal ba dang /_bla ma la gus pa dang /_ri mo byed pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pas dge 
[\[122a.7\]]ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang /_snying rje chen pos sems can la lta ba dang /_yon tan yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i skye bo la rim gro byed pa dang /_shes pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yongs su bskyab pa ste/_klu'i bdag po chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]sems dpa' rnams thos pa sgrub pas mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni phan yon rnam pa lnga po 'di dag yang dag par mthong nas/_rab tu 'byung ba la mos par 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_bdag gis las byas pa chud za bar mi 
[\[122b.2\]]'gyur ba dang /_bdag gis byas pa'i bag chags kyis bsgo bar 'gyur ba dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad la bdag gi sems gtong bar 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag smad par mi 'gyur ba dang /_bdag grol zin nas kyang nyon mongs pa'i 
[\[122b.3\]]bcing ba rnams kyis bcings pa'i sems can rnams 'ching ba de las rab tu thar bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par 'gyur ro snyam pa ste lnga po de dag go/_/gzhan yang rnam pa lnga ste lnga gang zhe na/_rab tu 'byung ba ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir tshul 
[\[122b.4\]]khrims dang 'thun pa yin no/_/rab tu 'byung ba ni thos pa nyung ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thos pa dang 'thun pa yin no/_/rab tu 'byung ba ni sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin dang 'thun pa yin no/_/rab tu 
[\[122b.5\]]'byung ba ni shes rab 'chal pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir shes rab dang 'thun pa yin no/_/rab tu 'byung ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba'i lam la sems can dgod par bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i ye shes dang 'thun pa yin te/_lnga po de dag go/_/
[\[122b.6\]]gzhan yang rnam pa lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_rab tu 'byung ba ni phung po lnga yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir nga rgyal bcom pa'o/_/rab tu 'byung ba ni kun 'byung ba spang ba'i phyir sred pa'i bag la nyal spong ba'o/_/rab tu 'byung ba ni 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhi ba dang /_rab 
[\[122b.7\]]tu zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o/_/rab tu 'byung ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'i phyir lam la 'jug go/_/rab tu 'byung ba ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sems can dgod pa'i phyir bden pa la 'jug pa ste/_lnga po de dag go/_/klu'i bdag po chos 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams nags dang nags 'dab na rgyu zhing bas mtha'i gnas mal dag na gnas pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad la lta ba dang /_mngon par shes pa'i shes pa skyed par 
[\[123a.2\]]'dod pa dang /_spyod lam rab tu zhi bas lha dang mi rnams mgu bar byed pa ste/_klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams nags dang /_nags 'dab na rgyu zhing bas mtha'i gnas mal dag na gnas pa yin no/_/klu'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[123a.3\]]sems dpa' ni don gyi dbang rnam pa bzhi mthong nas/_nags dang nags 'dab na rgyu zhing bas mtha'i gnas mal dag na gnas pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_dgon pa dang rab tu dgon pa 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa yin te/_dgon pa ni gnas na snying rje chen pos 
[\[123a.4\]]sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba la dmigs pa ni bdag gis bre mo gtam zer ba yin gyi/_phyogs gcig tu gyur pa ni ma yin no snyam pa dang /_bdag gis ni byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan bsags kyi nyon mongs pa rnams ni ma yin no snyam pa dang /_bdag gis ni yongs su 
[\[123a.5\]]sbyang ba byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' du ma dag gi rjes su bslab dgos so snyam pa dang /_bdag dgon pa na gnas te/_chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs nas grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang yul 'khor dang /_pho brang 'khor dag tu song 
[\[123a.6\]]ste/_sems can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o snyam pa ste/_klu'i bdag po bzhi po de dag dang ldan na nags dang nags 'dab na rgyu zhing bas mtha'i gnas mal dag na gnas pa yin no/_/klu'i bdag po gsum po 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i rigs dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_
[\[123a.7\]]yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dang phan yon phul dang rab mchog yin te/_gsum gang zhe na/_dga' ba dang /_mi dga' ba rnams la mi lta ba'i phyir 'du 'dzi'i bya ba med pa dang /_sems rag las pa med cing gang du 'dod par 'gror yod pa'i 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]phyir rang nyam dang /_rang dbang dang /_tha mal par gnas pa dang /_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid du sems pa'i phyir de'i ting nge 'dzin myur du skye bar 'gyur ba ste/_gsum po de dag go/_/gzhan yang gsum ste/_de la tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag mi 'byung ba dang /_de 
[\[123b.2\]]la rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba'i sems mi skye ba dang /_sgrub cing 'dug pa na khyim la rjes su lta bar mi 'gyur ba ste/_klu'i bdag po gsum po de dag ni 'phags pa'i rigs dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[123b.3\]]dpa'i yon tan dang /_phan yon phul dang rab mchog yin no/_/klu'i bdag po chos brgyad dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba'i yon tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'phags pa'i rigs kyis chog par 'dzin pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon 
[\[123b.4\]]tan dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas pa dang /_mang du thos pa dang /_sems nges par sems pa la dga' ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa la kun tu rmongs pa mang bu dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pas gnas pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab sgom 
[\[123b.5\]]pa'i sbyor ba la brtson pa dang /_brtsams pa thams cad sgrub pa snying por byed pa ste/_klu'i bdag po chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba'i yon tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[123b.6\]]chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_bdag gi ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang /_bdag dag pas chos thams cad dag pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang /_bdag bdag med pas chos thams cad bdag med pa la mos pa dang /_
[\[123b.7\]]bdag stong pas chos thams cad stong par som nyi med pa dang /_bdag dben pas chos thams cad dben pa la 'jug pa dang /_bdag zhi bas chos thams cad zhi bar so sor rtog pa dang /_bdag ji lta ba bzhin pas chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa dang /_bdag 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]zab pas chos thams cad zab par nges par sems pa dang /_bdag bems po yin pas chos thams cad bems po yin par nges par rtog pa dang /_bdag gzung du med pas chos thams cad gzung du med par rab tu shes pa ste/_bcu po de dag go/_/klu'i 
[\[124a.2\]]bdag po gzhan yang chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_rnam par bsgrubs pas gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rab tu shes pa dang /_phyin ci log las byung bar mthong bas 
[\[124a.3\]]chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur rab tu shes pa dang /_phyin ci log tu 'du shes pas chos thams cad smig rgyu lta bur rab tu shes pa dang /_rgyu'i bya ba dang /_rkyen la dmigs te skye ba'i chos thams cad mig yor lta bur rab tu shes pa dang /_'pho ba med pa'i mtshan nyid las phyir 
[\[124a.4\]]mi ldog pas chos thams cad chu zla lta bur rab tu shes pa dang /_yul la mi gnas shing phyogs na mi gnas te ngo bo nyid med pas chos thams cad brag ca lta bur rab tu shes pa dang /_skad cig kyang mi sdod pas chos thams cad sprin dang glog snang ba lta bur rab tu shes pa dang /_
[\[124a.5\]]'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gis chags par mi 'gyur bas chos thams cad 'ja' tshon lta bur rab tu shes pa dang /_glo bur gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pas nyon mongs pa can du mi 'gyur bas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rab tu dag par shes pa dang /_skye ba 
[\[124a.6\]]dang /_'jig pa dang /_gnas pa dang bral bas chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur rab tu shes pa ste/_klu'i bdag po chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa yin no/_/klu'i bdag po chos gnyis dang ldan na byang chub 
[\[124a.7\]]sems dpa' rnams chad par lta bar ltung bar mi 'gyur te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par sgrub pa shes pa ste/_klu'i bdag po chos de gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams chad par lta bar 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po chos gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag par lta bar ltung bar mi 'gyur te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_mi rtag pa'i chos la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_skyes nas zhig cing zhu ste/_mi gnas par rab tu rnam par dbye ba shes 
[\[124b.2\]]pa ste/_klu'i bdag po chos de gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag par lta bar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams brten te/_'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/_ma rig pa kun 'byung ba nas rga shi kun 
[\[124b.3\]]'byung ba'i bar la 'jug pa dang /_ma rig pa 'gag pa nas rga shi 'gag pa'i bar la 'jug pa dang /_chad par lta bar yang mi ltung ba dang /_rtag par lta bar yang mi gnas pa ste/_klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rten cing 'brel 
[\[124b.4\]]par 'byung ba la 'jug pa la mkhas pa yin no/_/klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams lta bar gyur pa thams cad du lta bar mi 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_stong pa nyid shes pas bdag dang sems can du lta bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_mtshan ma med
