[\[166a.2\]]sad pa dang /_sdig pa'i rmi lam mi rmi ba yin/_gnyid log pa na yang de la lha rnams srung ba yin/_de la shar gnyer ba med pa yin te/_de la shar gnyer ba'i bag la nyal ba med pa yin/_ngan 'gro thams cad kyis mi 'jigs pa dang /_shi 'phos nas kyang 
[\[166a.3\]]bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye ba yin te/_rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos bcu po de dag 'thob bo/_/srog gcod pa spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_des de byang chub thob pa na tshe'i 
[\[166a.4\]]tshad sems kyi dbang du 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni yid brtan pa'i chos lnga 'thob ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_longs spyod che bar yang 'gyur la/_de'i longs spyod de dag kyang rgyal po dang /_chom rkun dang /_
[\[166a.5\]]chu dang /_me dang bgo skal la spyod pa'i mi mdza' ba rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin/_skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba yin/_dogs pa med pa yin/_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su de'i bsngags pa brjod cing de la pha rol gyi gnod pas 'jigs 
[\[166a.6\]]pa med pa yin/_de'i sems sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' la 'jug pa yin te lnga po de dag go/_/ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_des de de bzhin gshegs pa nye ba'i nyon 
[\[166a.7\]]mongs pa can ma yin pa'i ye shes can du rang gis mngon par rtogs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/klu'i bdag po 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni mkhas pas bsngags pa'i 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]chos bzhi 'thob ste bzhi gang zhe na/_dbang po bsdams pa dang /_rgol ba las yang dag par 'das pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyis bsngags pa dang /_chung ma mi 'phrogs pa ste bzhi po de dag go/_/'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i dge ba'i 
[\[166b.2\]]rtsa ba de gal te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_des de skyes bu chen po'i mtshan mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa 'thob bo/_/klu'i bdag po [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni lha dang mis bsngags pa'i chos brgyad 
[\[166b.3\]]'thob ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_ut+pa la'i dri 'byung bas kha dog yongs su dag pa 'thob pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyi tshad mar 'gyur ba dang /_lha dang mi dga' bas dpang gcig pur 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pas dogs pa med par 
[\[166b.4\]]'gyur ba dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pas lus dang ngag dang sems yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /_tshig 'khrul pa med pas mchog tu dga' ba mang bar 'gyur ba dang /_tshig gzung bar 'os pas ngag mnyan par 'gyur ba dang /_shes rab thob pas 
[\[166b.5\]]lha dang mir skyes na yang dpang gcig pur 'gyur ba yin te/_brgyad po de dag go/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_des de bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ro/_/klu'i 
[\[166b.6\]]bdag po phra ma spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni mi phyed pa lnga 'thob ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba dang bral bas lus mi phyed pa 'thob pa dang /_gzhan dag gi la chags pa med pas g.yog 'khor mi phyed pa 'thob pa dang /_las kyi rnam par smin 
[\[166b.7\]]pa mthong bas dad pa mi phyed pa 'thob pa dang /_sgrub pa snying por byed pas chos las mi phyed pa 'thob pa dang /_mi slu bas mdza' bshes mi phyed pa 'thob pa ste/_lnga po de dag go/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]yongs su sngo na/_des de g.yog 'khor mi phyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/_de'i 'khor bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis dbye bar mi nus so/_/klu'i bdag po 
[\[167a.2\]]ngag rtsub po spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni ngag yongs su dag pa brgyad 'thob la/_shi 'phos na yang lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ran pa'i tshig dang /_phan pa'i tshig dang /_rigs pa'i tshig dang /_'jam 
[\[167a.3\]]pa'i tshig dang /_gzung ba'i tshig dang /_mnyan pa'i tshig dang /_skye bo mang po dga' ba'i tshig dang /_mi smad pa'i tshig ste/_brgyad po de dag go/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_des de tshangs 
[\[167a.4\]]pa'i sgra skad kyi gdangs can gyi de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po tshig kyal pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni gcig tu nges pa gsum 'thob ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_mkhas pa rnams gcig tu nges par dga' ba dang /_lan legs par 
[\[167a.5\]]glon pas gcig tu nges par de'i blo bden pa la 'gro ba dang /_bcos ma ma yin pas gcig tu nges par lha dang mi'i bdag nyid chen po 'thob pa ste/_gsum po de dag go/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_
[\[167a.6\]]des de phyad par lung ston cing gzhan du mi gsung ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po brnab sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni bdag po'i chos lnga 'thob ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_dbang po ma tshang ba med pas lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems 
[\[167a.7\]]kyi bdag po 'thob pa dang /_dgra thams cad kyis mi rdzi bas longs spyod dang dbang phyug rgya chen po'i bdag po 'thob pa dang /_bsod nams la dbang byed pas de'i sems nye bar spyad pa dang /_longs spyod rgya chen po rnams la 'jug pa dang phyis bkrab pa thob 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]pas rgyal po bdag pos mchod pa dang /_sngon phrag dog med pas longs spyod ji ltar smon pa rnams 'bum gyur du khyad du 'gyur ba 'thob pa ste lnga po de dag go/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_des de 'jig 
[\[167b.2\]]rten gsum gyis mchod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa gcig pur 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po gnod sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni yid bde bar byed pa'i chos brgyad 'thob ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_de'i sems rnam par mi 'tshe ba la 'jug pa dang /_
[\[167b.3\]]de'i gnod sems rab tu zhi ba la 'jug pa dang /_de'i sems rtsod pa med cing 'thab pa med pa la 'jug pa dang /_de'i sems 'jam pa dang mnyen pa dang /_des pa la 'jug pa dang /_byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i skye bos bkur ba dang /_
[\[167b.4\]]sems can thams cad kyi bde ba la mngon par dga' ba'i phyir phan pa'i dngos po mang ba dang /_skye bo mang pos bkur sti bya ba'i phyir mdzes pa dang /_sems 'jam zhing las su rung ba'i phyir de tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar dka' ba med pa ste/_brgyad po de dag go/_/
[\[167b.5\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_des de sems thogs pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lta bas chog mi shes par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po log par lta ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni yon tan 
[\[167b.6\]]gyi chos bcu 'thob ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_bsam pa dge bar 'gyur zhing grogs po dge ba rnyed pa dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches te/_srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi byed pa dang /_lhar sangs rgyas 'dzin te gzhan lhar mi 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[167b.7\]]dge mtshan dang bkra shis su 'dzin pa med pas lta ba drang ba dang /_grogs lha dang mi yin te/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi grogs ma yin pa dang /_bsod nams 'bar bas khyad par du 'gro ba dang /_log pa thams cad med pas 'phags 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]pa'i lam du zhugs pa dang /_'jig tshogs la lta ba las bskyod de sdig pa'i lta ba thams cad dang bral ba dang /_sgrib pa med par mthong ba yin te/_yang dag par song ba yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang na mi khom pa dang 
[\[168a.2\]]bral ba yin te bcu po de dag go/_/log par lta ba spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_des de byang chub thob pa na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de la mngon sum du 'gyur zhing mngon par shes pa myur 
[\[168a.3\]]ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po de la srog gcod pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing /_tshe ring bar yang 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba 
[\[168a.4\]]thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/_longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing longs spyod mi 'phrogs par yang 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[168a.5\]]thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pas bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing chung ma mi g.yem par yang 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang 
[\[168a.6\]]de'i ma dang /_bu dang chung ma la su yang chags pa'i sems kyis lta bar mi 'gyur ro/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/_longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang /_skur pa 'debs pa med par 'gyur ba'i lam 
[\[168a.7\]]yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed de dam bcas pa brtan par 'gyur ro/_/phra ma spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing g.yog 'khor mi phyed 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]par yang 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang bsam pa 'thun pas byang chub sems dpa'i g.yog 'khor 'thob bo/_/ngag rtsub po spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing tshig btsun par 'gyur la tshig sun dbyung 
[\[168b.2\]]du med par yang 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang 'khor ma mgu bar su yang mi 'gro'o/_/tshig kyal pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing tshig snyan par yang 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod 
[\[168b.3\]]pa na yang the tsom thams cad gcod pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/brnab sems spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing longs spyod dang yongs su spyad pa rgya chen po dag la de'i sems 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems 
[\[168b.4\]]dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang rgya chen po la mos shing dbang che bar grags par 'gyur ro/_/gnod sems spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing mdzes pa dang /_skye bo mang po dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar yang 'gyur ro/_/byang 
[\[168b.5\]]chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang blo thogs pa med cing sems thogs pa med la dbang po ma tshang ba med par 'gyur ro/_/log par lta ba spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas la dad pa dang yang dag par lta ba'i 
[\[168b.6\]]khyim du skye'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang sangs rgyas la lta ba dang /_chos nyan pa dang /_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di 
[\[168b.7\]]dag sbyin pas brgyan na de ltar mthu che zhing phan yon che la byin che zhing rgya che bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag nyid tshul khrims kyis brgyan na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la smon pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/bzod pas brgyan na 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi gdangs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyis brgyan na bdud phyir rgol ba 'joms pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mthar phyin par 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan 
[\[169a.2\]]gyis brgyan na dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang /_brtan pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyis brgyan na lta ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/byams pas brgyan na sems can thams cad dang zhe 'gras 
[\[169a.3\]]pa med par 'gyur ro/_/snying rjes brgyan na sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar 'gyur ro/_/dga' bas brgyan na sems zhum pa med par 'gyur ro/_/btang snyoms kyis brgyan na rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba spong bar 'gyur ro/_/bsdu ba'i dngos 
[\[169a.4\]]pos brgyan na sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pas brgyan na lus dang /_tshor ba dang /_sems dang /_chos la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa'i spong bas brgyan na mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong 
[\[169a.5\]]ba dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas brgyan na lus dang sems yang dag par 'gyur ro/_/dbang po lngas brgyan na dad pa brtan pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtan pa dang /_rmongs pa med pa dang /_sems 
[\[169a.6\]]las su rung ba dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyis brgyan na rdzi ba med pa dang /_dgra dang 'khrug pa thams cad nges par 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi yan lag gis brgyan na chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[169a.7\]]du khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/lam gyis brgyan na yang dag pa'i ye shes 'dren par 'gyur ro/_/zhi gnas kyis brgyan na nyon mongs pa thams cad tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/_/lhag mthong gis brgyan na chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]par 'gyur ro/_/thabs kyis brgyan na 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi bde ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po mdor na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag kho nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_mi 'jigs 
[\[169b.2\]]pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_klu'i bdag po de lta bas na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag rgyas par rnam par dbye ba dang /_brgyan par brtson par bya'o/_/klu'i bdag po dper na grong dang 
[\[169b.3\]]grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad dang /_rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_shing thams cad dang /_las kyi mtha' thams cad dang /_sa bon gyi tshogs thams cad dang /_lo tog 
[\[169b.4\]]thams cad skye zhing rmo ba dang /_shal bas bshal ba dang /_'byung ba rnams ni sa la gnas te/_de dag gi gnas ni sa yin no/_/klu'i bdag po de bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag ni lha dang /_mir skye ba dang /_slob pa dang /_mi slob pa'i dge sbyong 
[\[169b.5\]]gi 'bras bu 'thob pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi gnas yin no/_/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[169b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sgor 'jug pa gang dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa'i nongs pa rnams spong zhing las kyi sgrib pa thams cad spangs nas kyang khyad par gyi gnas su 
[\[169b.7\]]mchi bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi sgor 'jug pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_klu'i bdag po chos gcig gis las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur te/_chos gcig po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sdom pa la gnas pa nyes pa byung 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]ba 'chags pa ste gcig ni de yin no/_/klu'i bdag po chos gnyis kyis las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad par 'gyur te/_gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_tshul bzhin du chos la so sor rtog pa dang /_da ltar byung ba mngon par 'du mi byed pa ste/_de gnyis 
[\[170a.2\]]so/_/klu'i bdag po chos gsum gyis las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad par 'gyur te/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rkyen gyi chos la 'jug pa'i shes pa la so sor rtog pa dang /_mi gsar mi rnying ba'i chos la so sor rtog pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon 
[\[170a.3\]]mongs pa med pa'i chos rnams la so sor rtog pa ste gsum po de dag go/_/klu'i bdag po chos bzhis las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid la nges par sems pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa dang /_smon 
[\[170a.4\]]pa dang bral ba dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa shes pa ste/_bzhi po de dag go/_/klu'i bdag po chos lngas las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad par 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag med pa nyid dang /_sems can med pa nyid dang /_srog 
[\[170a.5\]]med pa nyid dang /_gang zag med pa nyid dang /_gso ba med pa nyid de lnga po de dag go/_/klu'i bdag po chos drug gis las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad par 'gyur te/_drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mos pa dang /_yid ches pa dang /_gcig tu nges pa 
[\[170a.6\]]dang /_the tsom med pa dang /_yang dag pa la so sor rtog pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pas bya ba la 'jug pa ste/_chos drug po de dag gis las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po 
[\[170a.7\]]rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyad par du mchi ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_klu'i bdag po chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur te/_bcu 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_de la ma chags pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pas brtson 'grus brtan pa dang /_sems can la lta zhing snying rje che ba dang /_bsod nams la chog mi shes pa dang /_thos pa btsal ba la 
[\[170b.2\]]chog mi shes pa dang /_bag yod pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying po rjes su dran pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon sum du 'thob pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba ste/_chos bcu po de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur 
[\[170b.3\]]ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[170b.4\]]pa/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po chos brgyad dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/_brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_sgra gcan theg pa chen po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni nga rgyal med pa yin te/_sems 
[\[170b.5\]]can thams cad la 'dud cing mngon par 'dud pa dang /_bka' blo bde ba yin te/_'thun par 'dzin pa dang /_ji skad smras pa bzhin byed pa dang /_bla ma rnams la gus pa skyes pa dang /_dge ba spyod pa thams cad la sngon du 'gro ba dang /_dge ba'i chos 
[\[170b.6\]]rnams la dam bcas pa brtan pa dang /_rgya chen po la mos pa yin te/_sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyin pa dang /_srog gi phyir yang gzhan 'khrug par mi byed pa dang /_gong du yang sems can 'jigs pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing skyabs su 'ongs pa'i 
[\[170b.7\]]sems can rnams yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_bsod nams dang ye shes thams cad yongs su tshol ba dang /_chog mi shes pa ste/_chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos du dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lus che ba nyid dang /_gzugs che ba nyid dang /_'khor che ba nyid dang /_sems che ba nyid thob 
[\[171a.2\]]par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgra gcan chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpas lus che ba nyid 'thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzhan dag gi spyod lam la mi 'phya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[171a.3\]]pa'i sku rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed du 'jug pa dang /_sems can bye ba dang /_'thabs pa rnams bsdums shing 'thun par bkod nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dzud pa dang /_sems can thams cad la dbang po zhe 'gras 
[\[171a.4\]]pa med pa ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpas lus che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpas gzugs che ba nyid thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs sbyin pa dang /_phangs pa'i 
[\[171a.5\]]dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la byams pa'i mig gis lta ba dang /_gzhan byad bzhin bzang po dag la phrag dog dang /_ser sna mi byed pa ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpas gzugs che ba nyid thob 
[\[171a.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpas 'khor che ba nyid thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phra ma'i tshig spong zhing gzhan gyi 'khor mi 'byed pa dang /_gzhan gyi 'khor la dga' ba dang /_byang chub kyi sems shin tu brtan 
[\[171a.7\]]pa dang /_gzhan dag byang chub la 'dzud pa ste/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpas 'khor che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpas sems che ba nyid 'thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]'di lta ste/_bsam pa dag pa ste g.yo med pa dang /_sgyu can ma yin pa dang /_'dun pa drag po dang ldan pa dang /_bar ma dor skyo ba med pa dang /_rgya chen po la mos shing theg pa dman pa mi 'dod pa dang /_chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la 'jug 
[\[171b.2\]]pas chos zab mo'i tshul la 'jug pa ste/_sgra gcan chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpas sems che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'khor sum khri nyis stong dang bcas pa tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab 
[\[171b.3\]]tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas rin po che'i me tog rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa khal bcu tshad brgyas bcom ldan 'das la gtor te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 
[\[171b.4\]]'das la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/_phyogs bcu dag na sems can khams rnams mtha' yas gang su dag_/skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la rgyal ba mchod byed dang /_/phyogs bcu dag na sems can gang dag bskal pa 'bum du yang /_/
[\[171b.5\]]mchod la brtson pa'i sems can dag ni phan par byed pa dang /_/byams dang bsod nams 'phags pa'i rang bzhin las byung mchod pa rnams/_/ci 'dra ba dang mtshungs shing mnyam pa ma lags khyod la 'os/_/mtshungs med sems kyis yan lag gnas nas 
[\[171b.6\]]bskyed pa gang lags pa/_/de ni stobs bcu ldan pa rnams la rjed dang mchod pa lags/_/bdag ni byang chub reg 'gyur snyam ste de la sgrib gnas nas/_/bdag ni g.yo med byang chub mtshungs ma mchis la zhugs pa lags/_/mi dbang las bzhin srid gsum 
[\[171b.7\]]su yang bdag gi dbang ma mchis/_/bdag gi bsam pa ci 'dra'i dbang ni stobs bcu ldan pa lags/_/bdag ni kun la shin tu sdug cing nga rgyal bsal ba dang /_/sbyin dang dul dang ldan zhing tshul khrims ldan la bzod ldan dang /_/brtson 'grus dran pa ting 'dzin 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]shes rab rnam dag gnas pa dang /_/byams dang snying rjer ldan zhing bden pa'i chos la spyod gyur cig_/phan bzhed rgyal ba gal te bdag la lung ston mi mdzad kyang /_/mi yi dbang po bdag ni rang gis rang la lung yang bstan/_/bdag ni rang byung 
[\[172a.2\]]mi 'gyur snyam du yid gnyis dogs ma mchis/_/de ltar bdag ni bsam pa thag pas byang chub nyid sems nges/_/mi dbang 'dzum pa mdzad nas zla ba'i tog gis zhus pa ni/_/rang byung 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di ni ci lags lung bstan gsol/_/gang gi phyir na ngas ni 
[\[172a.3\]]dag pa'i 'od rnams ston mdzad pa/_/zla ba'i tog khyod mnyan par gyis zhes ston pas de la gsungs/_/lha min sgra gcan bdag nyid chen po byang chub mchog la zhugs/_/g.yog 'khor sum khri nyis stong gang lags rnams kyang de bzhin te/_/bskal pa stong phrag 
[\[172a.4\]]brgyar ni byang chub spyod pa spyad nas kyang /_/thams cad rjes su 'thun par byang chub gtso bo thob par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba gang gA'i bye ma snyed rnams la ni mchod bgyis te/_/de nas sems can shin tu mang po byang chub bkod nas kyang /_/de yi 'og tu bskal pa 
[\[172a.5\]]dge ba bkod pa mdzes pa la/_/byang chub rdul bral zhi ba mya ngan med par 'tshang yang rgya/_/sgra gcan bdag nyid chen po 'di ni chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur/_/brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan te dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes kyang bgyi/_/'jig rten khams kyang 
[\[172a.6\]]dga' ba skyed pa'i bkod pa zhes bgyi ste/_/dga' ldan gnas dang 'dra bar 'byor cing rgyas la lo yang legs/_/stobs bcu ldan gyi tshe ni lo grangs bye ba bdun cu ste/_/dge slong 'phags pa'i dge 'dun khrag khrig drug cu tham par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems 
[\[172a.7\]]dpa'i dge 'dun khrag khrig phrag bcu brgyad cu ste/_/thos pa dang ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa gzungs la shin tu gnas/_/bskal pa dge ba bkod pa zhes bgyi mdzes pa de dag tu/_/sems can brgya stong dag ni byang chub bkod pa bgyis nas kyang /_/'di dag thams 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]cad rim gyis byang chub mchog tu 'tshang yang rgya/_/byang chub sems mchog gi ni yon tan khyad par dag la ltos/_/der ni sgra gcan bzang po lung bstan thos par gyur nas kyang /_/srog chags 'bum phrag bzhi dag byang chub mchog la zhugs par gyur/_/
[\[172b.2\]]legs par yon tan 'chang ba rnams kyi bsam pa'i khyad par gyis/_/stong gsum rab g.yos lhas kyang me tog char pa rab tu phab/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad 
[\[172b.3\]]ni bdag ma mchis pa byed pa po ma mchis pa lags na/_lung bstan pa ni gang lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang lags/_byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_klu'i bdag po de de 
[\[172b.4\]]bzhin te/_chos thams cad ni bdag med pa/_byed pa po med pa yin te/_de ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid yin mod kyi/_'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo phyin ci log dang ldan pa/_ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pa rnams sems can med pa 
[\[172b.5\]]dag la sems can du 'du shes skyed par byed de/_de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis snying rje chen po bskyed nas phyin ci log gi 'du shes spong du gzhug pa dang /_ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir byang chub tu go cha gyon 
[\[172b.6\]]par zad kyi skyes bu dam pa de dag gis/_sems can med pa dang /_gang zag med pa mi shes pa ni ma yin te/_bdag dang sems can dang /_srog dang gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag tu lta ba'i sems can de dag yongs su grol bar byed 
[\[172b.7\]]do/_/klu'i bdag po khyod 'di skad du 'di la lung bstan nas gshegs zhes zer ba gang yin pa de la mngon sum du chos khong du chud pa ni lung bstan pa'o/_/sems can med pa dang /_srog med pa dang /_gso ba med pa dang /_gang zag med pa de la 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]sems nges par sems pa'i sems dang ldan par lung bstan pa'o/_/ma byung ba dang /_ma skyes pa dang /_rtsa ba med pa dang /_gnas med pa la gnas pa ni lung bstan pa'o/_/sems can thams cad mtshungs par bdag med pa la mos 
[\[173a.2\]]pa ni lung bstan pa'o/_/chos thams cad mtshungs par chos dben par mthong ba ni lung bstan pa'o/_/zhing thams cad zhing du mtshungs par nam mkha' bzhin du dag cing dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni lung bstan pa'o/_/chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[173a.3\]]chos dang chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa'i ye shes mthong ba ni lung bstan pa'o/_/bdud thams cad dang mtshungs par bdud kyi nyon mongs pas kun nas nyon mongs pa can du mi 'gyur te/_rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni lung bstan 
[\[173a.4\]]pa'o/_/stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa la mi rtog par rnam par mi rtog la mi len mi 'dor ba ni lung bstan pa'o/_/klu'i bdag po de ltar na sems dang /_yid dang rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa lung bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste 
[\[173a.5\]]dmigs su med do/_/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ji lta ba bzhin du/_khong du chud pa ni byang chub yin te/_de la don dam par na gang gi lung bstan pa'am/_gang gi byang chub 'am/_gang lung bstan par bya ba'am/_gang gis lung bstan pa'am/_
[\[173a.6\]]cis lung bstan pa ci yang mi dmigs so/_/klu'i bdag po de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa ste/_rtsa ba rnams yongs su chad pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa ste/_rgyu dang rkyen rnams las 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/
[\[173a.7\]]chos thams cad ni gzung du med pa ste/_ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa ste/_bral ba med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni ma 'ongs pa ste/_sngon gyi mtha' nas ma 'phos pa'i phyir 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]ro/_/chos thams cad ni med par gyur pa ste/_phyi ma'i mthar mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni mi gnas pa ste/_gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni mi dmigs pa ste/_byed pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni byed pa 
[\[173b.2\]]med pa ste/_lus med pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni lus med pa ste/_gnas med pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni gnas med pa ste/_rten med pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni rten med pa ste/_mi g.yo ba'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni mi 
[\[173b.3\]]g.yo ba ste/_mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni mi gnas pa ste/_bems po yin pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni bems po yin te/_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa ste/_rnam par rig par mi byed pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[173b.4\]]chos thams cad ni rnam par rig par mi byed pa ste/_sgro btags pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni sgro btags pa med pa ste/_yid la byed pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni yid la byed pa med pa ste/_dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/chos 
[\[173b.5\]]thams cad ni dmigs su med pa ste/_'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni 'gyur ba med pa ste/_rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa ste/_zhi ba'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni zhi 
[\[173b.6\]]zhing rab tu zhi la nye bar zhi ba ste/_rgyu las byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni rgyu las byung ba ma yin pa ste/_rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba ste/_rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid yin 
[\[173b.7\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid de/_gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni gnyis dang bral ba ste/_bgrod pa gcig pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni bgrod pa gcig pa ste/_so so tha dad pa dang bral ba'i 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni so so tha dad pa dang bral ba ste/_bye brag med pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ni bye brag med pa ste/_mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa'i phyir ro/_/klu'i bdag po de ltar na chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang 
[\[174a.2\]]yin pa de la ni lung bstan par bya ba dang /_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ci yang med do/_/klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying rje chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i stobs la ltos/_gang chos 'di lta bu dag la 
[\[174a.3\]]ming dang brdas rnam par phye nas sems can dag la go bar byed la sems can la ma gtogs pa'i chos rnams kyang ma mthong /_chos la ma gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyang ma mthong ngo /_/sems can rnams ji lta ba bzhin du chos rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/
[\[174a.4\]]byang chub kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/sangs rgyas kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/lung bstan pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/chos thams cad kyi dbyings kyang de dang 'dra ste/_des na de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin nyid rtogs pa'i don dang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa'i don gyis 
[\[174a.5\]]na de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin nyid ma bsgribs pa'i don dang /_de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa'i don dang /_de bzhin nyid khong du chud pa'i don des na de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhin nyid mtshungs par rab tu phye ba de bzhin 
[\[174a.6\]]du chos thams cad kyang /_de bzhin nyid dang mtshungs par rab tu phye ba yin te/_klu'i bdag po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams de la gnas na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[174a.7\]]pa'i sa mnyam pa nyid 'di yang sems can rnams la go bar byed do/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sum stong nyis brgyas mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa yang tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas 'dzam bu'i gling ri ba'i mu tig gi phreng ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gsol to/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu mo lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyi tsha mo rin chen sna tshogs can zhes bya 
[\[174b.2\]]ba des/_klu'i bu mo khri dang lhan cig tu lag pa g.yas pas mu tig gi phreng ba blangs nas bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par blta ste/_phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas bu mo rin chen sna tshogs can dang klu'i bu mo khri po de dag gis bcom 
[\[174b.3\]]ldan 'das kyi sku la mu tig gi phreng ba de dag gsol nas tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams lhan cig tu 'thun zhing yang dag par dga' ba bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/bdag 
[\[174b.4\]]cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig_/da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'di 'dra bar chos kyang ston par gyur cig_/dge 'dun yang srung bar gyur cig_/de nas 
[\[174b.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos klu'i bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bud med kyi lus kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te 'grub par dka'o/_/de nas bu mo rin chen sna tshogs can gyis 
[\[174b.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po bud med kyi lus kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur la lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa la yang /_byang chub 
[\[174b.7\]]'grub dka' ba ma mchis so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub ni sems bskyed pa la rag las te/_byang chub tu sems bskyed ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pas gang 'di skad du bud med kyi lus kyis bla na med pa yang 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/zhes gsungs pa de ni skyes pa'i lus kyis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad du mig ni 
[\[175a.2\]]skyes pa yang ma yin/_bud med kyang ma yin no/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni bud med kyang ma yin/_skyes pa yang ma yin no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po de ci'i slad du zhe na/_mig ni stong pa 
[\[175a.3\]]ste/_stong pa gang lags pa de la ni bud med kyang ma mchis/_skyes pa yang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni stong pa ste/_stong pa gang lags pa de la ni bud med kyang ma mchis/_
[\[175a.4\]]skyes pa yang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/btsun pa de la mig khong du chud pa gang lags pa de ni byang chub lags so/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid khong du chud pa gang lags pa de ni byang chub lags so/_/byang chub gang lags pa de la ni bud 
[\[175a.5\]]med kyi chos rnams sam/_skyes pa'i chos rnams ma mchis so/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po de lta bas na byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags pa de ni bdag gi ngo bo nyid kyang de lags so/_/smras pa/_bu mo ci khyod byang chub yin nam/_smras pa/_gnas brtan 
[\[175a.6\]]dang bdag cag gnyis ka yang byang chub lags so/_/smras pa/_bu mo kho bo ni byang chub ma yin gyi kho bo ni nyan thos yin no/_/smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po khyod sus btul/_smras pa/_bu mo kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pas btul to/_/smras pa/_
[\[175a.7\]]gnas brtan gal te de bzhin gshegs pas btul na gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas su zin na/_de bzhin gshegs pas gnas brtan gdul bar spyod dam/_/bu mo de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]po de lta bas na khyod nyid kyang byang chub lags te/_byang chub ma lags pa'i chos ci yang ma mchis so/_/smras pa/_bu mo ci mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub yin nam/_smras pa/_btsun pa de de bzhin te/_mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub lags so/_/
[\[175b.2\]]de ci'i slad du zhe na/_byang chub ni mtshams med pa'i rang bzhin can lags te/_mtshams med pa'i chos kyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de ni byang chub lags la/_stong pa nyid kyi chos kyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de ni byang chub lags pa'i slad 
[\[175b.3\]]du'o/_/btsun pa de ltar na mtshams med pa khong du chud pa las byang chub 'byung ngo /_/btsun pa byang chub ma lags pa gang lags pa de ni ma mchis te/_gal te chos 'ga' zhig dang mi ldan na ni ma lags kyi/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa de 
[\[175b.4\]]ni byang chub lags so/_/smras pa/_bu mo khyod kyi spobs pa 'di sus byin/_smras pa/_gnas brtan gyis stsal to/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gal te gnas brtan gyis ma smras na bdag gi spobs pa 'di skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/btsun pa dper na 
[\[175b.5\]]gal te ma smras na brag ca'i sgra 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du btsun pa 'od srung chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ma dris kyi bar du spobs pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_bu mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed la bsnyen bkur byas/_smras pa gnas 
[\[175b.6\]]brtan gyis nyon mongs pa ji snyed spangs pa snyed la'o/_/smras pa/_bu mo kho bo'i nyon mongs pa rnams ni spangs pa med do/_/smras pa/_btsun pa nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa lags sam/_smras pa/_kho bo ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin/_
[\[175b.7\]]nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa yang ma yin no/_/smras pa/_ci btsun pa khyod kyis nyon mongs pa rnams bzhag gam/_smras pa/_bskyed pa yang med/_'gag par byas pa yang med/_bzhag pa yang med de/_de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/_/
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]smras pa/_ci de bzhin nyid shes par bgyi ba zhig lags sam smras pa de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_'o na ci'i slad du de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du nyon mongs pa shes so zhes gsungs/_gal te mkhyen na ni de bzhin nyid ma lags so/_/ji ste 
[\[176a.2\]]mi mkhyen na ni de lta na btsun pa byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang mi shes pa can du mtshungs so/_/smras pa/_bu mo khyod kyi tshig thams cad ni gzhan gyi tshig gcod par byed pa'o/_/smras pa/_bdag ni tshig gcod par yang mi bgyid/_bsgrub par 
[\[176a.3\]]yang mi bgyid do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_chos kyi dbyings ni gcad du ma mchis pa lags la/_tshig thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba'i slad du'o/_/smras pa/_gang khyod kyis bdag byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang mnyam ste bzhag pa de 
[\[176a.4\]]khyod 'gyod par mi 'gyur ram/_smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po gal te bdag gis gnas brtan yang tha dad la byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang tha dad par bzhag pa ni de ltar bdag 'gyod par 'gyur ba zhig na gang gi slad du bdag gis gnas brtan 
[\[176a.5\]]byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang tha mi dad par bzhag pa des na bdag 'gyod par mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa mtshungs zhes bgyi ba de ni chos thams cad tha dad pa ma mchis pa dang /_nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags so/_/smras pa/_bu 
[\[176a.6\]]mo ci khyod so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs sam 'on te 'phags pa rnams dang mtshungs/_smras pa/_btsun pa bdag ni so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs pa yang ma lags/_'phags pa rnams dang mtshungs pa yang ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[176a.7\]]gal te bdag so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs na ni bdag ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa don ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/ji ste 'phags pa rnams dang mtshungs na ni nyan thos rnams dang mtshungs par 'gyur te/_de lta na ni bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_bu mo gal te khyod so so'i skye bo rnams dang yang mi mtshungs 'phags pa rnams dang yang mi mtshungs na/_ci khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang mtshungs sam/_smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po bdag ni da gzod 
[\[176b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang mtshungs pa ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bdag ni thog ma nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang mtshungs so/_/smras pa/_bu mo gal te khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang mtshungs na/_ci sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag 
[\[176b.3\]]khyod la yod dam/_smras pa/_gnas brtan ci sangs rgyas kyi chos su gdags pa 'das pa'am/_ma 'ongs pa'am/_da ltar byung ba'am/_yul na gnas pa'am/_phyogs na gnas pa'am/_sngon po'am/_ser po'am/_dmar po'am/_dkar po 
[\[176b.4\]]'am/_btsod ka'am/_shel gyi kha dog gam/_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu lags sam/_smras pa/_bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gdags pa ni kha dog dang /_dbyibs kyi sgo nas bstan par mi nus so/_/smras pa/_btsun pa gal te sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[176b.5\]]chos rnams gdags su ma mchis pa dang /_gdags su mi rung ba lags na ci'i slad du bdag la tshor bar mdzad/_smras pa/_bu mo 'o na sangs rgyas kyi chos gang las btsal bar bya/_smras pa/_lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis las btsal bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[176b.6\]]smras pa/_lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis kyang gang las btsal bar bya/_smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba las btsal bar bgyi'o/_/smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba gang las btsal bar bya/_smras pa/_
[\[176b.7\]]mtshams med pa lnga las btsal bar bgyi'o/_/smras pa/_mtshams med pa lnga yang gang las btsal bar bya/_smras pa/_gnas brtan 'od srung chen po'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba las btsal bar bgyi'o/_/smras pa/_bu mo khyod kyi gtam 'di 'dra 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]ba de ji lta bu zhig_/smras pa/_btsun pa gtam 'di ni ma bcings ma grol ba'i gtam lags so/_/blang du ma mchis shing dor du ma mchis te rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i gtam lags so/_/chos thams cad tha dad pa ma mchis 
[\[177a.2\]]pa'i gtam lags so/_/smras pa/_bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub dang 'thun pa ma yin no/_/smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po de ni med de/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub dang 'thun pa ma lags so/_/de ci'i 
[\[177a.3\]]slad du zhe na/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni brjod du ma mchis pa bsnyad du ma mchis pa lags pa'i slad du'o/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po bshad pa'i dngos po gang lags pa de dag thams cad ni sgras rnam par dbye ba lags la/_byang chub 
[\[177a.4\]]gang lags pa de ni don dam par sgras brda sprad par mi nus pa lags so/_/btsun pa byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di ni nye bar zhi ba'i gzhi lags so/_/'di ni yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzhi lags so/_/'di ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi gzhi lags so/_/'di ni gzhi 
[\[177a.5\]]ma mchis pa'i gzhi lags so/_/smras pa/_bu mo gal te byang chub kyi mtshan nyid de lta bu yin na/_de ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po lus dang sems kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 
[\[177a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_byang chub ni lus dang sems kyi ngo bo nyid kho na lags te/_ngo bo nyid kyis ngo bo nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_bu mo ci khyod byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ram/_
[\[177a.7\]]smras pa/_bdag nyid byang chub lags te/_byang chub kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/smras pa/_bu mo gal te khyod nyid byang chub yin na/_ci khyod kyi 'khor lo skor ram/_smras pa/_bdag ni chos kyi 'khor lo 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]skor lags so/_/smras pa/_khyod kyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba ji lta bu zhig_/smras pa/_'khor lo de ni rten thams cad dang bral ba'i slad du mi g.yo ba lags so/_/'khor lo de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa ma mchis pa lags 
[\[177b.2\]]so/_/'khor lo de ni bral ba ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin nyid lags so/_/'khor lo de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pas mi gnas pa lags so/_/'khor lo de ni gnas thams cad las byung ba ma lags pas gnas ma mchis pa lags so/_/
[\[177b.3\]]'khor lo de ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song bas gnyis su ma mchis pa lags so/_/'khor lo de ni gcig dang tha dad pa mi dmigs pas tha dad pa ma lags so/_/'khor lo de ni sgra dang skad dang tshig gi lam thams cad ro gcig pas brjod du 
[\[177b.4\]]ma mchis pa lags so/_/'khor lo de ni shin tu kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma lags pas rnam par dag pa lags so/_/'khor lo de ni chad pa dang rtag pa mi dmigs pas yod pa yongs su chad pa ma lags so/_/'khor lo de ni rgyu dang rkyen shin tu brtags pas 
[\[177b.5\]]'gal ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/'khor lo de ni bden pa lags so/_/'khor lo de ni mi skye mi 'gag pa lags so/_/'khor lo de ni stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa lags so/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po 'khor lo de 'dra ba gang 
[\[177b.6\]]lags pa de'i bskor ba ci 'dra ba zhig lags/_smras pa/_bu mo khyod kyi bstan pa 'di 'dra ba lags na/_khyod ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_gang gi tshe gnas 
[\[177b.7\]]brtan byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_bdag kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags so/_/smras pa/_kho bo byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de ni gnas med skabs med do/_/smras pa/_de de lta 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]lags te/_byang chub ni gnas ma mchis pa la gnas pa ste/_de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus lags so/_/bu mo des bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob 
[\[178a.2\]]par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bu mo de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_bu mo legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis chos bstan pa 'di legs par smras so//_//bam po drug pa/_de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod 
[\[178a.3\]]sbyin dang /_dri za kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/_bu mo 'di yun ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas dge slong de dag 
[\[178a.4\]]la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bu mo rin chen sna tshogs can 'di ni bskal pa grangs med pa sum brgya na bskal pa rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba la/_'jig rten gyi khams snang ba can du/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[178a.5\]]rgyas kun tu rnam par gzigs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams snang ba can de yang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'od kyis rtag tu snang bar 'gyur ro/_/zhabs 'bring ba byang chub sems dpa' ni bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe'i tshad ni 
[\[178a.6\]]bar gyi bskal pa bcur 'gyur ro/_/de nas klu'i bu mo khri po de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rnam par gzigs des byang chub brnyes pa de'i tshe/_bdag cag 'jig rten gyi 
[\[178a.7\]]khams der skye bar gyur cig ces gsol nas/_de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar lung bstan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]'di dag ni lha ma yin gyis 'jigs pas rtag tu skrag bzhin du gnas la/_lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa na yang phan tshun rtsod cing 'gyed par bgyid de/_de bas na bcom ldan 'das/_de bzhin gshegs pas ci nas sems can thams cad sems 'thun par 
[\[178b.2\]]'gyur ba de lta bur chos bstan na legs so legs so/_/'khor 'dir lha dang lha ma yin 'dus pa 'di dag thams cad kyang /_ci nas gcig la gcig 'thun par bgyid pa dang /_byams par sems pa dang /_phan par sems pa dang /_gnod par sems par mi 
[\[178b.3\]]'gyur ba de lta bur sems dad par bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog dang /_thags zangs ris dang /_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_sim byed rnams la bka' 
[\[178b.4\]]stsal pa/_grogs po dag byams pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags so/_/byams pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i skyes bu gang zag gis ni tshe 'di dang /_tshe phyi ma'i don thob par 'gyur ro/_/grogs po dag tshe 'di ni yun thung ngo /_/tshe phyi mar ni 'gro dgos so/_/
[\[178b.5\]]'byor pa thams cad kyi mtha' ni rgud pa'o/_/rgyal po'i longs spyod dang dbang phyug rnams ni mi rtag gis khyed lhan cig 'thun pa dang gnod sems med pa dang /_'jig rten pha rol la lta ba dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pas gnas par gyis shig_/bcom 
[\[178b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis de ltar ci nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang /_lha ma yin de dag 'thun par gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i skyo ba'i gtam mdzad do/_/de nas tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag deng slan chad mnyen pa'i tshul du bgyid 
[\[178b.7\]]cing gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems dang gnod sems ma mchis pas gnas par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag legs so legs so/_/byams pa'i rnam pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]mchod pa'i mchog yin no/_/rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po rnams kyis mchod pas ni 'di lta ste/_byams pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin de mchog yin te/_ngas de las dgongs nas de skad bstan to/_/grogs po dag gzhan 
[\[179a.2\]]yang bzhi po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa khyad par du 'phags pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_bslab pa las 'gal bar mi byed pa dang /_byams pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya ba'i 
[\[179a.3\]]phyir byang chub kyi sems dang /_ji ltar thos pa'i chos la so sor rtog pa'i chos kyi nan tan te/_bzhi po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa khyad par du 'phags pa'o/_/bstan pa 'di thos nas lha'i 'khor dang lha ma yin gyi 'khor de dag gi nang nas bzhi 
[\[179a.4\]]khris byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po dbugs can dang /_klu'i rgyal po dbugs can chen po dang /_'jog po dang /_kha dog mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po 'di'i nang na klu'i 
[\[179a.5\]]rigs tshad ma mchis pa las kyi rnam par smin pa sna tshogs las skyes pa dag mchis te/_de la kha cig ni dbang cher grags pa lags/_kha cig ni lus nyam chung zhing chung bar grags la lus chung ba dag kyang mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' 
[\[179a.6\]]lding bzhi der babs nas klu gzhon nu dang /_klu'i bu mo lus nyam chung ba rnams bton te 'tshal bar bgyid la/_rgya mtsho'i nang gi klu'i rigs thams cad kyang skrag par bgyid lags na/_ci nas rgya mtsho chen po'i klu de dag thams cad kyang 'jigs pa ma mchis 
[\[179a.7\]]pa dang /_skrag pa ma mchis par gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bur bcom ldan 'das kyis bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba mdzad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis ras phrag zar phrag pa las phab nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]la bka' stsal pa/_kye klu'i bdag po ras phrag zar 'di long la/_klu'i rigs thams cad dang /_klu'i gnas thams cad du dum bu dum bur gshegs te byin cig dang /_ji srid du ras phrag zar 'di las tha na nyag ma gcig tsam gnas pa de srid du/_yang rgya mtsho 
[\[179b.2\]]chen por nam mkha' lding thams cad rgyu bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i mchog gi thugs kyis smon pa ni 'grub pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad ras phrag zar 'di ltar chung ba 
[\[179b.3\]]'di rgya mtsho chen po'i klu thams cad kyis ji ltar thob par 'gyur snyam ste zhum par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/_klu'i bdag po gal te 
[\[179b.4\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis ras phrag zar 'di las dum bu dum bur khyer du zin kyang ras phrag zar 'di yongs su zad par mi 'gyur te/_de dag gis gos ji tsam gyi tshad du 'gyur bar 'dod na yang 
[\[179b.5\]]de las de dag gi gos de tsam du 'gyur te/_klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ni de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos ras phrag zar de blangs te/_dum bu 'bum phrag du mar byas nas klu thams cad dang klu gzhon nu 
[\[179b.6\]]thams cad la so sor byin no/_/der su ji tsam du 'dod pa de la de tsam gyi gos su mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/_yangs shing rgya che bar 'gyur la/_ras phrag zar de yang yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos klu'i rgyal po de dag 
[\[179b.7\]]thams cad la smras pa/_grogs po dag ras phrag zar de la ston pa'i 'du shes dang /_mchod rten gyi 'du shes skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ras phrag zar 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas longs spyad pa yin te/_sems can thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur pa 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]yin no/_/grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa gang yin pa dang /_ras phrag zar 'di la mchod pa byed pa gang yin pa de la ni bye brag tu bya ba'am/_tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal 
[\[180a.2\]]po rgya mtsho la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_klu'i bdag po legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_ras phrag zar de la mchod pa byed pa gang yin pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas pa yin no/_/klu'i bdag po klu dang /_
[\[180a.3\]]klu gzhon nu dang /_klu'i bu mo ji snyed kyis ras phrag zar de las dum bu dum bur khyer ba mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di dag thams cad ni bskal pa bzang po 'di kho na la yongs su 
[\[180a.4\]]mya ngan las 'da' bar ngas lung bstan te/_theg pa chen po la zhugs pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/_/klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa ni de ltar 'jig rten na yon gnas yin te/_de la sems gcig bskyed pa tsam yang chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgya 
[\[180a.5\]]mtsho chen po'i nang na klu dang /_klu gzhon nu dang /_klu'i bu mo ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te tshig 'di skad ces kyang 
[\[180a.6\]]smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su mi gsung ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni bden pa gsung ba'o/_/yang dag par gsung ba'o/_/phyin ci ma log par gsung ba ste/_des bdag cag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lung bstan 
[\[180a.7\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la shin tu skyabs su mchi'o/_/bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang gzung bar 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang bka' drin du gzo bar 'tshal te/_de bzhin 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]gshegs pa bzhugs pa na yang blta ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i slad du rgyun mi 'chad par thad du mchi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na yang sku gdung 'chang ba rnams la mchod pa bgyi'o/_/
[\[180b.2\]]bkur sti dang /_rim gro thams cad kyang bgyi'o/_/klu yongs su bskyab pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di thos nas mi dga' zhing /_rings pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[180b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi 'tshal ma bkum ste 
[\[180b.4\]]ci bgyi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag zas bzhi po 'di dag ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_grogs po dag 
[\[180b.5\]]zas gang srog chags gzhan bsad pa dang /_srog chags gzhan la rnam par 'tshe ba dang /_gzhan gyi srog bcad pas 'tsho ba 'di ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i zas dang 
[\[180b.6\]]po'o/_/grogs po dag gzhan yang zas gang ma byin par len cing 'phrog pa dang /_gzhan gyi longs spyod 'jig par byed pa dang /_dbyug pa dang /_ral gri dang /_mtshon cha dang /_lag chas 'tshog pa 'di ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i 
[\[180b.7\]]skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i zas gnyis pa'o/_/grogs po dag gzhan yang zas gang tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag dang /_pha rol la gnod pa byed pa dang /_spyod lam yang dag par ston pa dang /_cho ga nyams 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]pa dang /_tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_lta ba nyams pa dang /_'tsho ba nyams pa dang /_log pa dang /_yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yon tan gyis 'tsho ba 'di ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig 
[\[181a.2\]]rten du 'gro ba'i zas gsum pa'o/_/grogs po dag gzhan yang zas gang ston pa ma yin pa la ston par khas 'che ba dang /_yang dag par song ba ma yin pa la yang dag par song bar khas 'che ba dang /_dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang /_tshangs 
[\[181a.3\]]par spyod pa ma yin par tshangs par spyod par khas 'che bas 'tsho ba 'di ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i zas bzhi pa ste/_grogs po dag nga ni zas bzhi po 'di dag yang dag par gcad pa'i 
[\[181a.4\]]phyir chos ston te/_grogs po dag lus gso ba'i phyir gzhan gyi srog gcad par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can thams cad la ni srog gces shing phangs pa'i phyir te/_grogs po dag de lta bas na bdag nyid bsrung ba'i phyir dang /_'jig rten pha 
[\[181a.5\]]rol bsrung ba'i phyir dang /_sems can thams cad la bde ba sbyin pa'i phyir mkhas pas srog gi phyir yang gzhan gyi srog mi gcod cing /_bya ba ma yin pa thams cad mi bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding bzhi g.yog 
[\[181a.6\]]sa ya sa ya dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/sngon sdig pa'i las bgyis pa yang so sor bshags so/_/slan 
[\[181a.7\]]chad kyang sdom par 'tshal lo/_/klu'i rigs thams cad la yang mi 'jigs pa stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi dam pa'i chos yun ji srid gnas pa de srid du yang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las la brtson par bgyi'o/_/
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding bzhi po de dag la bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag khyed ni de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyi gsung rab la/_dge slong bzhir gyur te/_dga' byed dang /_dga' byed chen po dang /_bla ma dang /_bla ma'i 
[\[181b.2\]]bshes gnyen zhes bya bar gyur to/_/dge slong bzhi po de dag rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i rgyags pas myos shing mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang /_slongs mo ster ba'i khyim gyi rgyags pas myos la bdag nyid ni tshul khrims dang /_cho ga dang /_
[\[181b.3\]]lta ba nyams pas/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong rnams la ni 'khrug pa dang /_gnod pa byas te/_lus dang ngag dang /_yid ma bsdams shing sdig pa mang po byas par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub de la yang de dag gis mchod pa 
[\[181b.4\]]mang po byas so/_/des na khyed sems can dmyal bar ma song ste/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas 'dir skyes nas 'di ltar sdom pas ma bsdams pa'i phyir/_khyod kyis srog gcod pa mang du byas shing sdig pa'i las mang du byas la/_mang po dag kyang 'jigs par byas 
[\[181b.5\]]so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding bzhi po de dag gis ci nas tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub de dang der dge sbyong du gyur nas las mngon par 'du byed pa/_mngon par 'dus byas pa de 
[\[181b.6\]]dag thams cad rjes su dran par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa mdzad do/_/de dag gis kyang mngon sum du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems ni dmu rgod gdul dka' zhing bsrung dka' ba lags te 
[\[181b.7\]]der bdag cag gis sems brkam chags can du gyur pas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub de ma mnyes par bgyis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis/_da slan chad rang gi srog kyang yongs su gtang bar 'tshal gyis sdig 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]pa'i las ni mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag chos kyi gtam gyis dga' ba bskyed nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/grogs po dag khyed de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i 'dus pa dang po'i grangs su gtogs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[182a.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya mtsho chen por sems can gyi don ji snyed bya dgos pa de dag thams cad mdzad nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/_klu'i bdag po tshur shog_/da rang mal cha dang stan rnams sdus shig_/da ni rang gi gnas su 'gro'o/_/
[\[182a.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring ba dang bcas par gdan de las bzhengs nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas phyir yang rin po che'i them skas rnams las bkod pa chen po dang /_mchod pa chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid chen pos gshegs nas/_mgur 
[\[182a.4\]]bsal te/_rgya mtsho'i 'gram du gzhes so/_/de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan mas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa/_sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' lha dang mis mchod pa/_/lha min dbang pos bsnyen bkur mi 
[\[182a.5\]]mchog deng phyag 'tshal/_/pad ma lta bu'i spyan mnga' zhal ras zla ba 'dra/_/dge ba'i chos kyis 'phags pa bde sbyin deng phyag 'tshal/_/gzugs mchog ston pa bsod nams brgya yi mtshan dang ldan/_/yon tan ye shes 'phags pa rnam 'dren deng phyag 
[\[182a.6\]]'tshal/_/sbyin dang dul bas 'phags pa tshul khrims bzang po ba[{]stsogs[,]sogs[}]/_/bzod pa'i stobs kyis 'phags pa mi mchog deng phyag 'tshal/_/brtson 'grus stobs kyis byung ba bsam gtan blo gros sbyangs/_/shes rab mkha' mtshungs khyod la de ring 
[\[182a.7\]]mgos phyag 'tshal/_/byams pas snyoms pa'i thugs ldan thugs rjes 'gro la gzigs/_/'dren pa thugs dgyes rtag tu btang snyoms pha rol gshegs/_/ka la ping ka lta bur gsung snyan tshangs skad ston/_/gsung snyan ston pa khyod la de ring 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]mgos phyag 'tshal/_/bdud dpung 'joms pa bdud stobs nges par 'joms mdzad pa/_/byang chub brtul zhugs sgrub pa srid gsum srid pas mchod/_/dri gsum dri ma sbyong ba rnam thar gsum ston pa/_/'jig rten gsum grags khyod la de ring mgos phyag 
[\[182b.2\]]'tshal/_/bden pa'i brtul zhugs bzang rtogs rtag tu chos kyis 'phags/_/rtag tu dgon pa spyod yul rtag tu ye shes sbyong /_/nyon mongs dgra 'joms gzi brjid lhag par gzi bskyed pa/_/pad ma lta bu'i spyan mnga' deng khyod mgos phyag 'tshal/_/
[\[182b.3\]]lhun po'i rtse 'dra dgongs pa rdo rje lta bur brtan/_/dgongs pas 'dra yon tan rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal lo/_/'gro la stong pa ston pa zhi gnas pha rol phyin/_/rab tu zhi ba'i thugs ldan khyod la skyabs su mchi/_/bdud rtsi dam pa ston pa 'gro min 'gro ba gcod/_/
[\[182b.4\]]lha dang mis mchod khyod la de ring mgos phyag 'tshal/_/sa steng lha yul grags pa snyan dang grags pa 'phags/_/yon tan rgya chen mi zad yon tan 'byung gnas 'dud/_/ji skad gsungs bzhin mdzad cing ji skad mdzad bzhin gsung /_/ji skad spyod bzhin 
[\[182b.5\]]skul ba deng khyod mgos phyag 'tshal/_/rga shi grol mdzad sman pa 'gro bas bsnyen bkur ba/_/thar pa'i lam ston khyod la de ring mgos phyag 'tshal/_/rgyu yi byed pa rab ston lta ba'i mun pa sel/_/lam mchog ston pa rgyal ba khyod la skyabs su mchi/_/rin 
[\[182b.6\]]chen sbyin pa gcig pu chos kyi dga' ba gsung /_/sa 'dra'i thugs ldan khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/_/'dren pa yon tan rgya mtsho yon tan las bstod pa'i/_/bdag gis bsod nams gang lags des ni khyod 'drar shog_/de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i 
[\[182b.7\]]lha mo 'od ldan mas bcom ldan 'das la de skad bstod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das slar byung ste gshegs pas da ni rgya mtsho chen po mi mdzes pa lags na/_ci nas bdag rgya mtsho mdzes par bgyid pa de lta bur bcom ldan 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]'das kyis rjes su bstan na legs so legs so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od ldan ma chos bcu po 'di dag ni rgyan du 'gyur ba yin te/_bcu 
[\[183a.2\]]gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byams pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad la rnam par mi 'tshe bar bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po la gnas pa dang /_bsam pa'i sbyor ba bla na med 
[\[183a.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sems bskyed pa dga' bar gnas pa dang /_sbyin pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /_rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi smon lam la brtson 'grus brtan pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad 
[\[183a.4\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dran pa dang /_shes bzhin du gnas pa dang /_sngon gyi dge ba chud mi za ba'i phyir dang /_shes rab yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos dang ldan zhing chos 'dod pa dang /_phan pa'i dngos pos sems can thams cad 
[\[183a.5\]]la yon tan thams cad skyed pa dang /_gnyis su med pas gong du khyad par rtogs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi thugs su chud pa la yang dag par gzhol bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob pa ste/_'od ldan ma chos bcu po de dag ni rgyan du 'gyur ba yin 
[\[183a.6\]]no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_rgya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan ma lha mo khri dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgya 
[\[183a.7\]]mtsho chen po'i rgyan lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyan lags na/_rgya mtsho chen po lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_byang chub kyi sems de ni sangs 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]rgyas kyi zhing thams cad brgyan pa'i slad du bdag cag gis bskyed lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/_bdag ni rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na gnas bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs 
[\[183b.2\]]su bsrung ba'i slad du rtag tu brtson pa kho nar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na yang bkod pa thams cad nye bar bstan par 'tshal lo/_/chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam mdzad pa na yang 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa sgrub par 'tshal lo/_/
[\[183b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od ldan ma 'di ltar khyod kyis ni sangs rgyas khri la mchod pa byas so/_/'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa yang bstan to/_/dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su bsrungs so/_/'od ldan ma khyod ni bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin 
[\[183b.4\]]gshegs pa thams cad la yang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/khyod ni bskal pa bzang po 'di 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par 
[\[183b.5\]]dga' bar skye bar 'gyur te/_bud med kyi dngos po brjes nas skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/_/khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan 
[\[183b.6\]]mas bcom ldan 'das las bdag nyid kyi lung bstan pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che dang /_rin thang mnyam pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas 
[\[183b.7\]]sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bdag ni thub pa ye shes yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas de yis lung bstan te/_/bdag ni 'dren par 'gyur ba dag la yid gnyis the tsom ci yang yong ma mchis/_/
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]stong gsum sa gzhi thams cad rnam par 'gas shing zla ba sa la lhung yang gda'/_/lha las lhag pa'i lhas mchod sangs rgyas phyin ci log gi tshig gsung yong mi gda'/_/bsam pa byams pa brtson 'grus yul la thugs ni 'khrug par 'gyur 
[\[184a.2\]]ba mi mnga' ltos/_/bdag ni stong pa'i ye shes yul gyi chos rnams dag la gus par byed la ltos/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i yang dag spyod pa rnams dang ye shes thogs pa mi mnga' ltos/_/de yis 'dir ni bdag gi sems kyi yul bden mkhyen nas de bzhin lung 
[\[184a.3\]]yang bstan/_/smon pa rab mchog bde sbyin sdug bsngal kun las grol bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnas dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen skyob pa 'jigs pa rnams la 'jigs med sbyin mdzad pa/_/rgyal ba lam mchog dam pa ston mdzad lam ngan yongs 
[\[184a.4\]]su sbyong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig rten rnam par gzigs la mkhas pa 'jig rten 'das pa'i 'dren la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'dir ni lha dang mi rnams gang dag sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs rnams thos pa dang /_/byang chub spyod cing byang chub bsam pa sems pa 
[\[184a.5\]]de dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed/_/de dag la ni ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med de mi khom brgyad las yongs su grol/_/de dang de dag lha dang mi yi bde ba nges shing zhi ba'i go 'phang 'thob/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu mthong dgas 'di skad 
[\[184a.6\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma lags pa mang po dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa 
[\[184a.7\]]bgyis lags na/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang ba mdzad na/_bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las cung zad tsam 'tshal te/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring ba dang bcas par rnam par rgyal byed dang 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]'dra ba'i bkod pa chen po'i khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]nang du bzhugs par gsol la/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bskyal bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu da de'i dus la bab par shes na skyol cig_/de nas klu'i rgyal po 
[\[184b.2\]]rgya mtsho'i bu mthong dgas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rnam par rgyal byed dang 'dra ba'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byin gyis brlabs nas/_der bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring dang bcas par bzhugs par gsol nas steng gi bar snang las 
[\[184b.3\]]gshegs te/_klu'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang sil snyan byed pheg rdob/_glu dbyangs len cing me tog gi char chen po 'bebs la/_lha'i spos dang phye ma sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs bzhin du mthar gyis bcom ldan 'das bya rgod phung po'i ri la bskyal to/_/de nas 
[\[184b.4\]]klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bu dang bcas/_chung ma dang g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la bzod pa gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ma 'byor bar gyur pa gang lags pa rnams 
[\[184b.5\]]bdag cag la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das rin po che ji lta ba bzhin du de dang 'tsham pa'i mchod pa'i 'os lags la/_bcom ldan 'das ni sems can thams cad kyi bla na ma mchis pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing rin po che lags 
[\[184b.6\]]te/_mchod pa'i 'os lags na/_de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis kyang 'byor pa'am/_yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i rngo mi thogs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni de tsam tshad 
[\[184b.7\]]ma mchis pa'i mchod pa'i 'os lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' nan tan 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar mchod pa nyon cig_/bsam pa rnam par dag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/_bcos ma ma yin pa dang g.yo med pa'i phyir ro/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa ni de bzhin 
[\[185a.2\]]gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la lhag par dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/_sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa'i phyir ro/_/tshul 'chos pa dang /_
[\[185a.3\]]kha gsag thams cad rnam par spangs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/_spyod lam yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/_'jig rten thams cad la mi slu ba'i phyir ro/_/'phags 
[\[185a.4\]]pa'i rigs kyis chog par 'dzin cing sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par blangs pa mi 'dor ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/_dam bcas pa la brtan pa'i phyir ro/_/dben pa la dga' zhing bre mo'i gtam yongs su spangs pa ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[185a.5\]]pa la mchod pa yin te/_sems yongs su 'dul ba'i phyir ro/_/ji skad thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro/_/bdag med pa dang /_sems can 
[\[185a.6\]]med pa dang /_gsog med pa dang /_gso ba med pa dang /_gang zag med par nye bar rtogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/_gzod ma nas ma byung ba'i phyir ro/_/stong pa'i chos la 'jug pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa la nges par rtogs pa dang 
[\[185a.7\]]smon pa dang bral ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro/_/rkyen 'di pa nyid la 'jug cing mthar lta ba sel ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/_rtag pa dang chad par lta ba yongs su spong 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]ba'i phyir ro/_/ma byung ba dang ma skyes par bzod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/_rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i phyir ro/_/klu'i bdag po de ltar na lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rtsom pa gang yin pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yongs su 
[\[185b.2\]]dag pa ma yin gyi/_gang na lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rtsom pa med pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /_blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med pa dang /_'khor gsum yongs su dag pa 
[\[185b.3\]]dang /_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang dri ma gsum gyi dri ma sel ba dang /_khams gsum pa la mi rten pa dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la 'jug pa dang /_rig pa gsum gyi rig pa shes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin no/_/de skad ces bka' 
[\[185b.4\]]stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba 
[\[185b.5\]]dan dang /_na bza' dang /_bshos dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos sman dang /_yo byad dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag kyang ci de bzhin 
[\[185b.6\]]gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyid pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_klu'i bdag po de ni bla na med pa'i mchod pa de nyid kyis yongs su sbyangs pa yin gyis/_mchod pa de ni shin tu mthar thug pa dang /_shin tu dri ma med pa dang /_shin tu 
[\[185b.7\]]tshangs par spyod pa'i mthar thug pa ni ma yin no/_/klu'i bdag po dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i slob pa de dag ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba la/_sems gnas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams ni de lta ma yin no/_/klu'i bdag po gzhan yang chos bzhi 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa dag yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs sogs pa dang /_snying rje chen po la gnas pa'i sems kyis ye shes 
[\[186a.2\]]kyi tshogs sogs pa dang /_brtson 'grus chen po shin tu brtsams pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /_chos zab mo rgya chen po la sems bskyed pas bzod pa skyes pa thob pa ste/_klu'i bdag po chos 'di bzhi dang ldan pa'i 
[\[186a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa yin no/_/de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_khyim bdag rnams dang /_grong rdal pa dang /_yul gyi mi rnams dang /_rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang /_blon 
[\[186a.4\]]po dang /_nang 'khor dang /_sgo dpon dang /_'khor dang /_tshong dpon rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas su bshos gsol nas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gshegs so/_/zhes thos nas der srog chags bdun khri nyis stong 
[\[186a.5\]]dang /_rgyal po ma skyes dgra g.yog 'khor sum khri nyis stong dang lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer nas byung nas/_bya rgod phung po'i ri ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor 
[\[186a.6\]]ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho chen por gshegs na chab kyi tshogs de na mchis pa de gang du mchi lags/_bcom 
[\[186a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe dge slong me'i khams kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang bar mthong na/_de'i chu'i phung po de dag gang du song /_
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa'i sems de lta bur las su rung bar gyur pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis de nyan thos ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa la dbang thob pa'i sems las su 
[\[186b.2\]]rung ba las gyur par 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la mkhas pa/_sems la dbang yod pa/_chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug_/chos rnams la dbang yod pa ni de ltar mi 'dod 
[\[186b.3\]]dam/_rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe nga rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa de'i tshe chu de'i nang na gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni bdag nyid chu'i nang na gnas so snyam du 'dzin to/_/skam sa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni rgya mtsho chen po bskams par mthong ngo /_/ji ltar 
[\[186b.4\]]gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas kyi bkod pa rnams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa de bzhin du klu dang dri za dang lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis khyab par gyur to/_/rgya mtsho chen po'i nang gi sems can thams cad 
[\[186b.5\]]kyang gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems dang /_phan pa'i sems dang gnod sems med pa dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba med par gnas par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 
[\[186b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa de tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni ngo mtshar lags te/_'di ltar klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs te/_de ltar sems can 
[\[186b.7\]]gyi don tshad ma mchis pa bgyis na/_bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos yun ji srid cig nas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la ni mchod pa bgyis/_yun ji srid cig 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]na ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/_de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan ni ci zhes bgyi bar 'gyur/_de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ci 'dra bar 'gyur lags/_bcom 
[\[187a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_yun ring ba/_tshad med pa'i snga rol de'i tshe de'i dus na bskal pa yid du 'ong zhing zhi ba zhes bya ba la 
[\[187a.3\]]shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde ba gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i 
[\[187a.4\]]kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od rnam par dag pa'i 'od zer rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams lta ba yongs su dag pa de'i bkod pa byung ba de dag ni nga'i 
[\[187a.5\]]tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas su zin kyang rgyas par bstan par nus par sla ba ma yin no/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lhas btsa' zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rnam par dag pa'i 'od zer 
[\[187a.6\]]rgyal po de la lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du mchod pa byas te/_dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan pa de gnyid log pa'i rmi lam du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis thos so/_/skyes bu khyu mchog la ni mchod chen mnga'/_/dpag med rgya chen bsam yas byas zin gyis/_/
[\[187a.7\]]'gro ba dag la snying brtse bskyed nas kyang /_/rab mchog byang chub sems ni bskyed par gyis/_/byang chub sems ni yang dag sgrub byed gang /_/de ni mchod mchog dam pa khyad par 'phags/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs rnams bkur sti yin/_/de ni phyi ma'i 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]bsod nams gzi byin yin//_//bam po bdun pa ste tha ma/_rgyal po chen po de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lhas btsa' des tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis thos te/_de'i mtshan mo 'das nas g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/_bcom ldan 
[\[187b.2\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rnam par dag pa'i 'od zer rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de'i 
[\[187b.3\]]spyan sngar 'khod de/_thal mo sbyar nas lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/gzugs la brkam dang sgra la rten pa dang /_/dri dang ro dang reg la gnas pa 
[\[187b.4\]]dang /_/'dod la brkam dang bde ba dga' ba yis/_/byang chub mchog 'di rtogs par mi nus so/_/le lo can dang dma' la brtson pa dang /_/ser sna can dang tshul khrims ma bsdams dang /_/sdang ba'i sems dang blo ni 'khrul pa yis/_/byang chub mchog 'di 
[\[187b.5\]]rtogs par mi nus so/_/rang gi bde ba thams cad spangs pa dang /_/'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad bzod pa dang /_/brtson 'grus brtsams shing rtag tu chos 'dod gang /_/de ni 'jig rten de 'dra'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas byang chub la ni bdag
