[\[187b.6\]]zhugs pa/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang lha rnams dpang btsugs te/_/ci nas bdag tshig log par mi 'gyur ba/_/de ltar sman slad spyod pa spyad par bgyi/_/byang chub sems ni bdag gis rmi lam thos/_/thos nas bdag ni byang chub mchog la zhugs/_/
[\[187b.7\]]de yi slad du sangs rgyas mi yi mchog_/ye shes ldan pa de 'dra bdag gis bgyi/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lhas btsa' zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi'am/_yid gnyis sam/_the tshom za 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]na rgyal po chen po khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lhas btsa' zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de yang de'i dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yin no/_/
[\[188a.2\]]rgyal po chen po khyod 'di skad du klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di yun ji srid cig na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhes zer ba de nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di ni bskal pa grangs 
[\[188a.3\]]med pa nyis brgyan bskal pa dpal gyi me tog ces bya ba la/_'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sgra grag pa zhes bya bar/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde 
[\[188a.4\]]bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dri ma med cing yongs su dag la yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa las byung ba'i rgyal 
[\[188a.5\]]po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sgra grag pa de ni rin po che sa yas spras par 'gyur te/_'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las grub pa rin po che sna tshogs du mas bris shing mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su rnam par phye la/_lag mthil 
[\[188a.6\]]bzhin du mnyam ste/_ka tsa lin di ka'i gos bzhin du 'jam zhing reg na bde la yangs shing tha gru che ste/_gling bye ba phrag 'bum dang ldan la/_'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_yid du 'ong ba ste/_lha dang mi mang po dag gis gang la/_
[\[188a.7\]]gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i lha rnams kyi nye bar spyad pa dang longs spyod ji lta ba bzhin du mi de dag gi yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sgra grag pa zhes bya ba de na rin po che thams cad las grub pa'i shing ta la'i phreng ba dag 'byung bar 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]'gyur te/_shing ta la de dag gi lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad las chos kyi sgo khrag khrig phrag 'bum mang po dag 'byung ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de na sgra ji snyed 'byung ba 'di lta ste/_lha'i sgra'am/_mi'i sgra'am/_mi ma yin pa'i sgra'am/_
[\[188b.2\]]sprul pa'i sgra'am/_bya'i sgra'am/_rlung gi sgra yang rung ste/_sgra de dag thams cad chos dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du zhi ba dang ldan pa dang /_rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa dang /_nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa dang /_dga' ba dang dben pa dang ldan pa 
[\[188b.3\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos dang ldan pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po dang ldan pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang /_skyo ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i lta ba dang ldan pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma 
[\[188b.4\]]med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang ldan pa'i sgra dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming chos kyi sgra grag pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams der lha dang mi gang dag skye ba de dag thams cad kyang 
[\[188b.5\]]chos kyi dga' ba'i zas kho na dang ldan par 'gyur zhing mngon par shes pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la the tshom med pa sha stag go/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dri ma med cing yongs su dag la/_
[\[188b.6\]]yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa las byung ba'i rgyal po de yang gang gi tshe chos ston par bzhed pa de'i tshe/_de nyid kyi sku las 'od 'gyed par mdzad de/_'od des sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de las kyang sangs 
[\[188b.7\]]rgyas bye ba phrag stong gsung ba'i chos ston pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de na lha dang mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de yang mthong la chos bstan pa de yang thos nas dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba chen po rgya cher skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dri ma med cing yongs su dag la/_yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa las byung ba'i rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa tshad med pa byas te/_rdzu 'phrul dang mngon par shes pa'i 
[\[189a.2\]]stobs kyis nam mkha'i dkyil na rin po che'i bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa'i pad ma dag la skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de yang nam mkha'i dkyil nyid na seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te lha dang mi de dag la chos ston to/_/de 
[\[189a.3\]]chos ston pa na phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa brgya stong dag chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can su yang chos la zhe 'gras pa med do/_/de na bdud sdig can dag dang gzhan mu stegs 
[\[189a.4\]]can dag gi sgrar gdags pa yang med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bcur 'gyur ro/_/de'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bgrang ba las 'das par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i bkod pa ni bsam 
[\[189a.5\]]gyis mi khyab bo/_/chos bstan pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/zhabs 'bring ba 'khor byang chub sems dpa' yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho lung bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[189a.6\]]la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni rgyu'i rjes su 'brang ba dang /_rnam par bsgrubs na 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid lags te/_de dag ni ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar rnam par 'grub pa lags so/_/bcom 
[\[189a.7\]]ldan 'das byang chub kyi spyod pa ni mtha' yas pa lags so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' ni ji srid du rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma bzung ba de srid du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i ji lta ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin te/_chos thams cad ni yid la byed 
[\[189b.2\]]pa las 'byung ste/_chos thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par 'grub bo/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces smras so/_/klu'i bdag po gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar sangs 
[\[189b.3\]]rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad 
[\[189b.4\]]ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po chos gang yang lung bstan du med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_klu'i bdag po sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyang lung bstan du med dam/_
[\[189b.5\]]klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos smras pa/_rgyal po chen po sems can du gdags pa ni phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams su zad la/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams ni lung bstan du med do/_/rgyal po chen po ming dang gzugs la sems 
[\[189b.6\]]can du gdags par zad la/_ming dang gzugs la lung bstan du med do/_/rgyu dang /_lta ba dang /_'du shes dang /_yid la byed pa las sems can du gdags par zad na/_rgyu dang /_lta ba dang /_'du shes dang /_yid la byed pa de la yang lung bstan 
[\[189b.7\]]du med do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par 'grub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang lung bstan du med do/_/rgyal po chen po chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin la/_stong pa nyid ni lung 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]bstan du med do/_/rgyal po chen po chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin la mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan 
[\[190a.2\]]nyid ni lung bstan du med pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi snying rje chen po 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_ming med pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i chos thams cad ming dang mtshan mas ston par mdzad la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[190a.3\]]'das rnams ni ming dang /_mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa can yang ma yin no/_/rgyal po chen po lung bstan pa 'di ni 'jig rten brda sprad par zad de/_'di la gang lung bstan par bya ba'i chos gang yang nang ngam phyi rol na mi dmigs so/_/
[\[190a.4\]]rgyal pos smras pa/_klu'i bdag po bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung bstan pa med dam/_smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bzod pa de yang skad cig pa/_zad pa'i mtshan nyid/_mi zad pa'i mtha' can/_yang dag pa'i mthar 
[\[190a.5\]]nges pa/_mnyam pa'i mtha' can/_gnyis su med pa'i mthar nges pa ste/_gnyis su med pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'o/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gtan du mi 'byung ba'i mtha'o/_/mtha' can gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_
[\[190a.6\]]gti mug rnams so/_/de'i mtha' can ni rnam par grol ba'i mtha'o/_/gang mtha' de'i sgor zhugs pa ni gang du yang mngon par zhen pa med do/_/gang mngon par zhen pa med pa de ni tha snyad kyi brda la chags pa med do/_/ma chags na grol bar 'gyur 
[\[190a.7\]]ro/_/grol na phyin cad mi rgyu rab tu mi rgyu'o/_/mi rgyu rab tu mi rgyu na gang du yang nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/blo ma nyams na thams cad las nges par 'byung bar mthong ste/_ji ltar rnam par mi mthong ba de ni de ltar yang mthong ngo /_/gang gi tshe rnam par mi mthong ba 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]de'i tshe gnyis su mi 'byed do/_/gnyis su med pa la gnas na mnyam pa nyid la 'jug go/_/mnyam pa nyid la zhugs na mtho bar yang mi 'gyur dma' bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/mtho ba yang med/_dma' ba yang med na mnyam pa nyid kyi chos kyis rab tu phye ba'i 
[\[190b.2\]]bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/_de la bzod pa gang yin pa dang /_lung bstan pa gang yin pa dang /_gang lung bstan par bya ba dang /_sus lung bstan pa dang /_ci'i phyir lung bstan pa'i chos de dag thams cad chos mnyam pa dang /_chos med pa'i chos 
[\[190b.3\]]kyi dbyings su nges pa dang /_brda med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_dngos po dang /_dngos po med pa dang bral ba dang /_gnyis su med pa'i mtha' can de dag gi don yongs su gzhal nas/_chos gang yang bgrang bar mi byed do/_/dper na 
[\[190b.4\]]nam mkha' ni bgrang du med cing bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa ste/_de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/_/klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' nyis brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 
[\[190b.5\]]gyur to/_/dge slong nyis brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i spobs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/
[\[190b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po 'di'i spobs pa ni ngo mtshar yang mi che la dka' ba yang ma yin gyi/_las dang po pa gang dag gis bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag_/mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ba 'di ni de dag gi ches ngo mtshar che 
[\[190b.7\]]ba dang /_ches dka' ba yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni de ltar mos par dka' ba ste/_de la ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'jug par mi 'gyur/_'gro bar mi 'gyur/_mos par mi 'gyur/_
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]yid ches par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/_rgyal po chen po rnam grangs 'dis kyang gang dag chos zab mo bstan pa 'di la mi skrag_/mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin par de ltar rig 
[\[191a.2\]]par bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang 'di ci snyam du sems/_skyes bu gang gis nam mkha' gzugs can ma yin pa bstan du med pa 'di gzugs can du ston par byed na/_ci de dka' bar byed pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mchog 
[\[191a.3\]]tu dka' ba lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu dka' ba lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chos 'di lta bur zab pa/_zab par snang ba/_tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad pa/_bdag med pa/_sems can med pa/_srog med pa/_gso ba med 
[\[191a.4\]]pa/_gang zag med pa/_rgyu ba med pa 'di la mos la mos nas kyang de kho na bzhin du sgrub pa gang yin pa de dag ni de bas kyang ches dka' ba byed pa yin te/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'thun pa'i dge ba dang /_grogs dang /_mdza' bshes 
[\[191a.5\]]yin no/_/de dag gis ni sems can rnams kyi phyin ci log spang ba'i phyir chos ston nus so/_/de dag gis ni byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug nas bdud kyi dpung bye ba phrag brgya byams pa dang /_shes rab dang /_ye shes dang /_brtson 
[\[191a.6\]]'grus kyis gzhom par nus so/_/de dag gis ni chos thams cad la dbang byed pa dang /_sems dpa' ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon sum du byed pa dang /_sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 
[\[191a.7\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus so/_/de dag gis ni sems can thams cad brda sprad pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa/_ji lta ba 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]bzhin du shes pas chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor bar nus so/_/de dag gis ni phas kyi rgol ba rnams tshar gcad pa dang /_mu stegs can thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang /_dgra thams cad tshar gcad pa'i phyir chos kyi dung 'bud nus so/_/de nas 
[\[191b.2\]]klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bsam pa grub cing brnag pa dang /_yid la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs te rang gis lung bstan pa thos nas bar snang la mngon par 'phags te/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/bdud rnams sde bcas 
[\[191b.3\]]dpung bcas nges bcom zhing /_/lta ba ngan pa'i tshogs kun bshig nas ni/_/thub pa chen pos chos kyi char phab ste/_/'jig rten thams cad bdud rtsis tshim par mdzad/_/khyod ni chos rgyal mi 'jigs stsol ba lags/_/'dam las rgal te 
[\[191b.4\]]'jigs med 'gram na bzhugs/_/'jig rten mig ste lam mchog ston pa po/_/skye bo skyabs ma mchis pa'i mgon po lags/_/sman pa'i rgyal khyod zug rngu 'byin pa yi/_/sman pa rga shi med pa'i sman stsol ba/_/ci nas phyin chad nad rnams mi 'byung bar/_/
[\[191b.5\]]nad dang rga bas gzir rnams gso mdzad pa/_/khyod ni ston skyabs bla ma gcig pu lags/_/gtan du bde ba sbyin pa khyod nyag gcig_/khyod ni ru skya 'dzin pa don dam mkhyen pa lags/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las ni zlog mdzad pa/_/lha yi lha ste 
[\[191b.6\]]'gro ba rnams kyi gtso/_/'jig rten kun gyi sgron mar gyur pa lags/_/khyod dang mjal na 'jig rten chu chen rgal/_/mi rnams kyi ni mi mchog khyod nyag gcig_/ye shes gzugs dang pha rol gnon pa yis/_/thub dbang khyod 'dra su yang ma mchis 
[\[191b.7\]]te/_/khyod ni lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad kyi/_/ston pa po ste thar pa'i lam mtshon lags/_/khyod ni thams cad zil mnan kun mkhyen mchog_/'jig rten chos rnams kyis ni khyod ma gos/_/kun mkhyen sred bral rnam grol dpa' ba dang /_/ye 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]shes mchog brnyes khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/ji ltar bar snang nam mkha' rnam par dag_/gzugs med gzung du ma mchis 'dus ma bgyis/_/de bzhin chos rnams dri med rnam par dag_/'jig rten rnam par 'dren pas rab tu bstan/_/
[\[192a.2\]]yod dang med par lta ba spangs nas kyang /_/rnam dag chos rnams bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/_/rkyen dang bcas shing rgyu dang bcas pa ste/_/sems can ma mchis gang zag srog ma mchis/_/gzod nas rnam dag nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/_/sgyu ma smig 
[\[192a.3\]]rgyu chu zla 'dra ba ste/_/shin tu dag pa nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/_/gnas pa ma mchis glog dang 'dra ba'i tshul/_/sngon gyi mtha' stong phyi ma'i mtha' yang stong /_/skye dang 'jig dang gnas pa'i ngo bo stong /_/'dir ni 'di dag dngos med dngos med min/_/'di 
[\[192a.4\]]dag thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis stong /_/chos dbyings rang bzhin ngo bo gang lags de/_/sems can khams kyi rang bzhin ngo bo lags/_/sems can khams kyi rang bzhin ngo bo gang /_/sangs rgyas chos kyi rang bzhin ngo bo de/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi 
[\[192a.5\]]rang bzhin ngo bo gang /_/de ni chos kun rang bzhin ngo bo nyid/_/chos kun rang bzhin ngo bo gang lags pa/_/sangs rgyas zhing gi ngo bo rang bzhin te/_/sangs rgyas zhing gi rang bzhin ngo bo gang /_/sangs rgyas byang chub rang bzhin ngo bo de/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rang 
[\[192a.6\]]bzhin ngo bo gang /_/de ni chos dbyings rang bzhin ngo bo nyid/_/chos rnams kun la rnam par dag pa 'di/_/gang tshe byang chub sems dpas de ltar mthong /_/de nas rgyal rnams ye shes dam pa yis/_/byang chub mchog tu de ni lung ston mdzad/_/chos rnams 
[\[192a.7\]]brda dang ming dang tha snyad tsam/_/mnyam pa lags te mi bden ming du btags/_/de dag sngon chad sus kyang ma thob ste/_/de dag gis ni ming rnams kun tu brjod/_/ming ma mchis par ming ni rnam par brtags/_/chos rnams stong ste rang bzhin rnam par 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]dag_/'jig rten 'du shes mkhas par rig nas ni/_/tha snyad tsam la kun tu spyad par bgyi/_/chos kun sgyu ma bzhin du rig nas kyang /_/mi bden snying po ma mchis rmi lam 'dra/_/rnam smin rgyu dang nying mtshams sbyor ba tsam/_/de la bden pa'i 'du shes yod mi 
[\[192b.2\]]bgyi/_/chos kun slu bar bgyid cing 'jigs pa lags/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ste mi bden pa/_/mgal me'i 'khor lo gzugs brnyan 'dra ba lags/_/rtag tu byis pa'i skye bo rmongs par bgyid/_/byis pas bdag dang bdag gir 'dir brtags nas/_/blun 
[\[192b.3\]]po sred pas gzir ba 'dir rmongs te/_/'khor ba'i 'khor los yongs su 'khor ba na/_/sdug bsngal gyis non zhi ba 'thob mi 'gyur/_/'gro ba'i 'jug pa 'di ni yang dag min/_/gang gi 'jug pa de ni ma mchis te/_/'tsho ba'i 'jig rten lta ba gti mug 
[\[192b.4\]]ldongs/_/rgyun du yang dang yang du sdug bsngal rnyed/_/lha rnams sdug bsngal 'chi 'pho'i chos gcig pa/_/mi rnams kyi ni sdug bsngal tshol khro lags/_/dmyal ba dag gi sdug bsngal gnod pa rnams/_/gcig la gcig 'tshal dud 'gro rnams kyi 
[\[192b.5\]]lags/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sdug bsngal 'di na bkres dang skom/_/'jig rten thams cad sdug bsngal rnams su nub/_/skyabs med gyur dang rten med gyur pa yi/_/'jig rten sdug bsngal thams cad gzigs nas ni/_/drang srong chen po thugs brtse thugs rje can/_/
[\[192b.6\]]sdug bsngal rnam par dgrol phyir 'byung bar mdzad/_/byang chub sems dpa' bskal mang bye bar yang /_/brtul zhugs brtan zhing pha rol phyin la brtson/_/srid ma mchis pa de 'dra mkhyen nas ni/_/'dam las rgal te sems can rnams kyang 'dul/_/gang tshe 
[\[192b.7\]]chos rnams gsog dang gsob tu gzigs/_/nam mkha' chang stong 'dra zhing snying po med/_/de dag bdag gi ngo bo ma mchis pas/_/bdag med dngos med dngos po med ma lags/_/mtha' rnams kun tu lta ba kun spangs na/_/byang chub rdul med rnam dag thob par 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]'gyur/_/skye dang rga dang gnod par bgyi ba gang /_/'chi dang gnas pa gang lags su yang med/_/gang 'dir skye dang rga dang na dang 'chi/_/shed las skyes dang shed bu de ma mchis/_/'di na bdag dang bdag gi ma mchis te/_/gang zag shes skyes 
[\[193a.2\]]shed bu yong ma mchis/_/'di [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]bdag po ma mchis dbang ma mchis/_/'tsho ba'i 'jig rten sgyu ma lta bur 'jug_/byed pa ma mchis tshor ba po ma mchis/_/'on kyang las mchis 'bras bu don ma mchis/_/'gro ba'i las kyi rkyen gyis rang bzhin 'byung /_/
[\[193a.3\]]phan tshun du ni rgyu la rten par 'dus/_/dge dang mi dge'i las gang bgyid pa dang /_/gang zhig bsgoms dang gang zhig mang du bgyis/_/yul nam mchis phyogs nam mchis te/_/ngo bo nyid stong 'on kyang rnam par smin/_/nang dang slad rol bar na mi gnas te/_/chos 
[\[193a.4\]]rnams gang du'ang 'phungs pa yong ma mchis/_/de dag gang la'ang rten pa ma mchis la/_/rnam par smin pa slu bar yong mi bgyid/_/skyes pa mi mnga' 'gag pa mnga' ma lags/_/mkhas pa rnams ni go bar bgyi slad du/_/nyan pa la ni smra bas tshig kyang bstan/_/
[\[193a.5\]]lta ba rnam par sbyang ba'i slad du bstan/_/gang gi 'du shes 'du shes can ma mchis/_/mya ngan 'das mchis su yang zhi ma mchis/_/skye ba ma mchis mtha' gang mtha' de lags/_/bdag gi bdag med mtha' ni nam mkha'i mtha'/_/kun gyi mtha' ni mtha' mnyam thob pa 
[\[193a.6\]]des/_/sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab dam pa 'thob/_/sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang ni/_/skye ba'i mtha' dang skye ba ma mchis mtha'/_/mtha' kun de ltar mnyam par mthong ba dang /_/chags med mtha' yi sgo shes ldan pa dang /_/dus gsum mtha' rnams la ni ma 
[\[193a.7\]]chags des/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi rigs mchog thob par 'gyur/_/'gro ba bcings las rnam par grol mdzad nas/_/zhi mchog mya ngan 'das pa brnyes par 'gyur/_/'gro kun rmi lam lta bur des gzigs nas/_/'dir ni ming dang gzugs la sems ma chags/_/chos kun 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]las ni rnam par dag pa'i mig/_zhi ba dang ni mi g.yo mi 'gul 'thob/_/chos rnams thams cad sgra med skad med pa/_/gzung du med cing dngos med rnam par dag_/de bzhin rgyal ba dam pa rnams kyi gdung /_/zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid de smon pa spangs/_/skyon med rims nad med cing mya 
[\[193b.2\]]ngan bral/_/spros kun nye bar zhi zhing bsam mi khyab/_/rgyal ba mchog rnams kyi ni chos 'di dag_/gzung bral rang bzhin sgra dang skad ma mchis/_/'gro la sman slad skyes bu dam pa yis/_/de yang yi ge rnams kyis gleng zhing bstan/_/gang gis 'jig rten bla mar rang 'byung 
[\[193b.3\]]mthong /_/mthong nas kyang ni yid la dad bgyid dang /_/khyad par 'gro ba'i chos kyang nyan pa yi/_/lha dang mi rnams rnyed pa legs par rnyed/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su chos 'di ni/_/'jig rten rnam par 'dren pas rab tu bstan/_/gang dag ma 'ongs sangs 
[\[193b.4\]]rgyas 'gyur ba rnams/_/thams cad kyang ni mnyam pa'i chos su 'gyur/_/sgra rnams thams cad brag ca tsam du bas/_/de ni brjod na rna bar grag par 'gyur/_/de ni tshul bzhin lam gyi rgyud 'gyur te/_/chos so 'tshal gyi slad du btags pa tsam/_/chos kun sgyu ma 'dra zhing 
[\[193b.5\]]gsog lags te/_/de dag sems can slad du rnam par phye/_/de dag rang bzhin ngo bo gang yin pa/_/de ni nams kyang rnam par dbyer mi rung /_/'jig rten na ni sangs rgyas chos rgyal mchog_/chos kyi dbang phyug kun rig kun mkhyen pa/_/ston pa de la slob na de bzhin 
[\[193b.6\]]du/_/'phags pa kun gyis de nyid don kyang rtogs/_/byung ba gang lags pa dang da ltar dang /_/ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba gang lags pa/_/thams cad la yang thub pa skyes mchog gi/_/ye shes 'jug ste thogs pa yong mi mnga'/_/skyes bu dam pa de yis de ring bdag_/
[\[193b.7\]]dogs ma mchis par byang chub mchog lung bstan/_/bdag ni 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/bdag la som nyi ma mchis dogs ma mchis/_/chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub ci nas yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir mdo sde 'di zung shig_/khyod kyi nang nas su dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag gzung 
[\[194a.2\]]bar spro/_de nas der byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri dang lha'i bu khri stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag 
[\[194a.3\]]gzung bar 'tshal lo/_/rgyas par yang bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyed kyis chos bsgrub pa ji lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di 'dzin par byed/_de nas der byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba 
[\[194a.4\]]des/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dam pa'i chos gzung bar 'tshal na/_ci bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar sgrub 
[\[194a.5\]]na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa yang dag pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par ltas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mtshams ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid du mthong na/_ci bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 
[\[194a.6\]]'dzin pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar sgrub na nga'i byang chub 'dzin pa yang dag pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' lta ba med kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang ma mthong /_slob pa'i chos dang /_mi slob 
[\[194a.7\]]pa'i chos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang ma mthong na/_ci bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no/_/byang chub sems 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]dpa' chos thams cad la khas 'che ba med par shin tu gnas pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rang bzhin ci yang ma 'tshal cing mi 'dzin na/_ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no/_/byang chub 
[\[194b.2\]]sems dpa' mig mi 'dzums kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag mig gis mi lta/_sems kyis mi gtod/_dran pa mi skyed na/_ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' brjod du 
[\[194b.3\]]med pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag chos kyang mi ston/_chos ma lags pa yang mi ston/_bdag las chos kyi sgra yang mi 'byung /_chos kyi 'du shes pa yang rtog par mi bgyid na/_ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de 
[\[194b.4\]]ni de bzhin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' ming med pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gang gi ming dang mtshan ma yang mi nyan lags na/_ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i 
[\[194b.5\]]mdzod kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas gang la 'dzin pa'i chos rnams dang /_chos ma lags pa rnams mi mthong na/_ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni de 
[\[194b.6\]]bzhin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' mi g.yo ba'i stabs kyis 'gro bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag chos thams cad la mi dmigs mi g.yo mngon par zhen pa ma mchis na/_ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin 
[\[194b.7\]]no/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'joms kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag sangs rgyas kyi yul la bdud kyi yul gyi rjes su mchis la/_bdud kyi yul la yang sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rjes su mchi na/_ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/_bka' stsal 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i stabs kyis 'gro bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi dbyings kyang 'byed par mi bgyid/_sems can khams la ma gtogs par yang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par mi 
[\[195a.2\]]bgyid na/_ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang chos ci yang mi dmigs la/_ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang chos kyi sgra 'byung na/_
[\[195a.3\]]ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun nas bsrungs pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang bdud kyi zhags pas kyang ma bcings la/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yang spyod 
[\[195a.4\]]na/_ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang chos thams cad rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyas yang dag par 'du ba dang /_rnam par grol 
[\[195a.5\]]ba'i ngo bo nyid ro gcig par 'tshal na/_ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no/_/lha'i bu mtshan bzang gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang skye yang skye la/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'byung 
[\[195a.6\]]ba yang mi 'dzin/_'byung yang 'byung la/_de sems dang yid du 'dogs par yang mi bgyid na/_ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu de ni de bzhin no/_/lha'i bu dri ma med pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang chos thams cad dri ma ma 
[\[195a.7\]]mchis pa dang /_snyigs ma ma mchis pa dang /_'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral bar rig nas/_rgyu las rnam par grol bar mi bgyid na/_ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu de ni de bzhin no/_/lha'i bu sems can sgrol gyis 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang sems can rnams kyang sgrol bar bgyid la/_bdag ma mchis pa yang 'tshal/_bsgral nas kyang 'dzud par bgyid la/_tshu rol dang pha rol gyi 'gram na yang mi gnas na/_ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu 
[\[195b.2\]]de ni de bzhin no/_/lha'i bu dbang byed kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang chos thams cad la dbang yang thob la/_chos gang yang skye bar yang mi bgyid/_'gag par yang mi bgyid na/_ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu de ni de bzhin no/_/
[\[195b.3\]]lha'i bu rgyal po bzang gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang sems can thams cad sems can mnyam pa dang /_chos thams cad chos mnyam pa dang /_zhing thams cad zhing mnyam pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas mnyam par rjes su song na/_ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin 
[\[195b.4\]]pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu de ni de bzhin no/_/lha'i bu legs par sems kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag chos ci yang mi sems shing spros par mi bgyid de/_mtshan mar mi bgyid na/_ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/_bka' stsal 
[\[195b.5\]]pa/_lha'i bu de ni de bzhin no/_/sring mo ud pa las gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lags par 'tshal la/_'on kyang bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya na/_ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/_bka' stsal 
[\[195b.6\]]pa/_sring mo de ni de bzhin no/_/bu mo mu tig phreng gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bud med kyi chos rnams kyang mi dmigs/_skyes pa'i chos rnams kyang mi dmigs te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang lags pa de bud med dang /_skyes pa'i chos 
[\[195b.7\]]rnams kyi mtshan nyid lags la/_chos de dag kyang chos kyang ma lags/_chos ma lags pa yang ma lags te/_de'i slad du 'di ltar bdag ni skyed par yang mi bgyid/_khas len par yang mi bgyid na/_ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_bu mo de ni 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]de bzhin no/_/bu mo rin chen gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang ma mthong la/_sems can thams cad kyi go cha yang bdag gis bgos/_de dag kyang gtan du bdag gis ma mthong na/_ci bdag 
[\[196a.2\]]dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_bu mo de ni de bzhin no/_/bu mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag chos thams cad la yang chos kyi 'du shes mi skyed la/_sems can thams cad la yang sems can gyi 'du shes mi skyed/_chos 
[\[196a.3\]]thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la rnam par mi rtog ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi khongs su yang chos thams cad 'dus par yang dag par mthong la/_de dag gi khongs su yang ma zhen par yang dag par mthong na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar brtson 
[\[196a.4\]]na/_ci dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bu mo khyod de ltar sgrub na dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa yang dag pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 
[\[196a.5\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos rnam par nges pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i bu mo rnams kyis 'dir rnam pa dang sgra dang brda sna tshogs kyis chos nyid de kho na glengs te/_chos gang dang yang 'gal bar mi bgyid la/_chos thams cad kyang byang chub dang mnyam pa nyid du ston pa ni ngo mtshar 
[\[196a.6\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka gzhan yang chos de ni de bzhin te/_bu mo 'di dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos rnam par nges pa ston pa la mkhas pa/_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_bzod pa thob pa sha stag go/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang 
[\[196a.7\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgyas par bstan pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can chen po dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer bsrung ba de dag la bstabs pa'i phyir khyod la gtad do/_/de ltar byas na khyod 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i mchog byas par 'gyur ro/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis gzung lags so/_/'di ni bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kho nas rgyas par bgyi'o/_/ma 'ongs pa'i 
[\[196b.2\]]sems can chen po de dag la yang bstabs par 'tshal lo/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bka' drin bsabs pa'i rngo mi thogs te/_'di ltar bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyis phan gdags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[196b.3\]]'das gzhan yang ci nas bdud dang /_phyir rgol ba nges par bcom nas 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du spyod par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon 
[\[196b.4\]]la yid la zung shig dang /_bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags kyi gzhi'i byin brlab ngas bstan par bya ste/_rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags kyi gzhi de dag gis bdud thams cad dang /_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyang shin tu 
[\[196b.5\]]tshar gcod par 'gyur la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sgron ma 'di yang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_a b+ha ye/_b+ha ya bi ga te/_b+ha ya bi sho d+ha ne/_a b+ha ya dA de/_ni ru pa dra be/_a nA ku le/_A ku la saM sho d+ha ne/_a gra he/_a bi bA de/_a kalpe/_a ts+yut+te/_shu b+ha te dze/_
[\[196b.6\]]te dzo ba ti/_ma hA te dze/_u pa shA me/_mai t+r+yung+ga te/_sho Sha ya mA ne/_sat+ya dar+Sha Ne/_a bi rud d+he sa hi ta ar+the/_ar+tha sid+d+he/_a mr-i ta ba te/_sA ga re/_sA ga ra ba ti/_a b+hi de/_badzra san+d+hi/_ak+Sha ye/_ak+Sha ta pra b+he/_dzA ti bi sho d+ha ne/_shud+d+he/_shud+d+he/_a ba b+hA sa ba ti/_sa ma pra yo ge/_sa ma tsi te/_a nut+ta re/_
[\[196b.7\]]bud+d+ha a d+hi Sh+ThA ne/_shI la bi sho d+ha ne/_an+ti kra ma Ne/_a saM hA r+ye/_ni gr-i hI taM mAr ba lam/_pa rA dza yo b+h+r-i Sh+Ti ga tA nAM/_dz+wa lnga nAM d+ha rmo lkA nAM/_saM gr-i hI tA na/_d+ha rma tA nAM/_ung+g+ha TI naM/_d+harma ni d+hA nAn/_kau shi ka rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di dag yin te/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir gsungs so/_/rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis ni rtsod pa'i bdag po bdud thams cad tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[197a.2\]]tshangs pa kun du snang ba zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi/_bcang bar bgyi/_rgyas par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das byas pa gzo ba dang /_byas pa tshor ba ni dkar po'i 
[\[197a.3\]]chos legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba las bsngags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo ba dang /_byas pa tshor ba rjes su dran zhing rjes su bsrung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di gzung bar bgyi/_yongs su 
[\[197a.4\]]bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu bsod nams 'phags kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bzung na/_bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[197a.5\]]kyis lha'i bu de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas spyan gyis phyogs bcu yi/_/zhing rnams ji snyed ngas mthong ba/_/de kun rin chen gang byas nas/_/mi gang sbyin pa sbyin byed la/_/gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i chos/_/snying nas yongs su 'dzin byed na/_/
[\[197a.6\]]de bas mi de'i bsod nams ni/_/shin tu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur/_/bskal pa'i bar du bzhugs nas ni/_/dpe rnams bstan pas bshad na yang /_/dam pa'i chos ni 'dzin pa yi/_/bsod nams zad par yong mi 'gyur/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na lha khrag 
[\[197a.7\]]khrig bdun cu rtsa drug gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' drug khri ni mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa skyes so/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug dang mtshan ma chen po 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad du rab tu g.yos par gyur to/_/'di lta ste/_shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/_nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/_lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/_byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/_dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/_mtha' mtho na dbus dma' 
[\[197b.2\]]bar gyur te/_g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos/_'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_kun tu rab tu 'gul/_ldeg_/rab tu ldeg_/kun tu rab tu ldeg_/'khrugs/_rab tu 'khrugs/_kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/_'ur 'ur/_rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu rab tu 'ur 
[\[197b.3\]]'ur/_chem chem/_rab tu chem chem/_kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/_/snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten khyab par gyur to/_/me tog gi char chen po yang bab bo/_/sil snyan dag kyang ma dkrol bar rang 'khrol zhing sil snyan dang /_glu'i dbyangs de dag las kyang sgra 'di 
[\[197b.4\]]lta bu byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs par byin gyis brlabs so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rnam par dkrug tu med pa'i tshul du chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas legs par btab bo zhes byung ngo /_/klu'i 
[\[197b.5\]]rgyal po rgya mtshos kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par mu tig gi char chen po phab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung la/_gzhan 
[\[197b.6\]]dag la yang rgyas par yang dag par ston cig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis gzung lags na/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i phyir 
[\[197b.7\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/klu'i bdag po'i gzungs kyi le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/rin po che kun las btus pa'i chos kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu dpal gyi gzi brjid dang /_rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang /_phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[198a.2\]]chen po de dag thams cad dang /_'khor de dag thams cad dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen 
[\[198a.3\]]po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_pradz+nyA bad+ma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_/[{D154}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sA ga ra nA 
[\[198a.4\]]ga rA dza pa ri prits+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen 
[\[198a.5\]]po na klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa na/_dge slong brgyad stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa rab tu 
[\[198a.6\]]mang po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[198a.7\]]thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'dus par mkhyen nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/_klu'i bdag po kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bskyod nas sems kyi dmigs pa sna tshogs kyis las rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]'du byed de/_de yis 'gro ba yang sna tshogs su gyur to/_/klu'i bdag po 'khor 'di dang /_rgya mtsho chen po 'di na gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa dang /_gzugs tha mal pa ji snyed snang ba la ltos/_klu'i bdag po 'di dag thams cad ni rang rang gi sems dang /_lus dang /_ngag 
[\[198b.2\]]dang /_yid kyi las dge ba dang mi dge ba sna tshogs su byas pas sna tshogs su gyur pa dag go/_/sems ni gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_gzung du med pa'o/_/klu'i bdag po 'di ltar thams cad ni bcos ma sgrub pas gnas pa'i mtshan nyid de bdag po med pa/_bdag gi 
[\[198b.3\]]med pa/_yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o/_/de dag ni las ji ltar bsags pas bsgrubs pa sna tshogs su byas pa dag ste/_'di la byed pa po gang yang med do/_/klu'i bdag po 'di ltar chos 'di dag thams cad ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do/_/
[\[198b.4\]]klu'i bdag po de la byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas chos thams cad bsgrubs pas gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shes nas dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba dag mngon par 'du bya'o/_/de dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya bar 'du byed na bsgrubs pas gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 
[\[198b.5\]]chos rnams kyis phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched gang dag mngon par 'grub pa de dag mdzes shing blta na sdug la gzugs bzang ba dag tu mngon par 'grub bo/_/klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsod nams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong las skyes 
[\[198b.6\]]pa mtshan rnams kyis ji ltar brgyan pa dang /_ji ltar bsgrubs pa dang /_dpal gyis lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas ma chags par bzhugs te/_gang na brgya stong phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba'i tshangs pa chen po 'di dag mog mog por gyur nas de bzhin 
[\[198b.7\]]gshegs pa'i sku la lta na yang mig zi zi por gyur pa la ltos/_klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi gzugs dang /_mtshan dang /_lus dang /_rgyan rnams la ltos/_klu'i bdag po de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba rnams kyis mngon par 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]'dus byas pas brgyan par bsgrubs pa'o/_/klu'i bdag po khyod kyi bkod pa 'di yang bsod nams thams cad las byung ba'o/_/klu'i bdag po brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_
[\[199a.2\]]lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa 'di dag gi bkod pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang bsod nams las byung ba'o/_/klu'i bdag po rgya mtsho chen po 'di na gang dag lus sna tshogs gzugs mi sdug cing 
[\[199a.3\]]dbyibs ma legs pa dang /_dbyibs legs pa dang /_lus rags shing che ba rnams dang /_gang dag lus phra zhing chung ba de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi sems dang /_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las dge ba dang /_mi dge bas sna tshogs 
[\[199a.4\]]su gyur pa dag go/_/klu'i bdag po de bas na las bdag gir bya ba las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/_las kyi skye gnas pa/_las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton par bya'o zhes klu'i bdag po khyed kyis de ltar slobs shig dang /_las bdag gir bya ba las kyi bgo skal la spyod 
[\[199a.5\]]pa/_las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa khyed dge ba'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba la blo 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/lta ba chud gson par byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/chad pa dang rtag par lta ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/khyed kyis sbyin pa'i gnas rnams mgu bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[199a.6\]]mgu bar byas nas kyang bsti stang byed par 'gyur ro/_/bsti stang byas pa'i rgyu las byung bas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsti stang byas par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po chos gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi ngan 'gro ngan song mi khom pa'i lam thams cad yang 
[\[199a.7\]]dag par gcod do/_/chos gcig po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ji ltar gyur cing nyin zhag rnams 'gro zhig gu snyam du dge ba'i chos rnams la rab tu rtog pa'o/_/de de ltar dge ba'i chos la rab tu rtog pa mang bas mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyi go 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]skabs mi 'byed do/_/de mi dge ba'i chos spangs te dge ba'i chos dang ldan pas bsam pa dag pa'i sems can 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_'phags pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang 'grogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i 
[\[199b.2\]]bdag po/_de la dge ba'i chos rnams gang zhe na/_dge ba'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa'i rtsa ba dang rten to/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rtsa ba dang rten to/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rtsa ba dang rten to/_/de la 
[\[199b.3\]]rtsa ba dang rten gang zhe na/_gang 'di dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams so/_/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_srog gcod pa spong ba dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_
[\[199b.4\]]tshig rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal pa dang /_brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba spong ba'o/_/'di dag ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam zhes bya ste/_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyi rtsa ba dang rten to/_/klu'i 
[\[199b.5\]]bdag po de la srog gcod pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos bcu 'thob bo/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dis sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa byin pa yin no/_/de'i sems sems can thams cad la byams par dmigs pa la 
[\[199b.6\]]gnas pa yin no/_/de'i zhe sdang gi bag chags yang dag par chad pa yin no/_/des nad nyung bar 'gyur bar sgrub pa yongs su bzung ba yin no/_/des tshe ring bar 'gyur ba'i sa bon btab pa yin no/_/de la mi ma yin pa rnams kyang srung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sbed par 
[\[199b.7\]]byed do/_/bde bar nyal zhing bde bar sad pa dang /_sdig pa'i rmi lam mi mthong ba yin no/_/de nyal ba na yang lha rnams srung bar byed do/_/de la shar gnyer ba med pa yin te/_shar gnyer ba'i bag la nyal med pa yin no/_/ngan 'gro thams cad kyis mi 'jigs pa dang /_
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]shi 'phos nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_klu'i bdag po srog gcod pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos bcu po de dag 'thob bo/_/srog gcod pa spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal 
[\[200a.2\]]te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_de dge ba'i rtsa ba des byang chub thob pa na sems kyi dbang gis tshe tshad med par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni yid brtan pa'i chos bcu 'thob bo/_/
[\[200a.3\]]bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_longs spyod che zhing de'i longs spyod de dag rgyal po dang /_rkun po dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_mi mdza' ba dang /_nye mtshams kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin no/_/skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong bas skye bo mang po dga' ba yin no/_/nye ba'i nyon 
[\[200a.4\]]mongs pa med pa yin no/_/nor 'brel pa rnams la yid brtan du rung ba yin no/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su de'i bsngags pa rjod cing de la pha rol gyi gnod pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad med pa yin no/_/de'i dge ba brjod pa'i sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa mngon 
[\[200a.5\]]par 'phags par 'gyur ro/_/bag tsha ba med par 'khor gyi nang du 'jug ste zhum zhum po med par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang /_stobs dang /_kha dog dang /_bde ba dang /_spobs pa dang /_longs spyod dang /_phyug pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de'i 
[\[200a.6\]]sems sbyin pa yang dag par 'ged pa la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/lus dang bral nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_klu'i bdag po de ltar ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni yid brtan pa'i chos bcu po de dag 
[\[200a.7\]]'thob bo/_/ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_de dge ba'i rtsa ba des de bzhin gshegs pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i ye shes can du rang gi mngon par shes 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni mkhas pas bsngags pa'i chos bzhi 'thob bo/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dbang 
[\[200b.2\]]po sdom pa dang /_rgod pa las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyis bsngags pa dang /_chung ma mi 'phrogs pa ste/_klu'i bdag po 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni mkhas pas bsngags pa'i chos bzhi po de dag 'thob bo/_/
[\[200b.3\]]'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_de dge ba'i rtsa ba des skyes bu chen po'i mtshan mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa 'thob bo/_/klu'i bdag po [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spangs pa'i skyes bu 
[\[200b.4\]]gang zag ni lha dang mis bsngags pa'i chos brgyad 'thob bo/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ud pa la'i dri 'byung bas kha yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyi tshad mar 'gyur ba dang /_lha dang mi dga' bas dbang gcig por 'gyur ba 
[\[200b.5\]]dang /_dbugs 'byin pas 'byung po rnams dogs pa med par 'gyur ba dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pas lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /_tshig 'khrul pa med pas mchog tu dga' ba mang bar 'gyur ba dang /_tshig gzung 
[\[200b.6\]]bar 'os pas ngag nyan par 'gyur ba dang /_shes rab thob pas lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ba yin te/_klu'i bdag po [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni lha dang mis bsngags pa'i chos brgyad po de dag 'thob bo/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spangs 
[\[200b.7\]]pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_de dge ba'i rtsa ba des bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po phra ma'i tshig spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni mi phyed pa lnga 'thob bo/_/lnga gang zhe na/_
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]'di lta ste/_gzhan gyi gnod pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad las shin tu 'da' bas lus mi phyed pa 'thob pa dang /_gzhan dag gi la chags pa med pas g.yog mi phyed pa 'thob pa dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pas dad pa mi phyed pa 'thob pa dang /_
[\[201a.2\]]sgrub pa snying por byed pas chos las mi phyed pa 'thob pa dang /_mi slu bas mdza' bo mi phyed pa 'thob pa ste/_klu'i bdag po phra ma'i tshig spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni mi phyed pa lnga po de dag 'thob bo/_/phra ma'i tshig spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang 
[\[201a.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_de dge ba'i rtsa ba des g.yog mi phyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur te/_bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor dbye bar mi nus so/_/klu'i bdag po tshig rtsub po spangs 
[\[201a.4\]]pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni ngag gi las yongs su dag pa brgyad 'thob bo/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste tshig ran pa dang /_phan pa'i tshig dang /_rigs pa'i tshig dang /_'jam pa'i tshig dang /_gzung ba'i tshig dang /_mnyan pa'i tshig dang /_skye bo mang po dga' ba'i 
[\[201a.5\]]tshig dang /_ma smad pa'i tshig yin te/_klu'i bdag po tshig rtsub po spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni ngag gi las yongs su dag pa brgyad po de dag 'thob bo/_/tshig rtsub po spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_de 
[\[201a.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba des de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i sgra skad bsgrags pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po tshig kyal pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni gcig tu nges pa gsum 'thob bo/_/gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshig ran pas mkhas pa rnams 
[\[201a.7\]]gcig tu nges par dga' ba dang /_lan legs par lon pas gcig tu nges par de'i blo bden pa la 'gro ba dang /_bcos ma ma yin par mdza' bas gcig tu nges par lha dang mi'i che ba nyid 'thob pa yin te/_klu'i bdag po tshig kyal pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]gcig tu nges pa gsum po de dag 'thob bo/_/tshig kyal pa spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_de dge ba'i rtsa ba des phyad par lung ston cing gzhan du mi gsung ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[201b.2\]]klu'i bdag po brnab sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni dbang po lnga 'thob bo/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dbang po ma tshang ba med pas lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems la dbang ba 'thob pa dang /_dgra thams cad kyis mi rdzi bas longs spyod dang dbang phyug la dbang 
[\[201b.3\]]ba rgya chen po 'thob pa dang /_bsod nams kyi dbang gis de'i sems longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa rgya chen po thams cad la 'gro ba dang /_dgab pa mchog 'thob pas rgyal po dang dbang pos mchod pa dang /_sngon phrag dog med pas longs spyod ji ltar smon pa rnams de 
[\[201b.4\]]las stong phrag brgya 'gyur du khyad par du 'gyur ba 'thob pa ste/_klu'i bdag po brnab sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni dbang po lnga po de dag 'thob bo/_/brnab sems spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_
[\[201b.5\]]de dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa gcig pur 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po gnod sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni yid bde bar byed pa'i chos brgyad 'thob bo/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de'i sems 
[\[201b.6\]]rnam par mi 'tshe ba la 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /_de'i sems gnod sems rab tu zhi ba la 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /_de'i sems rtsod pa med cing 'thab pa med pa la 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /_de'i sems drang zhing mnyen la des pa la 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /_'phags pa'i 
[\[201b.7\]]skye bor grags par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad la bde bar dga' zhing byams pa'i sems phan pa'i dngos po mang bar 'gyur ba dang /_bde ba la mngon par dga' zhing dad pa mang la skye bo mang pos bsti stang bya bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems snum zhing las su rung 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]bas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba 'thob pa mi dkon par 'gyur ba ste/_klu'i bdag po gnod sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni yid bde bar byed pa'i chos brgyad po de dag 'thob bo/_/gnod sems spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te 
[\[202a.2\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_de dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems thogs pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa blta bas mi ngoms par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po log par lta ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni yon tan gyi chos bcu 'thob bo/_/
[\[202a.3\]]bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bsam pa dge bar 'gyur zhing grogs po dge ba rnyed par 'gyur ba yin/_las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pas srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi byed pa yin/_lhar sangs rgyas 'dzin gyi gzhan lhar mi 'dzin pa yin/_ngo mtshar 
[\[202a.4\]]dang bkra shis dang bral bas lta ba drang ba yin/_grogs lha dang mi yin gyi dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa grogs su mi 'gyur ba yin/_bsod nams sbyangs pas khyad par du 'gro ba yin/_log pa thams cad med pas 'phags pa'i lam du zhugs pa 
[\[202a.5\]]yin/_'jig tshogs la lta ba dang bral zhing sdig pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin/_yang dag par song zhing yang dag par zhugs pas sgrib pa med par mthong ba yin/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du mi khom pa dang bral ba yin te/_klu'i bdag po log par lta ba spangs 
[\[202a.6\]]pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni yon tan gyi chos bcu po de dag 'thob bo/_/log par lta ba spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des de la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon du 'gyur te/_mngon 
[\[202a.7\]]par shes pa myur ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi rtsa ba dang rten to/_bzlog 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]na mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams te/_de dag shas cher bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas na sems can dmyal ba'i rgyu'o/_/'bring ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi rgyu'o/_/chung ngu ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyu'o/_/klu'i bdag po de la srog gcod pa bsten cing bsgoms 
[\[202b.2\]]te mang du byas na sems can dmyal bar khrid do/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/_/de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/_tshe thung ba dang /_nad mang bar 'gyur ba'o/_/ma byin par 
[\[202b.3\]]len pas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/_/de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/_longs spyod chung ba dang /_thun mong gi longs spyod du 'gyur ba'o/_/
[\[202b.4\]]'dod pa la log par g.yem pas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/_/de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/_g.yog 'khor yid brtan du mi 
[\[202b.5\]]rung ba dang /_'gran zla dang bcas pa'i chung mar 'gyur ba'o/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra bas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/_/de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par 
[\[202b.6\]]sgrub ste/_skur pa mang ba dang /_gzhan gyis slu bar 'gyur ba'o/_/phra mas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/_/de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par 
[\[202b.7\]]sgrub ste/_g.yog 'khor mi 'dum pa dang /_g.yog 'khor ngan par 'gyur ba'o/_/tshig rtsub pos ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/_/de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/_yid du mi 'ong ba thos pa dang /_thab mo'i tshig tu 'gyur ba'o/_/tshig kyal pas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/_/de nas 
[\[203a.2\]]gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/_gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig ma yin pa dang /_ma nges pa'i spobs par 'gyur ba'o/_/brnab sems kyis ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do/_/gshin rje'i 'jig 
[\[203a.3\]]rten du khrid do/_/de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/_chog mi shes pa dang /_'dod pa che bar 'gyur ba'o/_/gnod sems kyis ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do/_/gshin rje'i 'jig 
[\[203a.4\]]rten du khrid do/_/de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/_mi phan pa 'dod pa dang /_gzhan gyis gnod pa bya bar 'gyur ba'o/_/log par lta bas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do/_/
[\[203a.5\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do/_/de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/_lta ba ngan par ltung ba dang /_g.yo sgyu can du 'gyur ba'o/_/klu'i bdag po de ltar na mi dge ba bcu po 'di dag gis sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po tshad 
[\[203a.6\]]med pa yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po de la srog gcod pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na longs spyod che bar 'gyur/_longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang gzhan gyis gnod 
[\[203a.7\]]pa bya ba'i 'jigs pa las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na longs spyod che bar 'gyur/_longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar yongs su gtong ba can du 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pas bla na med pa'i chos rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na longs spyod che bar 
[\[203b.2\]]'gyur/_longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang chung ma mi g.yem par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang ma dang /_bu dang /_chung ma la su yang sdang ba'i sems kyis lta bar mi 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa 
[\[203b.3\]]byin na longs spyod che bar 'gyur/_longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang /_skur pa 'debs pa med par 'gyur ba ni nan tan srung bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed de yi dam la brtan par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po phra ma'i tshig spangs 
[\[203b.4\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na longs spyod che bar 'gyur/_longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang g.yog 'khor mi phyed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang bsam pa 'thun pas byang chub sems dpa'i g.yog 'khor 'thob bo/_/klu'i bdag po 
[\[203b.5\]]tshig rtsub po spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na longs spyod che bar 'gyur/_longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang /_gzung ba'i tshig tu 'gyur/_btsun pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang 'khor ma mgu bar su yang mi 'gro'o/_/klu'i 
[\[203b.6\]]bdag po tshig kyal pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na longs spyod che bar 'gyur/_longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang /_mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig tu 'gyur/_yid ches pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang the tsom thams 
[\[203b.7\]]cad gcod pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po brnab sems spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na longs spyod che bar 'gyur/_longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang /_longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa rgya chen po la de'i sems 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang rgya chen po la mos shing dbang che bar grags par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po gnod sems spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na longs spyod che bar 'gyur/_longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang /_mdzes 
[\[204a.2\]]pa dang skye bo mang po dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang thogs pa med pa'i blo dang /_thogs pa med pa'i sems dang /_dbang po ma tshang ba med par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po log par lta ba spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas 
[\[204a.3\]]sbyin pa byin na longs spyod che bar 'gyur/_longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang /_sangs rgyas la dad cing yang dag par lta ba'i khyim du skye'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang sangs rgyas la lta ba dang /_chos nyan pa dang /_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_
[\[204a.4\]]byang chub tu sems skyed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po de ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag sbyin pas brgyan na 'byor pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag nyid tshul khrims kyis brgyan na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi don 
[\[204a.5\]]du smon pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag nyid bzod pas brgyan na mtshan dang /_dpe byad bzang po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te brtson 'grus kyis brgyan na bdud phyir rgol ba 
[\[204a.6\]]bcom pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan gyis brgyan na dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang /_dga' ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyis brgyan na lta ba ngan pa thams cad 
[\[204a.7\]]yang dag par 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/byams pas brgyan na sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems su 'gyur ro/_/snying rjes brgyan na sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar 'gyur ro/_/dga' bas brgyan na zhum pa med pa'i sems su 'gyur ro/_/
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]btang snyoms kyis brgyan na rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spong bar 'gyur ro/_/bsdu ba'i dngos pos brgyan na sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pas brgyan na lus dang /_tshor ba dang /_sems dang /_chos la mkhas 
[\[204b.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par spong bas brgyan na mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas brgyan na lus dang /_sems yang bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po lngas brgyan na dad pa brtan 
[\[204b.3\]]pa dang /_brtson 'grus 'bar ba dang /_rmongs pa med pa dang /_sems las su rung ba la mkhas pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyis brgyan na rdzi ba med cing dbul ba dang nyes pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub 
[\[204b.4\]]kyi yan lag gis brgyan na chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/lam gyis brgyan na yang dag pa'i ye shes 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/zhi gnas kyis brgyan na nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/lhag mthong gis brgyan na chos 
[\[204b.5\]]thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa'i shes rab dang ye shes su 'gyur ro/_/thabs kyis brgyan na 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi bde ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po mdor na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag gis stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs 
[\[204b.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'thob pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 'thob pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar dag 'thob pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i bdag po de bas na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag 
[\[204b.7\]]rgya cher rnam par dbye bas brgyan pa'i phyir brtson par gyis shig_/klu'i bdag po 'di lta ste/_dper na sa la gnas pa'i grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad dang /_rtswa dang /_
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal thams cad dang /_las kyi mtha' thams cad dang /_sa bon gyi tshogs thams cad dang /_'byung ba'i tshogs thams cad dang /_lo tog thams cad skyed pa dang /_rmo ba brko ba 
[\[205a.2\]]bya ba 'byung ba de dag gi gnas ni sa yin no/_/klu'i bdag po de bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyang lha dang /_mir skye ba'i rten to/_/slob pa dang /_mi slob pa'i 'bras bu rnyed pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /_sangs 
[\[205a.3\]]rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rten yin pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar gyi rten yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[205a.4\]]dpa' de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//
[\[205a.5\]]'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_mu ne bar ma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la 
[\[205a.6\]]sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//[{D155}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sA ga ra nA ga rA dza pa ri pr-i ts+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tre/_bod 
[\[205a.7\]]skad du/_'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]gnas na/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/_klu'i 
[\[205b.2\]]bdag po chos kyi mdo bzhi po 'di dag brjod na gang dag brjod pas chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong brjod par 'gyur ba rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'du byed thams cad mi rtag par/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 
[\[205b.3\]]bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad sdug bsngal bar/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang /_chos thams cad la bdag med par byang 
[\[205b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa zhi bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa ste/_klu'i bdag po chos kyi mdo 
[\[205b.5\]]bzhi po 'di dag brjod na gang dag brjod pas chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong brjod par 'gyur ba rnams yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 
[\[205b.6\]]'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu 
[\[205b.7\]]chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]{D156}]rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a na ba tap+ta nA ga rA dza pa ri prIts+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[206a.2\]]'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu 
[\[206a.3\]]bzhugs te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas bskor nas mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa/_klu'i rgyal po 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang /_klu'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bskor te mdun du bdar 
[\[206a.4\]]nas sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs len cing klu'i mthu chen po dang /_klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams thogs te/_bcom ldan 
[\[206a.5\]]'das ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_
[\[206a.6\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/_gus pa dang bcas/_zhe sa dang bcas shing rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/'dug nas kyang thal mo sbyar te bcom 
[\[206a.7\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/klu'i bdag po khyod sems can rnams kyi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa la ci 'dra ba zhig yongs su dri bar 'dod/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[206b.2\]]bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi mchog_/sems can chen po/_skyes bu dam pa/_seng ge ltar rnam par rtsen pa'i sems can rnams kyi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren pa/_'jig 
[\[206b.3\]]rten gyi chos kyis ma gos pa/_spyod pa dang bsam pa rnam par dag pa/_phan pa'i dngos po la yang dag par zhugs pa/_gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyid pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs kyi shugs la yang dag par zhugs pa/_ngan 
[\[206b.4\]]pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs kyi smra ba yang dag par rab tu 'joms pa/_bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/_sems ma zhum pa/_brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha shin tu bgos pa/_yid yongs su mi skyo ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs dpag tu ma mchis pa bsags pa/_tshul 
[\[206b.5\]]khrims dang thos pas mi ngoms pa/_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/_tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba/_mthar lta ba gnyi ga dang bral ba/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul zab mo la rab tu zhugs pa/_
[\[206b.6\]]zab cing gting dpag dka' ba/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bgyid pa dang bral ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems ma bskyud pa/_bsam pa rdo rje ltar brtan te mi phyed pa/_blo zla ba ltar dri ma ma mchis shing shin tu dkar ba/_sems nam mkha'i dkyil dang mtshungs 
[\[206b.7\]]pa/_bskal pa grangs ma mchis par yid yongs su mi skyo bar 'dzin pa/_sems sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang mnyam pa/_gnod sems dang /_tha ba dang /_zhe sdang dang /_nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa/_stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la smon lam shin tu btab pa/_sgyu ma dang /_rmi lam dang /_mig yor dang /_brag ca dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu zla lta bu'i chos kyi tshul la shin tu zhugs pa/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi gdung rigs 'dzin pa/_chos 
[\[207a.2\]]kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang dang ba rab tu thob pa u dum bA ra'i me tog ltar 'byung bar shin tu dka' ba/_rtse gcig tu bgyid pa yid la bgyid pa ma 'dres pa rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bdag de bzhin gshegs 
[\[207a.3\]]pa la yongs su zhu bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bas kyang khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos la rab tu zhugs pa rnams dang /_sems can rnams kyi ched du bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu bar 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 
[\[207a.4\]]'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chos kyis rnam par rtsen pa/_rdo rje lta bu'i yon tan la 'jug pa/_spyod pa zab mo dang gzungs kyi sgo'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa bshad du gsol/_nyan thos gdul ba'i slad du bden pa bzhi rnam par gdon mi 'tshal 
[\[207a.5\]]ba la 'jug pa/_shes pa'i sgo la 'jug pa/_rang sangs rgyas gdul ba'i slad du brten pa'i chos la 'jug pa/_shes pa'i sgo la 'jug pa/_theg pa chen po pa gdul ba'i slad du chos thams cad la 'jug pa shes pa'i sgo la 'jug pa/_bdud kyi phyogs tshar gcod pa/_lta bar gyur pa 
[\[207a.6\]]thams cad rnam par 'jig pa nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba/_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rab tu shes pa/_so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa/_chos thams cad rab tu ston pa/_ji ltar mos pa bzhin chos las rnam par grol bar bgyid pa de byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[207a.7\]]rnams la phan gdags pa'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang dregs pa bcom pas ye shes kyi stobs can rnams 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]lags/_ji ltar na las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pas chos kyi stobs can rnams lags/_ji ltar na 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang chos kyi sbyin pa la ser sna ma mchis pas sbyin pa'i stobs can rnams lags/_ji ltar na rnam par smin pa la mi re bar bdog pa thams cad yongs su 
[\[207b.2\]]gtong ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na smon lam gyis yang dag par song zhing ngan song thams cad kun tu chad pas tshul khrims kyi stobs can rnams lags/_ji ltar na sems can sdang ba thams cad dang du len pa'i rang bzhin can pas bzod pa'i stobs can rnams lags/_ji ltar na lus dang 
[\[207b.3\]]srog la mi lta bas brtson 'grus kyi stobs can rnams lags/_ji ltar na rab tu zhi ba la gnas shing bsam gtan las ldog pa yang mkhas pas/_bsam gtan gyi stobs can rnams lags/_ji ltar na sdig pa'i lta ba rnams dang bral zhing ma rig pa dang gti mug gi mun pa dang 
[\[207b.4\]]bral bas shes rab kyi stobs can rnams lags/_ji ltar na sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i go cha 'tshal bas thabs kyi stobs can rnams lags/_ji ltar na lha'i mig dang lha'i rna ba dang pha rol gyi sems 'tshal ba dang /_sngon gyi skye ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[207b.5\]]gyi bgyi bas rnam par rtsen pas mngon par shes pa thob pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad cing tshig dang yi ge mi zad pas spobs pa'i stobs can rnams lags/_ji ltar na thos pa thams cad kun tu 'dzin pas gzungs thob pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na chos dkon mchog 
[\[207b.6\]]gcig la yang dag par gzhol bar bskyud pa ma mchis pa dang /_rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na sangs rgyas la lta ba rnam par dag pa la yang dag par gzhol bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bskyud pa ma mchis pa rnams lags/_chos la lta ba rnam par dag 
[\[207b.7\]]pa la yang dag par gzhol bas chos rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa rnams lags/_phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la yang dag par gzhol bas dge 'dun rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa rnams lags/_byang chub kyi sems ma bskyud pas tshul khrims rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa rnams lags/_
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]'jig rten gyi zang zing dang chos kyi sbyin pa la ser sna ma mchis pas gtong ba rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa rnams lags/_dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rjes su dran pas lha rjes su dran pa bskyud pa ma mchis pa rnams lags/_
[\[208a.2\]]de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 'di dag zhus nas de'i 'og tu tshigs su bcad de zhus pa/_'jig rten don rnams mdzad par rang byung ba/_/lhag pa'i bsam dang bsam pa ci 'dra dang /_/'jug pa'i spyod dang spyod pa ci 'dra ba/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bshad du gsol/_/
[\[208a.3\]]byams par sbyor dang snying rjer 'jug pa dang /_/dga' la 'jug cing btang snyoms sgom pa dang /_/bsam gtan rnam thar rnams la sbyor dag pa/_/de ni ma smad bdag la bshad du gsol/_/yang dag spong dang dran pa nyer gzhag dang /_/rdzu 'phrul stobs dang dbang po lam sgom dang /_/byang chub yan 
[\[208a.4\]]lag bden dang yang dag rig_/yon tan 'byung gnas rnams la bshad du gsol/_/sbyin dul sdom dang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs/_/bzod dang des dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang /_/shes rab thob pas rab tu rtogs pa rnams/_/ji ltar 'gyur de de dag bshad du gsol/_/mngon shes rig dang 
[\[208a.5\]]so so yang dag rig_/dran dang shes bzhin de bzhin bag yod dang /_/thabs dang ldan dang tshul ni rtogs pa rnams/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bshad gsol/_/dga' dang mchog tu dga' dang yon tan dga'/_/'phags pa'i sbyangs dang rigs dang nor bdun dang /_/dgon 
[\[208a.6\]]par gnas shing nyon mongs ma mchis gnas/_/ji ltar 'gyur de de dag bshad du gsol/_/ji ltar spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/gzungs la'ang shin tu rab tu gnas pa dang /_/rgyun mi 'chad par chos ni ston pa dang /_/bskyud pa ma mchis thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/zhi gnas rjes su 
[\[208a.7\]]'thun dang lhag mthong dang /_/shes rab zab dang shin tu blo yangs dang /_/ye shes mtha' yas rtogs pa mnyam med du/_/byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ji ltar 'gyur/_/bdud kyi stobs bcom shin tu thul bar dka'/_/ngan pa'i tshogs can pha rol smra ba 'joms/_/ri rab 'dra bar mi g.yo shin tu 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]'phags/_/dag pa'i sems can zla ba lta bur spyod/_/stong pa mtshan med smon med rnam grol dang /_/sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bur chos nges dang /_/'dus byas rmi lam ngo bo nyid mos pa/_/de ni ma smad bdag la bshad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[208b.2\]]stsal to/_/klu'i bdag po legs so legs so/_/klu'i bdag po khyod ji ltar sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu 'thun pa dang /_snying rje chen po ma btang ba dang /_gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa dang /_'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba dang /_sangs rgyas dang chos 
[\[208b.3\]]dang dge 'dun gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pas de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni yang legs so/_/klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di dag dang /_yon tan gyi khyad par gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur 
[\[208b.4\]]ba ngas khyod la bshad do/_/klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig dang ldan na rnam pa'i mchog thams 
[\[208b.5\]]cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su 'dzin to/_/chos gcig po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems so/_/de'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de yang rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis shin tu bsdus pa yin te/_sum cu rtsa gnyis
