[\[252a.3\]]can de dag thams cad kyang nges par tshe'i tshad du 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ma dros pa'i tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag brgyad cur 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ma dros pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni [(]baidUr+ya [,]bai DUr+ya [)]las grub par 'gyur te/_sa 
[\[252a.4\]]chen po de ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi pad mas khebs par 'gyur/_lha dang mi de dag gi longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyad pa dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba yang bsams pa tsam gyis 'byor bar 'gyur/_mi de dag thams cad mngon par shes pa 
[\[252a.5\]]lngas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/_dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pa ci 'dra bar mi de dag gi yang de 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can de dag gnyis kyis gnyis sbyor ba ma yin gyi/_de dag thams cad chos kyi dga' ba la 
[\[252a.6\]]dga' zhing mos par 'gyur/_nyon mongs pa rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de yang yongs su mi skyo bar chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar da ltar nga rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul thams cad kyis chos ston pa ltar de sha thang bar chos ston par mi 
[\[252a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/sems can de dag kyang chos brjod pa tsam gyis 'dul bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sa 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na lha dang mi rnams la chos kyi gtam gcig ston par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyin mtshan zhes so sor bgrang du 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]med par 'gyur/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ma dros pa de'i rang gi lus las 'od bkye bas thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de gsal bas khyab par 'gyur ro/_/de nas sems can de dag 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa chos 
[\[252b.2\]]kyi bka' mchid mdzad par 'gyur ro snyam du sems par 'gyur zhing de dag 'od des bskul ba dang /_chos nyan pa'i phyir nam mkha' las 'dong bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar de dag 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa de shing ta la bdun srid du/_steng gi bar snang la 
[\[252b.3\]]'phags te/_nam mkha' la gnas pa'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas/_sems can de dag la chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/de der 'dug pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad du snang bar 'gyur te/_dper na zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no/_/de na 
[\[252b.4\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa'i sems can de dag 'di snyam du ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de'i seng ge'i khri gnas med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang gnas med de nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid do snyam du sems par 'gyur te/_de dag de nyid kyis mngon par rtogs par 
[\[252b.5\]]'gyur/_bzod pa yang rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de ni rdo rje'i sgo la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston to/_/'di lta ste/_dper na rdo rje ni gang dang gang du bab pa de dang de dag 'joms so/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs 
[\[252b.6\]]pa de'i chos bstan pa yang bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang ba thams cad 'joms so/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ma dros pa de gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par 'phags zhes bya ba 'di nga'i 'og tu de bzhin 
[\[252b.7\]]gshegs pa kun du snang ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang 'di 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur ro/_/zhes byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par 'phags pa lung bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i bu rtag tu dad 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]pa thob ces bya ba des nor bu rin po che'i gdugs rin po ches spras pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo/_/phul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par 'phags zhes 
[\[253a.2\]]bgyi bar 'gyur ba de gang lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po'i bu rtag tu dad pa thob kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par 
[\[253a.3\]]'phags zhes bya bar 'gyur ba de gzhan yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo klu'i rgyal po'i bu rtag tu dad pa thob pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i tshe dus na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par 'phags zhes bya bar 'gyur 
[\[253a.4\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das ma dros pa de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan cing rnam par dag pa'i lam gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[253a.5\]]'di mthar phyin pa'i dus shes nas phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am 
[\[253a.6\]]ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas mngon par dga' ste stan las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshul bzhin du mchod de/_rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo /_/de nas 
[\[253a.7\]]klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa bu dang bcas/_chung ma dang bcas/_gnyen dang 'khor du bcas te klu'i rgyal po lha srung du mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzhal med khang rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa yang mngon par sprul te/_bcom ldan 'das der bzhugs su gsol nas/_
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par bkod de rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du song ste/_des bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bya rgod phung po'i ri la 
[\[253b.2\]]bskyal nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/gsol pa/_bdag gis gzung lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[253b.3\]]kun dga' bo de'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i lam gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'khor bzhi po dag la rgyun mi 'chad par ston cig_/de ltar na khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i gnas nas bya rgod phung po'i ri la 
[\[253b.4\]]gshegs so zhes rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyis thos nas de dag thams cad dad pa thob ste/_lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de dag de ltar phyin pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par dag pa'i lam gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[253b.5\]]'di nyid las brtsams te/_de lta de ltar chos bstan nas 'khor de las srog chags khris byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/srog chags lnga stong ni chos la chos kyi mig skyes so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_nyan 
[\[253b.6\]]thos chen po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo 
[\[253b.7\]]rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_ban de ye shes sde dang /_yi ge pa dgon gling rma la sogs pas zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]{D157}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya dru ma ki nan ra rA dza pa ri prIts+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa mi[(] [,)]'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 
[\[254a.2\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na ri bya rgod kyi phung po la dge slong drug khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phal cher phyogs bcu'i 
[\[254a.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa bdun khri nyis stong thams cad kyang mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/_gzungs rab tu thob pa/_spobs pa chags pa med pa/_ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/_dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pa dang /_mos pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa 
[\[254a.4\]]dang /_khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa/_bsam pa rdo rje ltar brtan zhing mi phyed pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa/_lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par du 'phags pa la zhugs pa/_bdag nyid byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor ba/_sems 
[\[254a.5\]]can gzhan byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/_sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_sdom pa dang /_des pa dang /_bzod pa dang /_sdug pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /_yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa/_lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems 
[\[254a.6\]]dang /_tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa/_sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang /_bzod pa dang /_des pa'i stobs kyi go cha shin tu bgos pa/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag grangs med par brtson 'grus shin tu brtsams pa/_bsam 
[\[254a.7\]]gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rol pa/_tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba la spobs pa chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang /_ye shes la mkhas pa/_ri rab kyi ri ltar 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]sems g.yo ba med pa/_sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_ri ltar rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba dang bral ba byams pa chen po la gnas te 'od zer thogs pa med pa/_snying rje chen po la gnas te sems can thams cad kyi bya ba gcig la brtson pa/_dga' 
[\[254b.2\]]ba chen po la gnas te chos la dga' zhing mgu ba dang ldan pa/_btang snyoms chen po la gnas par brtson pa/_gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/_'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang /_ma rnyed pa dang /_grags pa dang /_ma grags pa dang /_
[\[254b.3\]]bstod pa dang /_smad pa dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal las rab tu 'das pa/_pha rol rgol ba ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad kun du rab tu 'joms pa/_bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/_u dum bA ra'i me tog mthong ba ltar shin tu 'byung bar dka' 
[\[254b.4\]]ba/_gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa/_rab tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa/_seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo dang mi 'jigs pa sgrogs pa/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[254b.5\]]pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa/_mi 'khrugs par phyad par lung ston pa/_ji ltar smras pa/_de bzhin byed pa/_de kho na'i chos kyi tshul la brtson pa 'od kyis nyi ma dang zla ba mog mog por byed pa/_phyogs bcur sgra bsgrags pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sems pa/_
[\[254b.6\]]chos dkon mchog gi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi gcod par yid la byed pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa 'da' ba la mkhas pa/_shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa gnas pa'i blo dang ldan pa mthong ba dang /_thos 
[\[254b.7\]]pa don yod pas rnam par gnon pa/_rtag par rgyun du sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la brtson pa/_shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa'i mchog thob pa/_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas ci rigs par chos ston pa/_
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la lta ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa/_sems can thams cad kyi 'jug pa dang btags pa la bde blag tu mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs pa med pa/_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_nyon mongs 
[\[255a.2\]]pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i bsod nams dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[255a.3\]]smon pa med pa'i chos thams cad la mos pa la/_smon pa med pa sems can dang /_chos thams cad sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_rmi lam dang /_chu zla dang /_mig yor dang /_brag ca dang /_nam mkha' dang mtshungs par mos pa/_sgra skad thams cad nges pa'i 
[\[255a.4\]]tshig gis ston pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/_chos dang /_don dang nges pa'i tshig dang /_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po mngon sum du gyur pa/_shugs chen po 'dzin pa'i stobs bcu la nye bar gyur pa/_
[\[255a.5\]]sha'i mig dang /_lha'i mig dang /_shes rab kyi mig dang /_chos kyi mig dang /_sangs rgyas kyi spyan snang ba thob pa/_lam gyi yan lag gi tshogs shin tu bsags pa'i lam thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod snang ba la 
[\[255a.6\]]'jug pa'i cho ga shes pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/_mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/_rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/_chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pa/_chos 
[\[255a.7\]]dkon mchog gi sgron ma 'dzin pa/_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la rnam par lta ba/_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa la rnam par lta bar mkhas pa/_sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi bya bas so sor nye bar gnas pa rnam 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i yon tan rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_bskal pa thams cad du bsngags pa yongs su brjod kyang mthar mi phyin pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed dang /_dga' 'byung dang /_
[\[255b.2\]]lag na rin po che dang /_rin chen me tog dang /_rin po che'i tog dang /_mthong dga' dang /_mig gis mthong dga' dang /_mdzes pa'i blo gros dang /_dga' zhing mchog tu dga' byed dang /_sa 'dzin dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_mthu chen thob dang /_
[\[255b.3\]]dpal chen dang /_bdud thul dang /_me tog man dA ra ba'i dri dang /_rlung lha dang /_bden dga' dang /_mnyam lta dang /_ri rab rtse 'dzin dang /_ri rab brtsegs dang /_ri rab mchog dang /_dra ba can gyi 'od dang /_rgyal ba'i blo gros dang /_skye bar tshim byed 
[\[255b.4\]]dang /_'gro ba 'dzin dang /_lha'i rgyal pos mchod dang /_mchog gi blo gros dang /_thogs med sems dang /_skya ring blo gros dang /_mi skyob pa dang /_dpag med rin chen mdzod dang /_'od kyi tog dang /_'od dpal dang /_sgron ma'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub blo gros dang /_
[\[255b.5\]]'od kyis yang dag brgyan dang /_sna tshogs me tog dang /_lha'i rgyal po dang /_lha'i tshul gyis lta ba dang /_dpung bzang dang /_legs par bsam pa sems pa dang /_'khor lo rab gnas rkang pa dang /_mi g.yo rkang pas rnam par gnon dang /_rdo rje'i rkang pas rnam par 
[\[255b.6\]]gnon dang /_rkang pas 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon dang /_dga' spobs dang /_spobs myur dang /_spobs pa mi 'chad pa dang /_spobs pa byin gyis brlabs dang /_'jam sgra dang /_sems can thams cad tshim byed dang /_tshangs dbyangs dang /_bzang skyong 
[\[255b.7\]]dang /_rin chen 'byung gnas dang /_ded dpon bzang po dang /_mis byin dang /_chu lha dang /_byams pa dang /_'jam dbyangs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_de las gzhan pa lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' 
[\[256a.2\]]lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[256a.3\]]chen po lha'i cod pan zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus pa des/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po de 'dus par rig nas stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan 
[\[256a.4\]]gsum bskor ba byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/'jig rten 'das pa 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad/_/khyod ni 
[\[256a.5\]]'jig rten don mdzad blo gros ldan/_/snang ba brnyes shing nyon mongs dri bsal ba/_/'jig rten snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sbyin la dgyes shing stobs bcu mchog mnga' ba/_/dul ba 'dul ba gdul ba'i pha rol phyin/_/bcom ldan lha dang mi dang klus mchod pa/_/gdul 
[\[256a.6\]]ba'i mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mtshan mchog 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad pa/_/'dom gang 'od ni gser gyi kha dog lta/_/dge ba'i mtshan gyi dam pa'i gzugs mnga' ba/_/srid gsum mtshungs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/pha rol phyin pas gzhan gyi 
[\[256a.7\]]tshogs 'joms shing /_/pha rol rgol ba'i rgol 'joms mi g.yo ba/_/sems can gzhan gyi sems dang spyod la mkhas/_/thugs rje mchog mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dgra bcom rgyal po nyon mongs rdul bsal ba/_/'tsho ba dag cing brtul zhugs tshul khrims 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]gnas/_/lha yi lha mchog dri med dri ma bral/_/pha rol tshogs 'joms khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bde gshegs rin chen mchog tu dga' mdzad pa/_/dgon par rtag gnas rtag tu dgon par dgyes/_/rdul skyon gti mug rnyog pa mi mnga' ba/_/nam mkha' mnyam thugs 
[\[256b.2\]]khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chu bo bzhi rgal bden bzhi bka' mchid gsung /_/mig sbyin bdud rtsi chos kyi bka' mchid can/_/'gro ba'i don mdzad 'jig rten gsum rgyu ba/_/'khor lo zhabs mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha dang mis mchod pa yi mthu bo che/_/mgon 
[\[256b.3\]]po lha yi dbang po bdun 'joms pa/_/mi dang lha klu tshogs kyis mnod pa yi/_/mi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rtag tu bde sdug dam pa'i chos la dgyes/_/mnyam thugs 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i thugs/_/chos la mnyam gnas mi rnams kha lo sgyur/_/
[\[256b.4\]]yon tan mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnam par dag dang ldan/_/tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs lta bur 'jam pa'i gsung /_/thams cad dbyangs kyi yan lag gsung tshul rdzogs/_/bden pa snyan gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/stong pa mtshan ma med 
[\[256b.5\]]cing smon dang bral/_/zab mo blta dka' shin tu rtogs par dka'/_/thar la 'jug par mkhas pa blo gros ldan/_/thar pa'i lam dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyu la rten pa mkhas pa'i bcom ldan 'das/_/mtha' gnyis lta ba rtag tu mi mnga' ba/_/las kyi rnam 
[\[256b.6\]]smin 'bras bu kho na gsung /_/lta ba'i mun bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang nas ma byon gang du'ang gshegs ma lags/_/rtag tu dben pa'i chos rnams rab gsung ba/_/smig rgyu rgyu bzhin nga yi mi mnga' ba/_/dge ba'i chos tshul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/skye ba mi 
[\[256b.7\]]skye gang du'ang skye ma lags/_/skye dang 'jig dang gang du'ang mi bas pa/_/chos kyi gnas nyid ji lta'i gnas la gnas/_/gnas la mi gnas rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin kho na de bzhin yang dag gsung /_/rtag tu mi g.yo de bzhin nyid la bzhugs/_/ri rab rgyal mtshan 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]rdo rje 'dra ba'i sku/_/mi g.yo ri rab mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sku ni dben zhing mnyam thugs blo ldan pa/_/grags pa mtha' yas 'jig rten gsum grags pa/_/skyes bu mchog la zhu ba zhus pa rnams/_/'jig rten zla bas myur du skabs dbyer 
[\[257a.2\]]gsol/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis zhus pa lung 
[\[257a.3\]]bstan pa'i slad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skabs dbye bar gnang na bcom ldan 'das la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[257a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_ngas dri ba dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems 
[\[257a.5\]]rangs par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[257a.6\]]'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos zab mo rnam par gdon mi za ba la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams 
[\[257a.7\]]cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma lags pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so so ci rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la sems kyi bsam pa mnyam 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]zhing spyod pa shes pa la 'jug par mkhas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyu dang dbye ba dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la brjed pa ma mchis par spyod pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i rgyan gyis 
[\[257b.2\]]brgyan pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 
[\[257b.3\]]rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams lags/_
[\[257b.4\]]ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na 
[\[257b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la mtshungs par spyod par yang rnam par mi rtog pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la yang lta la mya ngan las 'das pa 
[\[257b.6\]]la yang mi gnas pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khams sna tshogs la yang rnam par lta la chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' don yang mi 'dor la gnod par yang kun du gda' ba rnams lags/_
[\[257b.7\]]ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi nor dang ldan la thabs kyis nor ma mchis pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' a zhes bgyi ba'i sgos rnam pa ma mchis pa'i sgor 'jug pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam par gdon mi za ba rnams la rnam par phye ba shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang 
[\[258a.2\]]'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis bltar mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba 
[\[258a.3\]]rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shin tu dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams blangs pa ma mchis par slob dpon rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad 
[\[258a.4\]]kyi ston par gyur pa rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor ba rnams lags/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams lags/_de skad 
[\[258a.5\]]ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten 
[\[258a.6\]]la snying brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che'i don dang /_lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /_rigs kyi bu khyod da ltar gyi dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams rjes su gzung ba dang /_theg pa chen po 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/_rigs 
[\[258a.7\]]kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la gang don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dngangs khyod la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]chen po lha'i cod pan bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na spobs pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[258b.2\]]sems can thams cad la 'od zer thogs pa med pa rnams rin po che dang sdug pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong zhing yid 'gyod pa med pa rnams yin/_chos smra ba gzhan dag gis bshad pa mi zlog cing rjes su yi rang ste dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_dang 
[\[258b.3\]]ba dang mchog tu dga' ba thob nas legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa dang /_chos mnyan pa'am/_chos bgro ba'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi phyir ram/_mtshan mo 'dug par bskul na mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i 
[\[258b.4\]]bsam pa dang /_zang zing med pa'i sems kyi chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na spobs pa sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na chos zab mo rnam par gdon mi 
[\[258b.5\]]za ba la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang rjes su 'thun pa dang /_bdag gi rang bzhin ltar sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa dang /_'du byed thams cad gar yang mi 'gro/_gang nas kyang ma 'ongs 
[\[258b.6\]]par rab tu shes pa dang /_chos thams cad nam mkha'i phyag rgyas btab par mos pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na chos zab mo rnam par gdon mi za ba la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems 
[\[258b.7\]]dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i sgo mngon sum du gyur pa dang /_mngon par shes pas rnam 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]par rtse ba shes pa dang /_sems las su rung zhing ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang /_mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs 
[\[259a.2\]]kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na so so ci rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang /_sems can gzud pa shes pa dang /_chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i shes pa dang /_bdag 
[\[259a.3\]]gis sems sbyangs pas sems can thams cad kyi sems sbyangs par rab tu shes pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na so so ci rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang 
[\[259a.4\]]ldan na sems can thams cad la sems kyi bsam pa mnyam zhing spyod pa shes pa la 'jug par mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_shes rab kyi 'dzud pa dang /_ye shes chags pa med pa dang /_thabs kyis zhugs pas sgrib pa thams cad rgyun bcad pa dang /_blo shin 
[\[259a.5\]]tu sbyangs pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na sems can thams cad la sems kyi bsam pa mnyam zhing /_spyod pa shes pa la 'jug par mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na rgyu dang /_bya ba dang 
[\[259a.6\]]las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug par shes pa la brjed pa med par spyod pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_chad par smra ba ma yin pa dang /_rtag par smra ba ma yin pa dang /_rgyu dang bya ba dang las kyi 'bras bu la yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa dang /_chos la chos 
[\[259a.7\]]nyid du byed cing chos la chos su smra'i 'di la bdag dang bdag gir mi smra ba ste/_de ltar bya ba la 'jug pas rgyu dang bya ba dang /_las kyi 'bras bu ma rung bar mi byed pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/_rgyu dang bya ba dang las kyi rnam par smin pa 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]la 'jug pa shes pa la brjed pa med par spyod pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sbyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa rnams yin/_dpe byad bzang pos rnam par spras 
[\[259b.2\]]pa rnams yin/_gzugs lta bas mi ngoms pa rnams yin/_lag na rin po che thob pas longs spyod mi zad pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na sbyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi 
[\[259b.3\]]dang ldan na/_tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin du 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag 
[\[259b.4\]]po tshangs par 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang /_ngan 'gro thams cad yang dag par bcad nas lha dang mir skye ba yongs su bzung bar gyur cing byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na tshul 
[\[259b.5\]]khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bzod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_tshangs pa'i skad dang sgra dbyangs lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yin/_ka la ping ka'i sgra dang /_
[\[259b.6\]]rnga sgra lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yin/_skye bo mang pos mthong na sdug cing yid du 'ong ba rnams yin/_dge ba'i chos rnams la yi dam la brtan pa rnams yin te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na bzod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par 
[\[259b.7\]]bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par rig par bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par bya ba'i chog shes pas dge ba'i chos rnams la yi dam la brtan pa rnams yin/_pha rol gyis mnan 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]pa med pas rdo rje'i lus rab tu thob pa rnams yin/_bya ba ci yod ces bya ba la mos pas gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa rnams yin/_thos pa'i tshogs bsags pas mi ngoms pa'i phyir yid yongs su mi 
[\[260a.2\]]skyo ba rnams yin te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/_brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no/_/
[\[260a.3\]]bzhi gang zhe na/_mi rgod pa rnams yin/_ma khengs pa rnams yin/_mu cor smra ba med pa rnams yin/_cang shes kyi sems mi 'dor ba rnams yin te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin 
[\[260a.4\]]no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na shes rab kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag dang sems can dang /_srog dang gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag tu smra ba med pa rnams yin/_spobs 
[\[260a.5\]]pa chags pa med pa rnams yin/_tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/_chos thams cad la som nyi med cing the tsom dang bral ba rnams yin te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na shes rab kyi rgyan 
[\[260a.6\]]gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pa dang /_
[\[260a.7\]]sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs pa'i snying rje chen po dang /_chos thams cad la dga' bas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dga' ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyir mngon par bsgrubs pa'i btang snyoms te/_rigs 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bsam gtan bzhi 
[\[260b.2\]]sdud pa'i shes pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgrubs pa'i thabs shes pa dang /_rang gis sems la dbang sgyur ba'i chos shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas la blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems 
[\[260b.3\]]dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nang nye bar zhi ba dang /_phyi rol du mi rgyu ba dang /_
[\[260b.4\]]chos thams cad la sgyu ma lta bu rab tu rtog pa'i shes pa dang /_ye shes kyi stobs can yin gyi nyon mongs pa'i stobs can ma yin pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub 
[\[260b.5\]]sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na rgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod pa'i chu bo yang rab tu shes la 'dod chags dang bral ba yang mngon sum du mi byed pa dang /_srid pa'i chu bo yang rab tu shes la bsams bzhin 
[\[260b.6\]]du yang skye ba dang /_lta ba'i chu bo yang rab tu shes la lta ba'i bcing bas bcings pa yang mi 'dor ba dang /_ma rig pa'i chu bo yang rab tu shes la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rjes su 'thun par yang byed pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang 
[\[260b.7\]]ldan na rgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la mtshungs par spyod pa yang rnam par mi rtog 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu yongs su bsgrubs pa dang /_chos thams cad rnam par bsgrubs pas so sor nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shin tu brtags pa dang /_mngon par shes pa 
[\[261a.2\]]lngas rnam par rtse ba shes pa dang ldan pa dang /_yid kyi lus mngon par bsgrubs pa la mkhas pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang 
[\[261a.3\]]ston la mtshungs par spyod par yang rnam par mi rtog pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na 'khor ba la yang lta la mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mi gnas pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas 
[\[261a.4\]]kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_snying rje chen po'i sems dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang /_sngon gyi yi dam mi 'dor ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na 'khor ba la yang lta la mya ngan las 'das pa yang mi gnas pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi 
[\[261a.5\]]bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na khams sna tshogs la yang rnam par lta la chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can rang bzhin med pas chos rang bzhin med par rtog pa dang /_chos rang bzhin med pas sems 
[\[261a.6\]]can rang bzhin med par rtog pa dang /_sems can rang bzhin med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rang bzhin med par mos pa dang /_sems can rang bzhin med pa la som nyi med cing the tsom dang bral ba yin te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na khams sna 
[\[261a.7\]]tshogs la yang rnam par lta la chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na don yang mi 'dor la gnod par yang kun du snang ngo /_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bsam pa mya ngan las 'das par song ba rnams yin/_
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]sbyor ba 'khor bar song ba rnams yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bskang ba la bsam pa song ba rnams yin/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi yul la yang kun tu snang ba rnams yin te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan 
[\[261b.2\]]na don yang mi 'dor la gnod par yang kun du snang ngo /_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bsod nams kyis nor dang ldan la thabs kyis nor med pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rgya chen po la mos pa'i sems can 'dul ba'i 
[\[261b.3\]]phyir bsod nams kyis 'khor los sgyur ba dang /_brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyang nye bar ston pa dang /_'gro ba phal pa 'dul ba'i phyir dbul zhing dman par yang nye bar ston pa dang /_slong ba mthong na bdog pa thams cad gtong zhing /_nor med par 
[\[261b.4\]]yang 'gyur ba dang /_nor chen po dang ldan pa mthong na bsod nams kyis longs spyod zad mi shes par yang nye bar ston pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na bsod nams kyis nor dang ldan pa yin la/_thabs kyis nor med pa rnams 
[\[261b.5\]]yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na a zhes bya ba'i sgos rnam pa med pa'i sgo la 'jug pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'du byed thams cad mi rtag par shes pa sbyong ba dang /_'du byed thams cad gzod ma nas sdug 
[\[261b.6\]]bsngal lo zhes byang chub rab tu rnyed pa dang /_chos thams cad bdag med do zhes lta bar gyur pa yongs su sbyong ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa ni gzod ma nas zhi ba zhes ye shes la 'jug pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/_a 
[\[261b.7\]]zhes bya ba'i sgos rnam pa med pa'i sgo la 'jug pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ba yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi mig shin tu rnam par dag pa rnams yin/_
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]chos kyi mig gis snang ba thob pa rnams yin/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan mngon sum du gyur pa rnams yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[262a.2\]]chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/_chos rnam par gdon mi za ba rnams la rnam par phye ba shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_so so yang dag par 
[\[262a.3\]]rig pa shes pa sgrib pa med pa dang /_bden pa bzhi rnam par dgod pa shes pa dang /_rton pa la gnas su shes pa dang /_gzungs la g.yeng ba med par shes pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na chos rnam par gdon mi za ba rnams la 
[\[262a.4\]]rnam par phye ba shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang /_'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'jig rten 
[\[262a.5\]]gyi chos mngon sum du gyur pa dang /_'jig rten las sems can yang dag par sgrol ba dang /_rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba spong ba dang /_gzod ma nas rnam par dag cing 'od gsal bas kyang rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa yin te/_rigs kyi 
[\[262a.6\]]bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang 'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na gzhan dag gis bltar mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang 
[\[262a.7\]]phyug rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems kyi dbang phyug dang /_shes rab kyi dbang phyug dang /_ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang /_thabs kyi dbang phyug ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na gzhan dag gis bltar 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can rnams sangs rgyas mthong ba yang dag par 
[\[262b.2\]]'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_sems can rnams chos nyan pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_sems can rnams byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang mi 'bral ba yin te/_rigs kyi bu byang 
[\[262b.3\]]chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na shin tu dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'phags 
[\[262b.4\]]pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba mngon sum du gyur pa dang /_bden pa la nye bar brtags pas chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin pa dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par gcod pa la mkhas 
[\[262b.5\]]par gyur pa dang /_nyon mongs pas mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na shin tu dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na chos rnams blangs 
[\[262b.6\]]pa med par slob dpon rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dngos po phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la brtan zhing bsam pa sgyu med pa rnams yin/_bdag gis bde ba la mi 
[\[262b.7\]]chags pa rnams yin/_gang ye shes yongs su tshol ba de yang /_sems can thams cad kyi ched du yin gyi bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir ma yin pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na chos rnams blangs pa med par slob dpon rnams yin no/_/
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag gi don gtong zhing gzhan gyi don byed pa rnams yin/_bdag gi bde ba thams cad gtong 
[\[263a.2\]]zhing /_sems can rnams la chos kyi bde ba sbyin pa rnams yin/_ji ltar thos pa'i chos ston pa la ngal ba med pa rnams yin/_chos kyi 'tsho bas 'tsho'i zang zing gis 'tsho ba ma yin pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na sems 
[\[263a.3\]]can thams cad kyi rton par gyur pa rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor ba rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzungs rab tu thob pa dang /_spobs pa rgyun 
[\[263a.4\]]mi 'chad pa dang /_sems can gyi bsam pa shes pa la 'jug pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du khrid cing mi phyed pa'i chos ston pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor 
[\[263a.5\]]ba rnams yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_spyod pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa rnams yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[263a.6\]]spyod pa las mi ldog cing mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa rnams yin/_bsams bzhin du tshe dang /_'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba yang ston la phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas kyang btab pa rnams yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya la yang dag par gzhol zhing sa bcur 
[\[263a.7\]]nges par byung na/_sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]bshad pa na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gyur to/_/steng gi bar snang las lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis lha'i glu dbyangs blangs te/_lha'i me tog man dA 
[\[263b.2\]]ra ba'i char rab tu phab nas 'di skad ces kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las bstan pa 'di ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig grangs med 
[\[263b.3\]]pa nas bsgrubs pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /_mnyan nas mos pa dang /_mos nas 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang ston pa dang /_
[\[263b.4\]]byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba'i sems can de dag ni/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags te/_de dag ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa bzhin du lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma 
[\[263b.5\]]yin gyi 'jig rten gyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra sgrog par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pas rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/zhes ched du rjod pa ched du brjod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i 
[\[263b.6\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_lha dang mi'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[263b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa dang /_gzhan dag la rgya cher 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]rab tu ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos du dang ldan par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[264a.2\]]gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni chos brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsam pa nges te/_bsam pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /_sems 
[\[264a.3\]]can thams cad la zhe sdang ba'i sems med de/_shin tu byams pa bsgom pa bsgoms par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la gnas te/_snying rje chen po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_chos 'dod de chos don du gnyer bar 'gyur 
[\[264a.4\]]ba dang /_thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms te mtsho chen rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ba dang /_lus dang srog 'dor zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi 
[\[264a.5\]]rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs te/_smon lam gyis yang dag par byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_'khor gyi nang du 'jigs pa med pas bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur ba ste/_rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta 
[\[264a.6\]]bu 'di 'dzin pa dang /_gzhan dag la rgya cher ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/_/
[\[264a.7\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gang dag sa phyogs mthon dman can dang /_ri nag po dang /_chu mig dang /_mtsho dang /_lteng ka dang /_rgya mtsho chen po de dag thams cad mi snang bar gyur to/_/sa chen po 'di thams cad kyang lag mthil 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]ltar mnyam par gnas par gyur to/_/chu na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la yang gnod pa med par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na shing skam gang dag lo brgya lon pa de dag thams cad las kyang me tog dang /_'bras bu sna 
[\[264b.2\]]tshogs skyes par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su btud mngon par btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/_/de ma yin pa shing gzhan thams cad las kyang me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su btud mngon par btud nas 
[\[264b.3\]]phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/_/sa chen po las pad ma tshad shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam sna tshogs blta na sdug pa kha dog dang ldan pa dri dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba skyes so/_/snang ba chen pos kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gsal bar gyur to/_/
[\[264b.4\]]mi snang zhing ma dkrol bar steng gi bar snang las lha'i sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs kyi sgra byung ste grags par gyur to/_/ri'i rgyal po gangs can dang /_ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang las kyang lha'i me tog sna tshogs sngon dri mi mnam pa rnams kyang mchog gi dri langs par 
[\[264b.5\]]gyur te/_dri des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir dri zhim po bsnam par gyur to/_/ri'i rgyal po gangs can dang /_ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang de las me tog gi char chen po bab ste/_de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[264b.6\]]gang na ba der mngon par babs nas sa chen po 'dir me tog gi char de dag gis pus mo man cad nub par gyur to/_/me tog gi shing de dag las me tog sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab cing /_sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs sna tshogs kyi sgra dag kyang byung ngo /_/steng gi bar 
[\[264b.7\]]snang la rin po che sna tshogs kyi gdugs dpag tshad brgya stong phrag bcu'i tshad tsam kun du gnas par gyur to/_/rin po che'i gdugs de las mu tig gi do shal dang /_rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dril bu sna tshogs kyi dra ba 'phyang bar gyur to/_/dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i sgra yid 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]du 'ong ba/_yid dga' bar byed pa/_chags par byed pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di go bar byas par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[265a.2\]]dga' bar bgyid pa/_mgu bar bgyid pa'i mtshan ma rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par gyur pa gda' ba 'di su'i snga ltas lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i 
[\[265a.3\]]bu 'di ni mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po ri spos kyi ngad ldang nas 'khor mi'am ci stong phrag du ma dang 'khor dri za stong phrag du ma dang /_'khor lha stong phrag du ma dang bcas te 'ong ba de'i snga ltas so/_/de skad gsungs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de la mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong 
[\[265a.4\]]po sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs len pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_'khor brgya stong du mas bskor nas steng gi bar snang la me tog gi chu bo'i char 'bebs shing /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas 'khor dang bcas pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[265a.5\]]zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po bdag nyid kyis pi bang gi khog pa [(]baidUr+ya [,]bai DUr+ya [)]las byas pa/_'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[265a.6\]]gi gser gyi sab le'u can/_sa le sbram dang /_nor bu dang /_rin po che du mas spras pa/_sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su sbyangs pa blangs te/_sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang lhan cig tu grag par byed do/_/mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi 
[\[265a.7\]]bang de blangs ma thag tu de nas pi bang gi sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur to/_/pi bang gi sgra des 'dod pa na spyod pa'i rgyud kyi sgra dang /_glu'i sgra dang /_lha'i glu dbyangs kyi sgra rnams zil gyis mnan te mi gsal bar gyur to/_/
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]de nas pi bang gi sgra bskul bas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/_lha'i rol mo bor te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/_/mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi bang de blangs ma thag tu de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i shing dang /_ri'i rgyal 
[\[265b.2\]]po ri rab dang /_gangs can dang /_spos kyi ngad ldang dang /_btang bzung dang /_btang bzung chen po dang /_de ma yin pa gzhan ri nag po rnams dang /_rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ldeg_/rab tu ldeg_/kun tu rab 
[\[265b.3\]]tu ldeg go/_/g.yo rab tu g.yo/_kun tu rab tu g.yo'o/_/'gul rab tu 'gul/_kun tu rab tu 'gul lo/_/'di lta ste dper na chang gis ra ro ba'i mi 'khyar/_rab tu 'khyar/_kun tu rab tu 'khyar ba de bzhin du shing de dag thams cad dang /_ri thams cad kyang 'dud rab tu 'dud/_
[\[265b.4\]]kun tu rab tu 'dud do//_//bam po gnyis pa/_mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi bang khog pa [(]baidUr+ya [,]bai DUr+ya [)]las byas pa blangs ma thag tu/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa'i nang nas phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs 
[\[265b.5\]]par 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_
[\[265b.6\]]'jig rten skyong ba dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa'i dgra bcom pa dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis pi bang gi sgra de thos pa dang /_pi bang gi sgra de ma bzod nas rang rang gi stan las langs te 'dar/_rab tu 'dar 
[\[265b.7\]]kun tu rab tu 'dar ro/_/'dud rab tu 'dud/_kun du rab tu 'dud do/_/gar byed rab tu gar byed/_kun du rab tu gar byed do/_/nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi stan la mi dga' ste/_'gul/_rab tu 'gul zhing spyod lam yang 'khrugs nas 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]byis pa chung ngu bzhin du gar byed pa lta bur ston to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nyan thos chen po dag nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad 
[\[266a.2\]]la bsam gtan pa bden pa bzhi mthong bar gyur pa yin na/_ci'i phyir rang gi lus 'jog par mi nus shing /_tshe dang ldan pa dag byis pa chung ngu bzhin du gar byed pa lta bur ston/_nyan thos chen po de dag gis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi bang 
[\[266a.3\]]'di blangs pa dang /_sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs sbyar bas pi bang gi sgra des bdag cag la dbang med par bdag cag gi lus/_rang rang gi stan la 'dug par mi dga' zhing 'dar/_rab tu 'dar/_kun du rab tu 'dar te/_sems rnam par gzhag par yang ma nus so/_/
[\[266a.4\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po rgas gtugs 'khogs pa/_'dod pa nyung ba chog shes pa/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan 'dzin pa dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas 
[\[266a.5\]]pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa yin na/_ci'i phyir rang gi lus 'dzin par mi nus shing /_gnas brtan du gyur kyang byis pa chung ngu bzhin du gar byed pa lta bur ston/_gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos smras pa/_rigs kyi bu dper na dmu rlung phyad pa'i rlung langs 
[\[266a.6\]]pa na shing dang /_nags dang /_ri thams cad gang gis bdag rnam par gzhag pa'i stobs med mthu med de/_de dag thams cad mi 'dod bzhin du g.yo rab tu g.yo/_'gul rab tu 'gul lo/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang 'di mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi bang 
[\[266a.7\]]blangs pa de'i sgra thos pas bdag cag dmu rlung phyad pas ri chen po bdas pa bzhin du bdag 'dzin ma nus par gyur to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_skyes bu dam pa 'di'i smon lam dang /_bsod nams dang /_ye shes kyi khyad par ni 'di 'dra ste/_des nyan thos kyi bsod nams 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]dang ye shes dang /_gzi brjid thams cad zil gyis non to/_/byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dpal dang /_gzi brjid dang /_stobs la gang gi phyir pi bang gi sgra des 
[\[266b.2\]]bskul ba'am/_bskyod par mi nus pas btsun pa 'od srung chen po su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skyed/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang nyi tshe'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams kyi stobs dang /_gzi brjid de ni pi bang gi sgra 'dis zil gyis non 
[\[266b.3\]]to/_/gang theg pa chen po la zhugs pa rnams kyi stobs dang /_gzi brjid de la ni zil gyis gnon par mi nus pa la ltos/_de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi bang gi sgra de sgrog pa na sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i sngon gyi smon 
[\[266b.4\]]lam gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis pi bang de dang sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo /_/tha ma 'bring dang de bzhin mchog rnams kyi/_/chos rnams thams cad mnyam zhing chos rnams dben/_/zhi ba stong pa mi 'gyur 'khrugs pa med/_/
[\[266b.5\]]gzod nas dag ste dri med nam mkha' bzhin/_/gang dag da ltar gyi dang 'das pa yi/_/sems can kun mnyam sems can sems can med/_/sems can skad du sgra rnams 'byung ba yang /_/chos kyi sgra dang mtshungs te de yang med/_/zhing rnams thams cad 
[\[266b.6\]]zhing mnyam zhing min te/_/bar snang dang ni mtshungs shing mnyam par snang /_/'phel ba ma yin mi zad ma skyes te/_/gsob gsog nam mkha' lta bur rnam par dag_/sangs rgyas kun mnyam sangs rgyas sangs rgyas min/_/chos dbyings nges par 'dres pa 
[\[266b.7\]]med pa ste/_/tshul khrims shes rab ye shes rnam grol mnyam/_/mtshan nyid gcig ste mtshan mnyam mtshan nyid med/_/nyon mongs thams cad nyon mongs ma yin grol/_/rtog dang rtog pa kun rtog rnam par rtog_/nang na rgyu ba ma yin phyi rol min/_/'du 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]shes mdud pa phyin ci log las gyur/_/rnam par rtog pas chos dbyings ming btags pa/_/ming de nyid kyang gzhan min de bzhin min/_/ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin rjes rtogs pa/_/de dag rtag tu mi chags 'jig rten spyod/_/gang rnams 'das 
[\[267a.2\]]pa'i bde gshegs grangs med pa/_/de dag gis ni gang gsungs chos mang po/_/gzod nas zad cing dengs dang 'jigs las dben/_/de dag yul dang phyogs su 'gro ma yin/_/chos 'di dag ni yi ge las byung ste/_/yi ge gang dag zad can zad pa'i chos/_/
[\[267a.3\]]yi ge zad pa'i chos nyid shes pas na/_/chos rnams kun la rnam par rtog mi byed/_/sems kyi rgyud ni rgyud mnyam rgyud ma yin/_/rang bzhin gzhan dang gzhan te chags pa med/_/sems dang sems byung chos mtha' med shes pas/_/'phags pa rnams 
[\[267a.4\]]ni mnyam pa'i chos la 'jug_/mtha' dang mtha' med kun chad rnam par chad/_/thog ma tha ma bar ma mnyam gyur pa/_/dus gsum dag ni dben pas shes pa mnyam/_/shes pa de yang mtha' yod ma yin no/_/skye bo rtag tu ming dang gzugs la chags/_/
[\[267a.5\]]mtha' dang mtha' med lta bas gos pa rnams/_/rgyu dang rkyen las byung bar shes pas na/_/bdag dang sems can rnam par rtog ma yin/_/bdag las ldang ba rtag tu ldang ma yin/_/chos de kun nas bslang ba med pa ste/_/gang dag ldang dang ldang ba med rtog pa/_/
[\[267a.6\]]de dag bzod pa mnyam nyid rjes 'thun pa/_/chos kun rtag tu bdag med rang bzhin te/_/sprin dang glog dang nam mkha' lta bu gsog_/bdag dang sems can rtag tu rang bzhin stong /_/'di ni gzungs kyi phyag rgyar 'jug pa'o/_/chos rnams mtshan nyid gcig ste 
[\[267a.7\]]mtshan nyid med/_/gang gis thar pa'i sgo gsum rnam rtogs nas/_/thug pa med pa'i chos rnams ston byed kyang /_/chos la yongs su rtog pa mi byed do/_/tha ma 'bring dang de bzhin mchog rnams kyi/_/chos 'di dag ni yi ge las byung ste/_/yi ge rnams la 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]rnam par rtog mi byed/_/de lta bur ni don rnams bshad pa yin/_/don dang tshig 'bru gnyis la mi 'jug ste/_/gnyis med rtag tu don ni sgra dang bral/_/gang gis mtha' 'di dben par shes pa ni/_/de yi sngon gyi mtha' ni nye bar chad/_/gang dag sngon mtha' nye bar chad pa 
[\[267b.2\]]rnams/_/'gro ba'i don du 'dus byas rnams la spyod/_/yang dag mtha' ni rtag tu mtha' med shes/_/de yi byams dang snying rje shin tu dag_/gang gi byams dang snying rje rnam dag pa/_/sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba mtshungs mnyam sbyor/_/rgod dang khengs pa ma yin brtan pa 
[\[267b.3\]]yi/_/skyes bu mchog de don gyi cho ga shes/_/chos kyi tshul 'di zhi zhing dben pa ste/_/'chang ba na ni dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur/_/nam yang 'phel ba med cing 'bri ba med/_/chos nyid 'di ni ngar 'dzin med cing zhi/_/bar snang lam gyi sgra ni gzung med de/_/gang gis bshad 
[\[267b.4\]]pa med kyang grags par gyur/_/gang gis bshad dang gang la bshad pa rnams/_/de dag thams cad dbang can [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa yin/_/tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di bshad pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[267b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag ga las byung /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la dris shig 
[\[267b.6\]]dang /_des de'i lan glon par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mi'am ci'i bdag po tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di dag ga las byung /_smras pa/_sems can 
[\[267b.7\]]thams cad kyi sgra ga las byung ngo /_/smras pa/_mi'am ci'i bdag po sems can thams cad kyi sgra ga las byung /_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad kyi sgra ni nam mkha' las 'byung ngo /_/smras pa/_mi'am ci'i bdag po sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]sgra khong pa'i nang nas mi 'byung ngam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/_sems can thams cad kyi sgra lus kyi nang gi khong nas byung ngam/_'on te sems las byung /_smras pa/_mi'am ci'i bdag po lus las kyang ma yin/_sems las kyang ma 
[\[268a.2\]]yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lus ni bems po g.yo ba med pa/_byed pa med pa rtswa dang bong ba dang rtsig pa dang /_shing dang /_mig yor lta bu'o/_/sems ni gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_rnam par rig pa med pa ste/_sgyu ma lta bu'o/_/smras pa/_rigs 
[\[268a.3\]]kyi bu lus dang sems ma gtogs par gzhan gang nas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/_smras pa/_mi'am ci'i bdag po sems can rnams kyi sgra ni yid la byed pa las 'byung bar btags so/_/smras pa/_gal te nam mkha' med na sgra ga las 'byung /_smras pa/_mi'am ci'i bdag po nam mkha' 
[\[268a.4\]]ma gtogs par gzhan gang nas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rnam grangs 'dis sgra ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni nam mkha' las 'byung bar rig par bya'o/_/nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid ni sgra ste/_rnam par rig ma thag tu 'gag go/_/'gags nas nam mkha'i ngo 
[\[268a.5\]]bo nyid du yang dag gnas so/_/de'i phyir chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya ste rnam par rig pa med pa rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin mod kyi sgra dang sgra'i brdas brjod do/_/brjod pa de yang tha snyad do/_/gang sgras brjod pa 'di 'dra bar rab tu shes pa de ni chos gang la 
[\[268a.6\]]yang mngon par mi chags so/_/gang mngon par mi chags pa de ni rnam par mi 'phro'o/_/gang rnam par mi 'phro ba de mi 'khor ro/_/gang mi 'khor ba de mi phyed pa'o/_/gang mi phyed pa de mi skye'o/_/gang mi skye ba de mi 'jig par 'dod do/_/gang mi 'jig pa de dang ba'o/_/gang dang ba 
[\[268a.7\]]de dag pa'o/_/gang dag pa de dri ma med pa'o/_/gang dri ma med pa de 'od gsal ba'o/_/gang 'od gsal ba de sems kyi rang bzhin no/_/sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de 'jug pa'o/_/gang 'jug pa de mtshan ma thams cad gnon pa'o/_/gang mtshan ma thams cad gnon pa de 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]skyon med pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa ste/_des na skyon med pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya'o/_/gang bzod pa rab tu thob 
[\[268b.2\]]pa des thams cad bzod de/_de stong par yang bzod de gang zag tu yang bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang zag las stong pa gzhan ma yin te/_gang zag nyid stong pa'o/_/de mtshan mar yang bzod de mtshan ma med par bzod pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[268b.3\]]mtshan ma med pa'o/_/de smon par yang bzod/_de smon pa med pa yang bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_smon lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid smon pa med pa'o/_/de sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par yang bzod de sems can rnams 'chi 'pho ba 
[\[268b.4\]]dang skye bar yang bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'chi 'pho dang skye ba ni sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid do/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'gag pa med pa ste/_chos thams cad dang 'gal ba med pa yin no/_/bdag bzod pa'i rjes su 
[\[268b.5\]]'gro yang sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro bas kyang 'gro/_bdag bzod pa rjes su 'gro yang chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro bas kyang 'gro ste/_'ong ba yang med/_'gro ba yang med do/_/chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings la gnas par yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[268b.6\]]du rab tu shes so/_/ji ltar chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa de ltar sems can thams cad gnas te/_gang gi gnas de 'thob pa'i gnas med pa'i tshul gyis rjes su thob pa de sgra'i brda'i tha snyad kyi sgra nye bar bzung nas/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/mi 
[\[268b.7\]]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni gang gis kyang brjod pa'am/_bsnyad pa'am/_bstan par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_don de ni brjod du med pa/_sgra med pa/_bshad du med pa yin yang brjod du med pa'i don brjod pas bstan pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu de bzhin 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]gshegs pa'i che ba nyid do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kye ma mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'di ji tsam du chos zab mo la bzod pa ston par spobs pa dang /_'di lta bur 
[\[269a.2\]]rgya che ba'i yul la nye bar spyod cing longs spyod pas 'byor ba dang /_chos ston pas zab mo'i bzod pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[269a.3\]]bskrun na des 'di spobs pa 'di lta bu grub par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi skar ma'i gzugs ji snyed pa bgrang ba'i tshul gyis tshad gzung bar nus sam/_de bzhin du mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 
[\[269a.4\]]'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub btsal ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi gnan tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[269a.5\]]sangs rgyas de dag kyang tshad gzung bar mi nus te/_des na 'di'i spobs pa 'di 'dra'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mi'am ci'i bdag po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[269a.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas mang po de dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po de lta bu bsdoms pas ci bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/_mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos smras pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[269a.7\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sgrub pa na/_gang dag gis nam du yang ngoms par mi 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi ngoms pa bcu gnyis po 'di dag ste/_bcu gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya bas mi ngoms 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]pa dang /_chos mnyan pas mi ngoms pa dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bas mi ngoms pa dang /_chos rgya cher rab tu bstan pas mi ngoms pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya bas mi ngoms pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrub pas mi ngoms pa dang /_dgon 
[\[269b.2\]]pa la gnas pas mi ngoms pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su bskang bas mi ngoms pa dang /_ye shes mngon par rab tu dang zhing yongs su smin par bya bas mi ngoms pa dang /_chos nges par sems shing tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor bas mi ngoms pa dang /_bsod nams 
[\[269b.3\]]dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su btsal bas mi ngoms pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pas mi ngoms pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrub pa na gang dag nam du yang ngoms par mi 
[\[269b.4\]]'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi ngoms pa bcu gnyis te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i tshogs bsags pa la mi ngoms pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang 
[\[269b.5\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bgyi ba mchis te/_byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de la brten na yon tan rin po che'i khyad par gyi chos thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba zhig bdag gis thos na/_bcom ldan 'das gang thos pas/_
[\[269b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams yon tan rin po che'i khyad par gyi chos thams cad 'thob par 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dkon mchog 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[269b.7\]]pa/_mi'am ci'i bdag po de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dkon mchog 'byung gnas ngas khyod la bshad do/_/mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas/_bcom 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/mi'am ci'i bdag po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /_chos dkon mchog rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog 
[\[270a.2\]]rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa rin po che brgyad cu po 'di dag la 'jug go/_/brgyad cu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che mi brjed pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sems rin po che mi gtong ba dang /_dge ba rin po che thams cad kyi sems mi 
[\[270a.3\]]'dor ba dang /_dge ba rin po che thams cad la rab tu sbyor ba'i sems mi 'dor ba dang /_yi dam la brtan pa'i sems rin po che yongs su mi 'dor ba dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sems rin po che byang chub tu yongs su sngo bas rnam par smin pa la mi re ba'i sems 
[\[270a.4\]]rin po che la 'jug pa dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa gsum rnam par spangs pas/_lus kyi rgyan gyi sems rin po che dang /_ngag gi skyon rnam pa bzhi rnam par spangs pas ngag gi rgyan gyi sems rin po che dang /_brnab sems dang gnod sems dang log par lta ba dang bral 
[\[270a.5\]]bas sems kyi rgyan gyi sems rin po che dang /_tshul khrims ma nyams shing skyon med de 'dren ma ma yin zhing thun tshags ma yin pas tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyi sems rin po che dang /_sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pas khong khro ba med pa'i sems rin po che dang /_sems 
[\[270a.6\]]can thams cad kyis nyes par byas pa la ci mi snyam pas bzod pa dang nges pa'i sems rin po che dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag la lta bas lus dang srog la mi lta ba'i sems rin po che dang /_mtho dman med pas rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral ba'i sems rin po che dang /_
[\[270a.7\]]zhum pa med pas brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha'i sems rin po che dang /_lhod pa med pa'i brtson pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'i sems rin po che dang /_byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs bsags pas dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]mos pa brjed pa med pa'i sems rin po che dang /_sems la dbang byed pas bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang bskyed pa'i sems rin po che dang /_dam pa'i chos bsags pas chos yongs su tshol ba'i sems rin po che dang /_
[\[270b.2\]]'jigs pa med cing spobs pas thos pa 'dzin pa'i sems rin po che dang /_sdig pa 'dod pa med pas zang zing med par chos ston pa'i sems rin po che dang /_chags pa'i sems med pas slob dpon chos mi 'chab pa'i sems rin po che dang /_nan tan snying por byed pas tshul bzhin 
[\[270b.3\]]du yang yid la byed pa'i sems rin po che dang /_de ltar byed pas ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams la nan tan byed pa'i sems rin po che dang /_gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pas shes rab kyis so sor rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang /_sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab pas byams pa chen 
[\[270b.4\]]po'i sems rin po che dang /_sems can thams cad la lta bas snying rje chen po'i sems rin po che dang /_chos la dga' mos dad pas dga' ba chen po'i sems rin po che dang /_chos thams cad nges par sems pas btang snyoms chen po'i sems rin po che dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[270b.5\]]bsags pas 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems rin po che dang /_bdag gi bde ba la mi chags pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa'i sems rin po che dang /_chos 'dzin pas bsdu ba'i dngos po'i sems rin po che dang /_thams cad du rnam par 'phrul 
[\[270b.6\]]pas mngon par shes pa chen po'i sems rin po che dang /_ma thos pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa'i sems rin po che dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sogs pas sdig pa'i grogs po spong ba'i sems rin po che dang /_tha dad pa med pas sems can 
[\[270b.7\]]thams cad la sbyor ba mnyam pa'i sems rin po che dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la 'jug pas/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad yongs su shes pa'i sems rin po che dang /_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar byed pas 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]chos kyi sman thams cad yongs su tshol ba'i sems rin po che dang /_chos kyi bdag nyid pas ma bslabs pa rnams la mi brnyas pa'i sems rin po che dang /_sems can thams cad la 'dud pas nga rgyal med pa'i sems rin po che dang /_'chos pa med pa'i 
[\[271a.2\]]g.yo dang sgyu med pa'i sems rin po che dang /_dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas pas chos la dga' ba'i sems rin po che dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la byas pa gzo bas dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems rin po che dang /_brtan pa'i grogs po'i phyir byas pa shes shing 
[\[271a.3\]]byas pa gzo ba'i sems rin po che dang /_ltos pa med pas lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sems rin po che dang /_dkar po'i phyogs srung bas dgon pa la dga' ba'i sems rin po che dang /_las byas pa chud mi gson pas rtag tu rab tu 'byung ba'i sems rin po che dang /_
[\[271a.4\]]sdom pa'i spyod pa sogs pas 'phags pa'i rigs la dga' ba'i sems rin po che dang /_sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pas sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang yo byad bsnyungs pa'i sems rin po che dang /_shes rab kyis mi ngoms pas 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes pa'i sems 
[\[271a.5\]]rin po che dang /_lus dang sems dben pas dga' ba la dben pa'i sems rin po che dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis mi ngoms pa'i sems rin po che dang /_sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcad pa'i phyir ye 
[\[271a.6\]]shes kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba'i sems rin po che dang /_sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang /_chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir chos rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun 
[\[271a.7\]]la gzhol ba'i phyir dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang /_byang chub kyi sems las mi g.yo ba'i phyir tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su bor bas gtong ba rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang /_skye ba gcig 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rjes su dran pa'i phyir lha rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang /_mtshungs par byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rjes su dran pa'i sems rin po che dang /_don thams cad rtogs pas don so so yang dag par rig pa'i sems rin po che 
[\[271b.2\]]dang /_chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med pas chos so so yang dag par rig pa'i sems rin po che dang /_sems can gyi tshig thams cad rtogs pas nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa'i sems rin po che dang /_tshig 'bru'i rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pas spobs pa so so yang dag 
[\[271b.3\]]par rig pa'i sems rin po che dang /_rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa'i tshul gyis ye shes la rton pa'i sems rin po che dang /_bkri ba'i don gyi mdo sde las dang bya ba dang 'gal bas nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa'i sems rin po che dang /_gang zag gi rang 
[\[271b.4\]]bzhin rjes su rtog pas chos nyid la rton pa'i sems rin po che dang /_khams gsum thams cad la mngon par zhen pas 'jigs pa'i phyir 'du byed thams cad la mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar so sor rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang /_sems can thams cad la bdag med 
[\[271b.5\]]pas chos thams cad la bdag med par so sor rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang /_'dod pa'i khams las shin tu 'da' bas mi gtsang bar so sor rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang /_shin tu zhi zhing nye bar zhi bas mya ngan las 'das pa la zhi bar so sor rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang /_
[\[271b.6\]]bdud rtsi'i sgo la yang dag par gzhol bas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la mos pa'i sems rin po che dang /_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pas chos thams cad la ma skyes pa dang ma byung bas mos pa'i sems 
[\[271b.7\]]rin po che dang /_lta ba thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pas chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang /_mig yor dang /_rmi lam lta bur yang dag par gzhol ba'i sems rin po che dang /_rtag pa dang chad pa dang bral bas rten cing 'brel bar 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]'byung ba dang 'thun pa'i sems rin po che dang /_gnyis dang bral bas mthar lta ba thams cad sel ba'i sems rin po che dang /_theg pa gcig tu khong du chud pas gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i sems rin po che dang /_skyon med pa la 'jug pas 
[\[272a.2\]]spyod pa thams cad las ldog pa'i sems rin po che dang /_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir yang dag par skyon med pa la so sor rtog pa'i sems rin po che dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i 
[\[272a.3\]]sems rin po che ste/_'di dag ni chos rin po che brgyad cu'o/_/mi'am ci'i bdag po de ltar gang chos brgyad cu po 'di la 'jug pa dang thob pa dang /_nan tan byed pa de ni dkon mchog 'byung gnas ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/chos 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin sgrub pa'o/_/byang 
[\[272a.4\]]chub sems dpas gang gi tshe dkon mchog 'byung gnas ting nge 'dzin 'di rab tu thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/_des gang la dbang thob par ma gyur pa'i rin po che'i 'jig rten gyi'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa de gang yang med do/_/mi'am ci'i bdag po de la 'jig rten gyi rin 
[\[272a.5\]]po che ni gang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i rin po che ni gang zhe na/_mi'am ci'i bdag po de la 'jig rten gyi rin po che ni 'di lta ste/_lha dang mi rnams kyi che ba nyid dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa'i che ba nyid dang /_'jig rten skyong ba'i che ba nyid dang /_'khor los 
[\[272a.6\]]sgyur ba'i che ba nyid dang /_tshong dpon dang /_khyim bdag dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i che ba nyid do/_/de de ltar lha dang mi rnams kyi che ba nyid rab tu thob kyang rgyags pa mi skyed/_bag med pa mi skyed do/_/de bag yod par gyur pas/_byang 
[\[272a.7\]]chub sgrub par byed pa'i chos rnams yang dag par bsgrub pa ste/_'di ni 'jig rten gyi rin po che zhes bya'o/_/de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rin po che gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rin po che'o/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]rin po che gang zhe na/_chos gang 'jig rten las sgrol ba'o/_/'jig rten las sgrol ba'i chos gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab ste/_shes rab kyi 'jig rten las sgrol lo/_/shes rab rin po ches ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 
[\[272b.2\]]chos thams cad bsdus te/_shes rab ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyi gtso bo yin no/_/mi'am ci'i bdag po 'di lta ste dper na klung thams cad kyi gtso bo ni rgya mtsho chen po'o/_/ri thams cad kyi gtso bo ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab bo/_/skar ma thams cad kyi 
[\[272b.3\]]gtso bo ni zla ba'o/_/snang ba thams cad kyi gtso bo ni nyi ma'o/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]thams cad kyi gtso bo ni seng ge'o/_/skye dgu thams cad kyi gtso bo ni rgyal po'o/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa thams cad kyi gtso bo ni brgya byin no/_/tshangs pa la dbang du bya ba rnams kyi gtso bo ni tshangs pa chen 
[\[272b.4\]]po'o/_/mi'am ci'i bdag po de bzhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyi gtso bo ni shes rab ste/_de'i phyir shes rab ni chos thams cad kyi rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/mu stegs la gnas pa bsgral ba'i phyir bde bar 'gro bas lam mo/_/nyon mongs pa'i mun 
[\[272b.5\]]pa sel ba'i phyir sgron ma'o/_/g.yul las rgyal ba'i phyir dpa' bo'o/_/sman rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir sman pa'o/_/gtsug lag thams cad shes pa'i phyir slob dpon no/_/chos thams cad phigs pa'i phyir mda'o/_/nyon mongs pa gcod pa'i phyir ral gri'o/_/nyon mongs 
[\[272b.6\]]pa'i tshang tshing dral ba'i phyir thong gshol lo/_/mnyam pa'i phyir mi 'gal ba'o/_/'thab pa med pa'i phyir rtsod pa med pa'o/_/'byung ba med pa'i phyir mi 'gag pa'o/_/bden pa'i don rnams yongs su shes pa'i mthar thug pa'i phyir mi 'khrugs pa'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhog 
[\[272b.7\]]pa'i phyir dran pa'o/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams la mnyam pa nyid do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bskyed pa'o/_/dbang po rnams sbed pa'o/_/stobs rnams kyis mi rdzi ba'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rjes su rtog pa'o/_/lam ston pa'o/_/zhi gnas zhi 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]bar byed pa'o/_/lhag mthong rig par byed pa'o/_/rab rib med pa'i phyir snang bar byed pa'o/_/chos kyi snang bas mun pa sel ba'o/_/rdul dang bral ba'i phyir rdul med pa'o/_/brnyas thabs dang bral ba'i phyir mtho bar sems pa med pa'o/_/ya nga ba'i
