[\[273a.2\]]lam las rab tu 'das pa'i phyir kun tu mthong bar byed pa'o/_/phyi nang dang bral ba'i phyir yul med pa'o/_/lta bas byas pa med pa'i phyir stong pa sgrol ba'o/_/rnam par rtog pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir/_mtshan ma med pas rab tu phye ba'o/_/khams gsum pa las rnam par 'das pa'i 
[\[273a.3\]]phyir smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/_/mtshungs pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do/_/bdud kyi las dang bral ba'i phyir g.yo ba dang rlom sems 'joms pa'o/_/mi rtog pa'i sbyin pa'o/_/mi gnas pa'i tshul 
[\[273a.4\]]khrims so/_/rab tu mi gnas pa'i bzod pa'o/_/blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pa'i brtson 'grus so/_/sgro btags pa med pa'i bsam gtan no/_/rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i sgo'o/_/thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa'o/_/thabs dang 'brel ba'o/_/sems 
[\[273a.5\]]can la bdag med par yang dag par gzhol ba'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'o/_/bya ba med pa'o/_/bya ba dang bral ba ste/_mi'am ci'i bdag po 'di ni shes rab rin po che'o/_/shes rab rin po che 'di ni dkon mchog 'byung gnas ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i byang 
[\[273a.6\]]chub sems dpas 'thob bo/_/'di 'thob pa na rin po che thams cad yang dag par 'du ba yin no/_/mi'am ci'i bdag po 'di lta ste/_dper na chu bo thams cad kyi sgo ni rgya mtsho chen po ste/_rin po che thams cad sogs pa rin po che thams cad yang dag par 'du ba ste/_de 
[\[273a.7\]]las rin po che thams cad 'byung ngo /_/mi'am ci'i bdag po de bzhin du dkon mchog 'byung gnas ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang rin po che thams cad kyi sgo yin te/_chos dkon mchog thams cad sogs pa rin po che thams cad yang dag par 'du 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]ba'o/_/dkon mchog 'byung gnas ting nge 'dzin las dkon mchog gsum 'byung ste/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog go/_/des na dkon mchog 'byung gnas ting nge 'dzin ni rin po che thams cad sogs pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[273b.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'dis dkon mchog 'byung gnas ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs 
[\[273b.3\]]kyi bu khyod kyis de mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la dris shig dang des khyod la ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mi'am ci'i bdag po khyod kyis dkon mchog 'byung gnas ting nge 'dzin 
[\[273b.4\]]'di thob bam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin 'di ni thob pa'am/_dmigs par so sor nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin 'di ni sus kyang mi thob bo/_/ting nge 'dzin 'di ni gzugs su bgrang ba'am/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed 
[\[273b.5\]]dang /_rnam par shes par bgrang ba ma yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin 'di ni gzugs su snang ba ma yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin 'di ni mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i gzung ba ma yin/_skye ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin/_
[\[273b.6\]]'jig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin/_gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin/_rgyun 'chad pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin/_mtshan nyid gcig pa ma yin/_mtshan nyid tha dad pa ma yin/_mtshan nyid ma yin/_mtshan nyid dang bral ba ma yin/_mtshan nyid med pa yang ma yin te/_
[\[273b.7\]]brjod par bya ba ma yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin 'di ni yongs su rtogs par mi nus te/_kun tu rtogs par ma yin rnam par rtogs par ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te ting nge 'dzin 'di yongs su rtogs pa'am/_kun tu rtogs pa'am/_rnam par rtogs par 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]gyur na ni brtag pa'i gzhi nyid du 'gyur gyi ting nge 'dzin ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de dang nga mnyam mo/_/de dang sems can thams cad kyang mnyam 
[\[274a.2\]]mo/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di dang sems can thams cad mnyam mo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can thams cad ni stong pa ste/_stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'o/_/sems can thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/_mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid 
[\[274a.3\]]ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'o/_/sems can thams cad ni smon pa med pa ste/_smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'o/_/sems can thams cad ni dben pa ste/_dben pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'o/_/sems can thams cad ni bdag med pa ste/_bdag med 
[\[274a.4\]]pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'o/_/de ni lus dang ngag dang sems kyis reg par mi nus so/_/gang la la dag chos la reg par byed pa dang /_mnyam par byed pa dang /_mngon par mnyam par byed pa de dag thams cad ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la nga rgyal 
[\[274a.5\]]can du bstan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i spyod pa bag mchis pa 'di lta bu dang /_chos la spobs pa 'di lta bu ni ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[274a.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu bya ba thams cad kyang kun tu ston la bya ba thams cad kyis kyang mi gos pa 'di ni thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa'o/_/rigs kyi bu mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'dis rgyud kyi sgra dang /_glu'i sgra dang /_sil snyan 
[\[274a.7\]]dang /_pheg rdob pa byas pa'i tshul 'dis mi'am ci bye ba phrag bdun bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/_/dri za bye ba phrag sum cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/_/lto 'phye chen po bye ba 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]phrag bzhi bcu yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/_/rang gi 'khor gyi srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong yang byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/_/shes rab dang thabs kyi ye shes 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gang 
[\[274b.2\]]dang gang gi tshe 'khor gyi che ba nyid thob pa de dang de'i tshe/_sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rgyu med par me mi 'bar ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dben pa na gnas pa yang sems can 
[\[274b.3\]]yongs su smin par bya ba mi 'bar ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rgyu yod na me 'bar ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye bo phal po che'i nang na 'dug na/_sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba 'bar ro/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir 
[\[274b.4\]]rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ji lta ji lta bur yul dang 'khor chen po 'byor par gyur pa/_de lta de lta bur sems can dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par byed par rig par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 
[\[274b.5\]]cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos rgyud kyi sgra dang /_glu'i sgra dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa bgyis pas sems can yongs su smin par bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi 
[\[274b.6\]]bu mi'am ci dang /_dri za dang /_lto 'phye chen po glu dang /_rol mo'i dbyangs sgra la mos pa rnams la mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos gang gi tshe pi bang gi sgra thos par byed cing sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs sbyor ba de na mi'am ci dang /_dri za dang /_lto 'phye chen po de dag dga' ba 
[\[274b.7\]]dang /_rab tu mgu ba chen po 'thob bo/_/de dag dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_rab tu mgu ba thob nas rgyud kyi sgra dang /_sil snyan gyi sgra dang /_glu dbyangs kyi sgra de dag las sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'byung ngo /_/chos kyi sgra dang dge 'dun gyi sgra 'byung ngo /_/byang chub kyi sems la 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]dga' ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed par sbyor ba'i sgra 'byung ngo /_/sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi sgra 'byung ngo /_/byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_
[\[275a.2\]]dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms kyi sgra dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong dang /_bsam gtan dang /_
[\[275a.3\]]rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgra 'byung ngo /_/mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra 'byung ngo /_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /_
[\[275a.4\]]skye ba med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i sgra 'byung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs dang /_gzungs dang rdo rje'i tshig dang /_'khor gsum yongs su sbyong ba'i sgra 'byung ngo /_/phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor 
[\[275a.5\]]ba'i sgra dang /_chos thams cad la rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra 
[\[275a.6\]]dang /_rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_rin chen sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_rin chen 'byung gnas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_rin chen brtsegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_dga' byed ting nge 
[\[275a.7\]]'dzin gyi sgra dang /_pad ma bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_pad ma bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_nam mkha'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_dam pa'i chos puN+Da rI ka'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]khyad par can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_rnam par rgyal bar dbang byed ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_cher bsgyings ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_rnam pa la sems dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_seng ge bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_nyi ma sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra 
[\[275b.2\]]dang /_mtha' yas 'khyil pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_rgyun gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_rdo rje lte ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_
[\[275b.3\]]sa 'dzin ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_ri rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_ri rab rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_rin chen mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_sems la dbang byed ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra 
[\[275b.4\]]dang /_spyod pa thams cad kyi yul las nges par 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_zab mo sbed par sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_spobs pa sna tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_bltar mi mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[275b.5\]]gyi sgra dang /_rnam par rol ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_mngon par shes pa thams cad las nges par 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_bdud kyi dkyil 'khor 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_sgra thams cad 
[\[275b.6\]]la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_lus thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_spyod pa thams cad la dbang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_lag na sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_byang chub mngon sum snang 
[\[275b.7\]]byed ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra dang /_yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra 'byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyud kyi sgra dang /_sil snyan gyi sgra dang /_glu dbyangs kyi sgra de dag las chos kyi sgra 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]'di lta bu 'di dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgra 'byung ngo /_/sgra de dag gis sems can de dag yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa yin no/_/mi'am ci'i rgyal 
[\[276a.2\]]po sdong po'i yon tan bsngags pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi lag par lha'i me tog man dA ra'i phur ma grub nas/_de dag gis me tog gi phur ma de dag mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la gtor to/_/de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po 
[\[276a.3\]]sdong pos byin gyi rlabs ji lta bus me tog de dag lag pa g.yas par blangs te/_me tog gcig kyang sa la ma ltung bar de lta bu'i byin gyi rlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs nas me tog blangs pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/_/de nas me tog de dag gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas 
[\[276a.4\]]kyi mthus skad cig de la stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams me tog rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis khebs par gyur to/_/me tog rin po che'i gdugs de las mu tig gi do shal bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag rab tu 'phyang ngo /_/me tog gi do shal 'phyang ba re re las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[276a.5\]]brgya stong phrag du ma byung ngo /_/'od zer thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang pad ma sna tshogs blta na sdug pa/_kha dog dag dang ldan pa dri dang ldan pa/_yid du 'ong ba dag byung bar gyur to/_/pad ma thams cad la yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[276a.6\]]pa'i sku skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs par kun tu snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis kyang mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis sems can mang po yongs su smin par byas so/_/sems can 
[\[276a.7\]]yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gang yul las rnam par grol yang yul thams cad kyang ston/_'khor ba las grol yang bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba kun tu ston/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i skyon med pa thob kyang /_khams gsum na nye bar spyod pa 'di lta bu ni byang chub sems 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]dpa'i bya ba yin te/_legs so legs so/_/de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi dbu la rin po che'i gdugs gzhan dag byin gyis brlab po snyam mo/_/de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po de'i tshe rin 
[\[276b.2\]]po che'i gdugs bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po rin po che'i gdugs bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbu'i thad drang gi steng na rin po che'i gdugs rnams 
[\[276b.3\]]gnas par kun tu snang ngo /_/'khor der thams cad kyi lag pa g.yas pa nas kyang rin po che'i gdugs rnams byung bar gyur te/_de dag gis rin po che'i gdugs de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mngon par bkab bo//_//bam po gsum pa/_mi'am 
[\[276b.4\]]ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nyan thos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun bcas par bshos la spyan drangs te/_'di ltar bdag 
[\[276b.5\]]gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas par ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang du bdag gi gnas su gshegs par gsol to/_/de ltar na bdag gi gnas yongs su spyad par 'gyur ro/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_
[\[276b.6\]]mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs tshad med pa la phan btags par yang 'gyur ro/_/de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_yongs su spyad par bya bar spro bar 'gyur te/_de'i phyir de dag gi yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang /_grub pa dang /_bde ba 
[\[276b.7\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bsgrub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba dang /_
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]sems can tshad ma mchis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba spel ba'i slad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu ri spos kyi ngad ldang gi ngos la bdag gi 
[\[277a.2\]]gnas su dgung bdun zhig bzhugs par bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur dang yongs su spyad par bgyi bar spro'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la thugs brtse 
[\[277a.3\]]ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pa la zhag bdun ri spos kyi ngad ldang gi ngos la bzhug par gnang ngo /_/de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig nas/_tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang 
[\[277a.4\]]yid bde ba skyes nas dpung dang bcas g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_sil snyan dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de 
[\[277a.5\]]nas song nas ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang ba la gnas so/_/de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rang gi khyim rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/_'khor gyi khyams rgyar kun nas dpag tshad lnga brgya pa/[ (]baidUr+ya [,]bai DUr+ya [)]sngon po dang /_'dzam 
[\[277a.6\]]bu'i klung gi gser gyi pad mas legs par brgyan pa/_rin po che du mas rnam par spras pa byas so/_/'khor gyi khyams der gdan khri rtsa ba rin po che las byas pa/_lha'i ras brgya stong bting ba brgya stong phrag mang po bshams so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri 'phang du 
[\[277a.7\]]dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/_rin po che'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng ba/_snying po mchog gi bdug pas bdugs pa/_bla re bres pa/_dar gyi lda ldi mang po bres pa lha'i me tog gtor ba bshams 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]so/_/seng ge'i khri de'i phyogs bzhir rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs blta na sdug pa bzhi sprul te/_skye bo thams cad bsdus nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/u dum bA ra'i me tog ji bzhin du/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba brgya lam rnyed 'gyur ba/_/mi mchog de ni da ltar 
[\[277b.2\]]byung gyur gyis/_/skyob la gus dang bcas pas mchod pa gyis/_/nga rgyal dag dang rgyags dang g.yo spongs la/_/phrag dog ser sna de bzhin sgyu rnams dang /_/rgod pa thams cad yongs su spong byos la/_/ston la gus dang bcas pas mchod pa gyis/_/spos ngad ldang ba 'di na 
[\[277b.3\]]lha yul ba'i/_/me tog khyad par 'phags pa ji snyed pa/_/de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas su/_/skyes bu khyu mchog la ni mchod pa gyis/_/sems can mchog la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/_/dri zhim yid 'ong khyad par 'phags pa'i dri/_/dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan 
[\[277b.4\]]dan gyis/_/spos kyi ngad ldang 'di la bdug pa gyis/_/glu dbyangs sil snyan rnam mang yid 'ong ba/_/mi'am ci dag rtag rtsen gar byed pa/_/ldan par byos la dga' zhing dang ba yis/_/rkang gnyis mchog la mchod pa rab tu gyis/_/mtshungs pa med pa mthong ba rnyed dka' 
[\[277b.5\]]ba/_/de bzhin gshegs la lha yi gdugs rnams dang /_/ba dan dag dang rgyal mtshan chos gos dang /_/bla re mang po yid 'ong gzung bar byos/_/sangs rgyas mchod pas bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/_/brgya byin dang ni 'jig rten skyong bar 'gyur/_/tshangs pa dag dang dbang byed 
[\[277b.6\]]dbang phyug dang /_/lha dang mi yi bdag po chen por 'gyur/_/mi mchog mchod pas gzugs dang kha dog dang /_/grags dang brjod dang 'khor dang longs spyod dang /_/de bzhin dbang phyug dang ni snyan tshig dang /_/de bzhin gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig tu 'gyur/_/gang dag 'dir ni 
[\[277b.7\]]lha dang de bzhin du/_/mi rnams kyi ni 'dus byas bde ba dang /_/bde ba bde bas tshim par 'dod pa rnams/_/'jig rten mgon po de la mchod pa gyis/_/rang rgyal byang chub de bzhin nyan thos dang /_/de ltar dam pa mchog gi theg pa dang /_/bdud kyi dpung rnams rab 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]'joms gang 'dod pas/_/sems can mchog de la ni mchod pa gyis/_/de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos rang gi g.yog 'khor thams cad la go bar byas te/_me tog dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa bsngogs nas ro brgya pa'i zhal zas 
[\[278a.2\]]bshams te/_ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang gi lho phyogs kyi ngos la 'dug nas sil snyan dang glu dbyangs blangs te/_rgyud kyi sgra dang glu'i sgra dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis dbyangs las tshigs su bcad de/_bcom ldan 'das la dus bskul ba/_phan pa mdzad cing 
[\[278a.3\]]bde mdzad dga' mdzad bcom ldan 'das/_/zhal yang rab 'dzum zla ba'i ngos ltar dri mi mnga'/_/skye mchog dge sbyong dam pa lha dang mis mchod pa/_/bde bar gshegs khyod 'dir gshegs pa yi dus 'di lags/_/stobs bcu rnams kyi stobs mnga' pha rol dpung 'joms pa/_/
[\[278a.4\]]gzhan gyi tshogs rnams 'joms shing 'gro la phan pa mdzad/_/'jo dang rnyog pa rnams dang dri ma tha spangs pa/_/phan pa mdzad pa khyod 'dir gshegs pa'i dus 'di lags/_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan rdul sbyangs the tshom rnam par gtor/_/dran dang blo gros blo yangs mos rtogs blo gros 
[\[278a.5\]]ldan/_/'gro rgyal rtag tu 'gro ba 'gro med 'gro ba spangs/_/phan pa mdzad cing dga' mdzad rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs/_/nyi ma zla ba nor bu glog rnams mdzes pa'i 'od/_/brgya byin tshangs pa srid gsum lha tshogs 'od 'phrog cing /_/'od mdzad dpal stug thub khyod 'od ni phan 
[\[278a.6\]]bgyid pas/_/'od 'di bsal nas rgyal ba'i 'od ni lhag ge yi/_/khyod kyi lha skad klu skad mi ci'i glu sgra yis/_/yang dang yang du 'bar ba'i nyon mongs zhi bar bgyid/_/skad mchog yangs pa tshangs pa rnams kyi sgra skad kyis/_/nyon mongs thams cad zhi bar bgyid pas 'bar 
[\[278a.7\]]ma lags/_/sman pa gang dag phyogs bcur rgyu yang de dag gis/_/gang du'ang 'gro ba'i nyon mongs zhi bar bgyid mi nus/_/sman pa'i rgyal po bla med gang tshe gsung brjod pa/_/de tshe nyon mongs kun zhi bde ba thams cad sbyin/_/shin tu ngo mtshar 'od dang stobs mchog 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]mtshungs med stobs/_/gsung ni skyon bral 'khrul pa mi mnga' dgra 'dul ba/_/rdul med rab rib bdag gi mun pa shin tu bcom/_/dgra bral phan mdzad khyed kyi dus lags 'dir gshegs gsol/_/sbyin dang dul dang legs spyod mi mnyam mtshungs dang mnyam/_/tshul 
[\[278b.2\]]khrims brtul zhugs mi 'khrugs brtul zhugs dka' thub dgyes/_/bzod dang dul dang shin tu dge la nges pa'i thugs/_/dga' gsung dgra rnams kyi ni dga' spong gshegs su gsol/_/dbang po stobs dang lam dgyes bsam gtan mngon mkhyen rol/_/dran dang blo gros rtogs 
[\[278b.3\]]dang mos la gnas pa'i thugs/_/'od ni rab tu lhag ge shin tu dgyes pa'i thugs/_/yon tan mnga' ba khyod 'dir gshegs pa'i dus 'di lags/_/byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms bsgoms pa'i thugs/_/skyon gyi mun pa bcom zhing bag la nyal dang bral/_/
[\[278b.4\]]tshangs pa'i lam ni rab bslabs rgyal ba'i lam la gnas/_/dga' mdzad bde bar gshegs pa dus lags gshegs su gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos dus bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gsan nas dge slong gi dge 'dun la 
[\[278b.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos dus bskul gyis lhung bzed dang /_chos gos thogs la zhag bdun gnas pa'i gtsug lag khang skyong yang skos shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar bdag gis 
[\[278b.6\]]khang pa brtsegs pa/_bkod pa 'di lta bu sprul la khang pa brtsegs pa der/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pa bzhugs te/_rin po che bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa bdag gis lag pa g.yas 
[\[278b.7\]]par blangs te/_nam mkha'i ngos las ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang du bkur bar byin gyis brlab bo snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]kyi spyan sngar khang pa brtsegs pa tshad dpag tshad bcu pa bkra ba blta na sdug pa/_gru bzhi pa/_ka ba bzhi zug pa/_cha mnyam pa/_shin tu rnam par phye ba byung ngo /_/khang pa brtsegs pa der stobs dang ldan pa'i pad ma bkod pa'i khri rnams kyang byung ngo /_/
[\[279a.2\]]khang pa brtsegs pa der bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan rin po che'i pad ma bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri 'phang du mi bdun yod pa byung ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa dang /_seng ge'i khri bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di byas nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[279a.3\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos chen po 'di dag dang thabs cig tu khang pa brtsegs pa seng ge'i khri bshams pa 'dir bzhugs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis khang pa 
[\[279a.4\]]brtsegs pa 'di sug pa g.yas pas blangs te/_ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang du 'tshal nas gzhag par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos chen po de dag dang thabs 
[\[279a.5\]]cig tu khang pa brtsegs pa der ji ltar khri bshams pa de dag la bzhugs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis khang pa brtsegs pa de lag mthil g.yas par blangs te/_steng gi nam mkha' las rdzu 'phrul gyis song ngo /_/de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dang /_
[\[279a.6\]]gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'di mthong nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[279a.7\]]po lha'i cod pan la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa thams cad thogs te/_sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs shing /_nam mkha'i ngos las gshegs 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]pa la mchod pa byas te/_ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang du phyin to/_/mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs shing nam mkha'i ngos las gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas mi'am ci dang /_dri za brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bskor te/_
[\[279b.2\]]me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa thams cad thogs nas sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang glu dbyangs len pa'i bkod pa byas te/_bcom ldan 'das bsu ba'i phyir byung ngo /_/de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po dpung dang bcas 'khor 
[\[279b.3\]]dang bcas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa de dag dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_glu dbyangs len pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa 
[\[279b.4\]]byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dus la bab par mkhyen nas/_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_de ma yin pa gzhan lha'i bu rnams dang /_thabs cig tu mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong 
[\[279b.5\]]pos 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa ga la ba der gshegs te rang gi seng ge'i khri ji ltar bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad so so ci rigs par 'khod do/_/mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_
[\[279b.6\]]'jig rten skyong ba dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/_grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu gdugs tshod gsol gyis/_khyed thams cad 'dus la tshur spyon/_de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po slas 
[\[279b.7\]]dang bcas/_bu dang bcas/_rang gi skye bo dang bcas/_'khor dang bcas/_g.yog dang bcas te rang rang gi lag gis bza' ba dang /_bca' ba gya nom pa mang po ro dang ldan pa/_ro brgya pa'i zhal zas sna tshogs bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]dge 'dun dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /_'khor la brims nas bde bar bstabs te tshim par byas so/_/tshim par byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed bzhag ste/_phyag bcabs par rig nas/_dpung dang bcas g.yog dang bcas 
[\[280a.2\]]te/_chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ji ltar bdag la 'os pa'i stan la 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po dang skye bo'i tshogs phal po che de dag la chos kyi gtam yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/_/
[\[280a.3\]]gzengs bstod do/_/rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi gtam ni 'di yin te/_mi'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/rnam 
[\[280a.4\]]pa sum cu rtsa gnyis gang 'di lta ste/_mi'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_theg pa chung ngu spangs pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_slong ba la zhe sdang ba med pa'i sems kyis sbyin 
[\[280a.5\]]pa de sbyin pa dang /_len pa rnams la sbyin gnas su 'du shes bskyed de sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_len pa rnams la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed de sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_nang gi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma spangs te sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_kun tu 'dzin pa med 
[\[280a.6\]]pa'i sems kyi dga' ba dang /_dang ba dang mchog tu dga' ba thob nas sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_lag pa brkyang ste grol bas gtong ba rnam par gtong ba la dga' bas sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_rgya chen po la mos te zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_snod thams 
[\[280a.7\]]cad la mi gnas par sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_rnam par smin pa la re ba med par sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_lan la re ba med pa'i blos sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i blos sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bsngos te sbyin pa de 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]sbyin pa dang /_gdung ba med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po sngon du 'gro bas sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_chos 'dzin par gyur cig snyam ste sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[280b.2\]]pa'i gsung dang 'thun par gyur cig snyam ste sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_bdag bdud kyi phyogs tshar gcod par gyur cig ces te sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_bdag byang chub kyi lam rnam par spyod par gyur cig ces sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_bdag skyes bu dam pa'i las byed par gyur 
[\[280b.3\]]cig ces sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_bdag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi lam rnam par spong bar gyur cig ces te sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_bdag gi bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i rgyur gyur cig ces sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_bdag gis longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba'i bsgrub pa rab 
[\[280b.4\]]tu bzung bar gyur cig ces te sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_chos la dga' bar rab tu gnas par gyur cig ces te sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_bdag la dge ba'i bshes gnyen dkon par ma gyur cig ces te sbyin pa de sbyin pa dang /_bdag la sems can thams cad dga' ba'i mig 
[\[280b.5\]]dang ldan par gyur cig ces te sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /_bdag gi sbyin pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par gyur cig ces sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa gzhan rnams kyi rjes su slob par ma gyur cig ces 
[\[280b.6\]]te sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /_bdag mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po bsags pa yongs su 'dzin par gyur cig ces te sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /_bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang /_bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur cig ces te sbyin pa sbyin pa ste/_mi 
[\[280b.7\]]'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]yongs su dag pa yin no/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang bral bas lus yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang /_bdag gi lha sangs rgyas la mi slu ba'i mtshan nyid kyis ngag yongs su dag 
[\[281a.2\]]pa'i tshul khrims dang /_brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba med pas sems yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang /_lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong bas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang /_nyi tshe ba'i sa thams 
[\[281a.3\]]cad mi ston pas byang chub kyi sems dang /_bsam pa mi brjed pa'i tshul khrims dang /_shin tu nyams pa med cing g.yo dang bral bas lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang /_skye bo phal pa thams cad sdud pas 'phags pa'i skye bos bsngags pa'i tshul 
[\[281a.4\]]khrims dang /_sems can thams cad la sems snyoms par byams pa sngon du 'gro ba'i tshul khrims dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pas snying rje chen po la rab tu sbyor ba'i tshul khrims dang /_dam bcas pa'i stobs kyis bslab pa rdzogs pa med pa yang dag 
[\[281a.5\]]par 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims dang /_kha na ma tho ba chung ngu la yang 'jigs par lta bas ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i tshul khrims dang /_shin tu mi gtong bas skyon med pa'i tshul khrims dang /_spyod pa shin tu dag pas thun tshags ma yin pa'i tshul khrims 
[\[281a.6\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du 'gro bas rang gi rnam pa mang po la dbang byed pa'i tshul khrims dang /_skye bo mkhas pas rig pa'i phyir sngags pa'i tshul khrims dang /_ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad kyi lam las sgrol ba'i tshul khrims dang /_bde ba'i dngos po thams cad 
[\[281a.7\]]la rab tu gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang /_sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims yongs su rdzogs par byed pas sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims dang /_yi dam la brtan pas mi lhod pa'i tshul khrims dang /_rang gi sems nges par sems pas bdag la mi stod gzhan la 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]mi smod pa'i tshul khrims dang /_nyon mongs pa med pas nges par sems pa'i snying rje'i tshul khrims dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad la nye bar byed pa'i tshul khrims dang /_rab tu dga' bar byed pa la dga' bar byed pa'i tshul khrims dang /_'dod pa dang /_chags 
[\[281b.2\]]pa med pas chog shes par byed pa'i tshul khrims dang /_nan tan snying por byed pas bsgrub pa rlabs po che'i tshul khrims dang /_khyim gyi gnas thams cad la mi lta ba'i rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba'i tshul khrims dang /_chos kyi dga' ba la dga' mos pas dgon pa la dga' 
[\[281b.3\]]ba dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang /_'phags pa'i rigs la rton pas 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa la nges pa'i tshul khrims dang /_sdig pa 'dod pa thams cad dang bral bas sbyangs pa'i yon tan la yang dag par rab tu sbyor ba'i tshul khrims dang /_sems can med par 
[\[281b.4\]]rnam par spyod pas dmigs pa med par sbyor ba'i tshul khrims dang /_chad pa dang rtag pa yongs su spong bas lta bar song ba thams cad dang gti mug sel ba'i tshul khrims dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'gal bas byang chub kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i tshul khrims te/_
[\[281b.5\]]mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa 
[\[281b.6\]]yin no/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus la mi lta bas bzod par blta ba dang /_srog la mi chags par bzod par blta ba dang /_zhe sdang ba'i sems med par bzod par blta ba dang /_nyes par smras pa'i tshig dang du len pas bzod par blta ba 
[\[281b.7\]]dang /_nyam chung ba'i sems can la snying rje skyed pas bzod par blta ba dang /_ma bslabs pa la mi brnyas pas bzod par blta ba dang /_gnod pa byed pa rnams la lan glan pa'i mthu yod kyang lan mi ldon pas bzod par blta ba dang /_yan lag dang nying lag 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]thams cad bcad kyang mi 'khrugs shing gnod sems med pas bzod par blta ba dang /_brlang ba med pas bzod par blta ba dang /_gshe ba la slar mi gshe bas bzod par blta ba dang /_bsam pa dag pas bzod par blta ba dang /_rnyog pa'i sems 
[\[282a.2\]]med pas bzod par blta ba dang /_dkrugs pa'i sems med pas bzod par blta ba dang /_gzhan gyi sems bsrung bas bzod par blta ba dang /_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dngos pos bzod par blta ba dang /_snying rje'i blo dang ldan pas bzod par blta ba dang /_
[\[282a.3\]]nga rgyal med pas bzod par blta ba dang /_sems can thams cad la brnyas thabs med cing 'dud pas bzod par blta ba dang /_'bar ba med pas bzod par blta ba dang /_nye bar zhi bas bzod par blta ba dang /_nges par sems pas bzod par blta ba dang /_bdag gi 
[\[282a.4\]]'khrul pa la so sor rtog pas bzod par blta ba dang /_gzhan gyi 'khrul pa'i skyon la mi lta bas bzod par blta ba dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgoms pas bzod par blta ba dang /_chos la sems sbyor bas bzod par blta ba dang /_dang ba'i dngos pos bzod par 
[\[282a.5\]]blta ba dang /_sems la gdung ba med pas bzod par blta ba dang /_bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pas bzod par blta ba dang /_gsong po smra bas bzod par blta ba dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la dngang ba med pas bzod par blta ba dang /_ma skyes pa dang 
[\[282a.6\]]ma byung ba la mos pas bzod par blta ba dang /_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pas bzod par blta ba ste/_mi'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/
[\[282a.7\]]mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]'chad par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_chos kyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_sems can tshad med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus 
[\[282b.2\]]rtsom pa dang /_'khor ba tshad med pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_sangs rgyas tshad med pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa bsags pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_thos pa tshad med 
[\[282b.3\]]pa gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_sems can thams cad la legs par smra ba smra ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_sems can thams cad la rab tu gding bar byed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_sems can thams cad la bya ba ci yod ces bya ba la spro 
[\[282b.4\]]ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_sems can thams cad tshul khrims kyi bslab pa la gzud pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_bzod pa'i stobs thams cad dang /_des pa mi nyams 
[\[282b.5\]]par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad bskyed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_chags pa med pa'i shes rab mchog yongs su bskang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_
[\[282b.6\]]byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i gnas pa yongs su bskang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_mngon par shes pa thams cad la brtson 'grus bskyed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[282b.7\]]thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_bdud thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_stobs brtan pa chen pos pha rol gnon pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_pha rol rgol ba thams 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcad pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bskang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rgyan gyi phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa 
[\[283a.2\]]dang /_bya ba thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par byed cing brtson pa mi gtong ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_sems zhum pa med par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_ma rgal ba sgrol/_
[\[283a.3\]]ma grol ba dgrol/_dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung /_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams 
[\[283a.4\]]cad kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro zhing sangs rgyas la blta ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_sems dang lus dben pa'i phyir de'i brtson 'grus de dben pa las nges par byung 
[\[283a.5\]]ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa'i phyir de'i brtson 'grus de blang ba med cing dor ba med la/_gdeg pa med cing gzhag pa med de/_skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pas bsdus pa yin te/_mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis/_byang 
[\[283a.6\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dran pa 
[\[283a.7\]]yongs su dag pa dang /_blo gros yongs su dag pa dang /_rtogs pa yongs su dag pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /_khrel yod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_mos pa yongs su dag pa dang /_bsngo ba yongs po su dag pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems mi brjod pa yongs 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]su dag pa dang /_dbang po sbas pa yongs su dag pa dang /_mi gnas pa yongs su dag pa dang /_de la ma chags pa yongs su dag pa dang /_mngon par shes pa bskyed pa yongs su dag pa dang /_sems las su rung ba yongs su dag pa dang /_lus dben pa yongs su 
[\[283b.2\]]dag pa dang /_brag ca shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /_nang nye bar zhi ba yongs su dag pa dang /_phyi rol du mi rgyu ba yongs su dag pa dang /_dmigs pa'i lta ba spong ba yongs su dag pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /_sems can med pa dang /_srog med pa dang /_gso ba med 
[\[283b.3\]]pa dang /_gang zag med par so sor rtog cing khams gsum pa la mi gnas pa yongs su dag pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgo yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can la lta ba'i snying rje chen po yongs su dag pa dang /_shes rab la 'jug pas rab rib med cing snang ba yongs 
[\[283b.4\]]su dag pa dang /_rgyu dang /_'bras bu dang /_rnam par smin pa dang mi 'gal ba yongs su dag pa dang /_chos la sems pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_tshul bzhin gyi rnam pa'i chos la so sor rtog pa yongs su dag pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pa bsdu ba yongs su 
[\[283b.5\]]dag pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying po bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ma 'dres pa yongs su dag pa dang /_mi g.yo ba'i bsam gtan bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa la mi g.yeng ba yongs su 
[\[283b.6\]]dag pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa lta ba yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i mchog dang /_mchog ma yin pa shes nas so sor ci rigs par chos ston pa yongs su dag pa ste/_mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis 
[\[283b.7\]]po 'di dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]lta ste/_thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms pas mang du thos pa dang /_tshul bzhin yid la byed pas chos rnams la dpyod pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa dang /_byang chub mngon sum du byed pa'i bdag nyid chos bsgrub pa shes pa dang /_phung po la mkhas pa la 'jug 
[\[284a.2\]]pas rnam par grol ba shes pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa'i shes pa dang /_skye mched la mkhas pa'i shes pa dang /_rgyu dang bya ba khong du chud pas stong pa'i rnam par rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /_bden pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa dang /_der mi ltung 
[\[284a.3\]]bar skyon med pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_bsams bzhin du skye bas skye ba la so sor mi rtog pa'i shes pa dang /_gzod ma nas rnam par dag pas chos thams cad mi skye bar shes pa dang /_phyin ci log tu gyur pa yongs su smin par byed pas sems can thams cad bdag med par 
[\[284a.4\]]shes pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i phyir chos thams cad chos gcig tu shes pa dang /_nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir zhing thams cad zhing gcig tu shes pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pas sangs rgyas thams cad sangs 
[\[284a.5\]]rgyas gcig tu shes pa dang /_yi ge shes pa la mkhas pas chos kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes pa dang /_legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i spobs pas chos rgya cher shes pa dang /_thos pa thams cad 
[\[284a.6\]]'dzin pas gzungs brjed pa med pa'i shes pa dang /_bdud de dag byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed pas/_bdud kyi las thams cad khong du chud pa'i shes pa dang /_rnam par bsgrubs te so sor nye bar gnas par shes pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtog pa'i shes pa 
[\[284a.7\]]dang /_shin tu yongs su grub pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad rmi lam dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang /_mig yor dang /_brag ca lta bu'i tshul du ston pa shes pa dang /_shes pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad khong du 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]chud pa'i shes pa dang /_shin tu bslabs pa'i phyir 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa brtags par shes pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i phyir stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnam pa'i chos shes pa dang /_gzod ma nas bral ba 
[\[284b.2\]]med pa'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhi ba dang /_rab tu zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi bar shes pa dang /_ma rig pa dang /_gti mug gi mun pa kun tu bcom pa'i phyir chos thams cad la rab rib med cing snang ba thob pa dang /_chos thams cad gar yang mi 'gro gang nas kyang 
[\[284b.3\]]mi 'ong bar shes pas shes rab kyi 'od dang ldan zhing sems can thams cad la rnam par thar pa'i chos ston pa dang /_las dang bya ba khong du chud pas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang 'gro bar skye ba ston pa dang /_don dang chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa'i tshul la mkhas te 
[\[284b.4\]]phyad par de kho na'i lung ston pas/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang /_bdag dul ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_grol ba dang /_sbas pa dang /_byang bas yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i phyir don yod pa'i chos ston pa dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas sangs 
[\[284b.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis de shes rab las nges par byung bar rig nas/_chos kyi grong khyer thams cad yongs su skyong bar byin gyis rlob pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la yang dag par gzhol te/_mtha' la gnas pa'i tshul nges par byas pas lung 
[\[284b.6\]]bstan pa'i sa rab tu thob pa yin te/_mi'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/mi'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na thabs la 
[\[284b.7\]]mkhas par rig par bya'o/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' bdag zad par mi byed pas sems can la lta ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsod nams chen po la gnas pa dang /_sems can thams 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]cad kyi sbyin gnas kyi phyir sbyin gnas mi tshol ba dang /_sems can dbul po yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rgya chen po don du mi gnyer ba dang /_sems can thams cad ngag bsdam pa la sbyar ba'i phyir/_lkugs pa dang /_dig pa lta bur ston pa dang /_bud 
[\[285a.2\]]med dang bu mo yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_bud med yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_khye'u yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_khye'u'i gzugs su ston pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang 'thun par bya ba'i phyir/_gzugs thams cad ston pa dang /_sems can 
[\[285a.3\]]myos pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_myos pa ma yin yang myos pa'i lus su ston pa dang /_de la mos pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i phyir/_smyon pa dang sems g.yengs pa'i gzugs su ston pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_lo brgyar 
[\[285a.4\]]bsags pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po 'dor ba dang /_chos 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir/_sems can rnams la dga' ba dang /_thams cad la rtse ba dang /_longs spyod ston pa dang /_de la mos pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_g.yon can ma rungs pas 'tsho 
[\[285a.5\]]ba'i lus su ston pa dang /_bud med gang tshong dpon dang /_khyim bdag dang /_rgyal po'i chung mar gyur pa bu med pa bu'i tshe 'dod pa'i mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan zhing /_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba la de na byang chub sems dpas de dag dge ba la dad cing /_yongs su smin par bya ba'i 
[\[285a.6\]]phyir de'i bur khas len pa dang /_'brog dgon par song ba'i sems can dbul po la bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_nor sbyin zhing bgo bsha' bya ba'i phyir 'gron po mang po'i nang du ded dpon du 'gyur ba dang /_gter chen po mdun du byas te nor gyi phung po chen po byin nas 
[\[285a.7\]]chos ston pa dang /_mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi mya ngan gyi zug rngu bsal nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang /_gter stor ba'i sems can rnams kyi mdun du gter chen po nye bar bstan nas 'tsho ba yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /_
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]de dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la 'jug pa'i phyir gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa can dang /_kun tu rgyu ba rnams kyi nang du rab tu 'byung ba dang /_sems can 'dod chags kyi lcags kyus zin pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smad 'tshong ma'i khyim dang /_slas kyi nang du bu 
[\[285b.2\]]mo'i gzugs mdzes pa blta na sdug par ston pa dang /_sems can rnams mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyis yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dus pa chen po dang /_tshogs pa mang po'i nang du rnga dang /_rnga mri dang ga dang rnga pa na ba dang dung gi sgras sa chen po mdzes par byas nas/_bdag 
[\[285b.3\]]nye bar ston cing sems can 'dun pa de dag la rol mo'i dbyangs sgra de dag las chos ston pa'i sgra 'byin cing bzo'i gnas thams cad nye bar ston pa dang /_mya ngan du son pa'i 'gron pa bza' ba dang /_btung ba zad pa la mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtse zhing de'i stobs 
[\[285b.4\]]kyis bza' ba dang /_btung ba byin nas bkres pa dang bral zhing skom pa dang bral ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_sems can gang dag dmus long du gyur pa de dag gi nang du dmus long lta bur gyur nas/_dbul po mig med pa de dag la rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs 
[\[285b.5\]]kyis bza' ba dang /_btung ba 'byor bar byas nas/_mig byin te rang gi gzugs bstan nas/_ji ltar de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos ston pa dang /_rgyal po'i khri mon du bcug pa'i srog chags brgya 
[\[285b.6\]]phrag du ma g.yon can sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_bsams bzhin du bdag rkun por ston cing de g.yon can no zhes shes par byas nas/_khri mon du bcug pa dang de der zhugs nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bcings pa de dag gi lus bkrus 
[\[285b.7\]]shing bskus te/_gos bzang po bskon nas bza' ba dang /_btung bas lus tshim par byas te/_bcings pa dam po de dag las bkrol nas ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos ston pa dang /_sems can gang dag 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]rgyal pos gsad par bkri ba srog 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa'i thob pa sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyis gzhan dag cig sprul te/_rdzu 'phrul gyis gshed ma la bkris 
[\[286a.2\]]nas gsad par 'os pa'i mi de dag bcings pa de las bkrol te/_'jigs pa dang bral ba srog rnyed pa dang /_dbugs phyin pa de dag la ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur chos ston pa dang /_phyogs gang na don dang /_nor dang /_
[\[286a.3\]]zhing dang /_khyim gyi dngos po dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_dmag mi'i phyir 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_mtshang 'dru bar gyur pa der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs kyis dbus su 'dug nas rdzu 'phrul gyis 
[\[286a.4\]]don dang /_nor dang rin po che yongs su btang ste/_de dag 'dum par sbyor ro/_/de dag dum par rigs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas yan lag dang /_nying lag thams 
[\[286a.5\]]cad kyi dbang po nyams pa med kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dbang po nyams par yang ston pa dang /_spyod lam phun sum tshogs kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir spyod lam thams cad 'khrugs par yang byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thabs la 
[\[286a.6\]]mkhas pas gzhan mu stegs can ston pa dang /_ring du gnas pa bdud kyi spyod yul la spyod pa bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mu stegs can de dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dgug pa'i phyir de dag gi mdun du dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[286a.7\]]dpa' thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las log nas bsams bzhin du 'dod pa'i khams su skye ste/_mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa rnams la skye ba'i sdug 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]bsngal bstan nas dben pa thob pa rnams bla ma'i lam bsgom du gzud pa'i phyir/_mya ngan las 'das pa ston pa dang /_skyon med pa la ma zhugs pa la mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar 'dun pa rnams kyi mdun du/_byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa sangs rgyas kyi sku ston pa 
[\[286b.2\]]dang /_sangs rgyas la dad pa thob cing /_sems mnyam par bzhag pa rnams byang chub kyi sems len du gzud pa'i phyir/_rkyen 'di shes pa la 'jug pa nye bar ston pa ste/_mi'am ci'i bdag po rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[286b.3\]]chen po thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa la 'jug pa yongs su dag pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa na/_mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i 'khor dang /_de ma yin pa gzhan lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za'i srog chags 
[\[286b.4\]]dgu khri brgyad stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor byang chub sems dpa' las byang chub sems dpa' khri brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po ni shes rab sgron ma 
[\[286b.5\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par gyur to/_/de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi gtam gyis rab tu dga' bar byas/_yang dag par 'dzin du btsud/_gzengs bstod/_yang dag par bstan pas/_tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' 
[\[286b.6\]]ste/_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas/_rin thang med pa'i ras bcos ma phrugs gcig bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab bo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la yang rin thang med pa'i gos kyis so sor bkab bo/_/gnas 
[\[286b.7\]]thams cad ni yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/_/de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i bu brgyad stong pos rin po che'i pad ma bkod pa dang /_rin po che'i gdugs brgyad stong du tshang bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/_gtor ma thag tu 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag thams cad 'khor gyi khyams der bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad stong tsam na/_rin po che'i gdugs gcig tu gnas par gyur to/_/de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i bu brgyad stong pos bcom ldan 
[\[287a.2\]]'das kyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di mthong nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/_lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de dag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[287a.3\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang thos pas bdag cag byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba byang chub tu yongs su smin par bgyid pa'i chos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la bshad du gsol/_
[\[287a.4\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i bu de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas ta la bdun srid kyi steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs nas sku las 'di lta bu'i 'od phyung ste/_'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba 
[\[287a.5\]]chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/gang mi'am ci dang /_dri za dang /_lto 'phye de dag dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gi rol mo sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs de dag thams cad ma brdungs ma dkrol bar mdzes pa dang ldan par 'khrol lo/_/ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang na dri'i shing dang me 
[\[287a.6\]]tog gi shing dang 'bras bu'i shing ji snyed pa de dag las kyang rol mo sil snyan gyi sgra byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong byung ngo /_/'od zer thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang pad ma tshad shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam dag byung ngo /_/pad ma'i 
[\[287a.7\]]snying po thams cad la yang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyes bu chen po mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun tu brgyan pa'i lus dag gnas par kun tu snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi mthus rol mo sil snyan de dag las ni yongs su 'dri ba'i tshigs su bcad pa byung /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]de dag thams cad ni sgra dbyangs dang skad gcig gis tshigs su bcad nas nges par lan 'debs so/_/de la sil snyan las tshigs su bcad pa/_bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/_/ji lta bur ni skyed pa dang /_/byang chub snying por 'dug bar du/_/sems ni brjed pa med par 'gyur/_/
[\[287b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_sems can kun gyi ched kyi phyir/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs/_/snying rje che dang ldan pa ni/_/byang chub sems brjed mi 'gyur ro/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_de dag bsam pa ji lta bu/_/rab tu 'byor pa 
[\[287b.3\]]ci 'dra zhig_/de dag snying rje chen po la/_/nges par sems pa ji ltar skye/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_g.yo med lhag pa'i bsam pa ste/_/de dag sbyor ba bcos ma min/_/mya ngan 'da' sgor 'jog pa ni/_/de dag snying rje po sdong de 'dra'o/_/sil snyan 
[\[287b.4\]]rnams kyis smras pa/_de dag gtong ba ji lta bu/_/ji ltar byin nas 'gyod med cing /_/rnam smin don du mi gnyer bar/_/byang chub tu ni sngo bar byed/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_dngos po kun la mi lta ba/_/des ni byin nas 'gyod pa med/_/byang 
[\[287b.5\]]chub lam du 'jog byed pa/_/de phyir rnam smin re ba med/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_ji ltar tshul khrims ldan gyur kyang /_/tshul khrims kyis ni rlom sems med/_/theg chen bla na med pa la/_/ngang tshul ngan can smin par byed/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 
[\[287b.6\]]rnams kyis smras pa/_byang chub sems kyi tshul khrims ldan/_/stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems med/_/byams pa chen po skyed pa ni/_/ngang tshul ngan can yongs smin byed/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_ji ltar na ni sems can gyi/_/spyos shing bsdigs pa bzod byed cing /_/
[\[287b.7\]]sems kyis gnod pa mi byed la/_/mchog tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi/_/nyon mongs gso ba'i sman pa snyam/_/de dag ngan par smras pa yi/_/tshig thos zhe sdang mi 'gyur ro/_/sil 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_de dag brtson 'grus ji lta bu/_/pha rol gnon pa'ang ci 'dra zhig_/ji ltar zhum pa med sems kyis/_/byang chub spyad pa spyod par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_chos dang sems can bsrung ba ni/_/
[\[288a.2\]]pha rol gnon dang brtson 'grus so/_/dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pa ni/_/des na sems ni zhum mi 'gyur/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_de dag ji ltar dran dang ldan/_/blo gros rtogs par khong du chud/_/ji ltar bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/_/de la chags pa med par 'gyur/_/
[\[288a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_g.yeng ba med pa dran dang ldan/_/tshul 'chos med pa blo gros ldan/_/thabs kyis bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/_/des na de la chags mi 'gyur/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_ji ltar shes rab ldan pa dang /_/yang 
[\[288a.4\]]dag lta ba drang po dang /_/chos rnams rnam par dbye ba la/_/mkhas shing 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_thos pas shes rab kun tu 'phel/_/rten pas lta ba drang por 'gyur/_/chos kyi sbyin pas nges 'gyur te/_/tshul 
[\[288a.5\]]bzhin gyis ni don rtogs 'gyur/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_ji ltar thos pa btsal bas na/_/de dag thos pa mang du 'gyur/_/gang gis che ba'i bdag 'gyur bar/_/thos pa'i chos rnams ston par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_
[\[288a.6\]]gus par byas te thos tshol zhing /_/sgrub pa'i thos pa mang du 'gyur/_/zang zing med par chos sbyin pa/_/des ni che ba'i bdag nyid 'gyur/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_de dag byams pa ji lta bu/_/de dag snying rje ci 'dra zhig_/de dag dga' ba ji lta bu/_/btang snyoms 
[\[288a.7\]]kyang ni ci 'dra zhig_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_sems dang btang snyoms byams pa ste/_/sems can 'grol ba'i snying rje'o/_/sangs rgyas chos dga' dga' ba ste/_/gnyis spangs pa ni btang snyoms so/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]ji ltar sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/_/sems kyang ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur/_/chos thos nas ni ji lta bur/_/de dag the tshom skye mi 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran bsgoms pa/_/des ni 'dren pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/
[\[288b.2\]]the tshom med cing bsam dag pas/_/chos thos nas ni som nyi med/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_bsod nams tshogs ni ji lta bu/_/ye shes tshogs kyang ci 'dra zhig_/de dag zhi gnas lhag mthong la/_/brtson pa yang ni ji lta bu/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[288b.3\]]gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_ngoms mi shes pa bsod nams tshogs/_/'dri ba rnams ni ye shes tshogs/_/zhi ba'i sems ni zhi gnas te/_/chos shes pa ni lhag mthong ngo /_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_de dag gi ni spyod yul gang /_/de dag gnas kyang ji lta bu/_/
[\[288b.4\]]de dag gnas pa ci 'dra zhig_/de dag sbyor ba'ang ji lta bu/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_de dag spyod yul stong pa nyid/_/gnas ni pha rol phyin pa'i lam/_/gnas pa bsam gtan bzhi rnams te/_/sems can rab grol sbyor ba'o/_/sil 
[\[288b.5\]]snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_de dag bdud kyi las gang yin/_/sangs rgyas phrin las ji lta bu/_/ci 'dra ba yi las byas na/_/byang chub la ni gzhol bar 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_theg pa chung ngu bdud kyi las/_/sangs rgyas phrin 
[\[288b.6\]]las theg pa che/_/sdig pa thams cad spong ba ni/_/byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur ba'o/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_de dag grogs bsten ji lta bu/_/sdig pa'i grogs po ci 'dra zhig_/log par lta la mi gnas shing /_/ji ltar yang dag song bar 'gyur/_/byang 
[\[288b.7\]]chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_gang zhig byang chub lam ston pa/_/rtag tu bde sbyin grogs po'o/_/byang chub sems las gang zlog pa/_/de dag sdig pa'i grogs por shes/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_/lam du 'jug par 'gyur ba yi/_/
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]lta ba drang po ji lta bu/_/sbyor ba rnam par shes nas su/_/ji ltar lta de 'jig mi byed/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_las dang bya bar 'jug pa ni/_/de dag drang por lta ba yin/_/log par sbyor ba rnam shes nas/_/lta ba de dag 
[\[289a.2\]]'jig mi byed/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_ji ltar dam pa'i chos bsrung zhing /_/sems can yongs su smin par byed/_/ji lta bu yi thabs kyis ni/_/de dag byang chub bsgrub par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_brtson 'grus kyis 
[\[289a.3\]]ni chos bsrung ste/_/bsdu bas yongs su smin par byed/_/mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pas ni/_/byang chub sgrub par byed pa yin/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_de dag shes pa'i lam ci 'dra/_/nga rgyal las ni ji lta bu/_/ji ltar bka' blo bde ba dang /_/thams cad dus 
[\[289a.4\]]su 'thun par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_rtsod pa med pa shes pa'i las/_/nga rgyal las ni rtsod pa 'byung /_/nges par bka' blo bde ba ste/_/gus pa yis ni 'thun par 'gyur/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_de dag lam ni ji lta 
[\[289a.5\]]bu/_/log pa'i lam yang ci 'dra zhig_/bla med byang chub lam du ni/_/ji ltar sems can rab tu 'god/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_lam ni pha rol phyin pa drug_/theg pa chung ngu log pa'i lam/_/shes rab thabs la bslabs pa ni/_/sems 
[\[289a.6\]]can lam la 'dzud pa'o/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_ji lta bur na nor chen 'gyur/_/de dag rnyed pa'ang ci 'dra zhig_/gter rnams kyang ni ji lta bu/_/gang gis de dag 'gro tshim byed/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_nor bdun dang ni rtag tu ldan/_/
[\[289a.7\]]chos rnyed pa ni rnyed pa'o/_/de dag gter ni gzungs yin te/_rab tu rnyed nas tshim par byed/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_de dag gi ni pha ma gang /_/nye du'i tshogs ni ji lta bu/_/g.yog rnams kyang ni ci 'dra zhig_/gang gis mkhas pa de dag mdzes/_/
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_ma ni shes rab pha ni thabs/_/nye du byang chub phyogs rnams yin/_/dge ba rnams ni g.yog yin te/_/des ni mkhas pa de dag mdzes/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_ji ltar bdag med rtogs nas ni/_/byams pas 
[\[289b.2\]]'gro ba khyab par byed/_/bdag med pa dang byams pa dag_/de la ji ltar mtshungs par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_gang dag stong nyid rab shes pa/_/de ni bdag med khong du chud/_/gang gis 'gro ba stong shes pa/_/de ni de yi byams 
[\[289b.3\]]pa mchog_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_'du byed rnams ni rang bzhin gyis/_/'ong ba med cing 'gro med na/_/las dang las kyi rnam par smin/_/ji lta bur na 'thad par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_dam pa'i don du 'ong med de/_/gang 
[\[289b.4\]]du'ang 'gro ba yod ma yin/_/kun rdzob tu na lam 'jug cing /_/rnam par smin pa nye bar ston/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_stong nyid mtshan ma med pa dang /_/smon lam rnam par spangs par ni/_/mtshan nyid gcig tu rab rtogs nas/_/de kho na ni ji ltar shes/_/byang 
[\[289b.5\]]chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_stong nyid gang yin de mtshan med/_/mtshan ma don du gnyer med pa/_/mtshan nyid gcig cing don gcig ste/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo bstan to/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_gang gis mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i/_/
[\[289b.6\]]stong par rtog pa ji lta bu/_/sems can lta ba ji lta bu/_/yongs su smin byed ji lta bu/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_shes rab kyis ni stong par rtogs/_/thabs kyis sems can rnams la lta/_/snying rjes yongs su smin par byed/_/des 
[\[289b.7\]]ni mya ngan 'das par 'gro/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_chos 'di dag ni chos nyid kyis/_/skye ba med cing 'byung med par/_/tshul mchog 'di 'dra shes nas ni/_/gang gis 'khor bar skye bar 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_mi skye ba 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]dang mi 'byung ba/_/de ni shes rab spyod yul lo/_/bsams bzhin du ni gang skye ba/_/de ni thabs kyi tshul yin no/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_gtong la dga' bar ji ltar 'gyur/_/ji lta bur ni phyir mi ldog_/ji ltar bzod pa phun sum tshogs/_/
[\[290a.2\]]ji ltar rnam par nges par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_mnyam par gnas par gtong la dga'/_/chos kyi dbyings las phyir mi ldog_/mi skye ba la bzod pa ste/_/chos shes nas ni rnam par nges/_/sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/_byang 
[\[290a.3\]]chub snying po snying po gang /_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub mtshan nyid gang /_/ci phyir rdzogs sangs rgyas shes bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar grol/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/_byang chub snying po nam mkha' ste/_/byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid 
[\[290a.4\]]do/_/gang yang kun nas gti mug med/_/de bzhin nyid phyir de bzhin gshegs/_/de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i bu de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo/_/de dag gis bzod pa rab tu thob nas rang rang gi gos dang rgyan bcom 
[\[290a.5\]]ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/_'di skad ces kyang gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du bdag cag gis nyan pa'i rna ba 'di lta bu thob pas sangs rgyas ni bdag cag gi ched du byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das sil snyan dang glu dbyangs 'di dag las the tsom 'dri ba'i sgra 
[\[290a.6\]]'di lta bu byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di dag gis dris pa de dag thams cad kyi lan btab pas 'khor 'di'i dogs pa thams cad spangs pa dang /_bdag cag kyang chos kyi snang ba dpag tu ma mchis pa skyes pa ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das sil snyan de dag 
[\[290a.7\]]las sgra 'di lta bu byung ba'i rgyu ci lags/_su'i byin gyi rlabs kyis na byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di dag gis lan 'debs par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs su blta'o/_/bzhin 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis/_nam mkha' las kyang chos kyi sgra 'di lta bu byung na sil snyan las chos kyi sgra ci phyir mi 'byung ste/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i 
[\[290b.2\]]bu de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par gyur cig/_//bam po bzhi pa/_de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i slas mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong mu tig kha 
[\[290b.3\]]dog sna tshogs kyi do shal thogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas ji ltar thogs pa'i mu tig gi do shal de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab bo/_/mu tig gi do shal de dag phul ma thag tu 
[\[290b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la mu tig gi do shal gyi khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur te/_khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyang gru bzhi lham pa/_ka ba bzhi zug pa/_cha mnyam pa/_ngos shin 
[\[290b.5\]]tu rnam par phye ba sha stag go/_/khang pa brtsegs pa de dag ni rin po ches spras pa'i khri rtsa ba yang rin po che las byas pa/_lha'i ras bcos ma'i zung du ma bkram pa dag byung bar gyur to/_/khri de dag thams cad la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa 
[\[290b.6\]]gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dag bzhugs par kun tu snang ngo /_/de nas mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong nas/_tshim zhing mgu ste yid rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes te bsam pa thag pa nas bla 
[\[290b.7\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed nas dga' zhing mchog tu dga' ste dad pa thob nas/_thams cad kyis sgra skad dang dbyangs gcig tu tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]mngon par bstod do/_/bla na med pa'i dgra bcom mchog gsung ba/_/don dgongs mtshungs pa ma mchis bsam mi khyab/_/don dang chos dang 'dul ba rab bslabs pa/_/sems can mchog la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug tha ba 'jig_/
[\[291a.2\]]dgon par bzhugs dgyes bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/_/rin chen mdzod dang rin chen ston pa po/_/bcom ldan rgyal po'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/spyan sngar dri bral nyon mongs mi mnga' ba/_/sa yi dbang po pha rol dgra 'joms pa/_/pad mo lta bur srid gsum mi gos pa/_/bde 
[\[291a.3\]]gshegs mchog brnyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'gro ba'i nang na mig dang 'drar spyod cing /_/nyi zla 'di yi 'od ni spa bkong ba/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su rgyal por skyes/_/'khor lo mtshan mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ming dang gzugs la nam yang mi chags shing /_/
[\[291a.4\]]mgon dang dpung dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen gyur/_/khyod dang mtshungs med lhag pa ga la zhig_/mtha' yas dbyangs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/_/brnyes dang ma brnyes nam yang chags mi mnga'/_/'jig rten chos rnams zil gyis mnan te bzhugs/_/chags sred 
[\[291a.5\]]'khri shing dra ba grol mdzad pa/_/bcom ldan 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dul ba thugs ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhag_/nyon mongs bsregs te stobs bcus rab bzhugs shing /_/'gro la zang zing mi mnga' sbyin stsol pa/_/sbyin pa'i gnas la mgo bos 
[\[291a.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/smra mchog dam pa mtshan gyi 'od 'phros pa/_/lam log phyin ci log ni rnam par spangs/_/'jam zhing snum la snyan pa'i gsung gsung pa/_/srid pa gsum las 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mi mchog gdung bas gdungs pa mi mnga' ba/_/rdzu 
[\[291a.7\]]'phrul gyis ni bye ba'i zhing du gshegs/_/'gro ba rab tu sgrol ba'i gru mdzad pa/_/bcom ldan bran 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan brtson 'grus dag la ston mdzad pa/_/chags shing zhen pa'i 'gro dang mngon shes drug_/ldan zhing mkhas pa'i nyan thos 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]rnams kyang 'grel/_/'gro drug nye gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gser gyi kha dog 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhi gnas dbang po dul la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ston gyi zla 'dra'i zhal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mi mchog yon tan mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nyon mongs 
[\[291b.2\]]bsregs shing bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/_/skye dgu 'di dag bsgral dka' chu bzhi sgrol/_/bsgoms shing dbang po thul ba'i bcom ldan 'das/_/khyod la skyabs su mchi bar mchid kyis 'tshal/_/thub pas sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab stsal/_/bslangs na dbang po 
[\[291b.3\]]dgyes par rab 'gyur ba/_/pha rol dag la sbyin pa mchog stsol ba/_/gtong dpa' bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can nga rgyal rgyags khengs gti mug pa/_/rgyu dang rkyen dang bya ba 'gal bgyid rnams/_/'phags pa bla na med pa'i lam mchog la/_/rnam par 
[\[291b.4\]]'dren pa chen po khyod kyis bkod/_/phung po rang bzhin gyis ni stong mkhyen nas/_/las dang nyon mongs zil gyis mnan te bzhugs/_/'dren pa 'gro ba rnams kyi som nyi gcod/_/bcom ldan dus gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bden pa'i chos la dgyes shing mnyam 
[\[291b.5\]]par bzhag_/chos rnams kun la mnga' dbang pha rol phyin/_/bla na med pa kha lo sgyur ba mchog_/bcom ldan ded dpon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'chos pa mi mnga' g.yo sgyu rnams dang bral/_/bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms pa'i stobs po che/_/mi mchog lam dang lam 
[\[291b.6\]]ma lags la mkhas/_/rlung dmar lta bur ci la'ang chags mi mnga'/_/gzir bar gyur gsal pha rol shin tu gnas/_/thub pa bas ma 'tshal ba'i bang mdzod mnga'/_/spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na gang gA yi/_/bye ma snyed kyi mi mchog rnams la mchod/_/mthu brnyes mi g.yo 
[\[291b.7\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/chags pa'i skyon mi mnga' zhing thang la bzhugs/_/gnas na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba rnams kyis bsten/_/de slad mi rnams mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/skye dang na dang rga shi rnam par spangs/_/tshe rabs bye ba bsam mi khyab pa dgongs/_/bcom 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]ldan 'das kyi mkhyen pa'i gdugs 'od kyis/_/'jigs pa chen po'i dra ba rab tu 'dral/_/'dren pa rmi 'drar chos rnams thugs su chud/_/phyag dang zhabs la bkra shis mtshan mnga' zhing /_/bkra shis bgyid las 'jam pa'i ran slong ba/_/bcom ldan 
[\[292a.2\]]bkra shis mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gzungs rnams la ni dbang gi pha rol phyin/_/zang zing mi mnga' chos kyi sbyin pa stsol/_/thub pa chos kyi rnga ni rab brdungs pa/_/chos rje bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shAkya'i rigs dus rgyal po'i las byung ba/_/dbang 
[\[292a.3\]]po zhi zhing thugs kyang rab tu zhi/_/ston pa srid gsum 'jig rten rnam gzigs pa/_/bde gshegs zhi thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdud rnams dpung dang bcas pas rno ba yi/_/ral gri thogs nas byang chub drung lhags kyang /_/khyod kyi ba spu tsam yang ma g.yos te/_/
[\[292a.4\]]bcom ldan ri rab mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mi yi dam pa bzod pa'i pha rol phyin/_/sku rnams kun la nongs pa bgyis kyang bzod/_/yang 'byung ba dang skye dang 'chi bas dpa'/_/bzod gsung bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mthu brnyes bde bar gshegs pa mi 
[\[292a.5\]]g.yo ba/_/gnas dang gnas min mkhas pa bsnyengs mi mnga'/_/khyod kyis sems can mang po byang chub bkod/_/chos gnas rgyal ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'dus bgyis nyam chung snying po med par mkhyen/_/skye ba'i tshogs ni nyung ba ma lags sel/_/khyod kyi 
[\[292a.6\]]mkhyen pa srid gsum khyad par 'phags/_/ye shes pha rol phyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can long ba sdug bsngal mgon med pa/_/de dag khyod kyis dkon mchog gsum tshim bgyis/_/khyod ni bdud dpung bcas pa skrag mdzad pa/_/bcom ldan mgon gyur khyod la 
[\[292a.7\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/stobs dang bsam gtan dang ni dbang po bsgoms/_/khyod kyis bdud ni dpung dang bcas pa bcom/_/srid pa rnams kyi nang na mchog gyur pa/_/thub pa dbang po bsgoms la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dad pa'i rtsa ba rgya chen chos bstan pa/_/mtshungs med byang 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]chub la ni chags mi mnga'/_/grib ma lta bur mkhyen nas bde gsungs pa/_/bcom ldan gdugs 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'dren pa rmi 'drar chos rnams thugs su chud/_/'phags pa'i 'khor lo rmi 'dra rab tu bskor/_/'dus bgyis yang dag tu ni rmi lam 'drar/_/
[\[292b.2\]]mkhyen nas sems can mang po dran par mdzad/_/khyod kyi ljags mchog dag pa dri mi mnga'/_/ljags kyis rang gi zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khebs/_/ljags ni pad ma 'dab ma brgya lta bu/_/ljags skyon mi mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/srid gsum kun la chags 
[\[292b.3\]]pa mi mnga' ba/_/'gro ba rnams la 'dod pa'i skyon mi gsung /_/'dod pa'i chags bral smad pa ma lags pa/_/byang chub mchog la srog chags mos par mdzad/_/nyon mongs dgra dang sdig pa'i dgra spangs pa/_/ser sna'i 'dod chags bral zhing chags mi mnga'/_/mi 
[\[292b.4\]]yi dam pa gser ltar dpal stug pa/_/khyod kyi mtshan dang grags pa chub par grags/_/gnas dang dbang po rnam par 'byed la mkhas/_/'di na bzhugs shing 'gro ba'i mig tu gyur/_/gnas dang yig 'bru tshig gi don bslabs pas/_/khyod kyis chu bo bzhi la zam 
[\[292b.5\]]pa btags/_/glang po rin thang ma mchis sbyin pa mdzad/_/'dren pa mi dang lha rnams sgrol ba po/_/khyod kyi yon tan mtha' ma mi rnyed de/_/mgon po khyod la bdag ni thal mo sbyar/_/mi yi mchog la rdul ni sbyin byin pas/_/mi mjed 'dzam bu'i rgyal por gyur lags 
[\[292b.6\]]na/_/'dir ni dbang po dang bas thal sbyar nas/_/skyabs su nye bar mchi ba smos ci 'tshal/_/phung po gsog ste nyam chung snying po med/_/stong pa sgyu ma chu zla 'dra bar ni/_/gau tam khyod kyis de dag yang dag mkhyen/_/phung po khams mkhas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sred 
[\[292b.7\]]pa'i srad bus dam du mdud bor te/_/srid pa'i 'gro bar dra bar rab grags pa/_/srid par 'gro ba rnams kyi dra ba de/_/bde gshegs khyod kyi mkhyen pa'i 'od kyis dral/_/tshangs pa'i sgra skad lta bu'i gsung brjod pa/_/sho be ma lags mi 'gyur 'drid ma lags/_/
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]phun tshogs gsung de de dag thos nas ni/_/thal mo sbyar te skyabs su nye bar mchi/_/phyag gi mthil gyis sa 'dir reg pa na/_/nags tshal bcas par rnam pa drug g.yos kyang /_/'dir ni gzhan la gnod par 'gyur ma mchis/_/bdud phyogs dgra 
[\[293a.2\]]bcom khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha yi rgyal po che dang mkhas pa gang /_/khyod kyi chos don gnyer zhing mchis pa rnams/_/de dag so sor chos bstan thos nas su/_/zhabs gnyis la ni rab tu gtugs par bgyid/_/de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i slas rnams kyis bcom 
[\[293a.3\]]ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs nas bud med kyi dngos pos bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[293a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus na/_ji ltar bdag cag bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/_skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos 
[\[293a.5\]]de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la legs par bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i slas de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sring mo dag de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig 
[\[293a.6\]]dang /_ji ltar bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i slas rnams kyis bcom ldan 
[\[293a.7\]]'das la legs so zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sring mo dag chos gcig dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing myur du bla na med 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_chos gcig po de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
