[\[293b.2\]]pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_'jig rten gsum las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brjed pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa ste/_sring mo dag chos gcig po 'di dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes 
[\[293b.3\]]pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro/_/sring mo dag gzhan yang chos gnyis dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro/_/gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phrag dog med pa dang /_ser sna med pa ste/_sring mo dag chos 'di gnyis dang 
[\[293b.4\]]ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/_/sring mo dag gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus kyi sdom pa 
[\[293b.5\]]gsum yongs su dag pa dang /_ngag gi sdom pa bzhi yongs su dag pa dang /_yid kyi sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa ste/_sring mo dag chos gsum po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[293b.6\]]sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_g.yo med par sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /_g.yo med par bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa dang /_g.yo med par tshul khrims sten 
[\[293b.7\]]pa dang /_g.yo med par chos nyan pa ste/_sring mo dag chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/_/sring mo dag gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]po thob par 'gyur ro/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos don du gnyer ba dang /_chos thos nas tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang /_bsam pa thag pa nas bud med kyi dngos po la smod pa dang /_rtag par rgyun du skyes pa'i lus 'thob par 
[\[294a.2\]]sems skyed pa dang /_ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa ste/_sring mo dag chos lnga po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/_/sring mo dag gzhan yang chos drug dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/_skyes 
[\[294a.3\]]pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/_/drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_drang ba dang /_mnyen pa dang /_sgyu med pa dang /_g.yo med pa dang /_bstsal ba med pa dang /_bcos pa med pa ste/_sring mo dag chos drug po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te 
[\[294a.4\]]skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/_/sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bdun dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/_/bdun gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi sku thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_sangs 
[\[294a.5\]]rgyas kyi chos thob par bya ba'i phyir chos rjes su dran pa dang /_rang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun bsdu ba'i phyir dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_smon lam yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su dor ba'i phyir gtong ba 
[\[294a.6\]]rjes su dran pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir lha rjes su dran pa dang /_de dag dgrol ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la sems pa ste/_sring mo dag chos bdun po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 
[\[294a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/sring mo dag gzhan yang chos brgyad dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zas la sred pa ma yin pa dang /_skom la sred pa ma yin pa dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang phreng 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma la sred pa ma yin pa dang /_skyed mos tshal du 'gro bar sred pa ma yin pa dang /_rgod pa dang 'jo ba la sred pa ma yin pa dang /_glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra la sred pa ma yin pa dang /_dga' ba dang rtse ba la sred pa ma yin pa dang /_rna 
[\[294b.2\]]ba dang /_sgra dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_lce dang /_ro dang /_lus dang /_reg la dga' ba la sred pa ma yin pa ste/_sring mo dag chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/_/sring mo dag gzhan yang 
[\[294b.3\]]chos dgu dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chad par lta ba ma yin pa dang /_rtag par lta ba ma yin pa dang /_bdag tu smra ba ma yin pa dang /_sems can du smra ba ma yin pa dang /_srog 
[\[294b.4\]]tu smra ba ma yin pa dang /_gang zag tu smra ba ma yin pa dang /_'byung bar lta ba ma yin pa dang /_'jig par lta ba ma yin pa dang /_rgyu dang rkyen la 'jug pa la mkhas pa yin te/_sring mo dag chos dgu po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos 
[\[294b.5\]]po thob par 'gyur ro/_/sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bcu dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad la byams par gnas pa dang /_gzhan gyi longs spyod la brnab sems mi 
[\[294b.6\]]skyed pa dang /_skyes pa'i sems su yid la byed pa skyed pa dang /_srog gi phyir yang rdzun gyi tshig mi smra ba dang /_phra ma'i tshig mi smra ba dang /_zhe gcod pa'i tshig mi smra ba dang /_tshig kyal pa mi smra ba dang /_pha rol po dga' zhing rtse ba la phrag dog med pa dang /_gnod sems 
[\[294b.7\]]kyi bag la nyal mngon par sgrub pa dang /_yang dag par lta ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa ste/_sring mo dag chos bcu po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/_/sring mo dag gzhan yang 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]bud med zab mo la mos pa yin te/_de gzugs la dbu ba rdos pa lta bur so sor rtog kyang gzugs kyis rgyags shing myos par mi 'gyur ba dang /_tshor ba la chu'i chu bur lta bur so sor rtog kyang bde ba'i tshor ba la rjes su chags pa med pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi 
[\[295a.2\]]tshor ba la khong khro bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba'i kun tu gti mug par mi 'gyur ba dang /_'du shes la smig rgyu lta bur so sor rtog cing bud med kyi 'du shes mi skyed/_skyes pa'i 'du shes mi skyed pa dang /_'du byed rnams la chu 
[\[295a.3\]]shing gi phung po lta bur so sor rtog ste/_'du byed thams cad la snying po med par rtogs nas 'du byed thams cad la mi gnas shing de la chags pa mi skyed pa dang /_rnam par shes pa la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog ste/_sems dang yid dang rnam par rig pa de sgyu ma byas pa bzhin du rtogs 
[\[295a.4\]]nas chos thams cad la chags pa med zhe sdang med gti mug med pa dang /_lus la 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ldan par so sor rtog ste/_'di lta ste/_sa'i khams dang ldan pa dang /_chu'i khams dang ldan pa dang /_me'i khams dang ldan pa dang /_rlung gi khams dang ldan par lus 
[\[295a.5\]]la so sor rtog go/_/lus 'di ni bsdus pa rtswa dang /_shing dang /_bong ba dang /_rtsig pa dang /_mig yor lta bu ste/_'di bdag ma yin/_sems can ma yin/_srog ma yin/_skyes bu ma yin/_gang zag ma yin gyi phyin ci log sngon du song bas rgyu dang bya ba dang /_las 
[\[295a.6\]]kyi byung ba'o/_/gzhan yang bud med mig la kha zas las skyes pa sha'i gong bu ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa rang bzhin gyis dben par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang /_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid la ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa dang /_rang 
[\[295a.7\]]bzhin gyis dben par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa'o/_/gzhan yang bud med lus la gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jug pa dang /_ngag la brag ca lta bur 'jug pa dang /_sems la sgyu ma lta bur 'jug pa'o/_/sring mo dag chos 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i slas de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das las bud med kyi dngos po las sgyur ba'i chos 
[\[295b.2\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste/_yi rangs shing rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/_/dri med 
[\[295b.3\]]dri bral dri ma gcod mdzad pa/_/rdul med rdul bral lhag pa'i gzi brjid mnga'/_/pad ma'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan dang mdzes pa'i thugs/_/dri med zla zhal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dga' mdzad zhi mdzad nyon mongs gcod mdzad pa/_/dga' ba ston pa rtag tu dgon par 
[\[295b.4\]]dgyes/_/rin chen 'byung gnas rin chen mdzod mnga' ba/_/yon tan mchog mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/pha rol gshegs pa gzhan gyi tshogs rnams 'joms/_/pad ma lta bur stong mchog bka' mchid gsung /_/lam mchog stsol cing dam pa'i don ston pa/_/
[\[295b.5\]]mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chu bo bzhi rgal bden bzhi'i bka' mchid gsung /_/sa la rgyu ba 'di la mig stsol ba/_/'khor lo mchog gi mtshan ni stong mnga' ba/_/rdul med phan mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nyon mongs rdul bsal dam pa mthu 
[\[295b.6\]]bo che/_/mgon po 'gro la mchog gi don mdzad pa/_/bdud kyi dpung rnams stobs med 'jig mdzad pa/_/bcom ldan stobs bcu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sred pa'i 'khri shing gcod mdzad mnyam pa med/_/brnyes pa dag dang ma brnyes mtshungs mnyam thugs/_/
[\[295b.7\]]'jig rten mthar 'byin snang ba'i sgron mdzad pa/_/rgya mtsho lta bu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dul zhing stobs bcu chen po dam pa mnga'/_/sbyin pa stsol cing rtag tu gtong la dgyes/_/dul ba zhi gnas yon tan pha rol phyin/_/nyon mongs rdul bsal khyod la phyag 'tshal 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]lo/_/mtshan mchog 'gro ba kun la dam pa stsol/_/skye bo'i 'dren pa lha yi mchog pas mchog_/byams dang stobs dang bzod la nges par dgyes/_/mchod 'os bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mar me lta bu dri med zla ba 'dra/_/phyi nang nyon mongs 
[\[296a.2\]]dri ma gcod mdzad pa/_/nyon mongs spangs pa yon tan bsod nams gter/_/zhi ba thugs zhi khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dad pa stsol ba dge sbyong zhi mdzad pa/_/ston pa skye mched drug las thar mdzad pa/_/rjes su dran drug shin tu yongs dag dran/_/rgyal ba dge sbyong rgyal 
[\[296a.3\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'dom gang 'od ni gser gyi kha dog blta/_/gsung snyan dam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbyangs/_/bcom ldan gang zag dam pa skyes bu mchog_/srid gsum zhi mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shes rab mun pa ma mchis pha rol gshegs/_/rtag tu 
[\[296a.4\]]dka' thub brtul zhugs rab tu spyod/_/de bzhin kho na gzhan min de bzhin gsung /_/mun par sgron ma 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bde gshegs grags ldan yon tan bas ma 'tshal/_/de bzhin nyid kyi chos kyi gnas ston pa/_/yon tan brjod pa mthong zhing grags bsgrags 
[\[296a.5\]]pas/_/mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bsngags la gnas shing brtul zhugs dka' thub 'phags/_/khengs dang nga rgyal rgyags pa gcod mdzad pa/_/ye shes 'byung gnas rdul bral blo gros mchog_/skye bo mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ka la 
[\[296a.6\]]bing ka tshangs dbyangs thugs rje can/_/'dod pa rtsod bgyid dri ma sel mdzad pa/_/phung po yongs mkhyen mkhas pa bde bar gshegs/_/yon tan tshogs mchog mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yon tan ston pa yon tan bstod mchod pa/_/zab mo blta dka' shin tu rtogs par dka'/_/'dzum 
[\[296a.7\]]zhal zla 'dra gsong por gsung mdzad pa/_/bdud stobs 'joms mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mnyam thugs kha lo sgyur ba rab dul thugs/_/kun gyis mngon bstod mnyam pa'i lam la gnas/_/thub pa mchog gsung bden pa'i bka' mchid can/_/bde gshegs mnyam 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lam stsol snyan pa shin tu 'jam pa'i dbyangs/_/bdud kyi sde mang 'joms mdzad nga rgyal dang /_/lhag pa'i nga rgyal mi mnga' tshul mi 'chos/_/thub pa dge sbyong rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dgyes/_/
[\[296b.2\]]rtag tu 'dod chags skyon dang rab rib bral/_/bde bar gshegs pa mi g.yo gnas la zhugs/_/stobs bcu mchog mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag dang zhabs ni dri med dra bas 'brel/_/skye dang rga dang 'chi ba mi mnga' ba/_/rgyal bar 'os pa 'gro ba kun las rgyal/_/nam 
[\[296b.3\]]mkha' mnyam thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i slas mi 'am ci'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 
[\[296b.4\]]'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer du ma kha dog sna tshogs byung ste/_'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po 
[\[296b.5\]]dang /_le brgan dang /_shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu'o/_/de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par 'od kyis khyab par byas te/_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od mog mog por byas te/_slar log nas bcom 
[\[296b.6\]]ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te zhe sa dang bcas shing gus pa dang bcas par 
[\[296b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'dis bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus pa/_bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa/_/zla ba dri ma med zhal khyod la zhu/_/dri med gzi brjid 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]mnga' ba khyod la zhu/_/gser gyi kha dog lta bu khyod la zhu/_/bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa/_/dam pa'i gzugs rnams mnga' ba khyod la zhu/_/'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad khyod la zhu/_/lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod khyod la zhu/_/bde bar 
[\[297a.2\]]gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa/_/sbyin dang dul la dgyes pa khyod la zhu/_/tshul khrims yongs dag gyur pa khyod la zhu/_/bzod pa'i stobs dang stobs stsol khyod la zhu/_/bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa/_/brtson 'grus stobs dang mthu mnga' khyod la zhu/_/
[\[297a.3\]]bsam gtan mngon shes dgyes pa khyod la zhu/_/shes rab nam mkha' mnyam pa khyod la zhu/_/bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa/_/rtag tu byams pa'i thugs can khyod la zhu/_/rtag tu thugs rje ldan pa khyod la zhu/_/dga' dang btang snyoms dgyes pa khyod la 
[\[297a.4\]]zhu/_/bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa/_/srid pa gsum po mthar 'byin khyod la zhu/_/spyan gsum dri ma mi mnga' khyod la zhu/_/bdud rtsi chos rnams gsung ba khyod la zhu/_/bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa/_/bdud rnams tha mar 'byin pa khyod 
[\[297a.5\]]la zhu/_/ngan pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms pa khyod la zhu/_/bden pa dam pa gzigs pa khyod la zhu/_/bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa/_/stobs bcu dam pa mnga' ba khyod la zhu/_/the tsom dag ni gcod mdzad khyod la zhu/_/yon tan stong gis brgyan pa khyod 
[\[297a.6\]]la zhu/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i slas rnams nga las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do/_/bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[297a.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur zhing skyes pa'i dngos po thob par bya ba'i phyir nga'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]bo mi 'am ci'i slas brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis bsam pa thag pa nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa 'dis 'di ni shi 'phos nas bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i lus thob nas dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang byang chub 
[\[297b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di kun 'gro ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub thob pa na mnyes par byed cing dam pa'i chos kyang kun bgro ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[297b.3\]]bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang rim gyis mnyes par byed par 'gyur/_de dag gis dam pa'i chos kyang kun bgro ba byed par 'gyur/_'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de dag rim gyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba thams cad kun 
[\[297b.4\]]tu rdzogs par byas nas/_gang gi tshe mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur te/_des de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston 
[\[297b.5\]]par yang 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad do/_/ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad kyi lam bkum mo/_/bde 'gro thams cad kyi 
[\[297b.6\]]lam rnam par sbyangs so/_/bdag cag byang chub kyi lam la rab tu bkod do/_/bdag cag la chos kyi gter bstan to/_/bdag cag ye shes kyis la bkod do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'bar bar bgyis so/_/pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs bstan to/_/thabs la mkhas pa 
[\[297b.7\]]bstan to/_/bdag cag byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin pa stsal to/_/chos bsgrags pas rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/dga' ba dang dang ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba thob pas gzengs bstod do/_/chos zab mo'i bzod pa la rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/bdag 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]cag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu bkod do/_/bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la byas pa gzo ba lags kyi byas pa mi gzo ba ma lags kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sha dang khrag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la lan mi lon na gzhan gyis lan ldon par 
[\[298a.2\]]mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/_ma la mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'di ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_'di'i ming ni 
[\[298a.3\]]ji skad ces bya bar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni ji snyed cig tu 'gyur/_longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa ni ji 'dra zhig tu 'gyur/_de'i sems can bkod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni ji 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur snyam mo/_/de nas bcom 
[\[298a.4\]]ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis yongs su mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer du ma kha dog tha dad pa kha dog brgya stong phrag du ma byung ste/_phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re rer yang sangs 
[\[298a.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bar byas te/_sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byas nas lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dun par byas te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan stong du bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 
[\[298a.6\]]'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon chad ma mdzad pa'i 'dzum pa mthong nas stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[298a.7\]]'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/_bde bar gshegs kyi 'dzum pa ci 'dra ba/_/de ring phyung ste thug 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]med bye ba'i zhing /_/rgya chen phyogs bcu'i gang gA'i rdul mtha' yas/_/khyab pa de 'dra sngon chad yong ma mthong /_/tshangs pa de bzhin 'jig rten skyong ba dang /_/nor bu me dang nyi ma zla ba'i 'od/_/mi dbang gzi brjid kyis ni mog mog gyur/_/'dzum mdzad 'di yi rgyu ni lung bstan 
[\[298b.2\]]gsol/_/su yi ched du dpa' bo khyod kyis 'od phyung bas/_/'dir ni ngan song gsum zhi byang chub yan lag rdzogs/_/chos kyi rje yis bdag cag rnams kyi dogs pa sol/_/mi rnams kyi ni yid gnyis ma lus legs par khum/_/'khor kun dga' bas rtog bgyid na/_/su 
[\[298b.3\]]slad de ring 'dzum pa bstan/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas bskor ba byas te rang gi stan la 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe glang po che'i lta stangs kyis phyogs bcur gzigs 
[\[298b.4\]]nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'dis tshul 'di lta bu dang /_rgya che ba 'di lta bu dang /_rnam pa 'di lta bu 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[298b.5\]]ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'di bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[298b.6\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dri ma med ces bya bar yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs 
[\[298b.7\]]su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba/_kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dri ma med pa de ni lag 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]mthil ltar mnyam par 'gyur te/[ (]baidUr+ya [,]bai DUr+ya [)]dkar po las grub pa/_zla ba lta bur snang ba/_shin tu dri ma med pa/_shin tu rnam par dag pa/_mching bu med pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang tshad med par 
[\[299a.2\]]gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa/_rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pa sha stag go/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni nam mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa na longs spyod de/_de dag nam mkha' la khang pa brtsegs 
[\[299a.3\]]pa na gnas pa na [(]baidUr+ya [,]bai DUr+ya [)]dkar po las grub pa'i sa chen po der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba de'i gzugs brnyan mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis mthong ma thag tu chos 'di dag thams cad ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'o zhes dran pa skye bar 
[\[299a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gang la the tsom za ba na de de bzhin gshegs pas de la snang bar gyur pa de la zhu bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la zhus pa'i lung bstan pas sems rangs par mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[299a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis chos de thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de na grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor yod par mi 'gyur 
[\[299a.6\]]ro/_/sems can de dag thams cad kyang nam mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa na 'khod par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bud med du gdags pa'ang med par 'gyur ro/_/sems can de dag thams cad kyang pad ma'i snying po las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten 
[\[299a.7\]]gyi khams de na kha zas su gdags pa med de/_sems can de dag thams cad ni bsam gtan la dga' ba dang /_chos la dga' ba'i zas can du 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na gzhan rnam par gzhag pa med de/_sems can de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po la 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]nges par 'gyur ba dag go/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na tshul khrims log par zhugs pa'am/_lta ba log par zhugs pa'am/_cho ga log par zhugs pa'am/_'tsho ba log par zhugs pa'i sems can 'ga' yang med par 'gyur ro/_/sems can de dag thams cad ni nan tan 
[\[299b.2\]]dang ldan pa ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur ba sha stag go/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bdud dam/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha 'am/_gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa can dang /_kun tu rgyu dang dmigs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa dang /_pha rol 
[\[299b.3\]]rgol ba med par 'gyur ro/_/sems can de dag thams cad ni zab mo'i spyod yul stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na ming du btags pa tsam dang /_'du shes tsam ma gtogs par lha dang mi zhes tha dad du bya ba med par 'gyur ro/_/sems 
[\[299b.4\]]can de dag thams cad ni yongs su spyod pa mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de yang lha dang /_mi rnams kyi skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo 
[\[299b.5\]]mang po la bde ba'i phyir bar gyi bskal pa bcu tham par bzhugs par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa de gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bzhed pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar ba 
[\[299b.6\]]'di nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig 
[\[299b.7\]]rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya ba lung bstan nas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo bar gyi 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]bskal pa de yang sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang chos dkon mchog dang dge 'dun dkon mchog dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/_bar gyi bskal pa de ni dkon mchog 'byung ba zhes brjod do/_/de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das las 
[\[300a.2\]]lung bstan pa thos nas dga' zhing mgu ste/_yi rangs shing rab tu dga' nas/_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes te/_byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis sa las steng gi bar snang la shing ta la bdun tsam du 'phags te/_
[\[300a.3\]]thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dad pa rgya cher spel ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_rang gi shes rab kyi spobs pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/chos 'di thams cad rab tu dben pa dang /_/dri ma 
[\[300a.4\]]med de nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/_/rgyud kyi dam pa 'di ni rnam shes na/_/de phyir de dag thub sras thu bor 'gyur/_/rmi lam bzhin du mthong ba cung zad med/_/thams cad med de gzung med gsog dang gsob/_/chos rnams thams cad rmi lam 'drar shes nas/_/'dus 
[\[300a.5\]]byas dag la skyo bar 'gyur ba med/_/la las sgyu ma'i rta dang glang chen dang /_/shing rta dpung bu chung dang bzhon mthong ba/_/dam pa'i don du snying po med pa ltar/_/phung po 'di dag sgyu 'dra snying po med/_/gzugs kyi rang bzhin dbu ba rdos pa bzhin/_/tshor ba 'di ni 
[\[300a.6\]]chu yi chu bur 'dra/_/'du shes dag ni smig rgyu 'dra bar gsungs/_/'dus byas thams cad chu shing snying po med/_/srid gsum 'di ni sems yid rnam par shes/_/rgyal bas de bzhin sgyu 'dra gsog tu gsungs/_/gzugs kyi rang bzhin stong par rig nas ni/_/
[\[300a.7\]]'dus byas dag la nam yang skyo ba med/_/khams bzhi po ni chos kyi dbyings 'dra dang /_/skye mched rnams ni grong stong lta bu dang /_/chos 'di gsog dang gsob ltar rnam shes pa/_/de dag rgyal ba'i chos mdzod 'dzin pa yin/_/rab tu dul phyir sbyin dang dul ba dang /_/
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]de bzhin tshul khrims rnam dag tshul khrims dang /_/rtag tu 'phags pa'i tshul gyis bzod mi zad/_/stong pa nyid phyir brtson 'grus rnam par dag_/bsam gtan rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa dang /_/de ltar shes rab chags med ma spros par/_/gang gi 'jug pa de 
[\[300b.2\]]'drar gyur pa de/_/pha rol phyin pa'i pha rol rab tu phyin/_/bdag med kho na nyid phyir byams pa mnyam/_/nam mkha' lta bur gong du snying rje dag_/zhi phyir dga' dang btang snyoms bcas pa yi/_/lam 'di tshangs pa'i lam ste rtag tu zhi/_/bsdu ba bzhi po khyad par 
[\[300b.3\]]'phags pa 'di/_/rnam par 'dren pas rjes su gzung phyir gsungs/_/'dzin pa med cing rnam rtog gang med pa/_/de ni bsdu ba'i dngos po'i pha rol phyin/_/sems can 'di dag bdag med sems can med/_/srog dang gso ba gang zag mi rnyed do/_/dbang po drug 
[\[300b.4\]]'di stong ste rab zhi bar/_/gang shes de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin/_/sems can med cing byang chub sems dpa' med/_/de ni gang du'ang bdag med rlom sems med/_/gnyis dang bral zhing ma chags spros med pa/_/sems can byang chub sems dpa' de 
[\[300b.5\]]dpal ldan/_/chos 'di snying po med de sgyu ma 'dra/_/gang du'ang mi 'ong nam yang 'gror mi 'gyur/_/chos dbyings 'di yi gnas pa rig nas ni/_/rgyal bas de bzhin nyid ni mnyam sangs rgyas/_/gang na'ang yod pa'am med pa med mod kyi/_/rgyu la brten nas chos 
[\[300b.6\]]rnams 'byung bas na/_/mkha' la glog mthong 'jig pa lta bur ni/_/sems kyi 'khri shing de ltar shes par bya/_/rlung ni nam mkhar mi chags rgyu ba bzhin/_/gzugs med sems ni 'dus byas dag la rgyu/_/sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag de shes nas/_/
[\[300b.7\]]nyon mongs gzugs med sogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/lus ni rtsig pa rtswa dang lo ma 'dra/_/blun pa rje med rdo shing ngan pa ltar/_/de yis snga ma'i rang bzhin 'drar shes nas/_/lus kyi chos la gnas par mi byed do/_/tshig ni rtag tu gzung med rlung dang 'dra/_/ri dang 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]phug gi brag ca lta bu ste/_/de 'drar sgra ni rab tu dben shes pa/_/sgra rnams kun la 'dod pa'i chags pa med/_/bdag ni nam mkha'i ngos gnas mi ltung ste/_/mkha' las ltung ba'i gnas kyang yod ma yin/_/chos 'di nam mkha' 'dra bar bsgoms 
[\[301a.2\]]nas ni/_/de ltar sems can sems can med mtshungs gnas/_/bskal pa brgya phrag mang por bsregs kyang ni/_/ji ltar nam mkha' nam yang sngon ma tshig_/chos rnams thams cad nam mkhar 'drar shes pa/_/de sreg bskal tshe zhing rnams brgyar yang 'gro/_/ri dang 
[\[301a.3\]]ri bar kho ra khor yug ri/_/de bzhin ri dang bcas pa'i sa rnams kun/_/nam mkha'i ngos kyis phye bar rig nas de/_/rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis bye ba'i zhing du 'gro/_/sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dag dang /_/khams bzhi 'di dag nam mkha'i ngos mnyam par/_/dpa' bo tshul 
[\[301a.4\]]'di khong du chud pa dag_/mkha' las bye ba mtha' yas zhing du 'gro/_/srid pa gsum na sgra dang skad kyi bag_/bzang ngan de bzhin 'bring po ci yod pa/_/de yi mtha' ma bskal pa brgyar brjod kyang /_/sngon gyi rang bzhin mi snang rgyu ba med/_/rang byung ba ni mtshan mchog 
[\[301a.5\]]ma yin yang /_/sems kyi chos kyis gzugs kyis rab tu phye/_/sems dang yid ni mtshungs pa dben par gyur/_/rgyal ba thams cad chos mtshungs nyid phyir mnyam/_/sngon gyi srid par byang chub spyad spyod cing /_/dge ba brgya stong rab tu bsags nas ni/_/byang chub 
[\[301a.6\]]mnyam zhing mnyam par rab shes pa/_/grags pa chen po rnams ni lung bstan 'gyur/_/chos rnams kun ni rang yul yang dag ste/_/mtha' yas phyir ni rgyal ba'i yul du mnyam/_/mnyam nyid 'di dag gang gis rab shes pa/_/yon tan ldan pa de dag lung bstan 'gyur/_/
[\[301a.7\]]bdag ni gzugs min tshor min 'du shes min/_/sems pa ma yin rnam par shes med kyang /_/byang chub khong du chud pas bdag lung bstan/_/phung po khams kyis bdag ni lung ma bstan/_/bzod pa gang zhig gzod ma nas zhi yi/_/skad cig pa ni zad dang 'dra 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]min la/_/mtshungs med mi skye ba la bzod pa na/_/mi dbang 'gyur zhes rgyal bas lung bstan to/_/chos rnams kun dang bdag tu rang bzhin mnyam/_/bdag ni bdag med stong pa'i rang bzhin te/_/stong pa nam mkha' 'dra ba'i ngo bo nyid/_/byang chub rtag tu mkha' mnyam rang 
[\[301b.2\]]bzhin no/_/zad par bya phyir zad pa shes mi nus/_/mi zad pa ni zad pas zad mi 'gyur/_/zad pa'i sgo yis chos rnams kun ma skyes/_/bzod dang ldan la sangs rgyas lung ston to/_/mtshan med gnas 'jug pa yi gnas med de/_/yang dag 'dus ma byas pa dus las 
[\[301b.3\]]grol/_/ma byas byed du ma bcug byung ba min/_/de bzhin nyid 'drar rgyal bas bdag lung bstan/_/gal te bdag ni lung bstan 'gyur snyam na/_/chos lam tshul la mi mnyam sbyor ba yin/_/sems dang yid kyis sbyor ba sbyor ma yin/_/chos sbyor khyad par 'phags 'di 
[\[301b.4\]]mtshungs shing mnyam/_/khyed cag thams cad sa yi steng na 'khod/_/bdag ni nam mkha'i dkyil na rnam par gnas/_/sa dang nam mkha' mnyam par shes nas ni/_/srid pa gsum na chags med ye shes 'jug_/de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos tshigs 
[\[301b.5\]]su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas steng gi bar snang las babs te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas ni bdag gi ched du byung ngo /_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[301b.6\]]sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa don ma mchis par ma bgyis te/_sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis bdag ma bslus pas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung 
[\[301b.7\]]bstan to/_/de nas 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed de/_mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang las dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mi 'am 
[\[302a.2\]]ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de bzhin gshegs pa gang las byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/_
[\[302a.3\]]rgyas pa/_tshad med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_
[\[302a.4\]]bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen phung po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 
[\[302a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen phung po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni bye ba phrag drug cur gyur te/_thams cad kyang brtson 'grus brtsams pa/_bzod pa rab tu thob pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[302a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go/_/de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag drug cu thub par gyur to/_/dge ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yang [(]baidUr+ya [,]bai DUr+ya [)]las grub pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa dga' 
[\[302a.7\]]ldan gyi lha'i ris lta bur khang khyim dang /_longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba bsams pa tsam gyis 'byor pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na theg pa chen po ma gtogs par theg pa gzhan rnam par gzhag pa med par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'dzin ces bya ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/_de'i slas ni stong phrag bzhi bcu yod do/_/de'i bu ni stong tham pa yod de/_dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs can 
[\[302b.2\]]pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa sha stag go/_/rigs kyi bu rgyal pos 'dzin des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu la lo bye ba tham par yid du 'ong ba'i chos gos dang /_zhal zas dang /_mal 
[\[302b.3\]]cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams dang /_bde bar sbyar ba bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de la mchod pa dpag tu med pa byas te/_dge ba'i rtsa bas 
[\[302b.4\]]nye bar brtan nas bud med bzhi stong po de dag dang /_bu stong po de dag dang /_srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/des byang chub tu sems bskyed nas kyang lo bye bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[302b.5\]]gshegs pa rin chen phung po de la bsnyen bkur byas so/_/de dus gzhan zhig na bu thu bo brtul zhugs yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba rgyal por bcug nas rgyal srid thams cad bor te/_skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad 
[\[302b.6\]]pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/de na rgyal po'i bu de dag gis kyang rim gyis bu thu bo re re rgyal por bcug nas pha'i rjes su rab tu byung bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na rnam grangs 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ring bar gyur to/_/rgyal po gzhon 
[\[302b.7\]]nu de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de las rab tu byung nas rgyal bu gzhon nu tha chung sa snying rje'i blo zhes bya ba gcig pu ma gtogs te/_de ni chos kyis rgyal srid byed pa chad pa med pa dang /_mtshon cha med par chos dang 'thun par dbang byed du bcug go/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]de ltar rgyal po sa 'dzin de bu dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas thog ma dang bar ma dang tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de'i dam pa'i chos rab tu bzung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 
[\[303a.2\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sa 'dzin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tsom za'am yid gnyis su gyur pa lta na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal 
[\[303a.3\]]po sa 'dzin zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rgyal po de'i bur gyur pa de dag thams cad ni de ltar phyogs bcu na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de las bla na med 
[\[303a.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed tshun chad/_da'i bar thams cad du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang chos nyan pa dang /_dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang ma bral bar gyur to/_/'dis 
[\[303a.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyang myur du yang dag par bsgrubs pas 'di la ngas 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung yang bstan to/_/
[\[303a.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pas 
[\[303a.7\]]'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus bgyis pa'i rgyu ba nas yun ring du lags pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i mkhyen pas gzigs pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang ldan no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu gang sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i sems kyi rgyu zad pa/_'gags pa/_bral 
[\[303b.2\]]ba/_rnam par gyur pa/_rgyu gang dag las sems kyi rgyud de dag byung ba dang /_rgyu gang dag med pas zad pa/_dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'am/_lung du bstan pa'am/_lung du ma bstan pa de dag thams cad rnam pa dang bcas/_gzhi dang bcas/_gtan tshigs dang 
[\[303b.3\]]bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud byung ba dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'am/_lung du bstan pa'am/_lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste/_sems rang gi 'og tu sems gang byung ba de 
[\[303b.4\]]dag thams cad kyang rnam pa dang bcas/_gzhi dang bcas/_gtan tshigs dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang sems las byung ba'i chos dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'am/_lung 
[\[303b.5\]]du bstan pa'am/_lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste/_sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa dang bcas/_gzhi dang bcas pa/_gtan tshigs dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar 
[\[303b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags sum 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[303b.7\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa la zhag bdun bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas yongs su longs spyad par bya 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]ba'i phyir rang gi khang khyim dang /_'khor gyi khyams de yang bcom ldan 'das la phul te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du rtag tu 'dir gshegs shing bzhugs par gsol/_des na skye bo mang po la phan pa 
[\[304a.2\]]dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo'i tshogs phal po che'i don dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_dri za dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i bu dri ma med pa'i mig ces bya 
[\[304a.3\]]bas bcom ldan 'das la nor bu rin po che'i dra ba phul nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs su lags kyang bdag cag ni sil snyan dang rol mo'i dbyangs 
[\[304a.4\]]sgra dang /_glu dang gar la rab tu chags/_me tog dang spos dang bdug pa dang byug pa dang /_phye ma la bag ma mchis par dga' zhing rtse ba lags na ji ltar bdag cag bag mchis par 'gyur zhing /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 
[\[304a.5\]]chos rin po che'i phyag rgya'i sgo'i gdams ngag bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la stsal bar gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i bu dri ma med pa'i mig la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag de'i phyir deng phyin 
[\[304a.6\]]cad sil snyan dang glu dbyangs de dag las byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos drug cu rtsa bzhi 'byung bar khyed la byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi rtag pa'i sgra 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyi sgra dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra dang /_
[\[304a.7\]]zhi ba'i sgra dang /_mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i sgra dang /_dben pa'i sgra dang /_mi skye ba'i sgra dang /_dngos po med pa'i sgra dang /_'byung ba med pa'i sgra dang /_gnas med pa'i sgra dang /_ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgra dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgra dang /_chos kyi dbyings 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]kyi sgra dang /_sems can med pa'i sgra dang /_srog med pa'i sgra dang /_gang zag med pa'i sgra dang /_sbyin pa'i sgra dang /_tshul khrims kyi sgra dang /_bzod pa'i sgra dang /_brtson 'grus kyi sgra dang /_bsam gtan gyi sgra dang /_shes rab kyi sgra dang /_byams 
[\[304b.2\]]pa'i sgra dang /_snying rje'i sgra dang /_dga' ba'i sgra dang /_btang snyoms kyi sgra dang /_'ong ba med pa'i sgra dang /_'gro ba med pa'i sgra dang /_rgyu ba med pa'i sgra dang /_gnas med pa'i sgra dang /_brtan pa med pa'i sgra dang /_stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i 
[\[304b.3\]]sgra dang /_smon pa med pa'i sgra dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgra dang /_'byung ba med pa'i sgra dang /_rten pa'i sgra dang /_rten pa med pa'i sgra dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra dang /_byang chub tshad med pa'i sgra dang /_dran 
[\[304b.4\]]pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sgra dang /_yang dag par spong ba'i sgra dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sgra dang /_dbang po'i sgra dang /_stobs kyi sgra dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgra dang /_lam gyi sgra dang /_zhi gnas kyi sgra dang /_lhag mthong gi sgra dang /_thabs kyi sgra dang /_
[\[304b.5\]]bsdu ba'i dngos po'i sgra dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgra dang /_bdud tshar gcad pa'i sgra dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i sgra dang /_chos thams cad sgyu ma dang /_rmi lam dang /_gzugs brnyan dang /_chu'i zla ba dang /_brag ca lta 
[\[304b.6\]]bu'i sgra dang /_chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med pa'i sgra dang /_'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i sgra dang /_'byung ba'i sgra dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi sgra dang /_dbu ba dang /_chu'i chu bur dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu shing gi phung po dang /_sgyu ma dang /_
[\[304b.7\]]snying po med pa'i sgra dang /_ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bya zhing chos bsgrub pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi mthus sil snyan dang glu dbyangs de dag las gang gi khyed bag yod par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgrub par 'gyur 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]ba de lta bu'i sgra 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro//_//bam po lnga pa ste tha ma/_de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du 
[\[305a.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang byang chub 'di byin gyi rlabs kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_chos bstan pa dang /_ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu yongs su bzung ba ni ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[305a.3\]]stsal pa/_grogs po dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu yongs su bzung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bzung bas sems can thams cad yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[305a.4\]]grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bzung ba gang yin pa de sems can thams cad kyi don nyid do/_/de ltar na sems can thams cad kyi ched du de dag go cha gang gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa 'khor ba las mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam du 
[\[305a.5\]]gzud par 'gyur ba'i go cha chen po gyon no/_/grogs po dag rnam grangs 'dis 'di lta rang da ltar bzhugs kyang rung yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su bzung ba mdzad pa gang yin pa des sems can thams cad yongs su bzung ba 
[\[305a.6\]]yin par rig par bya'o/_/grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' la chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis rim gror byas pa ni sems can thams cad la rim gro byas par 'gyur ro/_/grogs po dag byang 
[\[305a.7\]]chub sems dpa' la bde bar sbyar ba nye bar bsgrubs pa ni sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyar ba nye bar bsgrubs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_grogs po dag tha na byang chub sems dpa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang /_rngub pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang sems can 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]thams cad la snying rje chen po rab tu 'thob pa dang ldan pa dang /_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir yongs su 'dzin to/_/de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_
[\[305b.2\]]dri za dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas/_lha'i me tog rnam pa mang po kha dog sna tshogs pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/_/de nas mi 
[\[305b.3\]]'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos 'di snyam du bsams te/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis sam/_gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis bdag gi gnas nas/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gshegs pa ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis bdag gis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[305b.4\]]pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir shing rta gang la bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par bzhugs pa de lta bu'i shing rta bkod pa bsgrubs te/_shing rta de yang bdag 'khor dang bcas pas drangs nas/_de ltar na 
[\[305b.5\]]bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas par 'gyur snyam mo/_/de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos yid las byung ba lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta 'phang du dpag tshad lnga khyon du dpag tshad lnga pa/_kha khyer rin po che sna tshogs kyis bskor ba shing ljon pa sna 
[\[305b.6\]]tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa steng du rin po che'i dra ba bres pa/_rin po che'i skud pa mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bres pa mngon par sprul nas shing rta de la bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri bkra ba blta na sdug pa/_'phang du mi bdun yod pa/_ras bcos ma zung brgya stong mang 
[\[305b.7\]]po bkram pa mngon par sprul/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad kyi stan yang so sor mngon par sprul/_gang dag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan zhing zhabs 'bring du 'brang ba brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]ba dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gi stan yang shing rta de'i steng du ci rigs par sprul to/_/de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de lta bu'i shing rta bkod pa de sprul nas thal mo sbyar 
[\[306a.2\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du shing rta 'di la ji ltar gdan bshams pa rnams la 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs su gsol/_de nas seng ge'i khri de la 
[\[306a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhugs/_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun dang 'khor thams cad kyang ci rigs par 'khod do/_/de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis shing rta de lag pa g.yas pas blangs te/_shing ta la bdun 
[\[306a.4\]]srid kyi steng gi bar snang la 'phags nas/_de nas mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag thams cad dang bu brgyad stong po de dag dang gzhan yang mi 'am ci dang dri za dang lto 'phye chen po brgya stong phrag du ma dang mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po nyid kyang rin po che'i thag pa thogs nas shing 
[\[306a.5\]]rta la btags te nam mkha' las drangs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das steng gi bar snang gi shing rta la bzhugs shing /_nam mkha'i dkyil nas gshegs pa la mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs blangs nas mchod pa byed de mdun 
[\[306a.6\]]du dong zhing bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po/_/gzugs kyi dam pa dang ni ldan pa dag_/sil snyan rnams ni rab tu dkrol bgyid cing /_/yang dag bsngags pas 'dren la bstod pa bgyid/_/
[\[306a.7\]]mtshan mchog bsod nams kyis ni gzi brjid gyur/_/gzugs mchog mthong na dga' bar bgyid pa'i gzugs/_/bden pa'i yon tan la ni rtag gnas pa/_/yon tan mtsho chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams dang khyod mi 'dra/_/g.yas g.yon 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]na yang rnam par mthong ma myong /_/ji ltar ri rab brtan zhing mi g.yo ba/_/de ltar khyed kyi sku ni dpal gyis mdzes/_/'dren pa khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/_/chags pa ma mchis par yang mkha' las mchi/_/nam mkha' lta bur dag cing dri mi mnga'/_/bcom ldan 
[\[306b.2\]]nyon mongs bsal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha dbang lha min dbang dang srin po dang /_/brgya byin tshangs pa dang ni dag pa'i lha/_/nyi ma zla ba skar mar bcas pa'i 'od/_/khyed kyi mdzod spus 'od ni ma mchis gyur/_/shes rab 'byung gnas shes rab rgya mtsho ldan/_/sems 
[\[306b.3\]]can kun gyi sems kyi spyod la mkhas/_/'jig rten gsum na 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod/_/'jig rten grags pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdud bzhi po yi skyon rnams bsal ba po/_/bden pa bzhi la bsgom zhing dpyod mdzad pa/_/rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi 
[\[306b.4\]]stobs kyis bsnyengs mi mnga'/_/sangs rgyas gshegs pas gshegs te gshegs pa mdzes/_/bskal pa brgyar yang skyo ba mi mnga' zhing /_/rtag tu dul la thugs ni mnyam par bzhag_/legs par gsungs pas 'gro ba tshim mdzad kyang /_/khyod ni tshig 
[\[306b.5\]]dang skad la gnas ma lags/_/khyod kyi gsung ni yid 'ong rab tu snyan/_/zhing brgya dag tu thogs pa med par mchi/_/sgra ni sems can gang gis thos gyur pa/_/de dag thams cad bde bas tshim par 'gyur/_/sems can kha lo sgyur ba spu gcig tu/_/stong gsum 
[\[306b.6\]]rgya mtsho'i chab rnams zhugs gyur kyang /_/sems can rags pa rnams la'ang mi gnod la/_/rdzu 'phrul la yang skyon ni yong mi gda'/_/stong gsum gyi ni ri bo ri rab dag_/phyag gcig gi ni mthil du bzhag nas su/_/zhing mang bye ba dag tu gshegs mdzad 
[\[306b.7\]]kyang /_/khyod kyi sku yi stobs ni zhum ma mchis/_/khyod ni bskal pa brgya phrag bsam yas nas/_/brtul zhugs dka' thub tshul khrims yon tan dang /_/sbyin dang dul dang sdom dang bzod pa dang /_/brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab shin tu bslabs/_/sangs 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]rgyas bye ba mang la bsnyen bkur mdzad/_/de dag rnams kyis bshad pa'i chos kyang bzung /_/thugs rje ldan zhing 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir/_/khyod la yongs su skyo ba'i thugs mi mnga'/_/rim gror ma bgyis zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /_/rim gro bgyis 
[\[307a.2\]]pas mtho bar 'gyur ma lags/_/dog sa lta bur snyoms shing mi g.yo ste/_/'jig rten chos gnas mi gos pad ma bzhin/_/chos rnams stong pa mtshan ma ma mchis dang /_/chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma lta bu dang /_/dbu ba rdos 'dra rmi lam glog 'dra dang /_/smig rgyu'i 
[\[307a.3\]]mtshan nyid lta bur rab tu mkhyen/_/ngo bo nyid kyis gang zag bdag ma mchis/_/gdod nas stong zhing mi g.yo rjes ma mchis/_/nam mkha' lta bur dag cing dri ma mchis/_/dngos po bas par dngos po ma mchis 'dra/_/las dang bya brgyu dang rkyen rnams las/_/byung 
[\[307a.4\]]ba lags kyi rjes ni ma mchis par/_/tshul 'di rnam par sbyang ba mdzad pas na/_/de phyir khyod ni rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bgyi/_/gang dag 'dren pa mthong zhing thos gyur pa/_/de dag la ni ngan song 'jigs ma mchis/_/de dag bde 'gro dag tu mchog gzhol te/_/
[\[307a.5\]]srog chags de rnams kyi ni rnyed pa lags/_/bdag cag rnams kyis gang zag dam pa khyod/_/kun tu mchod pas mchod pa bgyis nas su/_/byang chub tu ni sems kyang bskyed bgyis te/_/gang zag mchog 'drar thams cad 'gyur bar shog_/nam mkha' la 
[\[307a.6\]]ni dpag tu nus kyang gda'/_/rgya mtsho'i chab ni bas bgyir nus kyang gda'/_/nyi zla mkha' las sar ni ltung gda' yi/_/sangs rgyas yon tan bas par 'gyur mi gda'/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta la bzhugs te nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas gshegs 
[\[307a.7\]]pas gshegs shing /_gser gyi kha dog lta bur sku las 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od phyung ba dang /_'od des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po dang /_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri yang rab tu khyab par 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer dang bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba der gshegs so/_/de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi rgyal po ma skyes dgra blon po dang /_rgyal bu dang /_tshong dpon dang /_grong rdal pa dang /_khyim 
[\[307b.2\]]bdag tu bcas pa dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams 'od des bskul nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang ba 
[\[307b.3\]]dan thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das bsu ba'i phyir rings pa rings par rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo /_/sdong po'i slas rnams shing rta 'dren bzhin du sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong byed 
[\[307b.4\]]do/_/mi 'am ci mo'i rol mo sil snyan gyi sgra des bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri thams cad du grag par gyur to/_/de ltar mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po dpung dang bcas/_'khor dang bcas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil nas khyer te bya rgod kyi 
[\[307b.5\]]phung po'i ri la bzhag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta de las babs nas rang gi gnas su gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang shing rta de las babs nas bcom ldan 
[\[307b.6\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas bcom ldan 'das la kun nas bskor te rang rang gi stan la 'khod do/_/'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag kyang shing rta de las babs 
[\[307b.7\]]te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra blon po dang /_rgyal bu dang /_tshong dpon dang /_khyim bdag dang /_grong rdal pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen 
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan ji ltar thogs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod 
[\[308a.2\]]pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la sku ma mnyel tam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 
[\[308a.3\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te/_shing rta la bzhugs pa nam mkha'i dkyil nas drangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i 'khor dang 
[\[308a.4\]]bcas pas ci zhig 'thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po slas dang bcas/_bu dang bcas/_g.yog dang bcas pas 'dir byang chub tu sems bskyed nas de dag thams cad nam byang chub kyi snying 
[\[308a.5\]]po la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rab tu thob par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du phan tshun 'gro bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_chos nyan pa dang /_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_
[\[308a.6\]]tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur/_lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur/_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la brtson par 'gyur/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la spro bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras mi 'am ci'i bdag po sdong po la 'di skad 
[\[308a.7\]]ces smras so/_/mi 'am ci'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa mdzad pas khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed kyis khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de las shas shig kho bos kyang thob par 'dod do/_/mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos smras pa/_rgyal po 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di thams cad bdag gis khyod dang sems can thams cad la dbul lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni gang sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de gang yang med do/_/rgyal po chen 
[\[308b.2\]]po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni ser sna can ma yin te/_de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la ser sna mi bskyed do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la gtong yang yid mi bde bar mi bgyid/_'gyod par mi 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[308b.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba gang thams cad mkhyen par yongs su bsngos pa de yang sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas byed pa dang /_sems can la sbyor ba dang /_
[\[308b.4\]]sems can gyi phyir 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis gang gi phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rnyed de/_de gnyis las khyod kyis dam pa'i chos thos nas des mi shes pa'i mun pa dang /_gti mug gi ling tog 
[\[308b.5\]]chen pos mtshams med pa'i 'gyod pa byang ba'i sems bsal nas khyod kyis chos la chos kyi snang ba chen po thob ste/_chos kyi snang ba des khyod da ltar sgrib pa med pa thob cing gnas pas khyod kyis kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na byang chub sems 
[\[308b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gus par byas te/_ji nas kyang chos kyi tshig dang /_yi ge 'bru gcig thos pa'ang brjed par mi 'gyur ba dang /_chud za bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_kun tu bzung ba dang /_yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir ba dag chos kyi snod du 'gyur bar bya'o/_/
[\[308b.7\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi snod du 'gyur ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]cod pan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na chos kyi snod du 'gyur ro/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i snod 
[\[309a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa'i snod bsam pa dang /_byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston pa'i snod sbyor ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba khyad par du 'gro ba'i snod lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_mang du thos pa'i snod dran pa dang /_lam la 'jug pa'i snod blo 
[\[309a.3\]]gros dang /_don rtogs pa rjes su rtogs pa'i snod rtogs pa dang /_longs spyod chen po'i snod sbyin pa dang /_bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i snod tshul khrims dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'thob pa'i snod bzod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[309a.4\]]thams cad 'grub pa'i snod brtson 'grus dang /_sems las su rung ba'i snod bsam gtan dang /_dogs pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i snod shes rab dang /_sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa'i snod byams pa dang /_dbul zhing nyam thag pa thams cad 
[\[309a.5\]]bskyabs pa'i snod snying rje dang /_chos la dga' ba'i snod dga' ba dang /_rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba spang ba'i snod btang snyoms dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'dzin du 'jug pa'i snod dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod thos 
[\[309a.6\]]pa tshol bas ngoms mi myong ba dang /_mi ltos pa'i snod rab tu 'byung ba dang /_don nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba'i snod dgon pa la gnas pa dang /_bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa'i snod dben pa la dga' ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i snod bsdu ba'i dngos po dang /_
[\[309a.7\]]chos snang ba'i snod dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa'i snod gzungs dang /_sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcad pa'i snod spobs pa dang /_sangs rgyas mthong ba'i snod sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]pa'i snod chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrung ba'i snod zhe sdang med pa'i sems dang /_lta bar gyur pa thams cad spong ba'i snod stong pa nyid la mos pa dang /_mthar 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su spong ba'i snod rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_mi 'khrugs 
[\[309b.2\]]shing phyad par lung ston pa'i snod mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang /_stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi snod phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sum cu rtsa gnyis 
[\[309b.3\]]po 'di dag dang ldan na chos kyi snod du rig par bya'o/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyang 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi snod du 
[\[309b.4\]]gyur cig_/bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du bstan pa'i chos de lta bu'i snod du gyur cig ces smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/mi 'am ci'i bdag po khyod kyis 'khor 'di skyo bar 
[\[309b.5\]]'gyur du 'ong gis khyod rang gi gnas su song shig_/mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang yongs su skyo ba de byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni skyo ba bzod par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[309b.6\]]'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongs su skyo ba lags/_ji ltar na yongs su mi skyo ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta 
[\[309b.7\]]ste/_sems can gyi khams tshad med pa thos na skrag pa dang /_'khor ba tshad med pa thos na skrag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshad med par thos na skrag pa dang /_bsod nams tshad med pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'grub pa thos na skrag pa ste/_mi 'am ci'i 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o/_/mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_sems can gyi khams tshad med pa de yang bdag gi 
[\[310a.2\]]yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa'i phyir 'khor ba tshad med pa yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshad med pa de bdag gi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa dang /_bsod nams tshad med 
[\[310a.3\]]pa bsags pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'grub ste/_bdag gis kyang bsgrub par bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa ste/_mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/_/mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[310a.4\]]dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_skabs skabs su nyan thos kyi theg pa la re ba dang /_skabs skabs su rang sangs rgyas theg pa la re ba dang /_dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa na yal bar 'dor zhing 
[\[310a.5\]]yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /_gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu mi 'jug pa ste/_mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o/_/mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang 
[\[310a.6\]]chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rab tu nyen kyang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis la mi dbang ba dang /_lus dang srog 'dor zhing dam pa'i chos 
[\[310a.7\]]bsrung ba dang /_dpag tshad stong du 'gro zhing gzhan dag byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/_mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/_/mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_slong ba mthong na yongs su skyo ba dang /_bsod snyoms byed par sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa dang /_mang du thos pa tshol ba la mi brtson pa dang /_ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams 
[\[310b.2\]]gzhan la mi ston pa ste/_mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o/_/mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta 
[\[310b.3\]]ste/_slong ba la bshes gnyen du 'du shes skyed cing zhe sdang ba'i sems med la bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med de tshur shog legs par 'ongs sam zhes bya ba'i tshig smra ba dang /_bdag bde ba la mi chags shing sems can thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin pa dang /_mang 
[\[310b.4\]]du thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms shing /_ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan dag la rgya cher rab tu ston cing zang zing med pa'i sems kyi chos de gzhan la rab tu ston pa ste/_mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo 
[\[310b.5\]]bar rig par bya'o/_/mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su mi tshol ba dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po la mi sbyor ba dang /_
[\[310b.6\]]sems can yongs su smin par byed par brtson 'grus mi rtsom pa dang /_yon tan chung ngu tsam gyis chog par 'dzin cing gong du mi tshol ba ste/_mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o/_/mi 'am ci'i 
[\[310b.7\]]bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su tshol ba dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po la rtag tu brtson pa dang /_sems 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]can yongs su smin par byed par brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_dge ba thams cad yongs su bkang ba'i phyir de la mi chags pa yin te/_mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/_/de 
[\[311a.2\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bzhi bsgrub pa 'di mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la lan btab nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su skyo ba dang /_yongs su mi skyo ba bzhi bsgrub pa la 'jug 
[\[311a.3\]]pa 'di thos sam/_rgyal pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das thos lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su mi skyo bar spyad par bya'o/_/rgyal po ma skyes dgras gsol pa/_
[\[311a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa gang lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bskang ba'i phyir mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la bka' stsal pa/_mi 'am ci'i bdag po ji ltar sems can 
[\[311a.5\]]yongs su smin par byed pa'i rang gi thabs mkhas pa'i khyad par rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bskang ba'i phyir khyod kyis ston cig/_de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos rang gi pi bang de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar blangs so/_/pi bang de 
[\[311a.6\]]blangs ma thag tu de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis pi bang gi sgra de las seng ge bsgyings pa ltar shing sA la du ma g.yo ba'i sgrar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo /_/phan pa 
[\[311a.7\]]spyod pa dag dang don spyod dang /_/chos thos nan tan byed pa spyod pa dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag yongs su skyo ba med par spyod/_/bde ba spyod dang skyid pa spyod pa dang /_/sems can kun la sems snyoms spyod pa dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag rgya chen ma yin spyod pa med/_/brtan pa spyod dang bden pa spyod pa dang /_/bsam pa yongs su dag pa spyod pa dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag gang du'ang sgyu med spyod pa yin/_/dul ba spyod dang sbyin pa spyod pa dang /_/dngos 
[\[311b.2\]]po thams cad yongs su gtong spyod dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag ser sna med par spyod pa yin/_/tshul khrims spyod pa ma nyams spyod pa dang /_/lus dang ngag ni yongs dag spyod pa dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag 
[\[311b.3\]]ngan pa'i ngang tshul spyod pa med/_/brtul zhugs spyod dang bzod pa spyod pa dang /_/khro skyon yongs su gcod pa'i spyod pa dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag gnod sems med par spyod pa yin/_/brtson 'grus spyod dang mthu rnams spyod pa dang /_/
[\[311b.4\]]'khor bar yongs su mi skyo spyod pa dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag le lo med par spyod pa yin/_/bsam gtan spyod dang ting 'dzin spyod pa dang /_/lus dang sems ni rab tu dben spyod dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag 
[\[311b.5\]]g.yeng ba med par spyod pa yin/_/shes rab spyod dang blo mchog spyod pa dang /_/chos rnams thams cad ji bzhin spyod pa dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag shes rab 'chal pa'i spyod pa med/_/byams pa spyod dang phan 'dod spyod pa dang /_/sems 
[\[311b.6\]]can kun la snying rje spyod pa dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag khro ba'i tha ba med par spyod/_/stong pa spyod dang rab tu dben spyod dang /_/mtshan ma med pa yongs su dag spyod dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag smon pa med par spyod pa 
[\[311b.7\]]yin/_/yang dag spyod dang de bzhin nyid spyod dang /_/thams cad mkhyen pa yongs su dag spyod dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag gang du'ang chags pa med par spyod/_/dad pa spyod dang dang ba spyod pa dang /_/dran dang g.yeng ba med par spyod pa dang /_/byang 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag yongs su gcod pa med par spyod/_/bsam gtan spyod dang rnam thar spyod pa dang /_/mngon shes lnga rnams yongs dag spyod pa dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag chags pa med 
[\[312a.2\]]par spyod pa yin/_/sangs rgyas spyod dang dam chos spyod pa dang /_/dge 'dun dkon mchog nye bar brtan spyod dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag dkon mchog mchog gi spyod pa yin/_/chos spyod pa dang shin tu rigs spyod dang /_/sems can 
[\[312a.3\]]thams cad yongs su smin spyod dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag rgyun mi 'chad par spyod pa yin/_/bya ba spyod dang chos rnams spyod pa dang /_/mtha' kun yongs su gcod pa'i spyod pa dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/
[\[312a.4\]]de dag gang du'ang lta bar spyod pa med/_/dag par spyod dang rnam par dag spyod dang /_/nyon mongs thams cad yongs su gcod spyod dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag yongs su gdung bar spyod pa med/_/bde ba spyod dang shin tu rnam thar 
[\[312a.5\]]spyod/_/sems can kun la 'jigs med mchog spyod dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag smon lam spyod pa med pa yin/_/nyi ma spyod dang zla ba spyod pa dang /_/pad ma lta bur gos pa med spyod dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod 
[\[312a.6\]]pa/_/de dag lhar bcas 'jig rten phyag bya ba/_/brgya byin spyod dang tshangs pa'i spyod pa dang /_/dkar po'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs spyod dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag bdud rnams sder bcas skrag par byed/_/mchog spyod pa 
[\[312a.7\]]dang khyad par 'phags spyod dang /_/'dod chags nyes pa tha ba gcod spyod dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag gang du'ang gti mug spyod pa med/_/lam spyod pa dang mu stegs spyod pa dang /_/shes rab mig ni yongs su dag spyod 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag yongs su rtog par spyod pa med/_/dul ba spyod dang rab tu zhi spyod dang /_/ming dang gzugs la mi chags spyod pa dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag lha dang mi ni mang pos bstod/_/
[\[312b.2\]]'phags pa'i spyod dang shin tu mnyam spyod dang /_/g.yon phyogs lam ni yongs su gcod spyod dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag rtag tu don la 'bab pa yin/_/dpa' bo spyod dang shin tu brtan spyod pa/_/bdud kyi sde rnams 'jigs par byed spyod dang /_/
[\[312b.3\]]byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag byang chub snying por gzhol ba yin/_/gzung ba spyod dang don yod spyod pa dang /_/gzungs la g.yeng ba med par spyod pa dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag gang du'ang ma rig spyod pa med/_/dgon pa 
[\[312b.4\]]spyod dang rab tu dben spyod pa/_/rtag tu rab tu 'byung bar spyod pa dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag nan tan byed par spyod pa yin/_/gtso bo'i spyod dang khyad par 'phags spyod dang /_/'jig rten thams cad zil gnon spyod pa dang /_/
[\[312b.5\]]byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag chung ngu la ni spyod pa med/_/rigs pa spyod dang thabs la spyod pa dang /_/bsam gtan bde las ldog par spyod pa dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag mi shes spyod pa med pa yin/_/lta ba 
[\[312b.6\]]spyod dang rnam par lta spyod dang /_/ming dang gzugs la mi chags spyod pa dang /_/byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag 'jigs pa med par spyod pa yin/_/thams cad spyod dang kun tu spyod pa dang /_/dbang po yongs su smin par spyod pa dang /_/byang chub 
[\[312b.7\]]mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/_/de dag ye shes nam mkha'i mtha' dang 'dra/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di pi bang gi sgra de las byung ba na/_byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]thob par gyur to/_/rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_dri za dang /_lto 'phye chen po de dag gi 'khor gyi srog chags brgyad stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[313a.2\]]chub tu sems bskyed nas tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la bslab par bgyi'o/_/nan tan gyis bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/sems can tshad ma mchis pa dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di nyid yang dag par 
[\[313a.3\]]'dzin du stsal bar bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'gror gnang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po bu dang bcas/_dpung dang bcas/_slas dang bcas/_rang gi skye bo dang 
[\[313a.4\]]bcas 'khor dang bcas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bzod pa gsol nas sil snyan dkrol/_me tog gi char phab/_'od zer gyi dra ba phyung ste/_sa chen po rnam pa drug tu 
[\[313a.5\]]g.yos par byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ste/_de skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang du rang gi khyim du phyin to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[313a.6\]]mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang chos la mchod pas bdag zil gyis non to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos khyod 'ba' zhig zil gyis mnan pa ma yin gyis/_kau shi ka byang 
[\[313a.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa thob pa ma gtogs par gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]zil gyis non to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag pas/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba thams cad zil gyis non to/_/kau shi ka de lta bas na byang chub sems 
[\[313b.2\]]dpa' ni lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis zil gyis mi non to/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' la zil gyis gnon par sems pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[313b.3\]]pa 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa las ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'byung ngo /_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan pa 'di thos nas thal mo sbyar te mchi ma blags nas 'di skad ces kye ma'o/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' 
[\[313b.4\]]zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' ba 'di lta bu las nyams so zhes smras so/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi bu lha'i bu 'od zer srung zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yang 'di ltar gang rab tu dben pa 
[\[313b.5\]]rnam par bsgrub par nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ma lags pa'i chos rnams la/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi bskyed pa de ni sems can thams cad la snying rje rnyed pa ma lags/_rgya chen po la mos pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la 
[\[313b.6\]]sten pa ma lags te/_phyis 'gyod par 'gyur ba'o/_/yab skyon med pa la zhugs te rgyud tshig cing sa bon tshig ste/_theg pa chen po'i snod du ma gyur pa la da bgyir ci mchis/_bstan pa 'di bshad pa na sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu las lha'i bu stong tham pas bla na 
[\[313b.7\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu 'od zer srung gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong phrag ji snyed pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bstar ba ni bdag la mngon sum du gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me 
[\[314a.2\]]mdzad las mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i bzod pa thob pa de la 'jug pa'i rnam par dbye ba bstan pa cung zad cig bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa gang 
[\[314a.3\]]bdag gis thos nas de bzhin nyid du bsgrubs pas chos de 'thob par 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu 'od zer srung la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa rnams kyis mi skye
