[\[314a.4\]]ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par mi 'gyur gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan pa rnams kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[314a.5\]]bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos mnyam pa nyid dang /_dge 'dun mnyam pa nyid dang /_zhing mnyam pa nyid de lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[314a.6\]]lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_bsam gtan bzhis stong pa nyid la rnam par rtse ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis thabs mkhas pa la rnam par rtse 
[\[314a.7\]]ba dang /_mngon par shes pa lngas ye shes la rnam par rtse ba dang /_thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis rdzu 'phrul la rnam par rtse ba ste/_'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/'od 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]zer srung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_phung po rnams la byang chub tshol yang phung po rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa dang /_khams rnams la 
[\[314b.2\]]byang chub tshol yang khams rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa dang skye mched rnams la byang chub tshol yang /_skye mched rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog pa dang /_chos thams cad la byang chub tshol yang chos thams cad la byang chub kyi rang 
[\[314b.3\]]bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa ste/_'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/'od zer srung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur 
[\[314b.4\]]ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_mi g.yo ba'i tshul gyis chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par shes pa dang /_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'jug pa dang /_chos thams cad mtshan nyid 'dres 
[\[314b.5\]]pa med pas chos kyi dbyings su 'du bar shes pa dang /_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song bas nam mkha'i rang bzhin du so sor rtog pa ste/_'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 
[\[314b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/lha'i bu 'od zer srung ni rjes su 'thun par chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/chos kyi rnam 
[\[314b.7\]]grangs 'di'i tha mar bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos zhus pa pha rol tu phyin pas 'dul ba bstan pa'i sgo'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ngam/_kun dga' bos gsol 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi mthu nyid kyis bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kye ma'o ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zab mo rnam par nges pa dang don bzang po dang tshig 'bru bzang pos 
[\[315a.2\]]brgyan pa ni mdzes te ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sgom bsdus pa de gang yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das sngon bdag la chos snang bar gyur pa gang lags pa de yang nga chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten nas 
[\[315a.3\]]'bum 'gyur du skyes so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam du bdag lta bu nyi tshe ba'i 'chal ba dang ldan pa blo chung ngu nyan thos kyi theg pa'i skyon ma mchis pa/_tha chad la zhugs par gnas pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas kyang 'di lta bu'i chos kyi snang ba 'di skyes 
[\[315a.4\]]par gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes tshad ma mchis pa'i snod du gyur pa/_blo rgya che zhing rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan pa/_chos rin po che thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa/_gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[315a.5\]]bgyi ba gang lags pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na chos kyi snang ba ji snyed cig thob par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal snyam bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nyi ma dang 
[\[315a.6\]]zla ba'i snang ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu gcig gi 'od kyis mog mog por 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od ji snyed byung ba de dag ni shes rab kyi 'od kyis brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/_
[\[315a.7\]]stong gi cha dang /_stong phrag brgya'i cha dang /_bye ba'i cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_snang ba thams cad ni shes rab kyi snang ba las byung 
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]ba'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba gang yin pa shes rab kyi snang ba de dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad 
[\[315b.2\]]kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang /_g.yo ba rnams mkhyen pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba de lta bu dang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag ldan par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /_thos nas kyang mos pa dang /_mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[315b.3\]]'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du so sor rtogs pa dang /_de bzhin du bsgrub pa de dag ni byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa dang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba don du gnyer 
[\[315b.4\]]ba dang snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos pa dang /_byams pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa dang /_bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying por gzhol ba'i skyes bu dam par rig par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di 
[\[315b.5\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams 
[\[315b.6\]]ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis snga dro'i dus kyi tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa 
[\[315b.7\]]dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sbyin pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du nyi ma'i gung dang /_phye ma red kyi dus dang /_
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]srod dang /_nam gyi gung thun dang /_tho ras stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar la sbyin pa byin pa 
[\[316a.2\]]dang /_rnam grangs 'di lta bus lo gcig gam/_lo brgya'am/_lo stong ngam/_lo brgya phrag stong du sbyin pa byin na kun dga' bo de la ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/_kun dga' bos gsol pa/_
[\[316a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das mang ste tshad ma mchis so/_/bde bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das gdugs gcig bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de yang tshad ma mchis na/_dgung lo brgya phrag stong du bsags pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_
[\[316a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod mos par bya'o/_/khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o/_/byang chub don du gnyer ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba don du gnyer ba dang /_sems can rab tu thar par bya ba don du gnyer ba gang chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[316a.5\]]'di thos nas mos sam/_'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de de las bsod nams kyi phung po mang du skyed na gang de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_
[\[316a.6\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_gzhan dag la yang ston na de ni sbyin pa zhes bya ste/_de ni sbyin pa thams cad zil 
[\[316a.7\]]gyis gnon pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_chos kyi sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa rnams kyi mchog go/_/'di lta ste/_chos kyi rjes su 'dzin pa de ni rjes su bzung ba rnams kyi mchog go/_/'di lta ste/_chos kyi gding ba de ni gding ba rnams kyi mchog go/_/'di lta ste chos yongs su 
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]'dzin pa de ni yongs su 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo chos kyi sbyin pa byin pas ni nyon mongs pa 'bri bar 'gyur ro/_/zang zing gi sbyin pa byin pas ni lus brtan pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[316b.2\]]nyon mongs pa 'bri bar byed 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba chos kyi sbyin pa de sbyin par bya ste/_chos kyi sbyin pa des ni yon tan gyi khyad par thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa ni yon tan gyi phan yon yang dag phul sum cu rtsa 
[\[316b.3\]]gnyis rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_rtog pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_'dod chags chung bar 'gyur ba dang /_zhe sdang chung bar 'gyur ba dang /_gti 
[\[316b.4\]]mug chung bar 'gyur ba dang /_bdag dang gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang /_skye bo mang po dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_de'i bsngags pa lha rnams kyis brjod par 'gyur ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za rnams kyis bsrung 
[\[316b.5\]]bar 'gyur ba dang /_las byas nas bsod snyoms za bar 'gyur ba dang /_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_grags pa dang /_sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa phyogs bcur grags 
[\[316b.6\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dam pa'i chos 
[\[316b.7\]]'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_ngan song thams cad kyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur zhing /_de la lha dang mir skye ba dka' bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba dang /_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_skye ba 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]dran par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_nam du yang dbang po mi tshang bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob par 'gyur ba dang /_gzi brjid can gyi gzungs kyi sa bon bsgrub par 
[\[317a.2\]]'gyur ba dang /_spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_skye bo mkhas pas g.yog byas par 'gyur ba dang /_shes rab chen po'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_myur du chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang /_de'i sems la tshul 
[\[317a.3\]]bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa kun tu mi 'byung ba dang /_'jig rten gyi zang zing gi sbyin pa thams cad zil gyis mnan nas de chos kyi gter zad mi shes pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba ste/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin na yon tan gyi khyad 
[\[317a.4\]]par yang dag phul sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags te/_bcom ldan 'das yongs 
[\[317a.5\]]su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na sems can snod du gyur pa de dag gi rna lam du bsgrag par bgyi/_kun bsrung bar bgyi/_mos par bgyi/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa 'di dang bsod nams yongs su 'dzin pa don du gnyer 
[\[317a.6\]]ba'i slad du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la legs so/_/zhes bya ba gnang ste/_kau shi ka khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir nga'i mdun du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legs so legs so/_/kau shi ka dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di nga'i 
[\[317a.7\]]dam pa'i chos yun ji srid du gnas pa de srid du lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa na lha ma yin rnams ni pham par 'gyur lha rnams ni rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yang dag phul yin te/_kau shi ka 'di lta ste/_chos thams 
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]cad mi dmigs pa de ni 'jigs pa med pa'i sbyin pa'o/_/kau shi ka gang cung zad 'jigs pa skye ba de dag thams cad ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba la dmigs shing rab tu gnas pa las byung ngo /_/kau shi ka gang mi dmigs pa de dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/de nas 
[\[317b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag bsam gtan gyi bde ba la gnas pa tshad ma mchis pa btang ste/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho 
[\[317b.3\]]brang 'khor gang dang gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod pa de dang de dag tu bdag chos nyan pa'i slad du nye bar mchi bar bgyi'o/_/mchis nas kyang chos smra ba de dag chos dang ldan pas bsrung ba dang /_sba ba dang bskyab par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom 
[\[317b.4\]]ldan 'das nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams ni 'di las byung ba'i slad du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[317b.5\]]'das rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos chen po de dag dang bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du bsrung ba dang sba ba dang bskyab pa la brtson par bgyi'o/_/bdag cag gi 'khor gang dag sangs rgyas 
[\[317b.6\]]dang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ma dad pa de dag kyang ji nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du brtson par 'gyur bar dad par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 
[\[317b.7\]]la brtson pa dang /_gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa srung ba mchis pa de dag srung ba'i ched du gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag la kha ton du bgyi'o/_/gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag gis gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za dang /_mi 'am ci 
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_grul bum la sogs pa dang /_mi dang mi ma lags pa dang /_gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la zhe sdang bar bgyid pa rnams shin tu tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/_/tar+ya thA/_ta ra be/_a ra be/_a no pe/_sa ra pe/_hu lu ma hA 
[\[318a.2\]]hu lu/_hu lu hu lu/_a bad Te/_bi kad Te/_pa ri ts+tshe dA ni/_ni gr-i h+Ni te/_pra g+hA ta ni/_id Ti id Ti/_bid Ti bid Ti/_ad tshe gad tshe/_mA ra ni gra ha na/_sarba pa ra pra bA di ni gra ha na/_sarba mi th+ya pra yA tA nan ni gra ha na/_sarba b+hU ta gra hAn/_bud d+ha bar Ni ta d+harma ni ya ta shA ya b+hu tan/_bud d+ha 
[\[318a.3\]]bar Ni tAn/_tsa tur ma hA rA dza ni rde shAn/_man+t+ra ba lAn/_a ba tA ra/_prek+Shi NA ni gra hA ya/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan la bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu dam pa dag ngas bskal pa mtha' yas grangs med par yang 
[\[318a.4\]]dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di ji nas yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang nub par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir khyed gnyis kyi lag tu bzhag go gtad do/_/de gnyis kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das 
[\[318a.5\]]pa'i slad na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi'o/_/rgyas par bgyi'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos smra ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi lag tu mchi bar bgyi'o/_/de dag mdo sde 'di la mos par bgyi ba dang yongs su 'dzin par 
[\[318a.6\]]bgyi ba'i slad du de dag gi yid rab tu gzung bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi rna lam du thos pa dang /_thos nas 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_'chang ba de dag ni byang chub 
[\[318a.7\]]sems dpa' byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyi byin gyi rlabs legs par rig par bgyi'o/_/de nas bdud sdig can 'khor der 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de gdong las mchi ma zag cing nga ro phyung nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]'das gang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa las brtsams te/_chos bstan pa la ni bdag tha na spu zing zhes bgyid pa tsam yang ma mchis so/_/gang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_
[\[318b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub kyi lam la 'jug pa/_sems can thams cad kyi rton pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsungs pa des bdag mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan zhing bdag nyid rnyis par gyur pa snyam bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la phyag brkyang ba bstsal 
[\[318b.3\]]du gsol/_gang thos pas bdag mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu yang mi gsung bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sdig can khyod dang 'thun pa'i sems can chos zab mo 'di lta bu la ma mos pa ni mang /_gang dag mos 
[\[318b.4\]]pa'i sems can de dag ni nyung gis/_mya ngan ma byed smre sngags ma 'don cig_/sdig can 'di lta ste dper na/_sa'i steng nas rdul blangs pa snyed kyi sems can ni chos kyi rnam grangs zab mo 'di lta bu la mos so/_/sa'i rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can ni chos kyi rnam grangs zab 
[\[318b.5\]]mo 'di la ma mos te/_de dag thams cad ni khyod dang 'thun no/_/sems can gyi khams tshad med pa khyod dang 'thun gyis de bas na sdig can dga' bar gyis shig_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sems can dpag tu med pa ni byang chub la yang dag par zhugs so/_/byang chub sems 
[\[318b.6\]]dpa' dgu khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/dge slong brgyad stong ni nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/
[\[318b.7\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/_lha'i me tog gi char ni rab tu phab/_sil snyan brgya stong dag ni ma dkrol bar rang 'khrol lo/_/lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams ni steng gi bar snang la kye ma 
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]bdag cag gis 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor ba 'di mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan te bshad nas/_sems can gyi don mdzad pa gang lags pa 'di na grong khyer 'khor mor 'jig tu chos kyi 
[\[319a.2\]]'khor lo bskor te/_sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa de bas ches mchog go/_/gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_gzhan dag la rgya cher ston pa dang /_tha na glegs bam la bris te/_'chang ba'i sems 
[\[319a.3\]]can de dag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das las 
[\[319a.4\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos zhus pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par nges pa bstan pa dang /_dam pa'i chos 
[\[319a.5\]]rin po che'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[319a.6\]]rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par dga'o//_//'phags pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal gyi lhun po dang /_
[\[319a.7\]]dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing sa te gtan la phab pa//_//
